T04canprasu:327: tadyathā- na paramārthataḥ parebhyastatpratyayebhyaḥ ādhyātmikāyatanajanma, paratvāt,
T04canprasu:329: athavā- na pare paramārthena vivakṣitāḥ cakṣurādyādhyātmikāyatananirvartakāḥ pratyayā iti pratīyante, paratvāt,
T04canprasu:332: yathā cānena- utpannā eva ādhyātmikā bhāvāḥ,
T04canprasu:333: tadviṣayiviśiṣṭavyavahārakaraṇāt- ityasya parābhihitasya hetorasiddhārthatāmudbhāvayiṣuṇā idamuktam, atha samāhitasya yoginaḥ
T04canprasu:334: prajñācakṣuṣā bhāvayāthātmyaṃ paśyataḥ utpādagatyādayaḥ santi paramārthata iti sādhyate, tadā tadviṣayiviśiṣṭavyavahārakaraṇāditi hetorasiddhārthatā,
T04canprasu:337: paramārthato 'gataṃ naiva gamyate, adhvatvāt, gatādhvavaditi adhvatvahetoḥ svata evāsiddhārthatā yojyā ||
T04canprasu:338: na paramārthataḥ sabhāgaṃ cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyati, cakṣurindriyatvāt, tadyathā tatsabhāgam |
T04canprasu:339: tathā- na cakṣuḥ prekṣate rūpam, bhautikatvāt, rūpavat |
T04canprasu:340: kharasvabhāvā na mahī, bhūtatvāt, tadyathānirlaḥ, ityādiṣu hetvādyasiddhiḥ svata eva yojyā
T04canprasu:342: kiṃ sattvāt caitanyavannādhyātmikānyāyatanāni svata utpadyantām, utāho ghaṭādivat svata utpadyantāmiti ghaṭādīnāṃ sādhyasamatvānnānaikāntikateti cet,
T04canprasu:344: nanu ca yathā parakīyeṣvanumāneṣu dūṣaṇamuktam, evaṃ svānumāneṣvapi yathoktadūṣaṇaprasaṅge sati sa eva asiddhādhārāsiddhahetvādidoṣaḥ prāpnoti, tataśca yaḥ ubhayordoṣaḥ, na tenaikaścodyo bhavatīti
T04canprasu:349: tathā hi- paraḥ cakṣuḥ paśyatīti pratipannaḥ |
T04canprasu:352: tasmād yatra yatra svātmādarśanaṃ tatra tatra paradarśanamapi nāsti,
T04canprasu:353: tadyathā ghaṭe, asti ca cakṣuṣaḥ svātmādarśanam, tasmāt paradarśanamapyasya naivāsti |
T04canprasu:354: tataśca svātmādarśanaviruddhaṃ nīlādiparadarśanaṃ svaprasiddhenaivānumānena virudhyata iti etāvanmātramasmadanūmānairudbhāvyata iti kuto 'smatpakṣe
T04canprasu:357: asti, sā ca svaprasiddhenaiva hetunā, na paraprasiddhena, lokata evaṃ dṛṣṭatvāt |
T04canprasu:358: kadāciddhi loke arthipratyarthibhyāṃ pramāṇīkṛtasya sākṣiṇo vacanena jayo bhavati parājayo vā, kadācit svavacanena |
T04canprasu:359: paravacanena tu na jayo nāpi parājayaḥ |
T04canprasu:362: ata eva kaiściduktam- na parataḥ prasiddhibalādanumānabādhā, paraprasiddhereva nirācikīrṣitatvāditi
T04canprasu:364: manyate- ya eva ubhayaniścitavādī, sa pramāṇaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ vā,
T04canprasu:365: nānyataraprasiddhasaṃdigdhavācī iti, tenāpi laukikīṃ vyavasthāmanurudhyamānena anumāne yathokta eva nyāyo 'bhyupeyaḥ ||
T04canprasu:366: tathā hi nobhayaprasiddhena vā āgamena bādhā, kiṃ tarhi svaprasiddhenāpi
T04canprasu:367: svārthānumāne tu sarvatra svaprasiddhireva garīyasī, nobhayaprasiddhiḥ |
T04canprasu:368: ata eva tarkalakṣaṇābhidhānaṃ niṣprayojanam, yathāsvaprasiddhayā upapattyā buddhaistadanabhijñavineyajanānugrahāt
T04canprasu:373: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate |
T04canprasu:379: sarvasya janma ca bhavetkhalu sarvataśca tulyaṃ paratvamakhile 'janake 'pi yasmāt ||
T04canprasu:381: ācāryabuddhapālitastu vyācaṣṭe- na parata utpadyante bhāvāḥ, sarvataḥ sarvasaṃbhavaprasaṅgāt ācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha- tadatra prasaṅgavākyatvāt sādhyasādhanaviparyayaṃ kṛtvā, svataḥ ubhayataḥ ahetuto
T04canprasu:382: vā utpadyante bhāvāḥ, kutaścitkasyacidutpatteḥ, iti prākpakṣavirodhaḥ |
T04canprasu:392: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate |
T04canprasu:394: gṛhyeta naiva ca jagadyadi hetuśūnyaṃ syādyadvadeva gaganotpalavarṇagandhau ||
T04canprasu:396: ācāryabuddhapālitastvāha- ahetuto notpadyante bhāvāḥ, sadā ca sarvataśca
T04canprasu:398: atrācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha- atrāpi prasaṅgavākyatvāt yadi viparītasādhyasādhanavyaktivākyārtha iṣyate, tadā etaduktaṃ bhavati- hetuta utpadyante bhāvāḥ, kadācit kutaścit kasyacidutpatteḥ, ārambhasāphalyācca |
T04canprasu:406: bhavadbhiḥ, yattarhi bhagavatoktam- avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā avidyānirodhātsaṃskāranirodha iti, tathā-
T04canprasu:408: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukhaḥ ||
T04canprasu:409: tathā- utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā, eko dharmaḥ sattvasthitaye yaduta catvāra āhārāḥ, dvau dharmau lokaṃ pālayato hrīścāpatrāpyaṃ cetyādi, tathā-
T04canprasu:410: paralokādihāgamanamihalokācca paralokagamanamiti, evaṃ nirodhādiviśiṣṭaḥ pratītyasamutpādo deśito bhagavatā, sa kathaṃ na ni (vi?) rudhyata iti?
T04canprasu:411: yata evaṃ nirodhādayaḥ pratītyasamutpādasyopalabhyante, ata evedaṃ madhyamakaśāstraṃ praṇītamācāryeṇa neyanītārthasūtrāntavibhāgopadarśanārtham |
T04canprasu:412: tatra ya ete pratītyasamutpādasyotpādādaya uktāḥ, na te vigatāvidyātimirānāsravaviṣayasvabhāvāpekṣayā, kiṃ tarhi avidyātimiropahatamatinayanajñānaviṣayāpekṣayā ||
T04canprasu:413: tattvadarśanāpekṣayā tūktaṃ bhagavatā- etaddhi bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yaduta amoṣadharma nirvāṇam, sarvasaṃskārāśca mṛṣā moṣadharmāṇaḥ iti |
T04canprasu:414: tathā- nāstyatra tathatā vā avitathatā vā |
T04canprasu:422: divā vā yadi vā rātrau saṃprajānan pratismṛtaḥ |
T04canprasu:425: yasyaivaṃ deśanābhiprāyānabhijñatayā saṃdehaḥ syāt- kā hyatra deśanā
T04canprasu:426: tattvārthā, kā nu khalu ābhiprāyikīti, yaścāpi mandabuddhitayā neyārthāṃ
T04canprasu:431: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā ||
T04canprasu:438: katame sūtrāntā neyārthāḥ katame nītārthāḥ? ye sūtrāntā mārgavatārāya
T04canprasu:442: yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājātānutpādābhāvanirātmaniḥ sattvanirjīvaniḥ pudgalāsvāmikavimokṣamukhā nirdiṣṭāḥ ta ucyante nītārthāḥ
T04canprasu:443: | iyamucyate bhadanta śāradvatīputra nītārthasūtrāntapratiśaraṇatā, na neyārthasūtrāntapratiśaraṇatā iti ||
T04canprasu:446: yasmin punaḥ pudgalasattvapūruṣā neyārthato jānati sarvadharmān ||
T04canprasu:448: nanu ca- utpādādīnāmabhāve sati yadi sarvadharmāṇāṃ mṛṣātvapratipādanārthamidamārabdhavānācāryaḥ nanvevaṃ sati yanmṛṣā na
T04canprasu:449: tadastīti na santyakuśalāni karmāṇi, tadabhāvānna santi durgatayaḥ, na santi kuśalāni karmāṇi, tadabhāvānna santi sugatayaḥ,
T04canprasu:450: sugatidurgatyasaṃbhavācca nāsti saṃsāraḥ, iti sarvārambhavaiyarthyameva sthāt |
T04canprasu:452: saṃvṛtisatyavyapekṣayā lokasya idaṃsatyābhiniveśasya pratipakṣabhāvena mṛṣārthatā bhāvānāṃ pratipādyate 'smābhiḥ |
T04canprasu:453: naiva tvāryāḥ kṛtakāryāḥ kiṃcidupalabhante yanmṛṣā amṛṣā vā syāditi |
T04canprasu:455: yena hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ mṛṣātvaṃ parijñātaṃ kiṃ tasya karmāṇi santi,
T04canprasu:456: saṃsāro vā asti? na cāpyasau kasyaciddharmassya astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vopalabhate |
T04canprasu:458: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate |
T04canprasu:460: yannopalabhyate tannaiva atītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam |
T04canprasu:461: yannaivātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannam, tasya nāsti svabhāvaḥ |
T04canprasu:464: nāstyutpādaḥ, tasya nāsti nirodhaḥ || iti vistaraḥ ||
T04canprasu:465: yastu viparyāsānugamānmṛṣātvaṃ nāvagacchati, pratītya bhāvānā svabhāvamabhiniviśate, sa dharmeṣvidaṃsatyābhiniveśādabhiniviṣṭaḥ san
T04canprasu:466: karmāṇyapi karoti, saṃsāre 'pi saṃsarati, viparyāsāvasthitatvānna bhavyo nirvāṇamadhigantum
T04canprasu:467: kiṃ punaḥ- mṛṣāsvabhāvā api padārthāḥ saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanaṃ bhavanti |
T04canprasu:470: tadyathā kulaputra māyākāranāṭake pratyupasthite māyākāranirmitāṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā kaścidrāgaparītacittāḥ parṣacchāradyabhayena utthāyāsanādapakrāmet,
T04canprasu:471: so 'pakramya tāmeva striyamaśubhato manasikuryāt, anityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmato manasikuryāt
T04canprasu:476: tathā mṛṣāsvabhāvā api bhāvā bālānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanaṃ bhavanti ||
T04canprasu:478: atha khalu tāni pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuśatāni bhagavato dharmadeśanāmanavatarantyanavagāhamānānyanadhimucyamānāni utthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni |
T04canprasu:479: atha bhagavān [tasyāṃ velāyāṃ] yena mārgeṇaite bhikṣavo
T04canprasu:480: gacchanti sma, tasmin mārge dvau bhikṣū nirmimīte sma ||
T04canprasu:481: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni yena [mārgeṇa] tau dvau bhikṣū [nirmitakau]
T04canprasu:484: gamiṣyathaḥ? nirmitakāvavocatām- gamiṣyāva āvāmaraṇyāyataneṣu, tatra dhyānasukhasparśavihārairvihariṣyāvaḥ
T04canprasu:486: tamāvāṃ nāvatarāvo nāvagāhāvahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāvaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāvahe |
T04canprasu:488: vayamapyāyuṣmanto bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ nāvatarāmo nāvagāhāmahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāmaḥ saṃtrasyāmaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāmahe |
T04canprasu:490: nirmitakāvavocatām- tena hi āyuṣmantaḥ saṃgāsyāmo na vivadiṣyāmaḥ |
T04canprasu:492: kasyāyuṣmantaḥ prahāṇāya pratipannāḥ? tānyavocan- rāgadveṣamohānāṃ prahāṇāya vayaṃ pratipannāḥ
T04canprasu:493: nirmitakāvavocatām- kiṃ punarāyuṣmatāṃ saṃvidyante rāgadveṣamohā yān kṣapayiṣyatha? tānyavocan- na te 'dhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyante, nāpi te 'parikalpitā utpadyante nirmitakāvavocatām- tena hi āyuṣmanto mā kalpayata, [mā vikalpayata] |
T04canprasu:494: yadā cāyuṣmanto na kalpayiṣyatha na vikalpayiṣyatha, tadā na raṃkṣyatha na viraṃkṣyatha |
T04canprasu:495: yaśca na rakto na viraktaḥ, sa śānta ityucyate |
T04canprasu:497: samādhiḥ prajñā vimuktirvimuktijñānadarśanamāyuṣmanto (Pp_16) na saṃsarati na parinirvāti
T04canprasu:501: mā ca saṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñā kārṣṭa, mā ca saṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñāṃ parijñāsiṣṭa |
T04canprasu:502: yo hi saṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñāṃ parijānāti, saṃjñā bandhanamevāsya tadbhavati |
T04canprasu:510: vāgatāḥ te 'vocan- na kvacidgamanāya na kutaścidāgamanāya bhadanta subhūte
T04canprasu:511: bhagavatā dharmo deśitaḥ āha- ko nāmāyuṣmatāṃ śāstā? āhuḥ- yo notpanno na
T04canprasu:513: āha- kathaṃ yuṣmābhirdharmaḥ śrutaḥ? āhuḥ- na bandhanāya na mokṣāya |
T04canprasu:514: āha- kena yūyaṃ vinītāḥ? āhuḥ- yasya na kāyo na cittam |
T04canprasu:516: kathaṃ yūyaṃ prayuktāḥ? āhuḥ- nāvidyāprahāṇāya na vidyotpādanāya |
T04canprasu:518: kasya yūyaṃ śrāvakāḥ? āhuḥ- yena na prāptaṃ nābhisaṃbuddham |
T04canprasu:519: āha- ke yuṣmākaṃ sabrahmacāriṇaḥ? āhuḥ- ye traidhātuke nopavicaranti |
T04canprasu:521: kiyaccireṇāyuṣmantaḥ parinirvāsyanti āhuḥ- yadā tathāgatanirmitāḥ parinirvāsyanti |
T04canprasu:522: āha- kṛtaṃ yuṣmābhiḥ karaṇīyam? āhuḥ- ahaṃ kāramamakāraparijñānataḥ |
T04canprasu:529: āha- paricarito yuṣmābhiḥ śāstā? āhuḥ- na kāyena na vācā na manasā |
T04canprasu:538: iti hyāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ paripṛcchatasteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ prativisarjayatāṃ tasyāṃ parṣadi aṣṭānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāśravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni, dvātriṃśataśca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmacakṣurviśuddham |
T04canprasu:540: ityevaṃ mṛṣāsvabhāvābhyāṃ tathāgatanirmitābhyāṃ bhikṣubhyāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ vyavadānanibandhanaṃ kṛtamiti ||
T04canprasu:542: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ kāṇḍaṃ ca pratītya mathanīṃ ca pratītya puruṣasya hastavyāyāmaṃ ca pratītya dhūmaḥ prādurbhavatīti agnirabhinirvartate |
T04canprasu:543: sa cāgnisaṃtāpo na kāṇḍasaṃniśrito na mathanīsaṃniśrito na puruṣahastavyāyāmasaṃniśritaḥ |
T04canprasu:544: evameva mañjuśrīḥ asadviparyāsamohitasya puruṣapudgalasya utpadyate rāgaparidāho dveṣaparidāho mohaparidāhaḥ |
T04canprasu:545: sa ca paridāho nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇa sthitaḥ ||
T04canprasu:546: api tu mañjuśrīḥ yaducyate moha iti, tatkena kāraṇenocyate moha iti?
T04canprasu:547: atyantamukto hi mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmairmohastenocyate moha iti |
T04canprasu:548: tathā narakamukhā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā idaṃ dhāraṇīpadam |
T04canprasu:549: (Pp_17) āha- kathaṃ bhagavannidaṃ dhāraṇīpadam? āha- narakā mañjuśrīḥ bālapṛgthajanairasadviparyāsaviṭhapitāḥ svavikalpasaṃbhūtāḥ |
T04canprasu:550: āha- kutra bhagavannarakāḥ samavasaranti? bhagavānāha- ākāśasamavasaraṇā mañjuśrīḥ narakāḥ
T04canprasu:551: tatkiṃ manyase mañjuśrīḥ svavikalpasaṃbhūtā narakā uta
T04canprasu:554: te ca asatsamāropeṇa duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti duḥkhamanubhavanti triṣvapyapāyeṣu ||
T04canprasu:555: yathā cāhaṃ bhagavan narakān paśyāmi tathā nārakaṃ duḥkham |
T04canprasu:556: tadyathā bhagavan kaścideva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato narakagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte |
T04canprasu:557: sa tatra kvathitāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmanekapauruṣāyāṃ lohakumbhyāṃ prakṣiptamātmānaṃ saṃjānŌṣyāt
T04canprasu:558: sa tatra kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ tŌṣvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayet |
T04canprasu:559: sa tatra mānasaṃ paridāhaṃ saṃjānŌṣyāt uttraset saṃtrāsamāpadyeta |
T04canprasu:560: sa tatra pratibuddhaḥ samānaḥ- aho duḥkham,
T04canprasu:561: aho duḥkham, iti krandet śocet paridevet |
T04canprasu:566: sa tānākrośet paribhāṣet- ahaṃ ca nāma nairayikaṃ duḥkhamanubhavāmi |
T04canprasu:567: yūyaṃ ca me uttari paripṛcchatha kenaitattava duḥkhamiti |
T04canprasu:575: tadyathā bhagavan sa puruṣo 'satsamāropeṇa suptaḥ svapnāntaragato narakagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīyāt, evameva bhagavan sarvabālapṛthagjanā
T04canprasu:577: te strīnimittaṃ kalpayitvā tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ ramamāṇamātmānaṃ saṃjānanti |
T04canprasu:578: tasya bālapṛthajanasyaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ puruṣaḥ, iyaṃ strī, mamaiṣā strī |
T04canprasu:579: tasya tena cchandarāgaparyavasthitena cittena bhogaparyeṣṭiṃ cittaṃ krāmayanti |
T04canprasu:582: sa tena saṃjñāviparyāsena kālagataḥ samāno bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānamātmānaṃ saṃjānāti ||
T04canprasu:583: tadyathā bhagavan tasya puruṣasya mitrajñātisālohitā evaṃ vadanti- mā
T04canprasu:587: evameva buddhā bhagavantaścaturviparyāsaviparyastānāṃ sattvānāmevaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti-
T04canprasu:588: nātra strī na puruṣo na sattvo na jīvo na puruṣo na pudgalaḥ |
T04canprasu:597: te imāṃ tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā vigatarāgān sarvadharmān paśyanti |
T04canprasu:600: te kālagatāḥ samānā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti |
T04canprasu:604: bhaya darśita nairayikaṃ me sattvasahasra savejita naike |
T04canprasu:605: na ca vidyati kaściha sattva yo cyutu gacchati ghoramapāyam ||
T04canprasu:606: na ca kāraku kāraṇa santi yehi kṛtā asitomaraśastrāḥ |
T04canprasu:607: kalpavaśena tu paśyati tatra kāyi patanti apāyita śastrāḥ ||
T04canprasu:609: teṣvapi kāraku nāstiha kaści te 'pi ca sthāpita kalpavaśena ||
T04canprasu:610: kalpavaśena vikalpitu lokaḥ saṃjñagaheṇa vikalpitu bālaḥ |
T04canprasu:611: so ca gaho agaho asabhūto māyamarīcisamā hi vikalpāḥ ||
T04canprasu:612: tadevamete 'svabhāvā bhāvāḥ svaviparyāsaviṭhapitā bālānāṃ saṃkleśahetavo bhavanti saṃsāre iti sthitam ||
T04canprasu:613: yathā ca mṛṣāsvabhāvānāṃ padārthānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānahetutvaṃ tathā madhyamakāvatārādvistareṇāvaseyam
T04canprasu:614: atrāha- yadi svataḥ parataḥ ubhayato 'hetutaśca nāsti bhāvānāmutpādaḥ,
T04canprasu:615: tatra kathamavidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityuktaṃ bhagavatā? ucyate |
T04canprasu:617: kiṃ saṃvṛtervyavasthānaṃ vaktavyam? idaṃpratyayatāmātreṇa saṃvṛteḥ siddhirabhyupagamyate
T04canprasu:620: idaṃpratyayatāmātrābhyupagame hi sati hetuphalayoranyonyāpekṣatvānnāsti svābhāvikī siddhiriti nāsti sasvabhāvavādaḥ |
T04canprasu:625: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam |
T04canprasu:631: atra kecitparicodayanti- anutpannā bhāvā iti kimayaṃ pramāṇajo niścaya
T04canprasu:632: utāpramāṇajaḥ? tatra yadi pramāṇaja iṣyate, tadedaṃ vaktavyam- kati pramāṇāni kiṃlakṣaṇāni kiṃviṣayāṇi, kiṃ svata utpannāni kiṃ parata ubhayato 'hetuto veti |
T04canprasu:635: anadhigato hyartho na vinā pramāṇairadhigantuṃ śakyata iti pramāṇābhāvādarthādhigamābhāve sati kuto
T04canprasu:636: 'yaṃ samyagniścaya iti na yuktametadaniṣpannā bhāvā iti |
T04canprasu:637: yato vāyaṃ niścayo bhavato 'nutpannā bhāvā iti bhaviṣyati, tata eva mamāpi
T04canprasu:639: yathā cāyaṃ te niścayaḥ- anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti,
T04canprasu:642: 'nutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā iti, tadā svayamaniścitasya parapratyāyanāsaṃbhavācchāstrārambhavaiyarthyameveti santyapratiṣiddhāḥ sarvabhāvā iti ||
T04canprasu:644: yadi kaścinniścayo nāmāsmākaṃ syāt, sa pramāṇajo vā
T04canprasu:647: kiṃ kāraṇam? ihāniścayasaṃbhave sati syāttatpratipakṣastadapekṣo niścayaḥ |
T04canprasu:651: yadā caivaṃ niścayasyābhāvaḥ, tadā kasya prasiddhayarthaṃ pramāṇāni
T04canprasu:652: parikalpayiṣyāmaḥ? kuto vaiṣāṃ saṃkhyā lakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo vā bhaviṣyati-
T04canprasu:653: svataḥ parata ubhayato 'hetuto vā samutpattiriti sarvametanna
T04canprasu:655: yadyevaṃ niścayo nāsti sarvataḥ, kathaṃ punaridaṃ niścitarūpaṃ
T04canprasu:656: vākyamupalabhyate bhavatām- na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetuto bhāvā bhavantīti? ucyate |
T04canprasu:663: yadi hyāryā upapattiṃ na varṇayanti, kena khalvidānīṃ paramārthaṃ lokaṃ
T04canprasu:664: bodhayiṣyanti? na khalvāryā lokasaṃvyavahāreṇopapattiṃ varṇayanti, kiṃ tu lokata eva yā prasiddhopapattiḥ, tāṃ parāvabodhārthamabhyupetya tayaiva
T04canprasu:666: yathaiva hi vidyamānāmapi śarīrāśucitāṃ viparyāsānugatā rāgiṇo nopalabhante, śubhākāraṃ cābhūtamadhyāropya parikliśyante, teṣāṃ vairāgyārthaṃ tathāgatanirmito (Pp_20) devo vā śubhasaṃjñayā prāk pracchāditān kāyadoṣānupavarṇayet- santyasmin kāye keśā ityādinā |
T04canprasu:667: te ca tasyāḥ śubhasaṃjñāyā vimuktā vairāgyamāsādayeyuḥ |
T04canprasu:668: evamihāpyāryaiḥ sarvathāpyanupalabhyamānātmakaṃ bhāvānāmavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītaṃ svabhāvamadhyāropya kvacicca kaṃcidviśeṣamatitarāṃ parikliśyanti pṛthagjanāḥ |
T04canprasu:670: yathā vidyamānasya ghaṭasya na mṛdādibhya utpāda ityabhyupetam,
T04canprasu:681: atha syāt- eṣa eva pramāṇapremeyavyavahāro laukiko 'smābhiḥ
T04canprasu:682: śāstreṇānuvarṇita iti, tadanuvarṇanasya tarhi phalaṃ vācyam |
T04canprasu:683: kutārkikaiḥ sa nāśito viparītalakṣaṇābhidhānena, tasyāsmābhiḥ samyaglakṣaṇamuktamiti cet, etadapyayuktam |
T04canprasu:684: yadi hi kutārkikairviparītalakṣaṇapraṇayanātkṛtaṃ lakṣyavaiparītyaṃ lokasya syāt, tadarthaṃ prayatnasāphalyaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:688: yadi pramāṇādhīnaḥ prameyādhigamaḥ, tāni pramāṇāni kena
T04canprasu:693: tallakṣaṇadvayam, kiṃ tallakṣyamasti atha nāsti? yadyasti, tadā tadaparaṃ prameyamastīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam? atha nāsti lakṣyam, tadā lakṣaṇamapi nirāśrayaṃ nāstīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam? vakṣyati hi-
T04canprasu:696: atha syāt- na lakṣyate 'neneti lakṣaṇam, kiṃ tarhi 'kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam';
T04canprasu:697: iti karmaṇi lyuṭaṃ kṛtvā lakṣyate taditi lakṣaṇam |
T04canprasu:698: evamapi tenaitasya lakṣyamāṇatvāsaṃbhavādyenaitallakṣyate, tasya karaṇasya karmaṇo
T04canprasu:700: atha syāt- jñānasya karaṇatvāttasya ca svalakṣaṇāntarbhāvādayamadoṣa iti,
T04canprasu:703: tadyathā pṛthivyāḥ kāṭhinyaṃ vedanāyā viṣayānubhavo vijñānasya viṣayaprativijñaptiḥ |
T04canprasu:704: tena hi tallakṣyata iti kṛtvā prasiddhānugatāṃ ca
T04canprasu:706: vijñānasya ca karaṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyamānenetyuktaṃ bhavati svalakṣaṇasyaiva karmatā svalakṣaṇāntarasya karaṇabhāvaśceti |
T04canprasu:708: karaṇam, tasya vyatiriktena karmaṇā bhavitavyamiti sa eva doṣaḥ ||
T04canprasu:709: atha syāt- yatpṛthivyādigataṃ kāṭhinyādikaṃ vijñānagamyaṃ tattasya
T04canprasu:711: evaṃ tarhi vijñānasvalakṣaṇasya karmatvābhāvātprameyatvaṃ na syāt, karmarūpasyaiva svalakṣaṇasya prameyatvāt |
T04canprasu:712: tataśca dvividhaṃ prameyaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ ca ityetadviśeṣya vaktavyam- kiṃcitsvalakṣaṇaṃ prameyaṃ yallakṣyata ityevaṃ vyapadiśyate, kiṃcidaprameyaṃ yallakṣyate 'neneti
T04canprasu:714: atha tadapi karmasādhanaṃ tadā tasyānyena karaṇena bhavitavyam |
T04canprasu:716: atha manyase- svasaṃvittirasti, tatastayā svasaṃvityā grahaṇātkarmatāyā
T04canprasu:718: vistareṇa madhyamakāvatāre svasaṃvittiniṣedhāt svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇāntareṇa lakṣyate, tadapi svasaṃvittyā iti na yujyate |
T04canprasu:720: tadapi nāma jñānaṃ svalakṣaṇavyatirekeṇāsiddherasaṃbhavāllakṣyābhāve nirāśrayalakṣaṇapravṛttyasaṃbhavāt sarvathā nāstīti kutaḥ svasaṃvittiḥ?
T04canprasu:724: tatkimanyadālambanamanyaccittam, atha yadevālambanaṃ tadeva cittam? yadi
T04canprasu:726: atha yadevālambanaṃ tadeva cittam, tatkathaṃ cittena cittaṃ samanupaśyati? na ca cittaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati |
T04canprasu:727: tadyathāpi nāma tayaivāsidhārayā saivāsidhārā na śakyate chettum, na tenaivāṅgulyagreṇa tadevāṅgulyagraṃ
T04canprasu:728: śakyate spraṣṭum, evameva na tenaiva cittena tadeva cittaṃ śakyaṃ draṣṭum |
T04canprasu:729: tasyaivaṃ yoniśaḥ prayuktasya yā cittasyānavasthānatā anucchedāśāśvatatā na kūṭasthatā nāhetukī na pratyayaviruddhā na tato nānyato na saiva nānyā |
T04canprasu:730: tāṃ cittadhārāṃ cittalatāṃ cittadharmatāṃ cittānavasthitatāṃ cittāpracāratāṃ cittādṛśyatāṃ cittasvalakṣaṇatāṃ tathā jānāti tathā paśyati yathā tathatāṃ na ca nirodhayati |
T04canprasu:731: tāṃ ca cittavivekatāṃ tathā prajānāti tathā paśyati |
T04canprasu:736: bhedena vā tallakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyātsyādabhedena vā? tatra yadi tāvad
T04canprasu:737: bhedena, tadā lakṣyād bhinnatvādalakṣaṇavallakṣaṇamapi na lakṣaṇam |
T04canprasu:747: na ca vinā tattvānyatvena lakṣyalakṣaṇasiddhau anyā gatirasti |
T04canprasu:750: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate || iti ||
T04canprasu:752: avācyatā hi nāma parasparavibhāgaparijñānābhāve sati bhavati |
T04canprasu:753: yatra ca vibhāgaparijñānaṃ nāsti, tatra idaṃ lakṣaṇam, idaṃ lakṣyam, iti viśeṣataḥ paricchedāsaṃbhave sati dvayorapyabhāva eveti |
T04canprasu:756: yadi jñānaṃ karaṇaṃ viṣayasya paricchede, kaḥ kartā? na ca kartāramantareṇāsti karaṇādīnāṃ saṃbhavaḥ chidikriyāyāmiva |
T04canprasu:757: atha cittasya tatra kartṛtvaṃ parikalpyate, tadapi na yuktam, yasmādarthamātradarśanaṃ cittasya vyāpāraḥ, arthaviśeṣadarśanaṃ caitasānām,
T04canprasu:760: ekasyāṃ hi pradhānakriyāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ guṇakriyānirvṛttidvāreṇāṅgībhāvopagamāt |
T04canprasu:762: na ceha jñānavijñānayorekā pradhānakriyā, kiṃ tarhi,
T04canprasu:763: arthamātraparicchittirvijñānasya pradhānakriyā, jñānasya tu arthaviśeṣapariccheda iti nāsti jñānasya karaṇatvaṃ nāpi cittasya kartṛtvam |
T04canprasu:765: atha syāt- anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā ityāgamāt kartuḥ sarvathābhāvāt kartāramantareṇāpi vidyata eva kriyādivyavahāra iti, etadapi nāsti |
T04canprasu:768: athāpi syāt- yathā śilāputrakasya śarīram, rāhoḥ śiraḥ, iti śarīraśirovyatiriktaviśeṣaṇāsaṃbhave 'pi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo 'sti, evaṃ pṛthivyāḥ svalakṣaṇamiti svalakṣaṇavyatiriktapṛthivyasaṃbhave 'pi
T04canprasu:771: śarīraśiraḥśabdayohi buddhayādipāṇyādivatsahabhāvipadārthāntarasāpekṣatāpravṛttau śarīraśiraḥ śabdamātrālambano buddhayupajananaḥ sahacāripadārthāntarasākāṅkṣa eva
T04canprasu:772: vartate, kasya śarīram, kasya śira iti |
T04canprasu:775: iha tu kāṭhinyādivyatiriktapṛthivyādyasaṃbhave sati na yukto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ |
T04canprasu:777: na hi tīrthikaparikalpitā yuktividhurāḥ padārthāḥ svasamaye 'bhyupagantuṃ nyāyyāḥ,
T04canprasu:780: pudgalādiprajñaptivat saśarīropādānasya śilāputrakasyopādāturlaukikavyavahārāṅgabhūtasya viśeṣaṇasyāvicāraprasiddhasya sadbhāvāt, śiraupādānasya ca rāhorupādātuḥ
T04canprasu:784: yathaiva hi rūpādivyatirekeṇa vicāryamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati, api ca lokasaṃvṛtyā
T04canprasu:787: evaṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ yadyapi kāṭhinyādivyatiriktaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ
T04canprasu:788: nāsti, lakṣyavyatirekeṇa ca lakṣaṇaṃ nirāśrayam, tathāpi saṃvṛtireveti parasparāpekṣayā tayoḥ siddhayā siddhiṃ vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvurācāryāḥ |
T04canprasu:793: śilāputrakādīmevāsaṃbhavaḥ, kiṃ tarhi vakṣyamāṇayā yuktyā rūpavedanādīnāmapi nāsti saṃbhava iti teṣāmapi saṃvṛtyā śilāputrakādivannāstitvamāstheyaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:795: atha syāt- kimanayā sūkṣmekṣikayā? naiva hi vayaṃ
T04canprasu:799: vayamapyevaṃ brūmaḥ- kimanayā sūkṣmekṣikayā laukikavyavahāre 'vatārika(ta?)yā? tiṣṭhatu tāvadeṣā viparyāsamātrāsāditātmabhāvasattākā saṃvṛtiḥ mumukṣūṇāṃ
T04canprasu:803: saṃvṛtisatyavyavasthāvaicakṣaṇyāllaukika eva pakṣe sthitvā saṃvṛtyekadeśanirākaraṇopakṣiptopapattyantaramupapattyantareṇa vinivartayan lokavṛddha iva lokacārātparibhraśyamānaṃ bhavantameva nivartayāmi na tu saṃvṛtim tasmād yadi laukiko vyavahāraḥ, tadā avaśyaṃ lakṣaṇavallakṣyeṇāpi bhavitavyam |
T04canprasu:811: vyavaharati, śabdārthaṃ kriyākaraṇādikaṃ ca necchatīti aho vata
T04canprasu:813: yadā caivaṃ prameyadvayamavyavasthitaṃ tadā svasāmānyalakṣaṇāviṣayatvena āgamādīnāṃ pramāṇāntaratvam
T04canprasu:814: kiṃ ca ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityevamādikasya laukikavyavahārasyāsaṃgrahādanāryavyavahārābhyupagamācca avyāpitā lakṣaṇasyeti na yuktametat ||
T04canprasu:816: | tataśca yathaiva kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃ kṛtvā buddhānāṃ sukha utpāda iti
T04canprasu:817: vyapadiśyate, evaṃ pratyakṣanīlādinimittako 'pi ghaṭaḥ kārye kāraṇopacāraṃ
T04canprasu:820: utpādo hi loke sukhavyatirekeṇopalabdhaḥ, sa ca saṃskṛtalakṣaṇasvabhāvatvādanekaduṣkaraśatahetutvādasukha eva, sa sukha iti vyapadiśyamānaḥ asaṃbaddha evetyevaṃviṣaye yukta upacāraḥ |
T04canprasu:821: ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityatra tu- na hi ghaṭo nāma kaścidyo 'pratyakṣaḥ
T04canprasu:823: nīlādivyatiriktasya ghaṭasyābhāvādaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvamiti cet, evamapi sutarāmupacāro
T04canprasu:827: lokavyavahārāṅgabhūto ghaṭo yadi nīlādivyatirikto nāstīti kṛtvā tasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ
T04canprasu:828: nanvevaṃ sati pṛthivyādivyatirekeṇa nīlādikamapi nāstīti nīlāderasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ kalpyatām |
T04canprasu:831: vāyvādivyatirekeṇa tathā rūpaṃ na vidyate || iti |
T04canprasu:838: sarva eva ghaṭo 'dṛṣṭo rūpe dṛṣṭe hi jāyate |
T04canprasu:846: tatparicchedakasya jñānasya tṛṇatuṣāgnivat pratyakṣakāraṇatvāt pratyakṣatvaṃ vyapadiśyate
T04canprasu:847: yastu akṣamakṣaṃ prati vartata iti pratyakṣaśabdaṃ vyutpādayati, tasya jñānasyendriyāviṣayatvād viṣayaviṣayatvācca na yuktā vyutpattiḥ |
T04canprasu:849: atha syāt- yathā ubhayādhīnāyāmapi vijñānapravṛtau āśrayasya paṭumandatānuvidhānād vijñānānāṃ tadvikāravikāritvādāśrayeṇaivavyapadeśo bhavati cakṣurvijñānamiti, evaṃ yadyapi arthamartha prati vartate, tathāpi akṣamakṣamāśritya vartamānaṃ vijñānamāśrayeṇa vyapadeśāt pratyakṣamiti
T04canprasu:851: dṛṣṭo hi asādhāraṇena vyapadeśo bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti |
T04canprasu:853: tatra hi viṣayeṇa (Pp_25) vijñāne vyapadiśyamāne rūpavijñānamityevamādinā vijñānaṣaṭkasya bhedo nopadarśitaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:855: tathā hi nīlādivijñānaṣaṭke vijñānamityukte sākāṅkṣa eva pratyayājjāyate kimetadrūpīndriyajaṃ vijñānamāhosvinmānasamiti |
T04canprasu:856: āśrayeṇa tu vyapadeśe manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānaviṣaye pravṛttisaṃbhave 'pi parasparabhedaḥ siddho bhavati |
T04canprasu:857: iha tu pramāṇalakṣaṇavivakṣayā kalpanāpoḍhamātrasya pratyakṣatvābhyupagame sati vikalpādeva tadviśeṣatvābhimatatvādasādhāraṇakāraṇena vyapadeśe sati na kiṃcit prayojanamupalakṣyate |
T04canprasu:858: prameyaparatantrāyāṃ ca pramāṇasaṃkhyāpravṛttau prameyākārānukāritāmātratayā ca samāsāditātmabhāvasattākayoḥ pramāṇayoḥ svarūpasya vyavasthāpanānnendriyeṇa vyapadeśaḥ kiṃcidupakarotīti sarvathā viṣayeṇaiva vyapadeśo nyāyyaḥ ||
T04canprasu:863: sa tu yathā loke, tathā asmābhirucyata eva |
T04canprasu:864: yathāsthitalaukikapadārthatiraskāreṇa tu tadvayutpāde kriyamāṇe prasiddhaśabdatiraskāraḥ prasiddhaḥ syāt, tataśca pratyakṣamityevaṃ na syāt |
T04canprasu:865: ekasya ca cakṣurvijñānasya ekendriyakṣaṇāśrayasya pratyakṣatvaṃ na syād vīpsārthābhāvāt, ekaikasya ca pratyakṣatvābhāve bahūnāmapi na syāt ||
T04canprasu:866: kalpanāpoḍhasyaiva ca jñānasya pratyakṣatvābhyupagamāt, tena ca lokasya
T04canprasu:869: cakṣurvijñānasāmaṅgī nīlaṃ jānāti no tu nīlamiti cāgamasya
T04canprasu:870: pratyakṣalakṣaṇābhidhānārthasyāprastutatvāt, pañcānāmindriyavijñānānāṃ jaḍatvapratipādakatvācca nāgamādapi kalpanāpoḍhasyaiva vijñānasya pratyakṣatvamiti na yuktametat |
T04canprasu:871: tasmālloke yadi lakṣyaṃ yadi vā svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vā, sarvameva
T04canprasu:878: sādṛśyādananubhūtārthadhigama upamānaṃ gauriva gavaya iti yathā ||
T04canprasu:880: tāni ca parasparāpekṣayā sidhyanti- satsu pramāṇeṣu prameyārthāḥ, satsu prameyeṣvartheṣu pramāṇāni
T04canprasu:881: no tu khalu svābhāvikī pramāṇaprameyayoḥ siddhiriti |
T04canprasu:884: laukika eva darśane sthitvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā || 3 ||
T04canprasu:885: atrāhuḥ svayūthyāḥ- yadidamuktaṃ na svata utpadyante bhāvā iti, tadyuktam,
T04canprasu:890: 'pi yuktaḥ| yattu khalvidamucyate nāpi parata iti, tadayuktam yasmātparabhūtā eva bhagavatā bhāvānāmutpādakā nirdiṣṭāḥ |
T04canprasu:893: tatra nirvartako heturiti lakṣaṇāt, yo hi yasya nirvartako
T04canprasu:896: kāraṇasyānantaro nirodhaḥ kāryasyotpattipratyayaḥ, tadyathā bījasyānantaro nirodho
T04canprasu:900: ye cānye purojātasahajātapaścājjātādayaḥ, te eteṣveva antarbhūtāḥ |
T04canprasu:901: īśvarādayastu pratyayā eva na saṃbhavantīti, ata
T04canprasu:904: atrocyate- naiva hi bhāvānāṃ parabhūtebhyaḥ pratyayebhya utpattiriti |
T04canprasu:906: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate |
T04canprasu:909: yadi hi hetvādiṣu parabhuteṣu pratyayeṣu samasteṣu vyasteṣu vyastasamasteṣu hetupratyaya sāmagyā anyatra vā kvacid bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmutpādātpūrvaṃ sattvaṃ syāt, syāttebhya utpādaḥ |
T04canprasu:911: yadi syāt, gṛhyeta ca, utpādavaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt |
T04canprasu:914: bhavanaṃ bhāva utpādaḥ, parebhya utpādaḥ parabhāvaḥ, sa na vidyate |
T04canprasu:916: athavā bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmaṅkurādīnāṃ vījādiṣu pratyayeṣu satsvavikṛtarūpeṣu nāsti svabhāvo nirhetukatvaprasaṅgāt ||
T04canprasu:917: tatkimapekṣaṃ paratvaṃ pratyayādīnām? vidyamānayoreva hi maitropagrāhakayoḥ parasparāpekṣaṃ paratvam? na caivaṃ bījāṅkurayoryaugapadyam |
T04canprasu:918: tasmādavidyamāne svabhāve kāryāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ paratvaṃ bījādīnāṃ nāstīti paravyapadeśābhāvādeva na parata utpāda iti |
T04canprasu:922: tadevaṃ pratyayebhya utpādavādini pratiṣiddhe kriyāta utpādavādī manyate-
T04canprasu:929: kriyā na pratyayavatī yadi kriyā kācit syāt, sā cakṣurādibhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pratyayavatī vijñānaṃ janayet |
T04canprasu:931: kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha kriyeyamiṣyamāṇā jāte vā vijñāne iṣyate, ajāte vā jāyamāne vā? tatra jāte na yuktā |
T04canprasu:934: jātasya janma punareva ca naiva yuktam |
T04canprasu:937: kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā |
T04canprasu:943: atha vā jāyamānatvaṃ sarvasyaiva prasajyate || iti |
T04canprasu:944: yataścaivaṃ triṣu kāleṣu janikriyāyā asaṃbhavaḥ, tasmānnāsti sā |
T04canprasu:952: yadā pratyayavatī nāsti, tadā kathamapratyayavatī nirhetukā syāt? na hi tantumayaḥ paṭo na yukta iti vīraṇamayo 'bhyupagamyate |
T04canprasu:954: atrāha- yadyevaṃ kriyāyā asaṃbhavaḥ, pratyayāstarhi janakā bhaviṣyanti
T04canprasu:957: pratyayā nākriyāvantaḥ yadā kriyā nāsti, tadā kriyārahitā akriyāvanto nirhetukāḥ pratyayāḥ
T04canprasu:958: janakāḥ? atha kriyāvanta eva janakā iti, ucyate-
T04canprasu:963: uktaḥ, kathaṃ kriyāvattvaṃ pratyayānāmiti? yathā ca vijñānajanikriyoktā,
T04canprasu:964: evaṃ parikriyādayo 'pi bhāvā uktā veditavyā iti nāsti kriyāto 'pi
T04canprasu:966: atrāha- kiṃ na etena kriyāvantaḥ pratyayā ityādivicāreṇa? yasmāccakṣurādīn pratītya pratyayān vijñānādayo bhāvā jāyante, tasmāccakṣurādīnāṃ pratyayatvaṃ tebhyaścotpādo vijñānādīnāmiti etadapyayuktamityāha-
T04canprasu:969: yadi cakṣurādīn pratyayān pratītya vijñānamutpadyate iti asya ime pratyayā
T04canprasu:970: ucyante, nanu yāvattadvijñānākhyaṃ kāryaṃ notpadyate tāvadime cakṣurādayaḥ
T04canprasu:971: kathaṃ nāpratyayāḥ? apratyayā evetyabhiprāyaḥ na cāpratyayebhya utpattiḥ sikatābhya iva tailasya |
T04canprasu:972: atha matam- pūrvamapratyayāḥ santaḥ kiṃcidanyaṃ pratyayamapekṣya pratyayatvaṃ pratipadyanta iti, etadapyayuktam |
T04canprasu:973: yat tat pratyayāntaramapratyayasya tasya pratyayatvena kalpyate, tadapi pratyayatve sati asya pratyayo bhavati |
T04canprasu:976: iha ime cakṣurādayo vijñānasya pratyayāḥ kalpyamānāḥ sato vā asya
T04canprasu:977: kalpyeran, asato vā? sarvathā ca na yujyate ityāha-
T04canprasu:980: asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataśca pratyayena kim || 8 ||
T04canprasu:981: asato hyarthasya avidyamānasya kathaṃ pratyayaḥ syāt? bhaviṣyatā vyapadeśo bhaviṣyatīti cet, naivam-
T04canprasu:982: bhaviṣyatā cedvayapadeśa iṣṭaḥ śaktiṃ vinā nāsti hi bhāvitāsya |
T04canprasu:986: evaṃ samastānāṃ pratyayānāṃ kāryotpādanāsāmarthyena apratyayatvamudbhāvya ataḥ paraṃ vyastānāmapratyayatvaṃ pratipādyate ||
T04canprasu:987: atrāha- yadyapyevaṃ pratyayānāmasaṃbhavaḥ, tathāpi astyeva lakṣaṇopadeśātpratyayaprasiddhiḥ
T04canprasu:993: na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā |
T04canprasu:994: kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate || 9 ||
T04canprasu:996: yadi nirvartyo dharmo nirvarteta, tamutpādako heturutpādayet |
T04canprasu:1004: tataśca yaduktaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃbhavādvidyate hetupratyaya iti, tadevaṃ sati na yujyate || 9 ||
T04canprasu:1009: cittacaittā yenālambanenotpadyante yathāyogaṃ rūpādinā, sa teṣāmālambanapratyayaḥ |
T04canprasu:1010: ayaṃ ca vidyamānānāṃ vā parikalpyeta avidyamānānāṃ vā |
T04canprasu:1014: athaivamanālambane dharme svātmanā prasiddhe kimasya ālambanayogena parikalpitena,
T04canprasu:1015: ityanālambana evāyaṃ san vidyamāno dharmaḥ cittādikaḥ kevalaṃ sālambana ityucyate bhavadbhiḥ svamanīṣikayā, na tvasya ālambanena kaścitsaṃbandho
T04canprasu:1017: athāvidyamānasyālambanaṃ parikalpyate, tadapi na yuktam, anālambana evāyamityādi |
T04canprasu:1024: tenāyamarthaḥ- athaivamanālambane dharme 'sati avidyamāne bhūyaḥ kuta ālambanam?
T04canprasu:1026: kathaṃ tarhi sālambanāścittacaittāḥ? sāṃvṛtametallakṣaṇaṃ na pāramārthikamityadoṣaḥ ||
T04canprasu:1030: tatra paścime ślokasyārdhe pādavyatyayo draṣṭavyaḥ, caśabdaśca bhinnakramo niruddhe ceti
T04canprasu:1031: tenaivaṃ pāṭhaḥ- niruddhe ca pratyayaḥ kaḥ? nānantaramato yuktam iti |
T04canprasu:1034: atra vicāryate- anutpanneṣu dharmeṣu kāryabhūteṣvaṅkurādiṣu nirodho nopapadyate kāraṇasya bījādeḥ |
T04canprasu:1036: samanantarapratyayaḥ? athānutpanne 'pi kārye bījanirodha iṣyate, evaṃ sati niruddha bīje abhāvībhūte aṅkurasya kaḥ pratyayaḥ? ko vā bījanirodhasya
T04canprasu:1038: ubhayametadahetukamityāha- niruddhe ca kaḥ pratyaya iti |
T04canprasu:1040: tena anutpanne cāṅkure bījādīnāṃ nirodhe iṣyamāṇe 'pyubhayametadahetukamapadyata iti nānantaramato yuktam |
T04canprasu:1042: na svato nāpi parata ityādinā utpādo niṣiddhaḥ, tamabhisaṃdhāyāha-
T04canprasu:1048: idānīmadhipatipratyayasvarūpaniṣedhārthamāha- bījādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ na sattā vidyate yataḥ |
T04canprasu:1050: iha yasmin sati yadbhavati, tattasya ādhipateyamityadhipatipratyayalakṣaṇam |
T04canprasu:1051: bhāvānāṃ ca pratītyasamutpannatvāt svabhāvābhāve kutastada yadasminniti kāraṇatvena vyapadiśyate, kutastad yadidamiti kāryatvena? tasmānnāsti lakṣaṇato 'pi
T04canprasu:1053: atrāha- tantvādibhyaḥ paṭādikamupalabhya paṭādestantvādayaḥ pratyayā iti |
T04canprasu:1054: ucyate paṭādiphalapravṛttireva svarūpato nāsti, kutaḥ pratyayānāṃ pratyayatvaṃ setsyati? yathā ca paṭādiphalapravṛttirasatī, tathā
T04canprasu:1057: pratyayebhyaḥ kathaṃ tacca bhavenna pratyayeṣu yat || 13 ||
T04canprasu:1058: tatra vyasteṣu tantuturīvematasaraśalākādiṣu pratyayeṣu paṭo nāsti,
T04canprasu:1067: apratyayebhyo 'pi vīraṇādibhyaḥ kasmānnābhipravartate paṭa iti nāsti phalapravṛttiḥ svarūpataḥ atrāha- yadi anyat phalaṃ syādanye ca pratyayāḥ, tadā kiṃ pratyayeṣu
T04canprasu:1069: nāsti tu vyatiriktaṃ phalam, kiṃ tarhi pratyayamayameveti? ucyate-
T04canprasu:1072: yadi pratyayamayaṃ pratyayavikāraḥ phalamiti vyavasthāpyate, tadayuktam |
T04canprasu:1075: syāt paṭo yadi tantava eva (Pp_31) svabhāvasiddhāḥ syuḥ |
T04canprasu:1076: te hi aṃśumayā aṃśuvikārā na svabhāvasiddhāḥ |
T04canprasu:1077: tataśca tebhyo 'svayaṃmayebhyo 'svabhāvebhyo yatphalaṃ paṭākhyam, tatkathaṃ tantumayaṃ bhaviṣyati? yathoktam-
T04canprasu:1083: saṃvidyate iti tantumayo yadā paṭo nāsti, tadā kathaṃ vīraṇamayaḥ syā?
T04canprasu:1086: bravīti- yadi asat phalaṃ pratyayebhyaḥ pravartate, apratyayebhyo 'pi
T04canprasu:1088: na cāsati phale paṭakaṭākhye tantuvīraṇānāṃ pratyayānāṃ pratyayatvaṃ yuktam, ataḥ phalamapyastīti
T04canprasu:1095: pratyayāśca apratyayāśceti samāsaḥ || tasmānnāsti bhāvānāṃ svabhāvataḥ
T04canprasu:1098: śūnyavidya na hi vidyate kvaci antarīkṣi śakunasya vā padam |
T04canprasu:1099: yo na vidyati sabhāvataḥ kvaci so na jātu parahetu bheṣyati ||
T04canprasu:1100: yasya naiva hi sabhāvu labhyati so 'svabhāvu parapaccayaḥ katham |
T04canprasu:1101: asvabhāvu paru kiṃ janīṣyati eṣa hetu sugatena deśitaḥ ||
T04canprasu:1102: sarva dharma acalā dṛḍhaṃ sthitā nirvikāra nirupadravāḥ śivāḥ |
T04canprasu:1104: śailaparvata yathā akampiyā evaṃ dharma avikampiyāḥ sadā |
T04canprasu:1105: no cyavati na pi copapadyayu evaṃ dharmata jinena deśitā || ityādi |
T04canprasu:1107: yo na pi jāyati nā cupapadyī no cyavate na pi jīryati dharmaḥ |
T04canprasu:1108: taṃ jinu deśayatī narasiṃhaḥ tatra niveśayi sattvaśatāni |
T04canprasu:1109: yasya sabhāvu na vidyati kaści no parabhāvatu kenaci labdhaḥ |
T04canprasu:1110: nāntarato na pi bāhirato vā labhyati tatra niveśayi nāthaḥ ||
T04canprasu:1111: śānta gatī kathitā sugatena no ca gati upalabhyati kāci |
T04canprasu:1112: tatra ca voharasī gatimukto muktaku mocayamī bahusattvān || iti vistaraḥ || 16 ||
T04canprasu:1113: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pratyayaparīkṣā nāma prathamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:1115: atrāha- yadyapi utpādapratiṣedhātpratītyasamutpādasya anirodhādiviśeṣaṇasiddhiḥ, tathāpi anāgamanirgamapratītyasamutpādasiddhaye lokaprasiddhagamanāgamanakriyāpratiṣedhārthaṃ kiṃcidupapattyantaramucyatāmiti ucyate |
T04canprasu:1116: yadi gamanaṃ nāma syānniyataṃ tadgate vā adhvajāte parikalpyeta agate gamyamāne vā |
T04canprasu:1118: gataṃ na gamyate tāvadagataṃ naiva gamyate |
T04canprasu:1122: yadgatamuparatagamikriyaṃ tadvartamānagamikriyāyogavācinā gamyate ityanena śabdenocyamānamasaṃbaddhamiti kṛtvā gataṃ tāvad gamyata iti na yujyate |
T04canprasu:1129: yadi agataṃ kathaṃ gamyate, atha gamyate na
T04canprasu:1133: iha hi gantā yaṃ deśamatikrāntaḥ sa tasya deśo gataḥ, yaṃ ca nātikrāntaḥ
T04canprasu:1135: na ca gatāgatavyatirekeṇa tṛtīyamaparamadhvajātaṃ paśyāmo gamyamānaṃ nāma |
T04canprasu:1136: yataścaivaṃ gamyamānaṃ na gamyate, gamyata iti na
T04canprasu:1138: ato na tad gamikriyayā āviśyate na gamyata iti nāsti gamyamāne 'pi gamanam ||
T04canprasu:1139: atha syāt- ganturgacchato yaścaraṇākrānto deśaḥ, sa gamyamānaḥ syāditi |
T04canprasu:1141: aṅgulyagrāvasthitasya paramāṇoryaḥ pūrvo deśaḥ, sa tasya gate 'ntargataḥ |
T04canprasu:1142: pārṣṇyavasthitasya caramaparamāṇorya uttaro deśaḥ, sa tasya agate 'ntargataḥ |
T04canprasu:1145: yathā caivaṃ caraṇe vicāraḥ, evaṃ paramāṇūnāmapi pūrvāparadigbhāgasaṃbandhena vicāraḥ kārya iti |
T04canprasu:1151: ceṣṭā yatra gatistatra gamyamāne ca sā yataḥ |
T04canprasu:1152: na gate nāgate ceṣṭā gamyamāne gatistataḥ || 2 ||
T04canprasu:1154: yato vrajato ganturyatra deśe ceṣṭā gatiḥ tatraiva deśe |
T04canprasu:1155: sā ca ceṣṭā na gate 'dhvani saṃbhavati
T04canprasu:1158: yatra hi gatirupalabhyate tadgamyamānam, tacca gamikriyayā āviśyate |
T04canprasu:1161: evamapi parikalpyamāne gamyamānaṃ na gamyata ityāha-
T04canprasu:1164: iha hi gamikriyāyogādeva gamyamānavyapadeśamicchati bhavān, tacca iti gamyata bravīti |
T04canprasu:1165: ekā cātra gamikriyā, tayā gamyamānavyapadeśo bhavatu
T04canprasu:1167: gamyata iti bhūyaḥ kriyāsaṃbandho gamyamānasya na yujyata iti gamyamānasya gamanaṃ kathaṃ nāmopapatsyate |
T04canprasu:1172: ekasyā gamikriyāyā gamyamānamityatropayuktatvād dvitīyāyā abhāvācca, gamyata ityayaṃ vyapadeśo vinā gamanena yadā naivopapadyate, tadā gamyamānaṃ gamyata iti paripūrṇo vākyārtho nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ gamyamānamityetāvanmātrameva saṃbhavati dvitīyakriyābhāvāt, na tu gamyata
T04canprasu:1174: atha gamyate ityatraiva gamikriyāsaṃbandha iṣyate, evaṃ sati gamyamānavyapadeśe nāsti kriyāsaṃbandha iti na paripūrṇatā
T04canprasu:1178: yasya vādino gamyamānasya gamanamiti pakṣaḥ, gamyamāne saṃjñābhūte gamikriyāśūnye yo gamikriyāmādheyabhūtāmicchati, tasya pakṣe ṛte
T04canprasu:1179: gatergamyamānamiti prasajyate, gatirahitaṃ gamanaṃ syāt, yasmādasya gamyamānaṃ hi gamyate
T04canprasu:1181: yasmād gatirahitameva gamyamānaṃ sat tasya vādino gamyate, gamyata ityatra kriyopayogāt, tasmād gatirahitaṃ gamanaṃ prasajyate || 4 ||
T04canprasu:1182: atha ubhayatrāpi kriyāsaṃbandha iṣyate gamyamāne gamyate ityatra ca,
T04canprasu:1185: yena tadgamyamānaṃ ca yaccātra gamanaṃ punaḥ || 5 ||
T04canprasu:1186: yena gamanena yogādgamyamānavyapadeśaṃ pratilabhate 'dhvā, tadekaṃ gamanam || tatra gamyamāne 'dhikaraṇabhute dvitīyaṃ gamanaṃ yena so 'dhvā gamyate
T04canprasu:1188: bhavatu gamanadvayam, ko doṣa iti cet, ayaṃ doṣaḥ |
T04canprasu:1193: yasmādavaśyaṃ kriyā svasādhanamapekṣate karma kartāraṃ vā |
T04canprasu:1195: nāsti ca ekasminneva gacchati devadatte dvitīyaḥ karteti |
T04canprasu:1198: atha syāt- yadāyaṃ devadattaḥ sthitaḥ, sa na bhāṣate? paśyati na? tadaiko
T04canprasu:1199: 'nekakriyo dṛṣṭaḥ, evamekasmin gantari kriyādvayaṃ bhaviṣyati iti |
T04canprasu:1202: kriyābhedācca tatsādhanasyāpi śakteḥ siddha eva bhedaḥ |
T04canprasu:1205: evam, na tu dravyaṃ kārakaḥ, kiṃ tarhi śaktiḥ, sā ca bhidyata eva |
T04canprasu:1207: sadṛśakriyādvaya kārakatvaṃ naikadeśikasya dṛṣṭam, ato naikasya ganturgamanadvayam || 6
T04canprasu:1208: atrāha- yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi gantari devadatte gamanamupalabhyate devadatto
T04canprasu:1217: gantāramantareṇa nirāśrayaṃ gamanamasadityuktam, tataśca gantāraṃ cetiraskṛtya pratyākhyāya gamanaṃ nāsti, asati gamane kuto nirhetuko
T04canprasu:1219: atrāha- vidyata eva gamanam, tadvatastena vyapadeśāt |
T04canprasu:1222: yadi gamanaṃ na syāt, gamanavato devadattasya gacchatīti vyapadeśo na syāt, daṇḍābhāve daṇḍivyapadeśābhāvavat
T04canprasu:1226: gantā na gacchati tāvadagantā naiva gacchati |
T04canprasu:1228: iha gacchatīti gantā, sa tāvanna gacchati, yathā ca na gacchati tathottareṇa ślokatrayeṇa pratipādayiṣyati |
T04canprasu:1232: | yadyasāvagantā, kathaṃ gacchati? atha gacchati, nāsau agantā iti |
T04canprasu:1234: ko hi ganturaganturvinirmuktastṛtīyo 'sti yo gacchatīti kalpyeta? tasmānnāsti gamanam || 8
T04canprasu:1235: atrāha- nāgantā gacchati nāpyubhayarahitaḥ, kiṃ tarhi gantaiva gacchatīti
T04canprasu:1239: gantā gacchatītyatra vākye ekaiva gamikriyā, tayā ca gacchatīti
T04canprasu:1241: ganteti tu vyapadeśe nāsti dvitīyā gamikriyā iti |
T04canprasu:1242: gamanena vinā gantā, agacchan ganteti yadā na saṃbhavati, tadā gantā gacchatīti na yujyate
T04canprasu:1243: kāmaṃ gacchatītyastu, ganteti tu na saṃbhavatīti tadayuktam || 9
T04canprasu:1244: atha gatiyogātsagatika eva gantā, tathāpi dvitīyagamikriyābhāvadgacchatīti vyapadeśo na
T04canprasu:1245: pakṣo gantā gacchatīti yasya tasya prasajyate |
T04canprasu:1247: yasya vādino gamikriyāyogādeva ganteti pakṣaḥ, tasya ganturgamanamicchataḥ sagamanagantṛvyapadeśādgamanena vinā gantā gacchatīti syāt,
T04canprasu:1250: gacchatītyetasyārthe ganteti śabdo gamanena vinā gantetyatra vākye || 10
T04canprasu:1251: atha ubhayatrāpi gatiyoga iṣyate gantā gacchatīti, evamapi-
T04canprasu:1252: gamane dve prasajyete gantā yadyuta gacchati |
T04canprasu:1253: ganteti cocyate yena gantā san yacca gacchati || 11 ||
T04canprasu:1254: yena gamanena yogād gantetyucyate vyapadiśyate tadekaṃ gamanam |
T04canprasu:1255: gantā bhavan yacca gacchati, yāṃ ca gatikriyāṃ karoti, tadetadgamanadvayaṃ prasaktam |
T04canprasu:1256: ato gantṛdvayaprasaṅga iti pūrvavad dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam |
T04canprasu:1261: yasmāddevadattāśrayaivaiṣā cintā kimasau gantā san gacchati, uta agantā gacchati, tadvayatirikto veti |
T04canprasu:1271: yadi gamanārambho bhavet, tad gate vādhvanyāramyeta, agate vā gamyamāne vā
T04canprasu:1272: | tatra gate gamanaṃ nārabhyate, taddhi nāma uparatagamikriyam |
T04canprasu:1273: yadi tatra gamanamārabhyeta, tad gatamityevaṃ na syād atītavartamānayorvirodhāt |
T04canprasu:1278: yathā ca gamanaṃ na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:1279: na pūrvaṃ gamanārambhādgamyamānaṃ na vā gatam |
T04canprasu:1281: iha devadatto yadāvasthita āste, sa tadā gamanaṃ nārabhate |
T04canprasu:1282: tasya gamanārambhātpūrvaṃ na gamyamānamadhvajātamasti, na ca gataṃ yatra gamanamārabhyeta
T04canprasu:1284: atha syāt- yadyapi gamanārambhātpūrvaṃ na gataṃ na gamyamānaṃ
T04canprasu:1289: tatra gamanārambha ityasaṃbaddhametadityāha- agate gamanaṃ kutaḥ iti || 13 ||
T04canprasu:1290: yadyapi gatāgatagamyamāneṣu gamanārambho nāsti, gatāgatagamyamānāni tu santi |
T04canprasu:1291: na cāsati gamane etāni yujyanta iti |
T04canprasu:1294: sati hi gamikriyāprārambhe yatroparatā gamikriyā tad gatamiti parikalpyeta, yatra vartamānā tad gamyamānam, yatrājātā tadagatamiti |
T04canprasu:1295: yadā tu gamikriyāprārambha eva nāsti, tadā-
T04canprasu:1296: gataṃ kiṃ gamyamanaṃ kimagataṃ kiṃ vikalpyate |
T04canprasu:1298: prārambhe 'nupalabhyamāne kiṃ mithyādhvatrayaṃ parikalpyate, kuto vā tadvayapadeśakāraṇaṃ gamanamityayuktametat || 14 ||
T04canprasu:1304: syād gamanaṃ yadi tatpratipakṣaḥ sthānaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:1305: kathamihedaṃ sthānaṃ ganturagantustadanyasya vā parikalpyeta? sarvathā ca na yujyata ityāha-
T04canprasu:1306: gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadagantā naiva tiṣṭhati |
T04canprasu:1308: yathā gantā na tiṣṭhati tathottareṇa ślokenākhyāsyati |
T04canprasu:1309: agantāpi na tiṣṭhati, sa hi tiṣṭhatyeva, tasya kimaparayā sthityā prayojanam? agantāpi na tiṣṭhati? sa hi tiṣṭhatyeva, tasya (Pp_38) kimaparayā sthityā prayojanam? ekayā sthityā agantā aparayā tiṣṭhatīti sthitidvayaprasaṅgāt
T04canprasu:1312: atrāha- nāgantā tiṣṭhati, nāpi ganturagantuścānyaḥ, kiṃ tarhi gantaiva
T04canprasu:1317: yadāyaṃ tiṣṭhatītyucyate, tadā sthitivirodhi gamanamasya nāsti, vinā ca gamanaṃ gantṛvyapadeśo nāsti |
T04canprasu:1320: iha gaternivartamānaḥ sthitimārabhate gamanābhāve tu na tato nivarteta |
T04canprasu:1325: tatra gantā gatādadhvano na nivartate gatyabhāvāt |
T04canprasu:1330: atrāha- yadi gamanapratidvandvisthityabhāvādgatirasatī, evaṃ tarhi gamanaprasiddhaye sthiti sādhayāmaḥ, tatsiddhau gamanasiddhiḥ |
T04canprasu:1331: tasmādvidyata eva sthānaṃ pratidvandvisadbhāvāt, sthiterhi pratidvandvi gamanam, tadasti, tataśca sthitirapi, pratidvandvisadbhāvāt |
T04canprasu:1335: atra hi yadgamanaṃ sthitisiddhaye varṇitaṃ tadgatyā samaṃ gatidūṣaṇena tulyamityarthaḥ |
T04canprasu:1336: yathā gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadityādinā gatiprasiddhaye sthiterhetutvenopāttāyā dūṣaṇamuktam, evamihāpi sthitiprasiddhaye gamanasya hetutvenopāttasya sthātā na gacchati tāvadityādinā
T04canprasu:1339: evaṃ tāvad gamanaṃ gatyā tulyaṃ pratyākhyeyam ||
T04canprasu:1340: atha syāt- vidyata eva sthānaṃ tadārambhasadbhāvāt |
T04canprasu:1341: iha gatyupamardena sthānamārabhyate, kathaṃ tanna syāt? ucyate |
T04canprasu:1343: tatra yathā pūrvaṃ gate nārabhyate gantumityādinā gamanārambho
T04canprasu:1353: iti gatyā tulyaṃ dūṣaṇamiti nāsti sthitiḥ |
T04canprasu:1356: yadi gamanaṃ syāt, gantṛvyatirekeṇa vā syādavyatirekeṇa vā?
T04canprasu:1358: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eveti na yujyate |
T04canprasu:1359: anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate || 18 ||
T04canprasu:1361: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eva hi bhavedyadi |
T04canprasu:1362: ekībhāvaḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karmaṇa eva ca || 19 ||
T04canprasu:1363: yeyaṃ gamikriyā, sā yadi ganturavyatiriktā nānyā syāt, tadā kartuḥ kriyāyāścaikatvaṃ syāt
T04canprasu:1364: tataśca iyaṃ kriyā, ayaṃ kartā, iti viśeṣo na
T04canprasu:1367: ato yadeva gamanaṃ sa eva ganteti na yujyate || 19 ||
T04canprasu:1371: yadi hi gantṛgamanayoranyatvaṃ syāt, tadā gamananirapekṣo gantā syāt,
T04canprasu:1372: gantṛnirapekṣaṃ ca gamanaṃ gṛhyeta pṛthak siddhaṃ ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ |
T04canprasu:1373: na ca gantuḥ pṛthaksiddhaṃ gamanaṃ gṛhyata iti |
T04canprasu:1374: anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate iti prasādhitametat || 20 ||
T04canprasu:1377: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate || 21 ||
T04canprasu:1378: yayorgantṛgamanayoryathoditanyāyena ekībhāvena vā nānābhāvena vā nāsti
T04canprasu:1379: siddhiḥ, tayoridānīṃ kenānyena prakāreṇa siddhirastu? ata āha- tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyata iti |
T04canprasu:1381: atrāha- iha devadatto gantā gacchatīti lokaprasiddham |
T04canprasu:1382: tatra yathā vaktā vācaṃ bhāṣate, kartā kriyāṃ karoti, iti prasiddham, evaṃ yayā gatyā
T04canprasu:1386: gatyā yayocyate gantā gatiṃ tāṃ sa na gacchati |
T04canprasu:1387: yayā gatyā devadatto gantetyabhivyajate, sa gantā san tāṃ tāvanna gacchati, na prāpnoti yadi vā na karotītyarthaḥ |
T04canprasu:1390: yadi gantā gateḥ pūrvaṃ siddhaḥ syāt, sa tāṃ gacchet |
T04canprasu:1393: kaściddevadattaḥ kiṃcidarthāntarabhūtaṃ grāmaṃ nagaraṃ vā gacchatīti dṛṣṭam |
T04canprasu:1394: na caivaṃ yayā gatyā gantetyucyate, tasyāḥ pūrvaṃ siddharūpo
T04canprasu:1395: gatinirapekṣo gantā nāma asti yastāṃ gacchet || 22 ||
T04canprasu:1396: atha manyase- yayā gatyā gantetyabhivyajyate, tāmeva asau na gacchati, kiṃ tahi tato 'nyāmiti
T04canprasu:1399: gatyā yayocyate gantā tato 'nyāṃ sa na gacchati |
T04canprasu:1401: yayā gatyā gantā abhivyajyate, tato 'nyāmapi sa gantā san na gacchati,
T04canprasu:1403: yayā gatyā gantā abhivyajyate, gantā san yāṃ cāparāṃ gacchatītyetad gatidvayaṃ prasaktam |
T04canprasu:1406: etena vaktā vācaṃ bhāṣate kartā kriyāṃ karoti, iti pratyuktam || 23 ||
T04canprasu:1408: sadbhūto gamanaṃ gantā triprakāraṃ na gacchati |
T04canprasu:1416: tatra sadbhūto gantā sadbhūtamasadbhūtaṃ sadasadbhūtaṃ triprakāraṃ gamanaṃ na gacchati |
T04canprasu:1418: evamasadbhūto 'pi gantā triprakāraṃ gamanaṃ na gacchati |
T04canprasu:1422: tasmādgatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate || 25 ||
T04canprasu:1426: yatra na saṃkarṣaṇapadaṃ na niṣkarṣaṇapadaṃ tadāryāṇāṃ padam |
T04canprasu:1428: yadi bījamevāṅkure saṃkramati, bījameva tatsyānna yadaṅkuraḥ
T04canprasu:1433: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro |
T04canprasu:1434: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā || iti ||
T04canprasu:1436: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāranucchedaśāśvatāḥ || iti ca ||
T04canprasu:1438: ādarśapṛṣṭhe tatha tailapātre nirīkṣate nārimukhaṃ alaṃkṛtam |
T04canprasu:1439: so tatra rāgaṃ janayitva bālo pradhāvito kāmi gaveṣamāṇo ||
T04canprasu:1440: mukhasya saṃkrānti yadā na vidyate bimbe mukhaṃ naiva kadāci labhyate |
T04canprasu:1441: mūḍho yathā so janayeta rāgaṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān ||
T04canprasu:1443: tahi kāli so daśabalo anagho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram |
T04canprasu:1444: supinopamā bhagavatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate ||
T04canprasu:1445: na ca sattvu labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ |
T04canprasu:1447: na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloka saṃkramati gacchati vā |
T04canprasu:1448: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇa śubha saṃsarato ||
T04canprasu:1449: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ |
T04canprasu:1450: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśati na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate ||
T04canprasu:1451: na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ |
T04canprasu:1452: na ca dṛṣṭa sthānagatiśuddhiriho na ca satvacāra supaśāntagati ||
T04canprasu:1453: supinopamaṃ hi tribhavaṃ vaśikaṃ laghu bhagnamanityena māyasamam |
T04canprasu:1454: na ca āgataṃ na ca ihopagataṃ śūnyānimitta sada saṃtatiyo ||
T04canprasu:1455: anutpāda śānta animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocara jināna guṇā |
T04canprasu:1456: bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāna iyaṃ vṛṣabhitā paramā ||
T04canprasu:1460: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau gatāgataparīkṣā nāma dvitīyaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:1462: atrāha- yadyapi gatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate, tathāpi pravacanasiddhayapekṣayā draṣṭṭadraṣṭavyadarśanādīnāmastitvamāstheyam |
T04canprasu:1464: darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ |
T04canprasu:1469: iha hi paśyatīti darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ, tasya ca rūpaṃ viṣayatvenopadiśyate || 1 ||
T04canprasu:1470: yathā darśanaṃ rūpaṃ na paśyati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:1471: svamātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hi tattameva na paśyati |
T04canprasu:1472: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān || 2 ||
T04canprasu:1473: tatra tadeva darśanaṃ svātmānaṃ na paśyati svātmani kriyāvirodhāt |
T04canprasu:1476: yadyapi svātmānaṃ darśanaṃ na paśyati, tathāṣyagnivat parān drakṣyati |
T04canprasu:1477: tathā hi agniḥparātmānameva dahati na svātmānam, evaṃ darśanaṃ parāneva
T04canprasu:1482: yo 'yamagnidṛṣṭānto darśanasya prasiddhaye bhavatopanyastaḥ, sa na paryāpto nālaṃ na samartho na yujyata ityarthaḥ |
T04canprasu:1487: darśanaprasiddhaye bhavatopanyastaḥ, so 'pi saha darśanena dārṣṭāntikārthena pratyukto dūṣitaḥ |
T04canprasu:1490: yathā gataṃ na gamyate nāgataṃ na gamyamānam,
T04canprasu:1491: evamagnināpi dagdhaṃ na dahyate nādagdhaṃ dahyata ityādinā samaṃ vācyam |
T04canprasu:1492: yathā ca na gataṃ nāgataṃ na gamyamānaṃ gamyate, evam-
T04canprasu:1493: na dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate tāvadadṛṣṭaṃ naiva dṛśyate |
T04canprasu:1496: yathā ca gantā na gacchati tāvadityādyuktam, evaṃ na dagdhā dahati tāvadityādi vācyam |
T04canprasu:1497: evaṃ na draṣṭā paśyati tāvadityādinā agnidṛṣṭāntena saha gamyamānagatāgatairyasmātsamaṃ dūṣaṇam, ato 'gnivad (Pp_44)
T04canprasu:1499: tataśca siddhametat- svātmavad darśanaṃ parānapi na paśyatīti || 3 ||
T04canprasu:1503: yadā caivamapaśyanna kiṃciddarśanaṃ bhavati, tadānīmapaśyato darśanātvāyogāt stambhādivat, paśyatīti darśanamiti vyapadeśo na yujyate |
T04canprasu:1504: yadyapi darśanaśabdādanantaraṃ ślokabandhānurodhena darśana paśyatīti pāṭhaḥ, tathāpi vyākhyānakāle paśyatīti darśanamityevaṃ kathametattu yujyate iti paṭhitavyam || 4 ||
T04canprasu:1505: kiṃ cānyat- iha paśyatīti darśanamityucyamāne darśanakriyayā darśanasvabhāvasya vā cakṣuṣaḥ saṃbandhaḥ parikalpyeta,
T04canprasu:1506: adarśanasvabhāvasya vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyate ityāha-
T04canprasu:1508: darśanasvabhāvasya tāvad dṛśikriyāyuktasya bhūyaḥ paśyatītyādinā saṃbandho nopapadyate dṛśikriyādvayaprasaṅgāt darśanadvayaprasaṅgācca |
T04canprasu:1510: yadā paśyati darśanaṃ naiva naiva paśyatyadarśanam |
T04canprasu:1513: ye tu manyante- nirvyāpāraṃ hīdaṃ dharmamātramutpadyamānamutpadyate iti,
T04canprasu:1514: naiva kiṃcit, kaścidviṣayaṃ paśyati kriyāyā abhāvāt, tasmāddarśanaṃ na paśyatīti siddhametatprasādhyata iti |
T04canprasu:1516: yadi kriyā vyavahārāṅgabhūtā na syāt, tadā dharmamātramapi na syāt,
T04canprasu:1523: kriyāvān śāśvato nāsti nāsti sarvagate kriyā |
T04canprasu:1524: niṣkriyo nāstinā tulyo nairātmyaṃ kiṃ na te priyam || iti |
T04canprasu:1526: atrāha- naiva hi paśyatīti darśanamiti kartṛsādhanamabhyupagamyate, kiṃ tarhi paśyatyanenetī darśanamiti karaṇasādhanam, tataśca uktadoṣāprasaṅgaḥ |
T04canprasu:1527: yaścānena darśanena karaṇabhūtena paśyati, sa draṣṭā, eṣa ca vidyate
T04canprasu:1531: yathā svamātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hītyādinā dūṣaṇamuktam, evaṃ draṣṭurapi darśanavaddūṣaṇaṃ veditavyam
T04canprasu:1534: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān ||
T04canprasu:1538: iha yannāsti iti, na tasya karmakaraṇe vidyete tadyathā vandhyāsūnoḥ |
T04canprasu:1539: asti ca draṣṭuḥ karaṇaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ ca karma |
T04canprasu:1542: naiva hi draṣṭavyadarśane vidyete, tatkuto draṣṭā syāt? draṣṭusāpekṣe hi draṣṭavyadarśane
T04canprasu:1545: iha draṣṭā nāma yadi kaścitsyāt, sa darśanasāpekṣo vā syānnirapekṣo vā |
T04canprasu:1546: tatra yadi darśanasāpekṣo 'tiraskṛtya darśanamiṣyate, tadā siddhasya vā
T04canprasu:1548: tatra siddho draṣṭā na hi darśanamapekṣate |
T04canprasu:1549: kiṃ siddhasya sato draṣṭuḥ punardarśanāpek ṣā kuryāt?
T04canprasu:1550: na hi siddhaṃ punarapi sādhyata iti |
T04canprasu:1555: tadevaṃ tiraskṛtyātiraskṛtya vā darśanaṃ yadā draṣṭā nāsti, tadā-
T04canprasu:1556: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ caiva draṣṭaryasati te kutaḥ || 6 ||
T04canprasu:1557: draṣṭaryasati nirhetuke draṣṭavyadarśane na saṃbhavataḥ iti kutastatsadbhāvād draṣṭā prasetsyati?
T04canprasu:1562: iti draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ ca pratītya vijñānamutpadyate |
T04canprasu:1570: nāstīti iha draṣṭurabhāvād draṣṭavyadarśane api na sta ityuktam |
T04canprasu:1571: ataḥ kuto vijñānādicatuṣṭayaṃ vijñānasparśavedanātṛṣṇākhyam? tasmānna santi vijñānādīni
T04canprasu:1581: vyākhyātaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ |
T04canprasu:1585: na cakṣuḥ prekṣate rūpaṃ mano dharmānna vetti ca |
T04canprasu:1586: etatta paramaṃ satyaṃ yatra loko na gāhate ||
T04canprasu:1591: no cakṣuṣi rūpa niśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi ||
T04canprasu:1595: na kahiṃci gataṃ na cāgataṃ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati ||
T04canprasu:1597: sarva sayogi tu paśyati cakṣustatra na paśyati pratyayahīnam |
T04canprasu:1598: naiva ca cakṣu prapaśyati rūpaṃ tena sayogaviyogavikalpaḥ ||
T04canprasu:1600: yena ca yogasamāśritacakṣustena na paśyati cakṣu kadāci ||
T04canprasu:1601: yo 'pi ca śrūyati śabdu manojñaḥ so 'pi ca nāntari jātu praviṣṭaḥ |
T04canprasu:1602: saṃkramaṇaṃ na ca labhyati tasya kalpavaśāttu samucchritu śabdaḥ || iti ||
T04canprasu:1604: gītaṃ na nṛtyamapi vādyarutaṃ na grāhyaṃ svapnopamā hi ratayo
T04canprasu:1606: saṃkalpalālasa gatā abudhā 'tra nāśaṃ kiṃ kleśadāsa iva bālajano bhavāmi
T04canprasu:1608: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau cakṣurādīndriyaparīkṣā nāma tṛtīyaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:1610: atrāha- yadyevaṃ cakṣurādīnīndriyāṇi na santi, na skandhāḥ, apratiṣedhāt tadantargatāni cendriyāṇi, atastānyapi bhaviṣyantīti |
T04canprasu:1618: tadvayatiriktaṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyākhyaṃ nopalabhyate ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ |
T04canprasu:1623: yathā ghaṭādarthāntarabhūtaḥ paṭo na ghaṭahetukaḥ, evaṃ rūpakāraṇacaturmahābhūtavyatirikta bhautikaṃ rūpamiṣyamāṇaṃ na bhūtahetukaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:1626: idānīṃ rūpeṇāpi vinirmuktaṃ yathā rūpakāraṇaṃ nāsti, tathā
T04canprasu:1629: yadi kāryarūpavinirmuktaṃ rūpakāraṇaṃ syāt, tadā, yathā ghaṭātkuṇḍaṃ pṛthaksiddhaṃ ghaṭahetukaṃ na bhavati, evaṃ kāryātpṛthagbhūtaṃ kāraṇamiṣyamāṇam-
T04canprasu:1636: atha cedaṃ rūpasya kāraṇamiṣyamāṇaṃ sati vā rūpe kāraṇatveneṣyate 'sati
T04canprasu:1640: sati vā saṃvidyamāne rūpe kiṃ rūpakāraṇena prayojanam? asati asaṃvidyamāne rūpe kiṃ kiṃ rūpakāraṇena prayojanam, kasya vā tatkāraṇaṃ parikalpyate?
T04canprasu:1642: atha syāt- yadyapi evaṃ rūpakāraṇaṃ na saṃbhavati, tathāpi kāryaṃ rūpaṃ
T04canprasu:1649: asati kāraṇe kuto nirhetukaṃ kāryaṃ rūpaṃ bhavet? naiva naivetyanena sāvadhāraṇena pratiṣedhadvayena ahetukatvādasyātyaniṣṭatāṃ darśayati |
T04canprasu:1650: yataścaivaṃ rūpaṃ sarvathā vicāryamāṇaṃ na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:1651: tasmāt tattvadarśī yogī rūpagatān kāṃścinna vikalpān vikalpayet || 5 ||
T04canprasu:1653: idaṃ rūpakāraṇamiṣyamāṇaṃ sadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ niṣpādayedasadṛśaṃ vā?
T04canprasu:1659: bāhyaṃ tu rūpādyāyatanādikaṃ cakṣurvijñānādigrāhyalakṣaṇaṃ na mahābhūtasvabhāvamiti |
T04canprasu:1662: na cāpi sadṛśānāṃ śālibījādīnāṃ parasparakāryakāraṇabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ, ityataḥ na kāraṇasya sadṛśaṃ kāryamityupapadyate |
T04canprasu:1665: yathā cedaṃ rūpaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ sarvathā nopapadyate, evaṃ vedanādayo 'pi,
T04canprasu:1670: yathaiva hyekasya dharmasya śūnyatā pratipādayitumiṣṭā mādhyamikena, tathaiva sarvadharmāṇāmapīti ataḥ-
T04canprasu:1671: vigrahe yaḥ parīhāraṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet |
T04canprasu:1674: śūnyatayā kāraṇabhūtayā rūpaṃ niḥsvabhāvamityevaṃ sasvabhāvavāde pratiṣiddhe, yadi paraḥ parihāraṃ
T04canprasu:1675: brūyāt- vedanādayastāvatsanti, tadvadrūpamapyastīti, tadetatsarvaṃ tasyāparihṛtaṃ bhavati
T04canprasu:1676: yasmādvedanādīnāmapi sadbhāvaḥ sādhyena rūpasadbhāvena samo veditavyaḥ |
T04canprasu:1678: vicāryamāṇamasat, evaṃ sparśapratyayā vedanā, vijñānasahajā saṃjñā,
T04canprasu:1680: svakāraṇātsparśādeḥ tattvānyatvādinā vicāryamāṇaṃ nāstīti sarvametatsādhyasamaṃ bhavati |
T04canprasu:1681: yathā vedanādayaḥ sādhyasamāḥ, evaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇakāryakāraṇāvayavyavayavādayo 'pi sarva eva padārthāḥ rūpeṇa sādhyena samā iti kutaḥ parasya parīhāra saṃbhavet? sarvaṃ vacanamasya sādhyasamaṃ bhavatīti sarvatra śāstre parīhāreṇa sādhyasamatvaṃ
T04canprasu:1683: yathā ca parapakṣadūṣaṇe vihi 'toyaṃ vidhiḥ, evaṃ vyākhyānakāle 'pītyāha-
T04canprasu:1684: vyākhyāne ya upālambhaṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet |
T04canprasu:1686: vyākhyānakāle 'pi yaḥ śiṣyadeśīyaścodyamupālambhaṃ kuryāt, tasyāpi taccodyamupālambhākhyaṃ pūrvavatsādhyasamaṃ veditavyam |
T04canprasu:1688: bhāvasyaikasya yo draṣṭā draṣṭā sarvasya sa smṛtaḥ |
T04canprasu:1689: ekasya śūnyatā yaiva saiva sarvasya śūnyatā || iti |
T04canprasu:1691: ekena dharmeṇa tu sarvadharmān anugacchate māyamarīcisādṛśān |
T04canprasu:1692: agrāhyatucchānalikānaśāśvatān so bodhimaṇḍaṃ nacireṇa gacchati || iti ||
T04canprasu:1694: yatha ñāta tayātmasaṃjña tathaiva sarvatra peṣitā buddhiḥ |
T04canprasu:1695: sarve ca tatsvabhāvā dharma viśuddhā gaganakalpāḥ ||
T04canprasu:1697: kiyadbahu pi bhāvetvā na tasyotpadyate madaḥ || iti |
T04canprasu:1698: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau skandhaparīkṣā nāma caturtha prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:1705: syuḥ skandhāyatanāni yadi dhātava eva syuḥ |
T04canprasu:1719: alakṣaṇo na kaścicca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kvacit |
T04canprasu:1726: tataśca asati asaṃvidyamāne alakṣaṇe lakṣaṇarahite bhāve kuha idānīṃ lakṣaṇaṃpravartatāmiti nāsti lakṣaṇapravṛttiḥ || 2 ||
T04canprasu:1728: idaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pravartamānaṃ salakṣaṇe vā pravarteta alakṣaṇe vā?
T04canprasu:1734: kiṃ hi lakṣaṇavataḥ prasiddhasya bhāvasya punarlakṣaṇakṛtyaṃ syāt? ityanavasthā atiprasaṅgaścaivaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:1735: na hyasau kadācinna salakṣaṇaḥ syāditi sadaiva lakṣaṇapravṛttiḥ prasajyeta |
T04canprasu:1743: yadi salakṣaṇo nālakṣaṇaḥ, athālakṣaṇo na salakṣaṇaḥ |
T04canprasu:1746: tasmādasaṃbhavādeva salakṣaṇe cālakṣaṇe ca lakṣaṇapravṛttirnopapadyate iti || 3 ||
T04canprasu:1747: athāpi syāt- yadyapi na lakṣaṇapravṛttiḥ, tathāpi lakṣyamastīti etadapi
T04canprasu:1751: yadā lakṣaṇapravṛttireva nāsti tadā kathaṃ lakṣyaṃ syāt? naiva saṃbhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ |
T04canprasu:1752: atrāha- lakṣaṇapravṛttistvayā niṣiddhā na tu lakṣaṇam, tataśca vidyate lakṣyam, lakṣaṇa sadbhāvāt |
T04canprasu:1755: lakṣaṇāsaṃpravṛttau ca na lakṣyamupapadyate iti pratipāditam |
T04canprasu:1758: yadā caivaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nāsti, tadā lakṣaṇasadbhāvādvidyate lakṣyamiti
T04canprasu:1760: tasmānna vidyate lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate |
T04canprasu:1762: atrāha- yadyāpi lakṣyalakṣaṇe na staḥ, tathā (pyā)kāśamasti, bhāvarūpaṃ ca bhavadākāśa lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vā syāt |
T04canprasu:1766: lakṣyalakṣaṇe yathā na staḥ, tathoktaṃ prāk |
T04canprasu:1768: yadyākāśaṃ bhāvo na bhavati, abhāvastarhi astu? etadapi nāsti |
T04canprasu:1771: yadā ākāśaṃ bhāvo na bhavati, tadā bhāvasyāsattve kasyābhāvaḥ kalpyatām?
T04canprasu:1777: yadyapi rūpaṃ syāttadā rūpābhāva ākāśamiti syāt |
T04canprasu:1778: yadā ca yathoktena nyāyena rūpameva nāsti, tadā kasyābhāva ākāśaṃ syāt?
T04canprasu:1780: asti ca bhavān bhāvābhāvayoḥ parīkṣakaḥ, ya evāha-
T04canprasu:1783: tasmād bhavato bhāvābhāvaparīkṣakasya sadbhāvāt parīkṣyāvapi bhāvābhāvau vidyete iti |
T04canprasu:1788: syātāṃ bhāvābhāvau yadi, tadā tayoḥ parīkṣako bhāvo va syādabhāvo vā |
T04canprasu:1789: yadi bhāva iṣyate, tasya lakṣyalakṣaṇanirmukto naiva bhāvo 'pi vidyate |
T04canprasu:1794: na ca bhāvābhāvavisadṛśadharmā kaścit tṛtīyaḥ padārtho 'sti, yo 'nayoravagamaka iti nāsti bhāvābhāvayoḥ parīkṣakaḥ |
T04canprasu:1796: bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānati sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate |
T04canprasu:1797: yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ bhajate samādhim || iti |
T04canprasu:1799: yo 'pi ca cintayi śūnyakadharmān so 'pi kumārgapapannaku balaḥ |
T04canprasu:1800: akṣara kīrtita śūnyaka dharmāḥ te ca anakṣara akṣara uktāḥ ||
T04canprasu:1801: śānta paśānta ya cintayi dharmān so 'pi ca cinta na jātu na bhūtaḥ |
T04canprasu:1802: cittavitarkaṇa sarvi papañcāḥ sūkṣma acintiya budhyatha dharmān ||
T04canprasu:1805: tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo na lakṣyaṃ nāpi lakṣaṇam |
T04canprasu:1809: pṛthivyādidhātavo ye pañca pare 'vaśiṣyante, te 'pi ākāśavad bhāvābhāvalakṣyalakṣaṇaparikalpasvarūparahitāḥ parijñeyā ityarthaḥ || 7 ||
T04canprasu:1810: tadevaṃ padārthānāṃ svabhāve vyavasthite avidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā anādisaṃsārābhyastatayā bhāvābhāvādiviparītadarśanā nirvāṇānugāmyaviparītanaiḥsvabhāvyadarśanasanmārgaparibhraṣṭāḥ astitvaṃ ye tu paśyanti nāstitvaṃ cālpabuddhayaḥ |
T04canprasu:1811: bhāvānāṃ te na paśyanti draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivam || 8 ||
T04canprasu:1812: draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivalakṣaṇaṃ sarvakalpanājālarahitaṃ jñānajñeyanivṛttisvabhāvaṃ śivaṃ paramārthasvabhāvam
T04canprasu:1813: paramārthamajaramamaramaprapañcaṃ nirvāṇaṃ śūnyatāsvabhāvaṃ te na paśyanti mandabuddhitayā astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ cābhiniviṣṭāḥ santa iti |
T04canprasu:1818: astīti nāstīti ume 'pi antā śuddhī aśuddhīti ime 'pi antā |
T04canprasu:1819: tasmādume anta vivarjayitvā madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti paṇḍitaḥ ||
T04canprasu:1820: astīti nāstīti vivāda eṣaḥ śuddhī aśuddhīti ayaṃ vivādaḥ |
T04canprasu:1821: vivādaprāptyā na dukhaṃ praśāmyate avivādaprāptyā ca duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate ||
T04canprasu:1823: tasmādasaṃbhava eva yatsāṃsārikeṇa mārgeṇa nirvāṇamadhigamyata iti || 8 ||
T04canprasu:1824: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dhātuparīkṣā nāma pañcamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:1829: iha yannāsti, na tadāśrayasaṃkleśopalabdhirasti bandhyāduhituriva vandhyāsūnoḥ |
T04canprasu:1831: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā- bālo bhikṣave aśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatitaḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi
T04canprasu:1834: raktaḥ san rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manaseti vistaraḥ |
T04canprasu:1836: syuḥ skandhāyatanadhātavo yadi rāgādaya eva kleśāḥ syuḥ |
T04canprasu:1837: ihāyaṃ rāgaḥ parikalpyamāno bālapṛthagjanaiḥ sati rakte nare parikalpyeta asati vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyata ityāha-
T04canprasu:1839: taṃ pratītya bhavedrāgo rakte rāgo bhavetsati || 1 ||
T04canprasu:1840: tatra rāgaḥ saktiradhyavasānaṃ saṅgo 'bhiniveśa iti paryāyāḥ |
T04canprasu:1842: sa yadi rakto rāgātpūrvaṃ rāgatiraskṛto rāgarahito bhavet,
T04canprasu:1843: tadā taṃ rāgatiraskṛtaṃ raktaṃ pratītya rāgo bhavet |
T04canprasu:1844: evaṃ sakti rakte rāgo bhavediti yuktam |
T04canprasu:1845: na tvevaṃ saṃbhavati, yadrāgarahito raktaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:1847: yadyevaṃ sati rakte na rāgaḥ, asati tarhi rakte rāgo 'stu |
T04canprasu:1849: rakte 'sati punā rāgaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati |
T04canprasu:1850: yadā sati rakte rāgo nāsti, tadā kathamasati rakte nirāśrayo rāgaḥ setsyati? na hi asati phale tatpakvatā saṃbhavatīti ||
T04canprasu:1851: atrāha- yadyapi tvayā rāgo niṣiddhaḥ, tathāpi rakto 'sti, apratiṣedhāt |
T04canprasu:1852: na ca rāgamantareṇa rakto yuktaḥ, tasmādayamapyastīti |
T04canprasu:1855: yasmādayaṃ rakta iṣyamāṇaḥ sati vā rāge parikalpyeta,
T04canprasu:1856: asati vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha-
T04canprasu:1857: sati vāsati vā rāge rakte 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ || 2 ||
T04canprasu:1858: tatra yadi sati rāge raktaḥ parikalpyeta, tatrāpi eṣa eva
T04canprasu:1864: rāge 'sati punā raktaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati |
T04canprasu:1868: atrāha- naiva hi rāgaraktayoḥ paurvāparyeṇa saṃbhavo yata idaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ syāt, kiṃ tarhi rāgaraktayoḥ sahaivodbhavaḥ |
T04canprasu:1869: cittasahabhūtena rāgeṇa hi cittaṃ rajyate, tacca raktamiti |
T04canprasu:1879: anayo rāgaraktayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ ekatve parikalpyeta pṛthaktve vā?
T04canprasu:1884: na hi rāgasvātmā rāgādavyatirikto rāgeṇa saheti vyapadiśyate ||
T04canprasu:1887: na hi pṛthagbhūtayorālokāndhakārayoḥ saṃsāranirvāṇayorvā sahabhāvo dṛṣṭa iti || 4 ||
T04canprasu:1891: yadi ekatve sahabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā yatra yatraikatvaṃ tatra tatra sahabhāva
T04canprasu:1893: pṛthaktve 'pi sahabhāve iṣyamāṇe yatra yatra pṛthaktvaṃ tatra tatra sahabhāva iti aśvādivyatiriktasya pṛthagavasthitasya goḥ asahāyasya sahabhāvaḥ syāt || 5 ||
T04canprasu:1898: kimanayoḥ siddhaḥ pṛthakpṛthagbhāvaḥ? kiṃ rāganirapekṣo raktaḥ siddho yatastayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ
T04canprasu:1899: syāt? pṛthakpṛthaksiddhayoreva hi gavāśvayoḥ sahabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ |
T04canprasu:1900: na tvevaṃ rāgaraktau pṛthakpṛthaksiddhāviti nāstyanayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ || 6 ||
T04canprasu:1911: pṛthakpṛthag rāgaraktayoḥ siddhirnāstīti kṛtvā yadyanayoḥ sahabhāvamicchasi, sa ca pṛthakpṛthagasiddhayornāstīti-
T04canprasu:1913: nanvevaṃ sati itaretarāśrayāyāṃ siddhau sthitāyāṃ kasyedānīṃ siddhau satyāṃ kasya siddhirastu? yāvatā-
T04canprasu:1916: nāstyeva sa pṛthagbhāvaḥ sahabhāvānapekṣo yasmin pṛthagbhāve sati sahabhāvasiddhiḥ syādityasaṃbhāvayannāha-
T04canprasu:1919: evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha |
T04canprasu:1921: yathā ca rāgaraktayorna paurvāparyeṇa siddhiḥ nāpi sahabhāvena, evaṃ
T04canprasu:1926: yo rajyeta yatra vā rajyeta yena vā rajyeta, yo duṣyeta yatra vā duṣyeta yena vā duṣyeta, yo muhyeta yatra vā muhyeta yena vā muhyeta, sa taṃ dharma na samanupaśyati taṃ dharma nopalabhate |
T04canprasu:1933: niḥkleśo vaśībhūtaḥ suvimuktacittaḥ suvimuktaprajña ājāneyo mahābhāgaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ apahatabhāro 'nuprāptasvakārthaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaḥ sarvacetovaśitāparamapāramiprāptaḥ śramaṇa ityucyate |
T04canprasu:1937: na vikalpayanti na virāgamapīha teṣām [āśu] sarvabhavabhāvavibhāvitānām ||
T04canprasu:1938: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau rāgaraktaparīkṣā nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:1940: atrāha- vidyanta eva saṃskṛtasvabhāvāḥ, skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ utpādādisaṃskṛtalakṣaṇasadbhāvāt
T04canprasu:1941: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā- trīṇīmāni saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni |
T04canprasu:1947: syuḥ skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvāstāvakena matena, yadi jātyādilakṣaṇameva bhavet
T04canprasu:1948: ihāyamutpādaḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatveneṣyamāṇaḥ saṃskṛto vā tallakṣaṇatveneṣyate, asaṃskṛto vā?
T04canprasu:1951: iyaṃ ca utpādasthitibhaṅgasamāhārasvabhāvasarvasaṃskṛtāvyabhicāriṇīti kṛtvā yadi utpādaḥ saṃskṛta iti parikalpyate, tadā utpāde 'pi trilakṣaṇī prasajyate |
T04canprasu:1953: athotpāde 'pi trilakṣaṇī neṣyate, tadā trilakṣaṇīrahitatvādākāśavat saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvamasyāvahīyate
T04canprasu:1958: ime utpādādayaḥ saṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇatvena parikalpyamānā vyastā vā pṛthagvā lakṣaṇatvena parikalpyeran, samastā vā sahabhūtā vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyata ityāha-
T04canprasu:1962: yadi utpādakāle sthitibhaṅgau na syātāṃ tadā sthitibhaṅgarahitasya ākāśasyeva saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvenānupapadya evotpādaḥ |
T04canprasu:1963: atha sthitikāle utpādabhaṅgau na staḥ, tadā tadrahitasya sthitiḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:1964: utpādabhaṅgarahitaśca padārtho nāstyeveti na asyāvidyamānasya khapuṣpavat sthitiryujyate |
T04canprasu:1966: sthitiyuktasya paścādanityatayāpi yogo na syāt, tadvirodhidharmākrāntatvāt |
T04canprasu:1968: pūrvaṃ śāśvato bhūtvā paścādaśāśvata iti, na caikapadārthaḥ śāśvataścāśāśvataśca yukta iti notpādabhaṅgarahitasya sthitiḥ |
T04canprasu:1969: tathā yadi bhaṅgakāle sthityutpādau na syātām, evamapyanutpannasya sthitirahitasya khapuṣpasya vināśo 'pi nāstīti |
T04canprasu:1970: evaṃ tāvadutpādādayo vyastā nālaṃ lakṣaṇakarmaṇi nālaṃ na paryāptā ityarthaḥ ||
T04canprasu:1971: idānīṃ samastā api na yujyanta ityāha-
T04canprasu:1976: jāyate, tasminneva tiṣṭhati vinaśyati ceti kaḥ sacetāḥ pratipadyeta?
T04canprasu:1977: tasmātsamastānāmapi utpādādīnāṃ saṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇakarmaṇi nāsti sāmarthyam || 2 ||
T04canprasu:1978: atha yaduktaṃ 'yadi saṃskṛta utpādaḥ'; ityādi, tena yadi utpādādīnāṃ
T04canprasu:1979: trilakṣaṇī prāptā prasaktā, tataḥ ko doṣaḥ? athāsaṃskṛtaḥ, evamapyadoṣa iti |
T04canprasu:1981: utpādasthitibhaṅgānāmanyatsaṃskṛtalakṣaṇam asti cedanavasthaivaṃ nāsti cette na saṃskṛtāḥ nanu ca pakṣadvaye 'pi vihita eva doṣaḥ, tatra kiṃ punaruktābhidhāneneti |
T04canprasu:1982: satyamukto doṣaḥ sa khalu nācāryeṇa, kiṃ tarhi vṛttikāreṇa |
T04canprasu:1986: sati ca aparyavasānadoṣe, kiṃ pūrvaṃ syād yata uttarakālamaparaṃ bhavediti vyavasthābhāvādasaṃbhava evaṃ utpādādīnāmityabhiprāyaḥ |
T04canprasu:1987: athavā, pūrvaṃ mukhyatvādutpādasyaiva dūṣaṇamuktam, adhunā tu sāmānyeneti |
T04canprasu:1988: nāsti cette na saṃskṛtā iti gatārthametat || 3 ||
T04canprasu:1989: atrāhuḥ sāṃmitīyāḥ- santi cotpādādīnāmutpādādayaḥ, na ca anavasthāprasaṅgaḥ, lakṣaṇānulakṣaṇānāṃ parasparaniṣpādakatvāt |
T04canprasu:1990: yasmādiha saṃskṛtadharmaḥ kuśalaḥ kliṣṭo vā utpadyamānaḥ ātmanā pañcadaśaḥ utpadyate
T04canprasu:1991: | sa dharmastasya cotpādaḥ samanvāgamaḥ sthitirjarā anityatā |
T04canprasu:1992: yadyasau dharmaḥ kliṣṭo bhavati, tasya mithyāvimuktiḥ |
T04canprasu:1998: idānīmutpāda syāpara utpādaḥ yāvadanairyāṇikatānairyāṇikatetyeṣa parivārasya parivāraḥ
T04canprasu:1999: | tatra yo 'yaṃ maula utpāda sa ātmānaṃ vihāya anyāṃścaturdaśa dharmān janayati |
T04canprasu:2001: evaṃ yāvadanairyāṇikatā caturdaśa dharmān na niryāṇayati, na tannirvāṇaṃ prāpayatītyarthaḥ
T04canprasu:2009: tatra yo 'yamutpādotpādasaṃjñaka utpādaḥ, sa mūlotpādasya kevalamutpādakaḥ |
T04canprasu:2017: yadi tava utpādasyotpādo mūlotpādasya janaka iti matam, sa kathamidānīṃ maulenotpādenānutpāditaḥ san utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayiṣyati? || 5 ||
T04canprasu:2018: atha manyase- utpādita eva maulenotpādena utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayiṣyati,
T04canprasu:2020: sa te maulena janito maulaṃ janayate yadi |
T04canprasu:2022: sa utpādotpādasaṃjñaka utpādo maulena janito yadi maulaṃ janayati, sa maula utpādotpādenājanito 'vidyamānaḥ kathamutpādotpādaṃ janayiṣyati?
T04canprasu:2023: tasmānmaulena janitaḥ san utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayatīte na yujyate |
T04canprasu:2024: tataśca parasparanirvartyanirvartakatvābhāvātsa eva anavasthāprasaṅga iti nāstyutpādaḥ || atrāha- utpadyamāna eva mūlotpāda utpādotpādamutpādayati, sa evotpādotpādo mūlotpādaṃ janayiṣyatīti
T04canprasu:2028: kāmamayaṃ mūlotpāda utpadyamāna utpādayedutpādam, yadyayameva ajātaḥ śaknuyādaparamajātamutpādayitum
T04canprasu:2030: sa ca ajātaḥ kathamutpādayiṣyatīti na yuktamevaitadityabhiprāyaḥ evamutpādotpāde 'pi vācyam atrāha- naiva hi utpādasyāpara utpādo 'sti yato 'navasthāprasaṅgaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:2041: kiṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ prakāśo hi tamovadhaḥ || 9 ||
T04canprasu:2043: tamaśca pradīpasvātmani tāvanna saṃbhavati virodhāt, yattamo nighnataḥ svātmaprakāśatvaṃ syāt
T04canprasu:2044: na cāpi pradīpo yatra deśe tiṣṭhati tatra tamo 'sti, yattamo nighnataḥ pradīpasya
T04canprasu:2047: | yadā caivam, tadā pradīpavadutpādasya svaparātmotpādakatvaṃ na
T04canprasu:2049: atrāha- yadetaduktaṃ pradīpe nāndhakāro 'stīti, etadasatyandhakāradhāte yuktameva vaktum |
T04canprasu:2050: yasmāttu utpadyamānenaiva pradīpena tamo nihatam, tatra pradīpe nāndhakāro 'sti, yatra ca pradīpo 'sti, tatrāpyandhakāro nāstīti yujyate |
T04canprasu:2051: yadi pradīpena nāndhakāradhātaḥ kṛtaḥ, tadā anutpanne iva
T04canprasu:2058: notpadyamāno hi tamaḥ pradīpaḥ prāpnute yadā || 10 ||
T04canprasu:2060: yadā caivaṃ prāpterabhāvaḥ, tadā kathaṃ kena prakāreṇedānīmutpadyamānena pradīpena tamo hatamiti yuktaṃ parikalpayitum? yasmācca evamutpadyamāna pradīpaḥ
T04canprasu:2061: tamo na prāpnoti, tasmānnaiva aprāptatvātpradīpaḥ kiṃcidapi
T04canprasu:2063: atha manyase- yathā aprāptāmeva avidyāṃ jñānaṃ nihanti, aprāptameva rūpaṃ cakṣuḥ paśyati aprāptameva ayaḥ ayaskānto maṇirākarṣati, evameva aprāptamevāndhakāraṃ pradīpo nihaniṣyatīti etadapyasāramityāha-
T04canprasu:2064: aprāpyaiva pradīpena yadi vā nihataṃ tamaḥ |
T04canprasu:2066: yadi aprāpyaiva pradīpena tamo nihatam, evaṃ sati, ihastha eva pradīpaḥ
T04canprasu:2068: etena nyāyena jñānena avidyāghātaḥ, cakṣuṣā rūpadarśanam, ayaskāntamaṇinā ayaākarṣaṇamiva ityevamādikaṃ sādhyasamaṃ jñeyam ||
T04canprasu:2069: atha aprāptāvapi satyāmayaskāntamaṇiprabhṛtīnāṃ yogyadeśāvasthānāmeva svakāryakṛtvaṃ debhaviṣyatīti cet, tadapi na yuktam |
T04canprasu:2070: aprāptau hi satyāṃ viprakṛṣṭadeśāntarāvasthitavadavyavahitaśāntarāvasthita vacca aprāptatvād yogyadeśāvasthitānāmapi yogyadeśāvasthitatvaṃ na yuktamiti kuto yogyadeśāvasthitānāṃ svakāryakṛttvaṃ prasetsyati?
T04canprasu:2072: yathā hi bhavān parikalpayati na tathā loke dṛṣṭam |
T04canprasu:2073: yasmāt na lokaḥ prāptyaprāpticintāmevamādau viṣaye 'vatārya pradīpādīnāṃ prakāśakatvādikaṃ kalpayati |
T04canprasu:2074: yathoditaṃ tu vicāramanavatārya pradīpena tamo hatam, cakṣuṣā rūpadarśanam,
T04canprasu:2077: tattvavicārakāle tu lokasyāprāmāṇyānna tena bādhā śakyate kartum |
T04canprasu:2082: yadyapi ceyaṃ prāptyaprāptyādicintā laukikavyavahāre nāvataratīti nirupapattikatvena mṛṣārthatvādasya, tathāpi tattvavicāre 'vatāryā, mā bhūtparamārthato 'pi nirupapattikapakṣābhyupagama ityalaṃ prasaṅgena || 11
T04canprasu:2083: yadi ca svaparātmānau pradīpaḥ prakāśayatīti parikalpyate tvayā, tamaso
T04canprasu:2084: 'pi tarhi pratipakṣa bhūtasya svaparātmanoḥ pracchādanaṃ prakalpyatamityāha-
T04canprasu:2093: iha sāsani sūramaṇīye pravrajathā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā |
T04canprasu:2094: phalavantu bhaviṣyatha śreṣṭho eṣu nideśitu kāruṇikena ||
T04canprasu:2095: pravrajitvā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā sarvaphalasya bhaviṣyati prāptiḥ |
T04canprasu:2096: puna dharmasabhāva tulitvā sarvaphalāna phalāna ca prāptiḥ ||
T04canprasu:2097: alabhanta phalaṃ tatha prāptiṃ āścariyaṃ puna jāyati teṣām |
T04canprasu:2098: aho 'tikāruṇiko narasiṃho suṣṭhupadeśita yukti jinena || iti ||
T04canprasu:2100: yathā hi dīpo layane cirasya kṛto hi gehe puruṣeṇa kenacit |
T04canprasu:2101: tatrāndhakārasya na bhoti evaṃ cirasthito nāhamito gamiṣye ||
T04canprasu:2102: tamondhakārasya na śaktirasti kṛte pradīpe na vigacchanāya |
T04canprasu:2103: pratītya dīpaṃ ca vinaśyate tama ubhayaṃ pi śūnyaṃ na ca kiṃ ca manyati ||
T04canprasu:2104: jñānaṃ tathā ārya pratītya nāsravaṃ ajñāna kleśopacitaṃ vigacchati |
T04canprasu:2105: saṃparka teṣāṃ na kadāci vidyate jñānasya kleśasya ca nityakālam ||
T04canprasu:2106: jñānaṃ na kalpeti añānu no bhavet jñānaṃ pratītyaiva vinaśyate tamo |
T04canprasu:2107: bhayaṃ pi agrāhya khapuṣpasaṃnibhaṃ jñānaṃ tathājñānu bhayaṃ pi śūnyam ||
T04canprasu:2109: kiṃ cānyat- ihāyamutpādo yadyātmānamutpādayet, sa utpanno vā
T04canprasu:2110: svātmānamutpādayet, anutpanno vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha-
T04canprasu:2112: athotpanno janayate jāte kiṃ janyate punaḥ || 13 ||
T04canprasu:2118: idānīṃ paramapi yathā notpādayati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:2125: tatra yathā gataṃ na gamyate, atītavartamānayorvirodhāt |
T04canprasu:2133: utpanna ityuparatotpattikriya ucyate, utpadyata iti vartamānakriyāviṣṭaḥ |
T04canprasu:2134: tataśca utpanna utpadyate ityucyamāne atītavartamānayorekakālatā syāt |
T04canprasu:2140: manyase- utpannānutpannavyatirekeṇa utpadyamānāsaṃbhavānnotpadyamānamutpadyata iti, etacca nāsti, yasmādiha utpattikriyāyuktamutpadyamānamiti vyapadiśyate |
T04canprasu:2146: yaduktam- utpattiṃ pratītya utpadyamānaṃ bhavati, taccotpadyata iti |
T04canprasu:2148: | viśeṣata etadvaktavyaṃ syāt- asyotpattiṃ pratītya idaṃ nāmotpadyamānaṃ bhavatīti |
T04canprasu:2150: na hi tadutpadyamānaṃ viśeṣato nirdhārayituṃ śakyate idaṃ tadutpadyamānamiti, anutpannatvāttannimittagrahaṇataḥ
T04canprasu:2152: kathamasatyāmutpattau tāṃ pratītya utpadyamānaṃ syāt? tasmādutpadyamānamutpadyate, tacca utpāda utpādayatītyayuktam || 15 ||
T04canprasu:2155: bhavāṃstathāgatapravacanavyākhyānavyājena dūṣaṇamātrakauśalamevātmanaḥ prakaṭayan paramarṣigaditamidaṃ pratyayatāpratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ tathāgatānāṃ nihanti |
T04canprasu:2156: iha bhagavatā tathāgatena prakṛtīśvarasvabhāvakālāṇunārāyaṇajaiminikaṇādakapilāditīrthakarakartṛvādanirāsena sarvabhāvānāṃ tattvamādarśitam, yaduta asmin sati idaṃ bhavati,
T04canprasu:2157: asyotpādādidamutpadyate, yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ ityādyaviparītaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ prakaṭayatā |
T04canprasu:2158: tasya ca tvayā notpadyamānaṃ notpannaṃ nānutpannamityādinā dūṣaṇaṃ vidadhatā tathāgatajananyāḥ pratītyasamutpattimāturvadha evācarita ityalaṃ bhavatā sarvanāstikena tvayeti |
T04canprasu:2161: bhavāneva tu paramagambhīrapratītyasamutpādādhimuktivirahādviparītaṃ tadarthamavadhārya asmākameva adhilayaṃ karoti |
T04canprasu:2162: nanu ca idaṃ pratītyedaṃ bhavatītyevamabhidhānena bhagavatā tathāgatena niḥsvabhāvatvameva sarvadharmāṇāṃ spaṣṭamāveditam |
T04canprasu:2165: yo hi padārtho vidyamānaḥ sa sasvabhāvaḥ svenātmanā svaṃ svabhāvamanapāyinaṃ bimarti |
T04canprasu:2167: nāpyutpadyate, iti kṛtvā sasvabhāvabhāvābhyupagame sati kutaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti bhavateva sasvabhāvatāṃ bhāvānāmabhyupagacchatā sarvathā pratītyasamutpāda eva bādhito bhavati |
T04canprasu:2168: tataśca paramadharmabuddhadarśanamapi bādhitaṃ bhavati- yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati, yo dharmaṃ paśyati sa buddhaṃ paśyatītyāgamāt
T04canprasu:2169: | mayā tu yatpratītya bījākhyaṃ kāraṇaṃ yadbhavatyaṅkurākhyaṃ kāryam,
T04canprasu:2170: tacca ubhayamapi śāntaṃ svabhāvavirahitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ pratipādayatā sarvathā bhagavatāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pratītyasamutpattimātā dyotitā bhavati |
T04canprasu:2179: tathā hi ghaṭotpattiṃ pratītya ghaṭa utpadyamāno bhavati, taṃ ca utpadyamānamutpāda
T04canprasu:2184: utpadyeta sa kiṃ tasmin bhāva utpadyate 'sati || 17 ||
T04canprasu:2185: yadi kaścidanutpannaḥ utpādātpūrvaṃ ghaṭo nāma kvacitsaṃvidyeta, sa utpattikriyāṃ pratītyotpadyeta na caivaṃ kaścidutpādātpūrvaṃ kvacidasti |
T04canprasu:2187: atha syāt- yadyutpādātpūrvaṃ ghaṭo nāsti, tathāpi utpannaḥ san
T04canprasu:2188: ghaṭasaṃjñāṃ pratilapsyate, tadbhāvinyā saṃjñayā na doṣa iti |
T04canprasu:2190: yadi hi utpattikriyā pravarteta, tadā vartamānībhūto bhāvo ghaṭākhyāṃ pratilabheta |
T04canprasu:2192: apravṛttiḥ, tadā kuto vartamānatā? atha aghaṭāśrayeṇa kriyā prārabhyeta,
T04canprasu:2193: tadvaktavyam- yo 'sau aghaṭaḥ, sa kiṃ bhaviturmahati paṭaḥ, uta naiva kiṃcit? yadi paṭa utpadyamānaḥ sa kathamutpannaḥ san ghaṭo bhaviṣyatīti atha naivaṃ kiṃcit, kathaṃ tadāśrayā kriyā kriyā pravartate? kathaṃ vā sa
