T04canprasu:2194: utpannaḥ san ghaṭo bhavet? iti sarvathā bhāvitatvakalpanāpyayuktā |
T04canprasu:2201: yadyapi utpadyamānaṃ padārthamutpāda utpādayedbhavanmatena, idaṃ tu vaktavyam- tamidānīmutpādaḥ katamo 'paraḥ utpādamutpādayiṣyatīti || 18 ||
T04canprasu:2202: atha syāt- utpādasyāpara utpādaḥ utpādakaḥ parikalpyeta, tadā anavasthādoṣaprasaṅga ityāha-
T04canprasu:2205: atha nāsyāpara utpāda iṣyate, nanvevaṃ sati vinā utpādena utpāda utpadyate ityevaṃ prāpnoti
T04canprasu:2206: tataśca utpādotpādyānāmapi padārthānāṃ vinaivotpādena utpattirastu bhāvatvādutpādavaditi pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:2210: utpāda ātmānaṃ parāṃścotpādayatītyatra pakṣe dūṣaṇameva na vaktavyamadhunāsmābhiḥ |
T04canprasu:2215: iti na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā |
T04canprasu:2217: tataścaivamutpāde niṣiddhe utpadyamānamutpāda utpādayati, svaparātmānau vā utpādayatītyasyāḥ
T04canprasu:2218: kalpanāyā nāstyevāvatāra iti kuta etatprasetsyati- utpāda utpadyate,
T04canprasu:2221: anityatānugatasya vartamānasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyate, anirudhyamānasya vā atītānāgatasyānityatāvirahitasya? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha-
T04canprasu:2225: anirudhyamānasyāpi vināśarahitasya atītānāgatasya bhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇasya khapuṣpasyeva nāstyutpāda iti || 21 ||
T04canprasu:2226: evaṃ bhāvānāmutpādābhāvaṃ pratipādya ataḥ paraṃ sthitirvicāryate ||
T04canprasu:2239: tatra sthitaṃ na tiṣṭhati tatra sthitikriyānirodhāt |
T04canprasu:2244: ihotpādapratiṣedhātko 'sāvanutpannaḥ padārtho yastiṣṭhediti sarvathā nāsti sthitiḥ || 22 ||
T04canprasu:2247: ubhayathā ca na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:2250: nirudhyamānasya nirodhābhimukhasya tāvadbhāvasya virodhinī sthitirna saṃbhavati |
T04canprasu:2251: yaścāpyanirudhyamānaḥ sa bhāva eva na bhavati, kutastasya sthitirbhaviṣyati || 23 ||
T04canprasu:2253: jarasā maraṇena ca sarva eva bhāvāḥ kṣaṇamapi na tyajyante |
T04canprasu:2254: yadā caitadevam tadā jarāmaraṇavirodhinyāḥ sthiterbhāveṣu pravṛttyavakāśa eva nāstīti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:2256: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā || 24 ||
T04canprasu:2257: ke hi nāma jarāmaraṇarahitā bhāvā yeṣāṃ sthitiḥ syāt? tasmānnāstyeva sthitirityabhiprāyaḥ yadi ca, asyāḥ sthiteranyā vā sthitiḥ sthityarthaṃ parikalpyeta, svayaṃ vā svātmānaṃ sthāpayet
T04canprasu:2259: sthityānyayā sthiteḥ sthānaṃ tayaiva ca na yujyate |
T04canprasu:2262: ātmānaṃ na janayati ityuktam, evaṃ sthitirapi nātmānaṃ sthāpayatīti vaktavyam |
T04canprasu:2273: asthitā hi ime dharmāḥ sthitiścaiṣāṃ na vidyate |
T04canprasu:2275: na sthitirnāpi co jātirlokanāthena deśitā lokanāthaṃ viditvaivaṃ samādhiṃ tena jānathā || iti ||
T04canprasu:2277: ākāśaniśrita samāruta āpakhandho tanniśritā iya mahī pṛthivī jagacca |
T04canprasu:2278: sattvāna karmaupabhoganidānamevaṃ ākāśathānu kṛta cittama etamartham ||
T04canprasu:2291: yadi anityateti kācitsyāt, sā niruddhasya bhāvasya aniruddhasya vā nirudhyamānasya vā syāt
T04canprasu:2292: tatra niruddhaṃ nirudhyate iti na yuktam,
T04canprasu:2296: tathāpi nirudhyamānaṃ na nirudhyate ityanena saṃbandhaḥ |
T04canprasu:2298: yataścaivaṃ triṣvapi kāleṣu nirodhāsaṃbhavaḥ, tasmānnāstyeva nirodha iti
T04canprasu:2304: ayaṃ nirodhaḥ sthitasya vā bhāvasya syādasthitasya vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyate ityāha-
T04canprasu:2308: asthitasya abhāvasya avidyamānasya nirodho nāsti, iti sarvathā nāsti
T04canprasu:2311: yadi iha nirodhaḥ syāt, sa tayaivāvasthayā tasyā evāvasthāyāḥ syādanyayā vā anyasyā avasthāyāḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:2316: tayaiva tāvatkṣīrāvasthayā saiva kṣīrāvasthā na nirudhyate, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt |
T04canprasu:2320: yadā ca nāsti, tadā kāmasatī vināśayet? yadi vināśayet, kharaviṣāṇatīkṣṇatāmapi vināśayet
T04canprasu:2322: atrāha- yadyapi tayaivāvasthayā saivāvasthyā, anyayā vā avasthayā
T04canprasu:2323: anyāvasthā na nirudhyate, tathāpi kṣīrāvasthāyāstāvannirodho 'sti, tataśca utpādo 'pi syāditi
T04canprasu:2326: nanu ca pūrvoktena nyāyena yadaivaṃ sarvadharmāṇāmutpādo nopapadyate |
T04canprasu:2331: nirodho nāma yadi kaścit syāt, sa sato vā bhāvasya syādasato vā |
T04canprasu:2338: sa yasya bhavati, sa naiva bhavati |
T04canprasu:2339: tataśca sato bhāvasya nirodha iti bruvatā bhāvābhāvayorekādhikaraṇatā abhyupagatā bhavati
T04canprasu:2341: yadi tadānīṃ bhāvaḥ syāt, tadā nirodhenābhāvenāveśādbhāvavyapadeśo 'yuktaḥ |
T04canprasu:2344: tasmādekatve sati bhāvābhāvayoḥ sa padārtho naiva bhāvo nāpyabhāva iti yujyate |
T04canprasu:2347: evaṃ tāvatsato bhāvasya nirodho na yuktaḥ || 30 ||
T04canprasu:2354: tadevamasato bhāvasya nirodho na saṃbhavati, sato 'pi na |
T04canprasu:2355: yaścobhayathāpi na saṃbhavati, sa kenātmanā sthitaḥ? nāstyeva nirodha iti pratīyatām || kiṃ cānyat |
T04canprasu:2356: yadi nirodho nāma bhāvānāṃ nirodhaka iti kalpyate, tasyedānīṃ kimanyo nirodha iṣyate, uta na? yadi iṣyate tanna yujyate |
T04canprasu:2357: na svātmanā nirodho 'sti nirodho na parātmanā |
T04canprasu:2362: ityādinā utpādaḥ svātmānaṃ notpādayati, evaṃ nirodho 'pi svātmānaṃ na nirodhayati |
T04canprasu:2365: atha naṣṭo nāśayati naṣṭe kiṃ nāśyate punaḥ ||
T04canprasu:2372: athāvināśo naṣṭo 'yaṃ sarvaṃ naśyatu te tathā ||
T04canprasu:2374: tadevaṃ parātmanāpi nirodho na saṃbhavatīti nāsti nirodhasya nirodhaḥ ||
T04canprasu:2375: atha manyase- nāstyeva nirodhasya nirodha iti, tadayuktam |
T04canprasu:2376: yadi hi nirodhasya nirodho na syāta, tadā nirodharahitatvātsaṃskṛtalakṣaṇamavahīyate |
T04canprasu:2377: tadevaṃ yadi vināśasya vināśaḥ parikalpyate tathāpi na yukto vināśaḥ |
T04canprasu:2380: kathaṃ tvidānīṃ vināśo yokṣyate parasya? atha syāt-
T04canprasu:2381: tathāpi evameva vicāre sati vināśo bhavato 'pi na yujyate, tataḥ ya ubhayordoṣaḥ, na tenaikaścodyo bhavatīti |
T04canprasu:2384: kiṃ kāraṇam? ye svātmanā niḥsvabhāvā bhāvāḥ, te ca niḥsvabhāvā eva santo bālānāmidaṃsatyābhiniveśināṃ vyavahārapathamupayānti avicāraprasiddhenaiva nyāyeneti teṣu nāsti yathoditavicārāvatāro 'smākam
T04canprasu:2385: māyāsvapnagandharvanagarādivattu laukikāḥ padārthā nirupapattikā eva santaḥ sarvalokasyāvidyātimiropahatamatinayanasya prasiddhimupagatā iti parasparāpekṣayaiva kevalaṃ prasiddhimupagatā bālairabhyupagamyante yathoktaṃ śatake-
T04canprasu:2388: tasmātsati utpāde utpādyam, sati utpādye utpādaḥ |
T04canprasu:2390: sati nirodhye nirodhaḥ, ityevaṃ laukikasya vyavahārasyābhyupagamātkuto
T04canprasu:2392: yastu vināśasya ahetukatvamabhyupetya kṣaṇikatāṃ saṃskārāṇāmāha, tasya nirhetukatvāt |
T04canprasu:2394: setsyati, kuto vināśarahitānāṃ saṃskṛtatvamapīti sarvameva asamañjasaṃ tasya jāyate |
T04canprasu:2395: jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānāṃ ca saṃskāraskandhāntarbhāva varṇayatā bhagavatā nanu sahetukatvaṃ spaṣṭamādarśitaṃ vināśasya |
T04canprasu:2398: atha syāt- vināśo hi nāma abhāvaḥ, yaśca abhāvaḥ, kiṃ tasya hetunā
T04canprasu:2403: bhāvo hi nāma vidyamānaḥ, yaśca vidyamānaḥ tasya ca kiṃ hetunā prayojanam? na hi jātaṃ punarapi janyate |
T04canprasu:2406: yathā utpādaḥ sahetukaḥ pūrvamabhāvātpaścācca bhāvāt, evaṃ vināśo 'pīṣyatām |
T04canprasu:2407: vināśo hi na sarvadā bhavati, utpādātpūrvamabhāvātpaścācca bhāvāt |
T04canprasu:2408: yaccocyate- yaścābhāvaḥ tasya (Pp_73) kiṃ hetunā kartavyamiti,
T04canprasu:2410: yasmānna vayaṃ vināśasya hetunā kiṃcitkriyamāṇamicchāmaḥ, kiṃ tarhi vināśa eva kriyate iti varṇayāmaḥ |
T04canprasu:2411: nanvevaṃ sati kriyamāṇatvādvināśo 'pi bhāvaḥ prāpnotīti cet, iṣyata evaitat |
T04canprasu:2412: vināśo hi svarūpāpekṣayā bhāvaḥ, rūpādidharmanivṛttisvabhāvatvāttu na bhāvaḥ |
T04canprasu:2415: aparijñānānupacchedaṃ (?) cetyāgamāt kathaṃ na sahetuko vināśaḥ?
T04canprasu:2417: kalpitābhāvalakṣaṇāyāśca śūnyatāyāḥ pareṇa bhāvarūpatāmabhyupagacchatā kathamabhāvasya bhāvatvaṃ
T04canprasu:2418: bhavati? bhāvatvācca kathamasaṃskṛtatvaṃ śūnyatāyāḥ syāt? ataḥ sarvamabhyupetaṃ vihīyate bhavatā
T04canprasu:2421: na saṃskṛtaṃ hi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau ||
T04canprasu:2424: atrāha- yadi utpādasthitibhaṅgāḥ saṃskṛtasya niṣiddhāḥ, tathāpi saṃskṛtamasti viśeṣalakṣaṇayuktam
T04canprasu:2425: tathāhi kāṭhinyādikaṃ sāsnādikaṃ ca tasya viśeṣalakṣaṇamupadiśyate |
T04canprasu:2431: yadā yathoktena nyāyena utpādasthitibhaṅgā eva niṣiddhāḥ, tadā kutaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ vastu tadviśeṣalakṣaṇamapyastīti
T04canprasu:2440: atrāha- yadi utpādasthitibhaṅgā na santītyavadhāritam, yattarhi idamanāvaraṇajñāninā muninā-
T04canprasu:2444: yathā māyā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā |
T04canprasu:2446: yathā māyādayaḥ svabhāvenānutpannā avidyamānā māyādiśabdavācyā māyādivijñānagamyāśca lokasya, evamete 'pi lokaprasiddhimātreṇa utpādādayaḥ svabhāvena avidyamānā api bhagavatā
T04canprasu:2449: tvaksnāyumāṃsāsthisamucchraye ca utpādya saṃjñāṃ mama patnireṣā |
T04canprasu:2450: mūḍhā hi balā janayanti rāgaṃ striyo na jānanti yathaiva māyām ||
T04canprasu:2451: yathā kumārī supināntarasmiṃ sā putra jātaṃ ca mṛtaṃ ca paśyati |
T04canprasu:2452: jāte 'tituṣṭā mṛti daurmanasthitā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān ||
T04canprasu:2453: yathaiva gandharvapuraṃ marīcikā yathaiva māyā supinaṃ yathaiva |
T04canprasu:2454: svabhāvaśūnyā tu nimittabhāvanā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān ||
T04canprasu:2458: eṣa samādhibalī balavanto yo imu jānati śūnyakadharmān || iti || 34 ||
T04canprasu:2459: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃskṛtaparīkṣā nāma saptamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:2461: atrāha- vidyanta eva saṃskṛtasvabhāvato vijñānādayaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ,
T04canprasu:2466: ityādinā karmaṇāṃ kārako vyapadiṣṭaḥ, tatkarmaphalaṃ ca vijñānādikamupadiṣṭam |
T04canprasu:2467: yasya ca kārako 'sti, tadasti, tadyathā ghaṭaḥ |
T04canprasu:2468: yannāsti, na tasya kārakaḥ, tadyathā kūrmaromaprāvārasyeti |
T04canprasu:2470: syādvijñānādikaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ yadi tasya niṣpādakakarmakārakau syātām |
T04canprasu:2473: sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma sadbhūtaṃ na karotyayam |
T04canprasu:2477: tacca karaṇaṃ sadbhūtasya vā kartuḥ parikalpyeta,
T04canprasu:2478: asadbhūtasya vā, sadasadbhūtasya vā? kriyate iti karma karturīpsitatamam |
T04canprasu:2480: tatra sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ kriyāyuktaḥ sadbhūtaṃ kriyāyuktaṃ karma na karotītyekā pratijñā |
T04canprasu:2484: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam |
T04canprasu:2486: kaścitsadbhūtaḥ kārakavyapadeśaṃ labhate, tataśca tasyaivaṃvidhasya kriyāhetukalabdhakārakavyapadeśasya aparā kriyā nāsti yayā karma kuryāt |
T04canprasu:2487: kriyābhāvācca yadā kārakaḥ karma na karoti, tadā kārakanirapekṣamakartṛkaṃ karma syāt |
T04canprasu:2488: na cākartṛkaṃ karma saṃbhavati bandhyāsūnoriva ghaṭakaraṇamiti |
T04canprasu:2489: evaṃ tāvat sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam |
T04canprasu:2490: iti doṣaprasaṅgāt sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma na karoti |
T04canprasu:2491: idānīṃ sadbhūtamapi karma kārako na karotīti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:2492: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ || 2 ||
T04canprasu:2494: tasyedānīṃ kriyānibandhanalabdhakarmavyapadeśasya aparā kriyā nāsti yayā karma kriyeteti |
T04canprasu:2497: kriyā, tadā kārakastatsadbhūtaṃ karma naiva karoti |
T04canprasu:2498: yadā ca na karoti karmaṇo dvitīyakriyābhāvāt, tadā (Pp_76) akarmaka eva avidyamānakarmaka
T04canprasu:2502: evaṃ sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ sadbhūtaṃ karma na karoti iti saṃsādhya idānīṃ yathā asadbhūtamapi karma asadbhūtaḥ kārako na karoti tathā
T04canprasu:2507: kriyā ca kārakavyapadeśe heturiti kriyārahita kārako 'pi nirhetukaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:2509: sati ca ahetukavādābhyupagame kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca sarvamapoditaṃ syādityāha-
T04canprasu:2510: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate |
T04canprasu:2511: satyeva hi hetorabhyupagame hetunā yanniṣpādyate tat kāryam, tasya ca yo
T04canprasu:2518: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate |
T04canprasu:2520: tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate || 4 ||
T04canprasu:2521: tadabhāve kāryakāraṇabhāve, kiṃ kurvāṇasya kriyā saṃbhavet, kasyāṃ vā kriyāyāṃ kumbhakārasya svātantryātkartṛtvaṃ syāt? na cāpi mṛdāṃ
T04canprasu:2522: tādātmyapravṛttyā sādhakatamatvena karaṇatvaṃ yujyata iti evaṃ tāvat-
T04canprasu:2523: tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate ||
T04canprasu:2526: iha yadā devadattaḥ prāṇātipātaviratikriyāsvātantryātkartā san svatantrakāryeṇa karaṇabhūtena prāṇātipātaviratikriyāṃ karoti, tadāsya dharma upajāyate |
T04canprasu:2527: evaṃ daśasvapi kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu kuśalakriyāniṣpādyeṣu ratnatrayamātāpitṛtadanyapūjyapūjādilakṣaṇeṣu ca kuśaladharmaprārambheṣu yojyam |
T04canprasu:2528: evamadharme 'pi prāṇātipātādilakṣaṇe kuśalaviparyayeṇa kriyākartṛkaraṇānāmabhāve sati karmaṇāmabhāvaprasaṅga udbhāvanīyaḥ ||
T04canprasu:2529: yadā caivaṃ dharmādharmau na saṃbhavataḥ, tadā tatphalamapi nāstyeveti
T04canprasu:2531: dharme cāsatyadharme ca phalaṃ tajjaṃ na vidyate || 5 ||
T04canprasu:2535: mārgaḥ yadi hi phalamiṣṭāniṣṭaṃ syāta, syāllaukikasya mārgasya dhyānārūpyasamādhisamāpattilakṣaṇaṃ svargaḥ, tadānīṃ tadarthaṃ laukikamārgabhāvanā jyāyasī syāt, kugatigamanakarmapathaviratisāphalyaṃ ca syāt |
T04canprasu:2536: yadi ca mokṣalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ phalaṃ syāt, tadartha lokottarāryāṣṭāṅgamārgabhāvanāsāphalyaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:2543: yā api hyetāḥ kṛṣivāṇijyabala (bhṛti?) gatādikāḥ kriyāḥ phalārtha
T04canprasu:2544: prārabhyante, tā api sarvāḥ phalābhāve sati nopapadyanta iti |
T04canprasu:2548: saddhiḥ asadbhūtaḥ kārako 'sadbhūtaṃ karma karotīti pakṣo nikṛṣṭa eveti tyājyaḥ || 6 ||
T04canprasu:2549: tadevaṃ pratijñādvayaṃ saṃsādhya idānīmubhayarūpaḥ kārakaḥ, ubhayarūpamapi karma na karotītyāha-
T04canprasu:2551: tatra yadetadasadbhūtaṃ karma kriyāyuktamakriyāyuktaṃ ca, tat sadasadbhūtaḥ kārako na karotīti
T04canprasu:2554: ekaḥ padārthaḥ ekasmin kāle kriyāyuktaścākriyāyuktaśceti na yujyata evaitat |
T04canprasu:2555: tataśca sadasadbhūto 'pi kārakaḥ sadasadbhūtaṃ karma na karoti,
T04canprasu:2557: evaṃ same pakṣe dūṣaṇamudbhāvya viṣamapakṣasyāpi nirācikīrṣayā āha-
T04canprasu:2558: satā ca kriyate nāsannāsatā kriyate ca sat |
T04canprasu:2559: kartrā satā sadbhūtena tāvatkartrā kriyāyuktena asadbhūtamasadakriyāyuktaṃ karma na kriyate
T04canprasu:2561: sarve prasajyante doṣāstatra ta eva hi || 8 ||
T04canprasu:2562: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam |
T04canprasu:2563: ityevaṃ tāvat sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma na karoti, nāpyasadbhūtaṃ karma kriyate |
T04canprasu:2566: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate ||
T04canprasu:2569: yathā caitat satā kartrā asatkarma na kriyate iti pratipāditam, evamasatā kartrā akriyāyuktena satkarma na kriyate iti vyākhyeyamuktapathānusāreṇa || 8 ||
T04canprasu:2570: evaṃ tāvadviṣamapakṣe ekaikapadaparāmarśena dūṣaṇamabhidhāya idānīmekaikasya padasya padadvaya parāmarśena dūṣaṇābhidhānamāha-
T04canprasu:2573: sa kārakaḥ sadbhūtaḥ asadbhūtaṃ karma sadasadbhūtameva vā na karotīti |
T04canprasu:2580: parasparaviruddhaṃ hi saccāsaccaikataḥ kutaḥ iti vacanāt |
T04canprasu:2581: evaṃ tāvatsadbhūtaḥ kārako 'sadbhūtaṃ sadasadbhutaṃ ca karma
T04canprasu:2583: idānīmasadbhūto 'pi kārakaḥ sadbhūtaṃ karma sadasadbhūtaṃ ca karma na
T04canprasu:2588: 'hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca'; ityādinā uktadoṣādasadbhūtaḥ kārako na karoti |
T04canprasu:2589: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ |
T04canprasu:2590: iti prasaṅgāt sadbhūtaṃ karma na kriyate |
T04canprasu:2595: idānīṃ sadasadbhūto 'pi kārakaḥ ekaika evobhayarūpaḥ san yathā sadbhūtamasadbhūtaṃ ca bhinnasaṃketaṃ karma na karoti tathā
T04canprasu:2601: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ |
T04canprasu:2605: yataścaivaṃ samapakṣeṣu viṣamapakṣeṣu ca kartuḥ karmaṇaśca sarvathā siddhirayuktā,
T04canprasu:2606: tasmādyaduktaṃ vidyanta eva vijñānādayaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvāḥ taddhetukakarmakārakasadbhāvāditi, tadayuktam ||
T04canprasu:2607: atrāha- kimavadhāritametadbhavatā na santi bhāvā iti? na hi |
T04canprasu:2608: bhavatastu sasvabhāvavādinaḥ svabhāvasya bhāvānāṃ vaidhuryātsarvabhāvāpavādaḥ saṃbhāvyate
T04canprasu:2613: yadi nāstīti tattoyaṃ gṛhṇīyānmūḍha eva saḥ ||
T04canprasu:2615: nāstīti cāpi moho 'yaṃ sati mohe na mucyate ||
T04canprasu:2617: yadā na labhate bhāvamevābhāvastadā kuha || iti || 11 ||
T04canprasu:2620: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam |
T04canprasu:2622: iha akurvāṇasya karmanirapekṣasya kārakatvābhāvāt karmāpekṣya kārakasya kārakatvaṃ bhavati
T04canprasu:2623: kārakeṇa cākriyamāṇasya kasyacitkarmatvābhāvāt kriyamāṇasyaiva karmavyapadeśāt, taṃ kārakaṃ pratītya karma pravartate ityevaṃ karmakārakayoḥ parasparāpekṣikīṃ siddhiṃ muktvā nānyatsiddhikāraṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ || 12 ||
T04canprasu:2624: yathā ca karmakārakayoḥ parasparāpekṣikī siddhiḥ, evamanyeṣāmapi
T04canprasu:2630: sā ca svasādhanaṃ kartāramupādātāraṃ karma copādānaṃ saṃnidhāpayati |
T04canprasu:2631: tayośca upādeyopādātroḥ parasparāpekṣayoḥ karmakārakavadeva siddhirna svābhāvikī |
T04canprasu:2636: tataśca ayamartha upapadyate- yaireva hetubhiḥ karmaṇaśca vyutsargo 'smābhiruktaḥ, taireva hetubhiḥ upādātā upādeyaṃ ca pratiṣiddhaṃ veditavyam |
T04canprasu:2637: na ca kevalamanayoranyonyāpekṣikī siddhiḥ katurśca karmaṇaśca pratiṣedhenāvaseyā, api ca
T04canprasu:2641: janyajanakagantṛgamanadraṣṭavyadarśanalakṣyalakṣaṇotpādyotpādakāḥ, tathā avayavāvayaviguṇaguṇipramāṇaprameyādayo niravaśeṣā bhāvāḥ, teṣāṃ kartṛkarmavicāreṇa svabhāvato 'stitvaṃ pratiṣidhya parasparāpekṣikīmeva siddhi prājño nirmumukṣurjātijarāmaraṇādibandhanebhyo mokṣāya vibhāvayet ||
T04canprasu:2643: nanu ca śeṣān bhāvān vibhāvayedityanenaiva upādānopādānnoradhigatatvādupādānopādānaṃ punarayuktam
T04canprasu:2646: tathā hi uttareṣu prakaraṇeṣu bhūyasā anayoreva vicāro bhaviṣyatīti |
T04canprasu:2648: bhaya darśita nairayikaṃ me sattvasahasra savejita naike |
T04canprasu:2649: na ca vidyati kaściha sattva yo cyutu gacchati ghoramapāyam ||
T04canprasu:2650: na ca kāraku kāraṇaṃ santi yehi kṛtā asitomaraśastrāḥ |
T04canprasu:2651: kalpavaśena tu paśyati tatra kāyi patanti apāyita śastrāḥ ||
T04canprasu:2653: teṣvapi kāraku nāstiha kaści te 'pi ca sthāpita kalpavaśena ||
T04canprasu:2654: kalpavaśena vikalpitu lokaḥ saṃjñagaheṇa vikalpitu bālaḥ |
T04canprasu:2655: so ca gaho agaho asabhūto māyamarīcisamā hi vikalpāḥ || iti || 13 ||
T04canprasu:2656: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau karmakārakaparīkṣā nāma aṣṭamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:2664: yasya upādātuḥ darśanaśravaṇaghrāṇarasanādīni vedanāsparśamanaskārādīni ca bhavanti, sa upādātā pūrvamebhya upādānebhyo 'stīti sāṃmitīyā vadanti || 1
T04canprasu:2668: iha vidyamāna eva devadatto dhanopādānaṃ kurute nāvidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ |
T04canprasu:2669: evaṃ yadi tāvatpudgalo darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ vyavasthito na syāt, nāsau darśanādikasyopādānamakariṣyat
T04canprasu:2670: tasmādasti asau dhanātprāgeva sthitadevadattavat darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ pudgalo yo 'sya upādānaṃ kariṣyatīti || 2 ||
T04canprasu:2673: yaḥ prāgvyavasthito bhāvaḥ kena prajñapyate 'tha saḥ || 3 ||
T04canprasu:2674: yau 'sau pudgalo darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvamastīti vyavasthāpyate, sa kena prajñapyatām? pudgalaprajñapterhi darśanādikaṃ kāraṇam |
T04canprasu:2675: sa yadi tebhyaḥ prāgvyavasthito 'stīti kalpyate, tadā darśananirapekṣaḥ syād ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ
T04canprasu:2676: yaśca svakāraṇanirapekṣaḥ sa nirhetuko dhanādinirapekṣaḥ dhanikavannāstītyabhiprāyaḥ || 3
T04canprasu:2679: amūnyapi bhaviṣyanti vinā tena na saṃśayaḥ || 4 ||
T04canprasu:2680: yadi manyase- darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ pudgalo nāmāsti, sa darśanādikamupādānamupādatte iti |
T04canprasu:2681: nanvevaṃ sati nirastasaṃśayamamūnyapi darśanādīni vinā pudgalena bhaviṣyanti |
T04canprasu:2682: tathāhi devadatto dhanasaṃbandhātpūrvaṃ dhanavyatirikto vyavasthitaḥ san arthāntarabhūtameva pṛthaksiddhaṃ dhanamupādatte |
T04canprasu:2687: iha bījākhyena kāraṇena kiṃcitkāryamabhivyajyate 'ṅkurākhyam, tena ca kāryeṇa kiṃcit kāraṇamabhivyajyate bījākhyam- asyedaṃ kāraṇamidamasya kāryamiti |
T04canprasu:2689: 'bhivyajyate asyāyamupādāteti, kenaciccātmanā kiṃcidupādānaṃ darśanādikamabhivyajyate idamasyopādānamiti, tadānīṃ syātparasparāpekṣayorupādānopādātroḥ siddhiḥ yadā tu upādātāraṃ vinā pṛthak siddhaṃ darśanādikamabhyupagamyate, tadā tannirāśrayamasadeva tasmānnāstyubhayorapi siddhiḥ, iti na yuktametat- darśanādibhyaḥ pṛthagavasthita upādāteti || 5 ||
T04canprasu:2691: yadi sarvebhyo darśanādibhya prāgavasthita ityabhyupagataṃ syāt, syādeṣa doṣaḥ |
T04canprasu:2697: yadā darśanena draṣṭetyabhivyajyate, na tadā śravaṇādīnyupādāya
T04canprasu:2700: etadapi na yuktaṃ darśanādirahitasya nirupādānasya nirhetukasya nirañjanasyāstitvāsaṃbhavāt
T04canprasu:2701: sarvebhyo darśanādibhyo yadi pūrvo na vidyate |
T04canprasu:2704: yo hi sarvebhyaḥ pūrvo na bhavati, sa ekaikasmādapi na bhavati |
T04canprasu:2705: tadyathā sarvebhyo vṛkṣebhya prāg vanaṃ nāsti, tadā ekaikasmādapi nāsti |
T04canprasu:2706: sarvāsāṃ ca sikatānāṃ tailajananābhāve sati ekaikasyā api sikatāyāstailaṃ nāsti |
T04canprasu:2708: yo hyekaikasmātpūrvo bhavati, nanu sa sarvebhyo 'pi pūrvaṃ evetyabhyupagataṃ bhavati |
T04canprasu:2712: draṣṭā sa eva sa śrotā sa eva yadi vedakaḥ |
T04canprasu:2714: ekaikasmādbhavetpūrvaṃ na ca yuktaṃ vaktuṃ sa eva draṣṭā sa eva śroteti |
T04canprasu:2715: yadi syāt, tadā darśanakriyārahitasyāpi śroturdraṣṭṭatvaṃ syāt, śravaṇakriyārahitasyāpi draṣṭuḥ śrotṛtvaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:2721: pratikriyaṃ ca kārakabhedātkuta etadevaṃ bhaviṣyatīti pratipādayannāha- evaṃ caitanna yujyata iti ||
T04canprasu:2724: asya ācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha- sarvagatasyātmano nendriyāntaragamanamastītyayuktaḥ prasaṅgadoṣa iti |
T04canprasu:2725: tadetadayuktaṃ svayūthyaparikalpitapudgalavādanirāsasya prastutatvāt, tasya ca sarvagatatvāpratijñānāt
T04canprasu:2731: sati syād draṣṭari śrotā bahutvaṃ cātmanāṃ bhavet || 9 ||
T04canprasu:2732: tadyathā goranyo 'śvaḥ na hi gavi sati na bhavati yaugapadyena, evaṃ yadi draṣṭuranyaḥ śrotā syāt, sadraṣṭaryapi sati syādyaugapadyena |
T04canprasu:2735: evaṃ sati bahava evātmānaḥ prāpnuvanti draṣṭṭaśrotṛvedakādīnāṃ pṛthak pṛthak siddhayupagamāt
T04canprasu:2736: tasmādekaikasmādapi darśanādeḥ pūrvaṃ nāsti pudgalo nāma kaścit || 9 ||
T04canprasu:2737: atrāha- vidyata eva pūrvaṃ sa sarvebhyo darśanādibhya ātmā |
T04canprasu:2739: yadyasti, kena prajñapyate sa iti yaducyate, iha darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ
T04canprasu:2740: nāmarūpāvasthāyāṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni santi yataḥ kramānnāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamiti darśanaśravaṇādīnyutpadyante
T04canprasu:2745: yebhyo mahābhūtebhyo darśanādikamutpadyate, teṣvapi mahābhūtopādānanimittako 'pyeṣa na yujyate pūrveṇaiva hetunetyabhiprāyaḥ |
T04canprasu:2763: pratipāditam, tadā tasminnātmani upādātari asati, kuto
T04canprasu:2766: na vidyate cedyasya sa na vidyanta imānyapi || 11 ||
T04canprasu:2767: yasya darśanādīni parikalpyante sa yadā nāstītyuktam, nanu tadaiva darśanādikamapi nāstīti spaṣṭamādarśitaṃ bhavati |
T04canprasu:2769: atrāha- kiṃ khalu bhavato niścitametannāstyevātmeti? kena etaduktam? nanu ca anantaramevoktaṃ darśanādyabhāvādātmāpi nāstīti |
T04canprasu:2773: parikalpitaḥ, sa svabhāvato na vidyate, tasya ca mayā
T04canprasu:2774: svabhāvābhiniveśanivartakameva vacanamuktamasadviparyāsapratipakṣeṇa, na tu asya abhāvaḥ parikalpitaḥ
T04canprasu:2782: prāk ca yo darśanādibhyaḥ sāṃprataṃ cordhvameva ca |
T04canprasu:2784: prāk tāvaddarśanādibhya ātmā nāsti, tatra hi tasyāstitvābhāvāt |
T04canprasu:2788: yadi hi pūrvaṃ darśanādīni syuḥ, uttarakālamātmā syāt, tadānīmūrdhvaṃ saṃbhavet |
T04canprasu:2791: yaścaivamātmā darśanādibhyaḥ prāk paścād yugapacca parīkṣyamāṇo nāsti, tasya idānīmanupalabdhasvabhāvasya astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vā kaḥ
T04canprasu:2792: parikalpayetprājñaḥ? tasmātkarmakārakavadeva upādānopādātroḥ parasparāpekṣā siddhirna svābhāvikīti sthitam ||
T04canprasu:2794: tahi kāli so daśabalo anagho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram |
T04canprasu:2795: supinopamā bhagavatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate ||
T04canprasu:2796: na ca sattvu labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ |
T04canprasu:2798: na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloka saṃkramati gacchati vā |
T04canprasu:2799: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇaśubha saṃsarato ||
T04canprasu:2800: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ |
T04canprasu:2801: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśati na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate ||
T04canprasu:2802: na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ |
T04canprasu:2803: na ca dṛṣṭisthānagatiśuddhiriha na ca sattvacārasupaśāntagati ||
T04canprasu:2804: anutpāda śānta animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocara jināna guṇā |
T04canprasu:2805: bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāniyaṃ vṛṣamitā paramā ||
T04canprasu:2806: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pūrvaparīkṣā nāma navamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:2808: atrāha- yadidamuktaṃ tasmātkarmakārakavadeva upādānopādātrorapi na svābhāvikī siddhiriti, tadayuktam, sāpekṣāṇāmapi padārthānāṃ sasvābhāvyadarśanāt |
T04canprasu:2815: svabhāvato bhaviṣyati, upādātṛsāpekṣaṃ copādānamityagnīndhanavadetau bhaviṣyata upādānopādātārāviti
T04canprasu:2817: syādetadevam, yadi agnīndhane eva syātām, na tu staḥ |
T04canprasu:2818: katham? iha yadi agnīndhane syātām, niyataṃ te ekatvena vā syātāmanyatvena vā? ubhayathā tu na yujyata ityāha-
T04canprasu:2821: tatra idhyate yat tadindhanam, dāhyaṃ kāṣṭhādikasaṃbhūtam |
T04canprasu:2823: tatra yadi tāvad yadindhanaṃ sa evāgniriti parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:2827: atha anyatvam, evamapi yadi indhanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:2829: na hi ghaṭādanyaḥ paṭastannirapekṣo na dṛṣṭaḥ |
T04canprasu:2836: apradīpanahetukaśca syāt punarārambhavaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt, evaṃ ca sati
T04canprasu:2843: pradīpanaṃ heturasyeti pradīpanahetuka, na pradīpanahetukaḥ apradīpanahetukaḥ |
T04canprasu:2844: yadi pradīpanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, tadā indhananirapekṣaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:2845: yo hi yasmādanyaḥ, sa tannirapekṣo dṛṣṭaḥ, ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ |
T04canprasu:2846: tataśca paratra nirapekṣatvādapradīpanahetukaḥ syāt, pradīpanasāpekṣasya hi agneḥ
T04canprasu:2848: yadā tu pradīpananirapekṣa, tadā nirvāṇapratyayavaikalyānnityapradīpta eva bhavet |
T04canprasu:2849: nityapradīpte cāgnau sati agneraparinirvāṇārthaṃ (Pp_87) cāsya upādānasaṃdhukṣaṇādikaṃ vyarthameva syāt |
T04canprasu:2850: evaṃ ca sati akarmako 'gniḥ kartā syāt |
T04canprasu:2856: ihānyatve 'pi sati agnīndhanayorna vinaiva indhanena agnerastitvam |
T04canprasu:2860: agnisaṃbandhādevendhanavyapadeśo bhavati, indhanāśrayeṇa cāgnirupalabhyate na pṛthak, tadā anyaścedindhanādagnirityādidoṣaprasaṅgasya nāstyevāvasara
T04canprasu:2872: yadā caitadvayatirikto nāstyagniḥ, tadā kena tadindhanaṃ dāhyatām?
T04canprasu:2875: yadā caivam, tadā kutaḥ kasyacijjvālāparigatiriti sa eva doṣo na vepate || 4 ||
T04canprasu:2879: anyo na prāpsyate 'prāpto na dhakṣyatyadahan punaḥ |
T04canprasu:2881: yadi indhanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, so 'nyatvādandhakāramivendhanaṃ na prāpnuyāt |
T04canprasu:2888: svaliṅgavāneva agniḥ sthāsyati, yadi vā nāstyanyatvamagnerindhanāditi |
T04canprasu:2890: anyo na prāpsyati na dhakṣyati na ca nirvāsyati svaliṅgavāṃśca sthāsyati |
T04canprasu:2892: atrāha- ayuktamagnīndhanayoranyatvam, yasmānna prāpsyate 'prāpto na dhakṣyatyadahan punarityādi, tadayuktam |
T04canprasu:2897: strī saṃprāpnoti puruṣaṃ puruṣaśca striyaṃ yathā || 6 ||
T04canprasu:2898: syādetadevam, yadi strīpuruṣavatparasparānapekṣā agnīndhanayoḥ siddhiḥ syāt || 6 ||
T04canprasu:2902: na tvevaṃ saṃbhavati yadindhananirapekṣo 'gniḥ syāt, agninirapekṣaṃ cendhanamiti |
T04canprasu:2904: anyonyāpekṣādhīnajanmanāṃ satyanyatve yeṣāṃ prāptiḥ siddhā, teṣāmeva dṛṣṭāntatvenopādānaṃ
T04canprasu:2906: te ca na saṃbhavantīti na yuktametadanyatve sati prāptirastīti || 7
T04canprasu:2915: asyendhanasya ayamagnirdāhakaḥ kartā, ityevaṃ yadi indhanamapekṣyāgnirvyavasthāpyate, asyāgneridamindhanaṃ karmetyevamagnimapekṣya yadīndhanam, tat kataradanayoḥ pūrvaniṣpannam?
T04canprasu:2916: kimindhanaṃ yadapekṣyāgni syāt, uta agniryamapekṣyendhanaṃ syāt? tatra yadi indhanaṃ pūrvaniṣpannamiti kalpyate, tadayuktam, agninirapekṣasya
T04canprasu:2921: tasmānnāsti atra kiṃcitpūrvasiddhaṃ yadapekṣya itarasya siddhi syāt || 8 ||
T04canprasu:2922: athāpi manyase- pūrvamindhanaṃ paścādagniriti, evamapi yadīndhanamapekṣyāgniragneḥ siddhasya sādhanam |
T04canprasu:2924: yadi indhanamapekṣyāgnirbhaviṣyatīti parikalpyate, evaṃ tarhi siddhasya sato 'gneḥ punarapi sādhanaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:2926: na hi avidyamāno devadatto gṛhe kaṃcidapekṣate |
T04canprasu:2927: evaṃ yadi agnirvidyamāno na syāt, nāsāvindhanamapekṣate |
T04canprasu:2929: tadā ca kimasya indhanasyāpekṣayā punaḥ kartavyam? na hi siddho 'gniḥ punarindhanena (Pp_89) kartavyo yadarthamindhanāpekṣāsāphalyaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:2934: yadi indhanamasiddhaṃ syāt, naiva tadagninā apekṣyeta,
T04canprasu:2936: tasmānniragnikasyendhanasya siddhirabhyupeyā, na caivametaditi na yuktametaditi || 9 ||
T04canprasu:2937: atha matam- yaugapadyenaiva indhanasiddhayā agnisiddhiḥ, agnisiddhayā ca indhanasiddiḥ
T04canprasu:2946: yadi yo 'pekṣitavyaḥ sa sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ || 10 ||
T04canprasu:2947: tatra yadi yaḥ agnyākhyo bhāvaḥ yamindhanākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati,
T04canprasu:2948: indhanākhyaśca bhāvaḥ yo 'gninā ātmasiddhayarthamapekṣitavyaḥ, sa yadi tameva agnyākhyaṃ padārthamapekṣya sidhyati, kathyatāmidānīṃ sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ iti |
T04canprasu:2949: yadā ca agnyabhāve sati indhanasya siddhireva nāsti,
T04canprasu:2950: tadā akāraṇasyendhanasyābhāvāt kutastaddhetuko 'gniḥ prasetsyati? evaṃ ya indhanākhyo bhāvaḥ yamagnyākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati, agnyākhyaśca bhāvo yaḥ indhanākhyena ātmasiddhayarthamapekṣitavyaḥ, sa yadi tamevendhanākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati, kathyatāṃ kimidānīṃ sidhyatāṃ
T04canprasu:2952: yadā hi indhanābhāve sati agneḥ siddhirnāsti, tadā niṣkāraṇasyāgnerabhāvāt kutastaddhetukamindhanam? itaśca agnīndhanayoḥ parasparāpekṣayāpi siddhirasatī,
T04canprasu:2956: yo hi agnyākhyo bhāvaḥ indhanākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati, saḥ asiddho vā
T04canprasu:2957: indhanamapekṣate siddho vā? yadi asiddhaḥ, tadā asiddhatvāt kharaviṣāṇavannendhanamapekṣeta
T04canprasu:2959: kimasyendhanāpekṣayā? na hi siddhaṃ punarapi sādhyate vaiyarthyāt |
T04canprasu:2967: yathā ca agnirapekṣya vā anapekṣya vā indhanaṃ saṃbhavati, evamindhanamapītyāha-
T04canprasu:2970: atrāha- kimanayā asmākamatisūkṣmekṣikayā prayojanam, ye vayaṃ brūmaḥ-
T04canprasu:2971: yasmādagninā idhyamānamindhanaṃ pratyakṣata upalabhyate, tasmātte eva agnīndhane iti |
T04canprasu:2974: yadi indhane 'gniḥ saṃbhavet, sa indhanaṃ dahet |
T04canprasu:2978: nirindhanasya cāhetukasyāgnerāgamanābhāvāt, sendhanasya cāgamane prayojanābhāvāt, tatrāpi cendhane tulyaparyanuyogāt,
T04canprasu:2985: idameva tāvatsaṃpradhāryate- kiṃ punarmūlodakādīnāmabhivyañjakaiḥ pratyayaiḥ kriyata iti
T04canprasu:2986: tatra svarūpaṃ tāvanna kriyate vidyamānatvāt abhivyaktiḥ kriyata iti cet, keyamabhivyaktirnāma? prakāśateti cet, evaṃ tarhi saiva kriyate pūrvamavidyamānatvādasyāḥ |
T04canprasu:2989: api ca iyamabhivyaktirabhivyaktasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyeta anabhivyaktasya vā? tatra tāvad yadabhivyaktaṃ tannābhivyajyate,
T04canprasu:2993: athāpi syāt- vidyamānasyaiva pratyayaiḥ sthaulyaṃ kriyate iti, evamapi yadeva sthaulyaṃ pūrvaṃ nāstīti tadeva kriyata iti kutaḥ
T04canprasu:2994: sthaulyāpādanamabhivyaktiḥ? saukṣmyasya ca nirhetukasyāsaṃbhavāt kasya sthūlatāpādanādabhivyaktiḥ syāditi |
T04canprasu:2995: tadevaṃ sarvathā indhane agnerna saṃbhava iti indhane 'gnirna vidyate |
T04canprasu:2996: na cāvidyamānāgninā indhanasya dahanamupajāyate ityasatyamevaitadupalabhate bhavān |
T04canprasu:3000: agninā indhanaṃ dahyamānamupalabhyate ityatra indhanaprastāve śeṣaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ gamyamānagatāgatadūṣaṇena veditavyam, uktapāṭhaviparyayeṇa-
T04canprasu:3001: dagdhaṃ na dahyate tāvadadagdhaṃ naiva dahyate |
T04canprasu:3004: yata evam, ato nāstyagninā indhanasya dahanamiti veditavyam ||
T04canprasu:3018: indhanamasyāsmin vā vidyata iti vyatirekeṇa vā vyutpādena avyatirekeṇa vā |
T04canprasu:3028: yathā cāgniḥ pañcadhā vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavati, evamātmāpi,
T04canprasu:3031: sarvo niravaśeṣeṇa tatra upādīyate ityupādānaṃ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ |
T04canprasu:3033: prajñapyate, sa upādātā grahītā niṣpādaka ātmetyucyate |
T04canprasu:3035: tadasyātmana upādānasya ca yaḥ kramaḥ siddhiḥ, sa sarvo 'gnīndhanābhyāṃ vyākhyāto
T04canprasu:3037: kaḥ punaḥ sarvasya niravaśeṣasya ca bhedaḥ? sarvagrahaṇenaiva pañca pakṣāḥ
T04canprasu:3039: sarve ete pañcāpi pakṣāḥ agnīndhanavadātmopādānayorapyavikalā ḍhaukanīyāḥ |
T04canprasu:3040: yaścaiyā pratipādane upapattikramaḥ prāgupavarṇitaḥ, tena niravaśeṣeṇa ātmopādānayoḥ pratiṣedho veditavyaḥ ityanena sarvātmanā pratiṣedhasāmyamagnīndhanābhyāmātmopādānayorveditavyamityupadarśanārthaṃ sarvo nirava śeṣeṇetyāha |
T04canprasu:3041: tatra yadevopādānaṃ sa eva ātmā, ityevaṃ kartṛkarmaṇorekatvaprasaṅgānna yujyate nāpyanyadupādānamanya
T04canprasu:3045: yata evaṃ pañcasu prakāreṣu ātmano na sattvam,
T04canprasu:3047: yaścāyamātmopādānayoḥ kramaḥ, sa nānayoreva, kiṃ tarhi-
T04canprasu:3050: ghaṭādayo hi kāryakāraṇabhūta avayavāvayavibhūtā lakṣaṇalakṣyabhūtā guṇnaguṇibhūtā vā syuḥ
T04canprasu:3058: tadevaṃ karmakārakavadātmopādānayorghaṭādīnāṃ ca parasparāpekṣikyāṃ siddhau vyavasthitāyāṃ tathāgatavacanāviparītārthāvabodhābhimānitayā tīrthyamatopakalpitapadārthavyavasthāṃ saugatapravacanārthatvenopanīya
T04canprasu:3060: ātmanaśca satattvaṃ ye bhāvānāṃ ca pṛthakpṛthak |
T04canprasu:3062: tatra saha tena vartata iti satat, satato bhāvaḥ satattvam, apṛthaktvam,
T04canprasu:3064: tadetat satattvaṃ ye varṇayanti, na tānācāryaḥ śāsanārthapaṇḍitān manyate |
T04canprasu:3065: tadyathā- ātmā upādānena prajñapyate yena, sahaiva tenopādānena saṃbhavati |
T04canprasu:3068: evaṃ yena kāraṇena mṛdādinā ghaṭaḥ prajñapyate, tadavyatirekeṇaiva sa bhavati, na pṛthak
T04canprasu:3069: evamātmano bhāvānāṃ ca satattvaṃ ye varṇayanti, na te paramagambhīrasya
T04canprasu:3071: pṛthak pṛthak ca ye nirdiśanti, pṛthagityātmānam,
T04canprasu:3072: pṛthagupādānam, pṛthak kāryam, pṛthak kāraṇam, ityādinā anyatvaṃ paśyanti,
T04canprasu:3077: evaṃ ca agnīndhanaparīkṣayā adhigatadharmatattvaparamasya yoginaḥ kalpenākālālipsitairapi naiva vapurdahyate rāgadveṣamohahutāśanairapi vā iti |
T04canprasu:3079: yatha gagaṇu na jātu dagdhapūrvaṃ subahubhi kalpaśatairhi dahyamānam |
T04canprasu:3080: gaganasama vijānamāna dharmān so 'pi na dahyati jātu sāgnimadhye ||
T04canprasu:3081: sarvi hi jvalamāṇi buddhakṣetre praṇidhi karoti samādhiye sthihitvā |
T04canprasu:3082: jvalata ayu praśāmyatāmaśeṣa pṛthivi vinaśyipi naivasyānyathātvam ||
T04canprasu:3083: tathā araṇiṃ yatha cottarāraṇiṃ hastavyāyāmu trayebhi saṃgatiḥ |
T04canprasu:3084: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtu kārya laghū nirudhyate ||
T04canprasu:3085: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuta ayamāgatu kutra yāti vā |
T04canprasu:3086: vidiśo diśa sarvi mārgato nāgatirnāsya gatiśca labhyati ||
T04canprasu:3087: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ śūnya ādhyātmika śūnya bāhirāḥ |
T04canprasu:3089: imu īdṛśa dharmalakṣaṇā buddha dīpaṃkaradarśane tvayā ||
T04canprasu:3090: anubuddha yatha tvayātmanā tatha bodhehi sadevamānuṣān ||
T04canprasu:3094: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau agnīndhanaparīkṣā nāma daśamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:3097: yadi hi ātmā na syāt, kasya pañcagatike ājavaṃjavībhāvena janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā saṃsaraṇaṃ
T04canprasu:3098: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā- anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāraḥ iti |
T04canprasu:3099: avidyānīvaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanānāṃ tṛṣṇāgaṇḍurabaddhānāṃ saṃsaratāṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ pūrvā koṭirna prajñāyata iti |
T04canprasu:3109: yadi hi saṃsāro nāma kaścit syāt, niyataṃ tasya pūrvamapi syāt, paścimamapi,
T04canprasu:3111: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā- anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo
T04canprasu:3114: anavarāgravacanāt, saṃsāra eva nāstīti nanu spaṣṭamādeśayāmāsa bhagavān |
T04canprasu:3115: tasmānnāsti saṃsāraḥ, pūrvāparakoṭayanupalambhāt, alātacakravat, iti sthitam ||
T04canprasu:3116: atredaṃ vicāryate- yadi pūrvaṃ cāparaṃ ca saṃsārasya niṣiddhaṃ bhagavatā,
T04canprasu:3117: kathaṃ punaridamāha- tasmāttarhi saṃsārakṣayāya pratipatsyāmaha ityevaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam, iti? ucyate |
T04canprasu:3120: teṣāṃ tu lokottaramārgajñānāgninā dagdhāśeṣakleśavāsanāmūlaniḥśeṣapādapānāṃ bhavatyeva antaḥ iti vijñeyam ||
T04canprasu:3124: yathā bījasya dṛṣṭo 'nto na cādistasya vidyate |
T04canprasu:3126: sa ca antopadeśo laukika eva vyavahāre sthitvā saṃsāracārakāvabaddhānāmutsāhanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ deśito laukikajñānāpekṣayā |
T04canprasu:3127: vastukacintāyāṃ tu saṃsāra eva nāsti, tatkuto 'sya parikṣayaḥ?
T04canprasu:3129: atrāha- yadyevaṃ laukikajñānāpekṣayā antavad ādirapi kiṃ nocyate? ucyate |
T04canprasu:3130: ahetukadoṣaprasaṅgāt laukikajñānāpekṣayāpi saṃsārasyāderabhāva ityubhayathāpyāderabhāva eveti vijñeyam || 1 ||
T04canprasu:3131: atrāha- yadyāpi avarāgre na staḥ saṃsārasya, tathāpi madhyamasti,
T04canprasu:3134: iha yannāsti, na tasya madhyamasti tadyathā kūrmaromaprāvaraṇasyeti |
T04canprasu:3137: naivāgraṃ nāvaraṃ yasya tasya madhyaṃ kuto bhavet |
T04canprasu:3141: yasya saṃsārasya ādirantaśca pratiṣiddhaḥ, tasya kuto madhyaṃ bhaviṣyati? tataśca saṃjñāmātrakameva
T04canprasu:3145: santi, ata eva saṃsārābhāvājjātijarāmaraṇādīnāṃ pūrvāparasahakramā api naiva santītyāha-
T04canprasu:3150: yadi pūrvaṃ jātirbhavet, tadā maraṇasahitā syāt |
T04canprasu:3153: jarāmaraṇarahitasya bhāvasya jātau parikalpyamānāyāmanyatra amṛtasyaiva devadattasya prathamamiha jātiḥ parikalpyamānā syāt |
T04canprasu:3155: abhūvamatītamadhvānam, ityevaṃ pūrvāntakalpanā ca na syāt |
T04canprasu:3157: atha syāt- āmrādīnāṃ yathā pūrvaṃ vināpi jarāmaraṇasaṃbandhāt prathamameva
T04canprasu:3161: āmrādīnāmapi hi svabījanirodhe samutpadyamānatvāt nānyatrāvinaṣṭānāmutpāda iti samametat pūrveṇa
T04canprasu:3162: atha syāt- anyadeva vṛkṣādbījam, ato 'nyatrāvināśapūrvaka eva vṛkṣasyotpāda iti naivam |
T04canprasu:3165: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat |
T04canprasu:3169: yataśca anyatrāmṛtasya ihotpādo nāsti, na pūrvaṃ jātirabhyupeyā || 3 ||
T04canprasu:3178: yatha ukkhitte loḍhammi ukkheve atthi kāraṇaṃ |
T04canprasu:3179: ṣaḍane kāraṇaṃ ṇatthi aṇṇaṃ ukkhevakāraṇā || iti |
T04canprasu:3180: yathāṣyatrotkṣepaḥ patanakāraṇaṃ nānyat, evamihāpi jātimevakāraṇatvena vināśasya varṇayāmo nānyat, iti nāstyahetukatā vināśasya |
T04canprasu:3181: jātihetukatvāccāsyodgamanameva vināśasya heturiti kṛtvā eṣāpi gāthā sunītā
T04canprasu:3184: sa bhāva eva dhammāṇaṃ yaṃ vibhonti samuggatā ||
T04canprasu:3189: yadi sahabhāvo jātijarāmaraṇānāṃ syāt, tadā jāyamānasya maraṇaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:3192: | na caivaṃ loke dṛṣṭaṃ yajjāyamāna eva mriyate iti |
T04canprasu:3195: na hi sahabhūtayoḥ savyetaragoviṣāṇayoranyonyahetukatā dṛṣṭeti na yuktametat || 5 ||
T04canprasu:3198: prapañcayanti tāṃ jātiṃ tajjarāmaraṇaṃ ca kim || 6 ||
T04canprasu:3199: yasyāṃ jātau yatra jarāmaraṇe ete pūrvāparasahakramāḥ na santi, tāṃ jātimanupalabhamānā āryāḥ kiṃ prapañcayanti? kiṃśabdo 'saṃbhave |
T04canprasu:3202: evamavidyamāneṣu jātyādiṣu tāṃ jātibhavidyamānāṃ bālāḥ kiṃ prapañcayanti tacca jarāmaraṇaṃ
T04canprasu:3203: saṃvidyate? tasmādavastuka eva bālānāṃ prapañca ityabhiprāyaḥ || 6 ||
T04canprasu:3204: yathā ca saṃsārasya pūrvā koṭirnāsti, evamanyeṣāmapi bhāvānāmityāha-
T04canprasu:3205: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇameva ca |
T04canprasu:3206: vedanā vedakaścaiva santyarthā ye ca kecana || 7 ||
T04canprasu:3207: pūrvā na vidyate koṭiḥ saṃsārasya na kevalam |
T04canprasu:3209: tatra yadi pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ paścātkāryaṃ syāt, akāryakaṃ kāraṇaṃ nirhetukaṃ
T04canprasu:3211: atha pūrvaṃ kāryaṃ paścātkāraṇam, evamapi kāraṇātpūrvaṃ kāryaṃ
T04canprasu:3216: na ca kevalaṃ saṃsārasya vyākhyānena kāryakāraṇādikaṃ vyākhyātaṃ
T04canprasu:3218: jñānajñeyapramāṇaprameyasādhanasādhyāvayavāvayaviguṇaguṇyādayaḥ, teṣāmapi pūrvā koṭirna vidyata iti yojyam || ata eva āryaratnameghasūtre
T04canprasu:3223: ādita śūnya anāgata dharmā no gata asthita sthānaviviktāḥ |
T04canprasu:3224: nityamasāraka māyasabhāvāḥ śuddha viśuddha nabhopama sarvi ||
T04canprasu:3225: yaṃ ca pabhāṣati dharma jinasya taṃ ca na paśyati so 'kṣayatāya |
T04canprasu:3226: ādinirātma nisattvimi dharmāstāṃśca ca pabhāṣati no ca kṣapeti |
T04canprasu:3227: kalpita buccati kalpitamātraṃ antu na labhyati saṃsaramāṇe |
T04canprasu:3228: koṭi alakṣaṇa yā puri āsīdeti anāgati pratyayatāye ||
T04canprasu:3229: karma kriyā ca pravartati evaṃ hīnautkṛṣṭatayā samudenti |
T04canprasu:3230: jaḍḍaka dharma sadā prakṛtīye śūnya nirātma vijānatha sarvān ||
T04canprasu:3232: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pūrvāparakoṭiparīkṣā nāmaikādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:3235: iha hi pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamityucyate, tacca asti, tena ca duḥkhena
T04canprasu:3236: kasyacidbhavitavyaṃ na nirāśrayeṇeti, ato vidyata eva duḥkhasyāśrayaḥ, sa cātmeti |
T04canprasu:3239: taddhi bhavet svayaṃ kṛtaṃ vā parakṛtaṃ vā ubhayakṛtaṃ vā heturahitaṃ vā |
T04canprasu:3240: sarvathā ca iṣyamāṇaṃ tatkāryameva nāstīti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:3242: duḥkhamityeka icchanti tacca kāryaṃ na yujyate || 1 ||
T04canprasu:3243: tatraike vādinaḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti pratipannāḥ |
T04canprasu:3244: apare punaḥ parakṛtam, anye ca ubhayakṛtam| kecidahetusamutpannameva duḥkhamiti pratipannāḥ
T04canprasu:3245: sarvathā ca tadduḥkhamiṣyamāṇaṃ kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ na yujyate,
T04canprasu:3248: svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavetpratītya na tato bhavet |
T04canprasu:3250: yasmādimān maraṇāntikān skandhān pratītya ime aupapattyāṃśikāḥ skandhā utpadyante tasmātsvayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti nopapadyate || 2 ||
T04canprasu:3251: idānīṃ parakṛtamapi duḥkhaṃ yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:3252: yadyamībhya ime 'nye syurebhyo vāmī pare yadi |
T04canprasu:3254: yadā amībhyo maraṇāntikebhyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ ime aupapattyāṃśikāḥ skandhā anye syuḥ, ebhyo vā aupapattyāṃśikebhyaḥ amī maraṇāntikā skandhāḥ pare
T04canprasu:3258: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat |
T04canprasu:3259: na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam || iti |
T04canprasu:3261: yadi hi anyatvaṃ syāt, tadā sati anyatve etaiḥ parabhūtaiḥ skandhairamī parabhūtāḥ kṛtā iti yuktaṃ vaktuṃ
T04canprasu:3263: na caitadevam| iti parakṛtamapi duḥkhaṃ na saṃbhavati || 3 ||
T04canprasu:3264: atha syāt- na brūmo yasmādduḥkhenaiva duḥkhaṃ kṛtam, ataḥ svayaṃ kṛtamiti
T04canprasu:3265: | kiṃ tarhi svapudgalena yasmātsvayameva kṛtam, nāpareṇa kṛtvā dattam,
T04canprasu:3269: svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam || 4 ||
T04canprasu:3270: yadetanmanuṣyaduḥkhaṃ pañcopādānaskandhalakṣaṇaṃ svayaṃ pudgalena kṛtamiti parikalpyate, kalpyatāmasau pudgalo yena tadduḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam |
T04canprasu:3271: yadi tāvadyena duḥkhena svapudgalaḥ prajñapyate, tadeva duḥkhaṃ tena kṛtamiti,
T04canprasu:3273: athāpi manuṣyaduḥkhopādānena pudgalena tadeva duḥkhaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt, na tarhi svapudgalakṛtaṃ tat, parapudgalakṛtameva syāt |
T04canprasu:3275: pudgalābheda iṣyate, etacca nāsti, upādānavyatiriktasya bhinnasya pudgalasya darśayitumaśakyatvāt
T04canprasu:3276: evaṃ tāvat svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na bhavati || 4 ||
T04canprasu:3277: atrāha- ka evamāha svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti? kiṃ tarhi parapudgalajaṃ
T04canprasu:3279: anya eva devaduḥkhānmanuṣyapudgalaḥ, manuṣyapudgalaśca devaduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā yasmāddevapudgalāya dadāti, tena ca devaduḥkhena
T04canprasu:3284: pareṇa kṛtvā tadduḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ || 5 ||
T04canprasu:3285: yadi devaduḥkhaṃ manuṣyapudgalakṛtam, tena ca manuṣyapudgalena tadduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā parasmai devapudgalāya pradīyata iti sa devapudgalo devaduḥkhavinirmuktaḥ kuto yasmai pradīyeteti |
T04canprasu:3286: evaṃ tāvadaparapudgalajasya duḥkhasya pratigrāhaka eva nāsti || 5 ||
T04canprasu:3289: vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat || 6 ||
T04canprasu:3290: yenopādānena sa manuṣyapudgalaḥ prajñapyate, sa manuṣyopādānavyatiriktaḥ katamo yo devapudgalāya devaduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā praheṣyati?
T04canprasu:3294: paro hi duḥkhaṃ yatkuryāttattasya syātsvayaṃ kṛtam || 7 ||
T04canprasu:3295: yadi devapudgaladuḥkhaṃ manuṣyapudgalena kṛtatvātparakṛtaṃ bhavati, nanu,
T04canprasu:3298: tataḥ svayaṃkṛtasyāprasiddheryadā manuṣyapudgalena svayaṃ tadduḥkhaṃ na kṛtam,
T04canprasu:3299: tadā kutaḥ parapudgalasya devākhyasya tadduḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
T04canprasu:3302: na tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tatkṛtam |
T04canprasu:3304: itaśca svaparābhyāṃ duḥkhasya karaṇaṃ na yujyate, yasmānna tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkham |
T04canprasu:3305: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmānna tenaiva hi tat kṛtam, svātmani
T04canprasu:3307: na parakṛtamapi, yasmādyo 'sau paraḥ karotīti parikalpyate, sa eva tāvannātmanā kṛto nātmanā niṣpannaḥ tasyāpi hetvantarāpekṣaṇāt |
T04canprasu:3308: yaśca svātmanā na niṣpannaḥ, sa kathamavidyamānasvabhāvaḥ san paraṃ kariṣyatīti na yuktametat idānīmubhayakṛtamapi duḥkhamasadityāha-
T04canprasu:3310: yadi hi ekaikena duḥkhasya karaṇaṃ syāt syāttadānīmubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkham
T04canprasu:3312: na caikaikena prāṇātipāte kṛte dvābhyāṃ kṛta iti vyapadeśo dṛṣṭaḥ ||
T04canprasu:3313: idānīṃ nirhetukamapi duḥkhaṃ yathā nāsti, tathā pratipadayannāha-
T04canprasu:3317: | yadi duḥkhaṃ svayaṃkṛtaṃ nāsti, parakṛtamapi nāsti yathoktena nyāyena,
T04canprasu:3318: tadidānīṃ kuta eva nirhetukaṃ bhaviṣyati khapuṣpasaugandhyavat?
T04canprasu:3320: yathā ca caturdhā vicāryamāṇaṃ duḥkhamasat, evaṃ bāhyā api
T04canprasu:3322: na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate |
T04canprasu:3323: sarveṣāṃ bāhyānāmapi bhāvānāṃ cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate || 10 ||
T04canprasu:3326: cāturvidhyāsaṃbhavaḥ, tatkatamena tarhi idānīṃ prakāreṇa eṣāṃ siddhiriti |
T04canprasu:3328: svabhāvato yadi etāni duḥkhādīni syuḥ, niyatameṣāṃ caturṇāṃ prakārāṇāmanyatamena prakāreṇa siddhiḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:3331: atha viparyāsamātralabdhātmasattākāyā duḥkhādisaṃvṛteḥ pratītyasamutpādavyavasthā (Pp_103) mṛgyate, tadā karmakārakaparīkṣāprakaraṇavihitavidhinā yathoditapakṣacatuṣṭayatiraskāreṇa idaṃpratyayatāmātrārthapratītyasamutpādasiddhayā siddhirabhyupeyā |
T04canprasu:3334: tārkikairiṣyate duḥkhaṃ tvayā tūktaṃ pratītyajam || iti ||
T04canprasu:3336: tathā saṃvṛti bhāṣitu dharma jinena saṃskṛta 'saṃskṛta paśyatha eva |
T04canprasu:3337: nāstiha bhūtatu ātma naro vā ettaku lakṣaṇa sarvajagasya ||
T04canprasu:3338: kṛṣṇaśubhaṃ ca na naśyati karma ātmana kṛtva ca vedayitavyam |
T04canprasu:3339: no 'pi tu saṃkrama karmaphalasya no ca ahetuka pratyanubhoti ||
T04canprasu:3340: sarvi bhavā alikā vasikāśca riktaka tucchaka phenasamāśca |
T04canprasu:3341: māyamarīcisamā sada śūnyā deśituḥ saṃvṛtu te ca viviktāḥ ||
T04canprasu:3343: evimu saṃskṛta sarvi vijāna māyamarīcisamaṃ jagu sarvam ||
T04canprasu:3345: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau duḥkhaparīkṣā nāma dvādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:3347: yataścaivaṃ samanantarātikrāntaprakaraṇavidhinā svaparobhayakṛtatvamahetusamutpanatvaṃ ca nirūpyamāṇaṃ bhāvānāmasat,
T04canprasu:3350: tasmānniḥsvabhāvā eva santo bālānāṃ visaṃvādakā māyākarituragādivat tadanabhijñānāṃ na tu vijñānām |
T04canprasu:3351: ata eva sarvadharmasvābhāvāvyāparokṣadhīnayanaḥ samunmūlitāśeṣāvidyāvāsanaḥ caturviparyāsaviparyastātrāṇasattvaparitrāṇāya aviparītanaiḥ svābhāvyopadeśatatparo buddho jagadvibodhako mahākāruṇikaḥ-
T04canprasu:3353: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā || 1 ||
T04canprasu:3354: sūtre uktam- tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadidaṃ saṃskṛtam |
T04canprasu:3355: etaddhi khalu bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yadidamamoṣadharma nirvāṇam |
T04canprasu:3360: tadanena nyāyena yanmoṣadharma tanmṛṣetyevaṃ yasmāduktavāṃstathāgato bhagavān, sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāḥ, tasmānmoṣadharmakatvena te saṃskārā mṛṣā bhavanti citrakarayantradārikāvat,
T04canprasu:3363: ato niḥsvabhāvatvena mṛṣā sarvasaṃskārāḥ moṣadharmakatvāt marīcikādijalavat |
T04canprasu:3366: tataśca vihitayā upapattyā asmāccāgamāt siddhaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyam |
T04canprasu:3367: śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogena iti ca prajñāpāramitā- ardhaśatikāpāṭhāt || 1 ||
T04canprasu:3368: atrāha- yadyevaṃ moṣadharmakatvena sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ mṛṣātvaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhavatā, nanvevaṃ sati na santi sarve bhāvā iti sarvapadārthāpavādinī mithyādṛṣṭireva syāt |
T04canprasu:3373: tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadyadi kiṃ tatra muṣyate |
T04canprasu:3374: yadā asmābhiḥ tanmṛṣā moṣadharmakam ityuktam, tadā kiṃ tatra muṣyate? kiṃ tatrābhāvo bhavati? kaścidyadi padārtho 'bhaviṣyat,
T04canprasu:3377: paśyāmaḥ, tadā kiṃ tatra muṣyate? naiva kiṃcidabhāvo bhavatītyayukto
T04canprasu:3379: atrāha- yadi abhāvadarśanamapi na pratipādyate, kiṃ punaranenāgamena pratipādyata iti?
T04canprasu:3381: yadetaduktaṃ bhagavatā, tanna bhāvānāmabhāvaparidīpakam kiṃ tarhi śūnyatāparidīpakam svabhāvānutpādaparidīpakamityarthaḥ
T04canprasu:3383: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto no tasya utpādu sabhāvato 'sti |
T04canprasu:3384: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ ||
T04canprasu:3386: atrāha- nāyamāgamo bhāvasvabhāvānutpādaṃ paridīpayati, kiṃ tarhi niḥsvabhāvatvam, svabhāvasyānavasthāyitvam, vināśitvam, iti |
T04canprasu:3391: bhavati- yadi bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo na syāt, tadānīṃ naivaiṣāmanyathātvamupalabhyeta |
T04canprasu:3396: asvabhāvo bhāvo nāsti bhāvānāṃ śūnyatā yataḥ || 3 ||
T04canprasu:3399: na ca asati dharmiṇi tadāśrito dharma upapadyate |
T04canprasu:3400: na hi asati vandhyātanaye tacchayāmatopapadyata iti |
T04canprasu:3404: yadi bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo na syāt, yo 'yaṃ vipariṇāmalakṣaṇaḥ anyathābhāvaḥ,
T04canprasu:3406: evamapi parikalpyamāne kasya syādanyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvo yadi vidyate || 4 ||
T04canprasu:3407: iha yo dharmo yaṃ padārthaṃ na vyabhicarati, sa tasya svabhāva iti
T04canprasu:3409: agnerauṣṇyaṃ hi loke tadavyabhicāritvāt svabhāva ityucyate |
T04canprasu:3411: yadā caivamavyabhicāriṇā svabhāvena bhavitavyam, tadā asya avyabhicāritvādanyathābhāvaḥ syādabhāvaḥ |
T04canprasu:3413: evaṃ bhāvānāṃ sati svabhāvābhyupagame 'nyathātvameva na saṃbhavet |
T04canprasu:3422: yuvā na jīryate yasmādyasmājjīrṇo na jīryate || 5 ||
T04canprasu:3423: tasyaiva tāvat prāgvat prāgavasthāyāṃ vartamānasya bhāvasyānyathātvaṃ nopapadyate |
T04canprasu:3424: tathā hi yūno yuvāvasthāyāmeva vartamānasya nāsti anyathātvam |
T04canprasu:3428: tadyadi yūno neṣyate, anyasyaiva jīrṇasya bhavatīti, tadapi na yujyate |
T04canprasu:3429: yasmānna hi jīrṇasya punarjarayā saṃbandhaḥ, niṣprayojanatvāt |
T04canprasu:3430: kiṃ hi jīrṇasya punarjarayā saṃbandhaḥ kuryāt? tadāgamanāntareṇa jīrṇatābhāvājjīrṇo jīryata iti na yujyate |
T04canprasu:3432: aprāptajarāvasthasya yuveti vyapadeśāt, avasthādvayasya ca parasparaviruddhatvāt || 5 ||
T04canprasu:3435: atha syāt- kṣīrāvasthāparityāgena dadhyavasthā bhavati, ataḥ na kṣīrameva
T04canprasu:3438: yadi kṣīraṃ dadhi bhavatīti neṣyate parasparavirodhāt-
T04canprasu:3440: kimudakasya dadhibhāvo bhavatu? tasmādasaṃbaddhameva tadanyasya dadhibhāvo
T04canprasu:3442: tadevamanyathātvāsaṃbhavāt kutastaddarśanāt sasvabhāvatā bhāvānāṃ prasetsyatīti na yuktametat
T04canprasu:3444: yo na pi jāyati no cupapadyī no cyavate na pi jīryati dharmaḥ |
T04canprasu:3445: taṃ jinu darśayatī narasiṃha tatra nideśayi sattva maharṣī ||
T04canprasu:3446: yasya svabhāva na vidyati kaści no 'parabhāvatu kenaci labdhaḥ |
T04canprasu:3447: nāntarato na pi bāhirato vā labhyati tatra niveśayi nāthaḥ ||
T04canprasu:3448: śānta gatī kathitā sugatena no ca gatī upapadyati kāci |
T04canprasu:3449: tatra ca vyoharasī gatimukto muktaku mocayasī bahusattvān ||
T04canprasu:3450: sarvi vadesi nirātmaka dharmān sattvatu grāhatu mocasi lokam |
T04canprasu:3451: mukta svayaṃ gatito gatimukto tenasi pāragato na ca tīrṇaḥ ||
T04canprasu:3452: pāragato 'si bhavārṇavatīrṇaḥ pāragato na ca labhyati kaści |
T04canprasu:3453: pāru na vidyati nāpi apāru pāragato 'smi vadesi ca vākyam ||
T04canprasu:3454: vāca na vidyati yāṃ ca vadesi yaṃ pi vadesi na vidyati taṃ pi |
T04canprasu:3455: yasya vadesi na vidyati so 'pi yo 'pi vijānati so 'pi asanto ||
T04canprasu:3456: tatra praṇaṣṭu jagaṃ imu sarvaṃ vitathavikalpaniveśavaśena |
T04canprasu:3457: śānta vijānati yo naru dharmāṃ stehi tathāgatu dṛṣṭa svayaṃbhūḥ ||
T04canprasu:3458: śānta prajānati dharma praṇītān prīti sa vindati toṣati sattvān |
T04canprasu:3459: so bhavatī jinu jitvena kleśān ātma ............ |
T04canprasu:3460: tena vijānita bodhi jinānāṃ buddhiya bodhayate sa jagaṃ pi |
T04canprasu:3462: yaccoktam- asvabhāvo bhāvo naivāsti, śūnyatā ca bhāvānāmiṣyate, tasmādasti śūnyatāaśrayo bhāvasvabhāva iti, etadapi na yujyate ityāha-
T04canprasu:3464: na kiṃcidastyaśūnyaṃ ca kutaḥ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati || 7 ||
T04canprasu:3465: yadi śūnyatā nāma kācit syāt, tadā tadāśrayo bhāvasvabhāvaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:3467: iha hi śūnyatā nāmeti sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamityabhyupagamāt aśūnyadharmābhāvādaśūnyataiva nāsti |
T04canprasu:3468: yadā ca aśūnyāḥ padārthā na santi, aśūnyatā ca nāsti, tadā pratipakṣanirapekṣatvācchūnyatāpi
T04canprasu:3470: yadā ca śūnyatā nāsti, tadātadāśrayā api padārthā na santīti sthitamavikalam || 7 ||
T04canprasu:3471: atrāha- trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākhyāni vimuktaye vineyebhyo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭāni sarvatīrthikasamayāsādhāraṇāni saugata eva pravacane samupalabhyante |
T04canprasu:3474: sa bhavāṃstathāgatapravacanavyākhyānavyājena idānīṃ tāmeva śūnyatāṃ pratikṣeptumārabdhavān, ityalaṃ bhavatā svargāpavargamārgasamucchedakeneti
T04canprasu:3476: aho vata bhavānatyunmukha iva atyantaviparyāsānnirvāṇapuragāminaṃ śivamṛjuṃ paramaṃ panthānamavadhūya bhāvābhiniveśavyā, kulitaṃ saṃsārakāntārānugameva mārgaṃ
T04canprasu:3477: mokṣapuragāmitvena samāśrito nirmumukṣuḥ san saṃsārāṭavīkāntāraḥ sadbhirupālabhya eva san abhimānābhiniveśagrahapavaraśatayā tānevopālabhate |
T04canprasu:3482: iha sarveṣāmeva dṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ sarvagrahābhiniveśānāṃ yaniḥsaraṇamapravṛttiḥ sā śūnyatā |
T04canprasu:3484: ye tu tasyāmapi śūnyatāyāṃ bhāvābhiniveśinaḥ, tān prati avācakā vayamiti kuto 'smadupadeśāt sakalakalpanāvyāvṛttyā mokṣo bhaviṣyati? yaḥ nakiṃcidapi te
T04canprasu:3485: paṇyaṃ dāsyāmītyuktaḥ, sa cet 'dehi bhostadeva mahyaṃ nakiṃcinnāma
T04canprasu:3486: paṇyam,'; iti brūyāt, sa kenopāyena śakyaḥ paṇyābhāvaṃ grāhayitum? evaṃ yeṣāṃ śūnyatāyāmapi bhāvābhiniveśaḥ, kenedānīṃ sa teṣāṃ tasyāṃ bhāvābhiniveśo niṣidhyatāmiti? ato mahābhaiṣajye 'pi doṣasaṃjñitvāt paramacikitsakairmahāvaidyaistathāgataiḥ pratyākhyātā eva te |
T04canprasu:3488: yanna śūnyatayā dharmān śūnyān karoti, api tu dharmā eva śūnyāḥ |
T04canprasu:3489: yannānimittena dharmānanimittān karoti, api tu dharmā evānimittāḥ |
T04canprasu:3490: yannāpraṇihitena dharmānapraṇihitān karoti, api tu dharmā evāpraṇihitāḥ |
T04canprasu:3491: yaivaṃ pratyavekṣā, iyamucyate kāśyapa madhyamā pratipaddharmāṇāṃ bhūtapratyavekṣā |
T04canprasu:3492: ye hi kāśyapa śūnyatopalambhena śūnyatāṃ pratisaranti,
T04canprasu:3496: varaṃ khalu kāśyapa sumerumātrā pudgaladṛṣṭirāśritā, na tveva abhāvābhiniveśikasya śūnyatādṛṣṭiḥ
T04canprasu:3497: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ hi kāśyapa śūnyatā niḥsaraṇam |
T04canprasu:3502: tasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya svayaṃ koṣṭhagataṃ na niḥsaret |
T04canprasu:3503: tatkiṃ manyase kāśyapa api tu sa puruṣastato glānyānmukto bhavet? no hīdaṃ bhagavan |
T04canprasu:3504: gāḍhataraṃ tasya puruṣasya glānyaṃ bhavet, yasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya
T04canprasu:3510: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃskāraparīkṣā nāma trayodaśamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:3513: iha yannāsti, na tasya saṃsargaḥ, tadyathā vandhyāsutaduhitroḥ |
T04canprasu:3516: trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ, sparśasahajā vedaneti vistaraḥ |
T04canprasu:3517: tathā saṃjñā ca vedanā ca saṃsṛṣṭāvetau dharmau nāsaṃsṛṣṭāviti saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsargopadeśaḥ
T04canprasu:3520: syādetadevam, yadi saṃsarga eva bhavato bhavet, na tvasti,
T04canprasu:3522: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā trīṇyetāni dviśo dviśaḥ |
T04canprasu:3524: tatra draṣṭavyaṃ rūpam,darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ, draṣṭā vijñānam |
T04canprasu:3525: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ dviśo dviśaḥ saṃsargo nāsti |
T04canprasu:3526: cakṣuṣo rūpasya ca, cakṣuṣo vijñānasya ca,
T04canprasu:3528: ityevaṃ dviśo dviśaḥ saṃsargo na bhavati |
T04canprasu:3530: yathā ca draṣṭavyadarśanadraṣṭaṇāṃ dviśo dviśaḥ sarvaśaśca saṃsargābhāvaḥ,
T04canprasu:3531: evaṃ rāgaśca raktaśca rañjanīyaṃ ca dṛśyatām |
T04canprasu:3532: rāgasya raktasya ca saṃsargo nāsti, rāgasya rañjanīyasya ca, trayāṇāmapi yugapatsaṃsargo nāsti
T04canprasu:3538: tena traidhena śeṣāḥ kleśā dveṣamohādayaḥ, te ete dveṣadviṣṭadveṣaṇīyādinā traidhena śrotraśrotṛśrotavyādinā ca || 2 ||
T04canprasu:3543: yadi draṣṭavyādīnāṃ parasparamanyatvaṃ syāt, tadā kṣīrodakayoriva anyena anyasya saṃsargaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:3544: taccānyatvaṃ yasmādeṣāṃ draṣṭavyaprabhṛtīnāṃ na saṃbhavati, ato naite saṃsarga brajanti || api ca |
T04canprasu:3547: na ca kevalaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasthitānāṃ draṣṭavyādīnāmanyatvaṃ na
T04canprasu:3548: saṃbhavati, ghaṭapaṭādīnāmapi padārthānāṃ sarveṣāṃ naiva saṃbhavatītyavasīyatām || 4 ||
T04canprasu:3553: iha yadetad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu paṭādanyaditi vyapadiśyate,
T04canprasu:3557: yacca paṭākhyaṃ vastu anyad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu pratītya anyadbhavati, tasmātpaṭākhyādvastunaḥ tad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu nānyadbhavatītyavasīyatām |
T04canprasu:3561: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat |
T04canprasu:3564: atrāha- yadi ghaṭādanyaḥ paṭaḥ syāt, taṃ ca pṛthagbhūtaṃ paṭamapekṣya anyo ghaṭaḥ syāt, tadā ko doṣa iti |
T04canprasu:3568: eko 'tra anyaśabda upadarśane, aparaśca arthāntaraparāmarśī, anyaśca
T04canprasu:3570: yadi hi etad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu paṭādanyasmādanyat syāt, tad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu anyasmādapi paṭākhyādṛte anyadbhavet, tadā ca paṭanirapekṣasyaiva ekaikasya ghaṭasya anyatvaṃ bhavet |
T04canprasu:3573: | sa eva ghaṭo na svarūpaniṣpattāvanyaṃ paṭamapekṣate |
T04canprasu:3574: evamanyatvamapi yadi ghaṭasya anyasmātpaṭādṛte bhavet, tadānīṃ paṭanirapekṣasya ghaṭasya
T04canprasu:3576: na tu ekaikasya paṭanirapekṣasya ghaṭasyānyatvaṃ dṛṣṭam|
T04canprasu:3577: tasmādanyadbhavatīti bruvatā yadapekṣya yadanyat, tatastadanyanna bhavatīti sphuṭamabhyupetaṃ bhavati ||
T04canprasu:3578: atrāha- yadi khalu anyatvamevaṃ kutaścitkasyacinnāsti, nanu idamapi tadā
T04canprasu:3579: na saṃbhavati vaktum- yasmādanyatpratītya anyadanyadbhavatīti, tasmādeva tadanyadanyanna bhavatīti
T04canprasu:3582: bhāvānāmanyatvasiddhiḥ, ata eva anyadityucyate laukike vyavahāre sthitvā |
T04canprasu:3584: yadi tarhi evamapyavidyamāne 'pyanyatve lokasaṃvṛtyā paṭādanyo ghaṭa iti
T04canprasu:3585: vyapadiśyate, atha kasmād bījāṅkurayorapi evamanyatvaṃ na vyapadiśyate?
T04canprasu:3587: naiva hi loko ghaṭapaṭayoriva bījāṅkurayoranyatvaṃ pratipadyate,
T04canprasu:3590: yasmādbījamātramu tvā bījakāryaṃ vṛkṣamupadarśayati pumān loke-
T04canprasu:3591: ayaṃ vṛkṣo mayopta iti, tasmālloke 'pi kāryakāraṇabhūtānāṃ nāstyeva paratvamiti vyavasthāpyate atrāha- yadi padārthāntare padārthāntarasāpekṣā parabuddhiḥ syāt, syādeṣa
T04canprasu:3594: kiṃ tarhi iha anyatvaṃ nāma sāmānyaviśeṣo 'sti, tadyatra samavetam sa padārthaḥ padārthāntaranirapekṣayāpi para ityucyate, tasmāduktadoṣānavasaro
T04canprasu:3596: ucyate syādetadevam, yadi anyatvameva syāt, na tvasti |
T04canprasu:3597: ihedamanyatvaṃ kalpyamānamanyasmin vā kalpyeta ananyasmin vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyata iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:3601: sa ca anyavyapadeśo vināpyanyatvena siddha eva, yasmāllabdhānyavyapadeśa eva padārthe 'nyasmin anyatvaṃ kalpyate, ityevaṃ tāvadanyasminnanyatvaṃ na
T04canprasu:3602: saṃbhavati idānīmananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ nāsti, yasmādananya ucyate ekaḥ,
T04canprasu:3603: tatra ca anyatvaviruddhamekatvamastīti yataḥ virodhādananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati
T04canprasu:3604: yacca idānīṃ nānyasminnananyasmin vidyate tadvayatiriktasya padārthāntarasyāsaṃbhavād etadvayatirikte 'pi padārthe na saṃbhavati, tatraivāsti |
T04canprasu:3605: yadā caivamanyatvameva nāsti, tadā anyatvasamavāyanibandhanaḥ anyabuddhidhvanipravṛttiheturanyo 'pi padārtho nāstīti siddham ||
T04canprasu:3606: atrāha- yadyapi anyatvaṃ nāsti, tathāpi anyastāvadasti |
T04canprasu:3607: na ca asati anyatve anyo bhavitumarhati, ato 'nyatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
T04canprasu:3610: yadā anyatvameva nāstīti prāk pratipāditam, tadā kutaḥ asati anyatve anyadvā tadeva vā bhaviṣyati? tadeveti ananyatvamityarthaḥ |
T04canprasu:3613: iha darśanādīnāṃ yadyapi anyatvaṃ nāstīti pratipāditam, tathāpi trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ
T04canprasu:3615: tataśca saṃsargasadbhāvād vidyanta eva darśanādaya iti |
T04canprasu:3617: syurevam, yadi teṣāṃ saṃsarga eva syāt |
T04canprasu:3620: na tena tasya saṃsargo nānyenānyasya yujyate |
T04canprasu:3621: iha yadi darśanādīnāṃ saṃsargaḥ syāt, sa ekatvena vā parikalpyeta anyatvena vā? tatra ekatve nāsti saṃsargaḥ |
T04canprasu:3622: na hi ekakaṃ kṣīramudakanirapekṣamudakena saṃsṛjyata ityucyate |
T04canprasu:3624: na hi udakātpṛthagavasthitaṃ kṣīramudakena saṃsṛjyata iti kathyate
T04canprasu:3625: | evaṃ darśanādīnāṃ yadi ekatve sati saṃsargaḥ parikalpyate, so
T04canprasu:3632: atrāha- yadyapi saṃsargo nāsti, tathāpi saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā
T04canprasu:3634: na ca saṃsargamantareṇa saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā ca saṃbhavati |
T04canprasu:3638: yasmādyadā saṃsarga eva nāstīti pratipāditam, asati ca (Pp_113) saṃsarge tadā kutaḥ saṃsṛjyamānādikam? tatra vartamānasaṃsargakriyāsādhanakarmabhūtaṃ saṃsṛjyamānam, saṃsṛṣṭaṃ
T04canprasu:3645: sarvasayogi tu paśyati cakṣustatra na paśyati pratyayahīnam |
T04canprasu:3647: ālokasamāśrita paśyati cakṣu rūpa manorama citravicitram |
T04canprasu:3648: yena ca yogasamāśrita cakṣustena na paśyati cakṣu kadāci ||
T04canprasu:3649: te parinirvṛta laukika śūrā yehi svabhāvata jñātibhi dharmāḥ |
T04canprasu:3650: kāmaguṇairhi caranti asaṅgāḥ saṅga vivarjiya sattva vinenti ||
T04canprasu:3651: no pi ca sattva na jīviha kaści sattvahitaṃ ca karonti jinendrāḥ |
T04canprasu:3652: ............. sattvu na asti karonti ca artham ||
T04canprasu:3656: bhāvitu mārga pavartitu jñāna śūnyaka dharma nirātmaka sarvi |
T04canprasu:3658: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃsargaparīkṣā nāma caturdaśamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:3660: atrāha- vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, tanniṣpādakahetupratyayopādānāt |
T04canprasu:3661: iha yannāsti na tasya niṣpādakahetupratyayopādānamasti yathā khapuṣpasya |
T04canprasu:3662: upādīyante ca bījāvidyādayo hetupratyayā aṅkarasaṃskārādīnāṃ niṣpādakāḥ,
T04canprasu:3665: yadi bhāvānāṃ saṃskārāṅkurādīnāṃ svabhāvo 'sti, kimidānīṃ vidyamānānāṃ hetupratyayaiḥ
T04canprasu:3667: yathā vartamānībhūtānāṃ saṃskārāṅkurādīnāṃ bhūyoniṣpattaye avidyābījādīnāmupādānaṃ kriyate evamanyadapi tadutpattaye na kartavyaṃ
T04canprasu:3670: atha syāt- naivotpādātpūrvaṃ kasyacidbhāvasya svabhāvo 'sti yato 'sya
T04canprasu:3671: vidyamānatvādutpattivaiyarthyaṃ syāt, kiṃ tarhi utpādātpūrvamavidyamānasyaiva svabhāvasya hetupratyayān pratītya paścādutpādo bhavatīti |
T04canprasu:3674: atha syāt- iṣyata eva hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvātsvabhāvasya kṛtakatvam,
T04canprasu:3675: tasmātkṛtakasyaiva svabhāvasyābhyupagamāt kṛtakatvaprasaṅgo nāsmākaṃ bādhaka iti, etadapi na yuktamityāha-
T04canprasu:3676: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham |
T04canprasu:3678: iha hi svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti vyutpatteḥ, yaḥ kṛtakaḥ padārthaḥ, sa loke naiva
T04canprasu:3679: svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate, tadyathā apāmauṣpyaṃ dhātupiśācapratyayaniṣpāditaḥ karkeṭanādīnāṃ padmarāgādibhāvaśca |
T04canprasu:3680: yastu akṛtakaḥ sa svabhāvaḥ, tadyathā agnerauṣṇyaṃ jātānāṃ padmarāgādīnāṃ padmarāgādisvabhāvaśca
T04canprasu:3682: tadevamakṛtakaḥ svabhāva iti lokavyavahāre vyavasthite vayamidānīṃ brūmaḥ- yadetadauṣṇyaṃ tadaṣyagneḥ svabhāvo na bhavatīti gṛhyatāṃ kṛtakatvāt, iha maṇīndhanādityasamāgamādaraṇinirdharṣaṇādeśca agnerhetupratyayasāpekṣataiva upalabhyate |
T04canprasu:3686: nanu ca gopālāṅganājanaprasiddhametad agnerauṣṇyaṃ svabhāva iti |
T04canprasu:3687: kiṃ khalu asmābhiruktaṃ na prasiddhamiti? etattu vayaṃ brūmaḥ- nāyaṃ svabhāvo bhavitumarhati svabhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt |
T04canprasu:3688: avidyāviparyāsānugamāttu loko niḥsvabhāvameva bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvena pratipannaḥ |
T04canprasu:3691: sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭāḥ, evamavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā bālā niḥsvabhāvaṃ bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭā yathābhiniveśaṃ lakṣaṇamācakṣate agnerauṣṇyaṃ svalakṣaṇam |
T04canprasu:3694: bālajanaprasiddhayaiva ca bhagavatā tadevaiṣāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ svarūpamabhidharme vyavasthāpitam
T04canprasu:3696: yadā tu vigatāvidyātimirāvadātaprajñācakṣuṣāṃ darśanamapekṣyate, tadā vitimiraiḥ taimirikopalabdhakeśādarśanavat
T04canprasu:3702: na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna ca vastu na cālayaḥ |
T04canprasu:3705: svabhāvānutpattiṃ saṃdhāya mahāmate mayā sarvadharmā anutpannā ityuktāḥ ||
T04canprasu:3711: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca || 2 ||
T04canprasu:3712: iha svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti yasya padārthasya yadātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ tattasya svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate
T04canprasu:3713: kiṃ ca kasyātmīyaṃ yadyasyākṛtrimam, yattu kṛtrimaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā apāmauṣṇyam
T04canprasu:3714: yacca yasyāyattaṃ tadapi tadātmīyaṃ tadyathā sve bhṛtyāḥ, svāni dhanāni |
T04canprasu:3715: yattu yasya parāyattaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā tāvatkālikāyācitakamasvatantram |
T04canprasu:3716: yataścaivaṃ kṛtrimasya parasāpekṣasya ca svabhāvatvaṃ neṣṭam, ata eva auṣṇyamagnerhetupratyayapratibaddhatvātpūrvaṃmabhūtvā paścādutpādena kṛtakatvānna svabhāva iti yujyate |
T04canprasu:3717: yataścaitadevam, ato yadevāgneḥ kālatraye 'pyavyabhicāri nijaṃ rūpamakṛtrimam, pūrvamabhūtvā paścādyanna bhavati, yacca hetupratyayasāpekṣaṃ na bhavati apāmauṣṇyavat pārāvāravat
T04canprasu:3719: kiṃ khalu agneḥ taditthaṃ svarūpamasti? na tadasti, na cāpi nāsti svarūpataḥ |
T04canprasu:3721: evam, tathāpi śrotṛṇāmuttrāsaparivarjanārthaṃ saṃvṛtyā samāropya tadastīti brūmaḥ |
T04canprasu:3723: anakṣarasya dharmasya śrutiḥ kā deśanā ca kā |
T04canprasu:3727: ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate ||
T04canprasu:3728: yadi khalu tadadhyāropādbhavadbhirastītyucyate, kīdṛśaṃ tat? yā sā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā nāma, saiva tatsvarūpam |
T04canprasu:3739: vigatāvidyātimirāṇāmāryāṇāmadarśanayogena viṣayatvamupayāti, tadeva svarūpameṣāṃ svabhāva iti vyavasthāpyate |
T04canprasu:3741: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca |
T04canprasu:3743: sa caiṣa bhāvānāmanutpādātmakaḥ svabhāva akiṃcittvena abhāvamātratvādasvabhāva eveti kṛtvā nāsti bhāvasvabhāva iti vijñeyam |
T04canprasu:3745: bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānati sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate |
T04canprasu:3746: yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ spṛśate samādhim ||
T04canprasu:3748: atrāha- yadyapi svabhāvo nāsti bhāvānām, tathāpi parabhāvastāvadasti,
T04canprasu:3749: tadapratiṣedhāt sati ca parabhāve svabhāvo 'pi bhaviṣyati |
T04canprasu:3754: iha svabhāva eva hi loke kaścitsvabhāvāntarāpekṣayā para iti vyapadiśyate
T04canprasu:3755: | yadi hi agnerauṣṇyaṃ svabhāvaḥ syāt, dravasvabhāvasalilasāpekṣayā parabhāva iti vyapadiśyeta
T04canprasu:3756: yadā tu mumukṣubhirvicāryamāṇasya kasyacitsvabhāva eva nāsti, tadā kutaḥ paratvaṃ syāt? parabhāvācca svabhāvo 'pi nāsti iti siddham || 3 ||
T04canprasu:3757: atrāha- yadyapi svabhāvaparabhāvau na staḥ, tathāpi bhāvastāvadasti,
T04canprasu:3759: sa ca bhāvo bhavan svabhāvo vā bhavet, parabhāvo vā |
T04canprasu:3763: svabhāve parabhāve vā sati bhāvo hi sidhyati || 4 ||
T04canprasu:3764: bhāvo hi parikalpyamānaḥ svabhāvo vā bhavet, parabhāvo vā |
T04canprasu:3765: tau ca pūrvoktavidhinā na staḥ, iti tayorabhāvādbhāvo 'pi nāstītyavadhāryatām ||
T04canprasu:3766: atrāha- yadyapi bhavatā bhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ, tathāpyabhāvo 'sti,
T04canprasu:3775: iha hi yadi bhāvo nāma kaścidabhaviṣyat, syāttasyānyathābhāvādabhāvaḥ |
T04canprasu:3776: ghaṭādayo hi vartamānāvasthāyāḥ pracyutāḥ santaḥ anyathābhāvamāpannāḥ abhāvadhvanivācyā bhavanti loke |
T04canprasu:3781: svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca |
T04canprasu:3782: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane || 6 ||
T04canprasu:3783: ye hi tathāgatapravacanāviparītavyākhyānābhimānitayā pṛthivyāḥ kāṭhinyaṃ svabhāvaḥ, vedanāyā viṣayānubhavaḥ, vijñānasya viṣayaprativijñaptiḥ svabhāvaḥ, ityevaṃ svabhāvaṃ bhāvānāṃ varṇayanti, anyadvijñānam,
T04canprasu:3784: anyadrūpam, anyaiva ca vedanā, ityevaṃ parabhāvaṃ varṇayanti,
T04canprasu:3785: vartamānāvasthaṃ ca vijñānādikaṃ bhāvatvena ye varṇayanti, vijñānādikameva ca atītatāmāpannamabhāva iti, na te paramagambhīrasya pratītyasamutpādasya tattvaṃ varṇayanti |
T04canprasu:3789: ata eva buddhānāmeva bhagavatāṃ vacanaṃ pramāṇamityupavarṇayanti vicakṣaṇāḥ,
T04canprasu:3791: ata eva ca āptebhyaḥ prahīṇāśeṣadoṣebhya āgatatvāt, āgamayatīti samantāt tattvaṃ gamayatīti vā, āmimukhyādgamanādvā tadāśrayeṇa lokasya nirvāṇagamanāt saṃbuddhavacanasyaiva āgamatvaṃ
T04canprasu:3800: yadbhūyasā kātyāyana ayaṃ loko 'stitāṃ vā abhiniviṣṭo nāstitāṃ ca |
T04canprasu:3812: tena bhagavatā bhāvābhāvavibhāvinā yasmādastitvaṃca nāstitvaṃ ca ubhayametat pratiṣiddham, tasmānna yuktaṃ bhāvābhāvadarśanaṃ
T04canprasu:3819: iyamucyate kāśyapa madhyamāṃ pratipad bhūtapratyavekṣā iti ||
T04canprasu:3821: astīti nāstīti ubhe 'pi antā śuddhī aśuddhīti ime 'pi antā |
T04canprasu:3822: tasmādubhe anta vivarjayitvā madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti paṇḍitaḥ ||
T04canprasu:3823: astīti nāstīti vivāda eṣaḥ śuddhī aśuddhīti ayaṃ vivādaḥ |
T04canprasu:3824: vivādaprāptyā na duḥkhaṃ praśāmyati avivādaprāptyā ca duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate || iti |
T04canprasu:3825: atrāha- yadi punarevamagnyādīnāṃ svabhāvata evāstitvaṃ syāt, ko doṣaḥ syāt? uktadoṣaḥ-
T04canprasu:3829: yadi ayameṣāmagnyādīnāṃ svabhāvaḥ syāt, tasya vidyamānasya sato
T04canprasu:3832: yadi agnyāderbhāvasya prakṛtyā svabhāvato 'stitvam, tadā asya svabhāvasya
T04canprasu:3836: yadi eṣāmagnyādīnāmiyameva prakṛtiḥ syāt, svabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā prakṛteravikāriṇītvānna kadācitpunaranyathābhāva upapadyeta |
T04canprasu:3838: evamagnyādīnāmapi prakṛtyā vidyamānānāṃ punaranyathātvaṃ na syāt |
T04canprasu:3841: atrāha- yadi prakṛtyā vidyamānasyānyathātvāsaṃbhavādanyathātvasya ca upalabhyamānatvāt prakṛtireṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ nāstītyucyate, nanu ca evamapi-
T04canprasu:3843: kasya idānīṃ prakṛtyā svarūpeṇāvidyamānasya khapuṣpasyeva anyathātvaṃ
T04canprasu:3845: anyathātvasya ca darśanāt, astyeva svabhāva iti |
T04canprasu:3847: yadi tāvakena matena prakṛtyā svabhāvena asaṃvidyamānasya anyathātvābhāvād anyathātvasya ca darśanātprakṛtirityucyate, evamapi-
T04canprasu:3849: kasyedānīṃ prakṛtyā svabhāvena vidyamānasya vartamānasyaiva anyathātvaṃ
T04canprasu:3850: bhaviṣyati? tasmāt prakṛtyā vidyamānasya anyathātvaṃ nāstīti sarvathā
T04canprasu:3853: yaccāpyuktam- anyathātvasya darśanānnāsti prakṛtiriti, tadapi paraprasiddhayā anyathātvadarśanamadhikṛtyoktam, na tvasmābhiḥ kadācidapi
T04canprasu:3855: tadevamatyantataḥ prakṛtāvasaṃvidyamānāyāṃ sarvadharmeṣu asaṃvidyamāneṣu asvabhāveṣu tadanyathātve ca asaṃvidyamāne yo hi idānīmastitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ parikalpayati, tasya evaṃ parikalpayato niyatameva-
T04canprasu:3862: asti yaddhi svabhāvena na tannāstīti śāśvatam |
T04canprasu:3864: yat svabhāvena astītyucyate, svabhāvasyānapāyitvānna tat kadācidapi
T04canprasu:3866: pūrvaṃ ca vartamānāvasthāyāṃ bhāvasvarūpamabhyupetya idānīṃ tadvinaṣṭatvānnāstiti paścādabhyupagacchataḥ ucchedadarśanaṃ prasajyate |
T04canprasu:3867: yasya tu bhāvasvabhāva eva nopapadyate, na tasya śāśvatocchedadarśanaprasaṅgaḥ, bhāvasvabhāvānupalambhāt
T04canprasu:3868: nanu ca bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo nāstītyabhyupagacchato mā
T04canprasu:3872: yo hi pūrvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvamabhyupetya paścāt tannivṛttimālambate, tasya pūrvopalabdhasvabhāvāpavādāt syādabhāvadarśanam |
T04canprasu:3873: yastu taimirikopalabdhakeśeṣviva vitaimiriko na kiṃcidupalabhate, sa nāstīti bruvan kiṃcinnāstīti brūyāt pratiṣedhyābhāvāt |
T04canprasu:3874: viparyastānāṃ tu mithyābhiniveśanivṛttyarthamataimirikā iva vayaṃ brūmaḥ- na santi sarvabhāvāḥ iti |
T04canprasu:3877: yo hi bhagavan pūrvaṃ rāgadveṣamohabhāvābhyupagamaṃ kṛtvā paścānna santi rāgadveṣamohabhāvā iti bravīti, sa bhagavan vai nāstiko bhavati |
T04canprasu:3880: saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanasya ca paratantravastumātrasadbhāvānnāstitvadarśanaṃ pariharati, tasya parikalpitasyāvidyamānatvāt paratantrasya ca vidyamānatvād astitvanāstitvadarśanadvayasyāpi upanipātāt kuto 'ntadvayaparihāraḥ?
T04canprasu:3890: tathāvidhavineyajanabodhānurodhāttu paramārthadarśanasya upāyabhūtatvāt neyārthatvena bhagavatā mahākaruṇāparatantratayā vijñānādivādo deśitaḥ sāṃmitīyapudgalavādavat, na nītārthaḥ iti vijñeyam |
T04canprasu:3893: yasmin punaḥ pudgala sattva pūruṣo neyārthato jānati sarvadharmān ||
T04canprasu:3895: bhāvābhāvadarśanadvayaprasaṅgo yāvat tāvatsaṃsāra ityavetya mumukṣubhiretaddarśanadvayanirāsena sadbhirmadhyamā pratipad bhāvanīyā yathāvaditi |
T04canprasu:3897: bhāva abhāva vibhāvayi jñānaṃ sarvi acintiya sarvi abhūtaṃ |
T04canprasu:3898: ye puna cittavaśānuga bālāḥ te dukhitā bhavakoṭiśateṣu ||
T04canprasu:3899: bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānatī sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate |
T04canprasu:3900: yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ spṛśate samādhim || iti |
T04canprasu:3902: smarāmyahaṃ pūrvamatīta adhvani acintiye kalpi narāṇamuttamaḥ |
T04canprasu:3904: sa jātamātro gagane sthihitvā sarvāṇa dharmāṇabhāva deśayi |
T04canprasu:3905: tadānurūpaṃ kṛta nāmadheyaṃ śabdena sarvaṃ trisahasra vijñayī ||
T04canprasu:3906: devāpi sarve pramumocu śabdaṃ abhāvanāmeti jino bhaviṣyati |
T04canprasu:3907: yo jātamātraḥ pada sapta prakraman abhāva dharmāṇa samaṃ prakāśayī ||
T04canprasu:3908: buddho yadā bheṣyati dharmarājaḥ sarvāṇa dharmāṇa prakāśako muniḥ |
T04canprasu:3910: yāvanti śabdāstahi lokadhātau sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ |
T04canprasu:3911: tāvanti kho tasya tathāgatasya ravu niścarī lokavināyakasya || iti |
T04canprasu:3913: na vidyate sattā svabhāvaḥ sarvabhāvānāmityabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogeneti prajñāpāramitāpāṭhāt bhāvasvabhāvasyānupapatteḥ |
T04canprasu:3914: abhāva dharmāṇa ravo bhaviṣyati ityādinā sūtrārtho 'vagantavyaḥ ||
T04canprasu:3915: yāvanti śabdāstahi lokadhātau sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ |
T04canprasu:3918: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau svabhāvaparīkṣā nāma pañcadaśamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:3920: atrāha- vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, saṃsārasadbhāvāt |
T04canprasu:3921: iha saṃsaraṇaṃ saṃsṛtiḥ gatergatyantaragamanaṃ saṃsāra ityucyate |
T04canprasu:3922: yadi bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo na syāt, kasya gatergatyantaragamanaṃ saṃsāraḥ syāt? na hi avidyamānānāṃ
T04canprasu:3924: tasmāt saṃsārasadbhāvāt vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti |
T04canprasu:3926: syādbhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, yadi saṃsāra eva bhavet |
T04canprasu:3928: iha yadi saṃsāraḥ syāt, sa niyataṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ vā bhavet sattvasya vā? kiṃ cātaḥ? ubhayathā ca doṣa ityāha-
T04canprasu:3929: saṃskārāḥ saṃsaranti cenna nityāḥ saṃsaranti te |
T04canprasu:3930: saṃsaranti ca nānityāḥ sattve 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ || 1 ||
T04canprasu:3931: tatra yadi saṃskārāḥ saṃsarantīti parikalpyate, kiṃ te nityāḥ saṃsaranti uta anityāḥ? tatra na nityāḥ saṃsaranti niṣkriyatvāt, anityānāṃ ca ghaṭādīnāṃ sakriyatvopalambhāt |
T04canprasu:3932: atha anityāḥ, ye hi akriyāḥ, te utpādasamanantarameva vinaṣṭāḥ |
T04canprasu:3936: athāpi syāt- anityā eva santo hetuphalasaṃbandhaparaṃparayā avicchinnakramāḥ saṃtānena ca pravartamānāḥ saṃskārāḥ saṃsarantīti |
T04canprasu:3938: kutaḥ? yat tāvadutpadyate kāryam, tasya saṃsāro nāsti, kutaścidanāgamanāt kvaciccāgamanāt
T04canprasu:3939: yacca kāraṇaṃ naṣṭam, tasyāpi saṃsāro nāsti, kutaścidanāgamanāt kvaciccāgamanāt |
T04canprasu:3941: uttarasmin kṣaṇe utpanne pūrvaḥ saṃsaratīti cet, yadi pūrvottarayoḥ kṣaṇayorekatvaṃ syāt, syādetadevam |
T04canprasu:3944: kiṃ ca ekatve sati pūrvottarakṣaṇavācyataiva na syāt |
T04canprasu:3945: na hi eko devadattaḥ ekadā pūrvaścottaraśceti vyapadiśyate |
T04canprasu:3946: evamihāpi ekatvāt pūrvottarakṣaṇavyapadeśa eva na syāt |
T04canprasu:3947: api ca pūrvakṣaṇo naṣṭa iti na syāduttarakṣaṇavadavyatiriktatvāt |
T04canprasu:3950: atha anyatve sati saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt, evaṃ sati arhatāmapi saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:3955: syādanaṣṭānnaśyamānādvā? tatra yadi naṣṭādiṣyate, vahnidagdhādapi bījādaṅkurodayaḥ syāt, tataśca nirhetukaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:3956: atha anaṣṭāt, evamapi avikṛte 'pi bīje 'ṅkurodayaḥ syāt, kāryakāraṇayośca yaugapadyaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:3962: bhaviṣyati? yadā ca pūrvottarakṣaṇavyavasthā kāryakāraṇavyavasthā ca nāsti, tadā saṃtāno 'pi nāsti, tadabhāvānnāsti bhavatāṃ saṃsāra iti anityānāmapi saṃskārāṇāṃ nāsti saṃsāra iti atraike varṇayanti- satyaṃ saṃskārā na saṃsaranti utpattividhuratvāt, kiṃ tarhi sattvaḥ saṃsaratīti
T04canprasu:3965: sattvaḥ saṃsaratītyucyamāne kimasau nityaḥ saṃsarati, uta anityaḥ, iti vicāryamāṇe ya eva saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsaraṇānupapattikramaḥ, sa samatvātsattve 'pi samo nipatati |
T04canprasu:3967: atrāha- naiva hi sattvasaṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsārānupapattikramaḥ samo bhavitumarhati, yasmādiha saṃskārāṇāṃ nityānityabhūtānāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ nāstītyuktam |
T04canprasu:3974: yadi pudgalo nāma kaścit syāt, sa saṃsaret |
T04canprasu:3986: ityevaṃ pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati pūrvoditena nyāyena |
T04canprasu:3987: yaścedānīṃ skandhāyatanadhātuṣvevaṃ vicāryamāṇaḥ pañcadhā na saṃbhavati, sa kathamavidyamānaḥ
T04canprasu:3988: saṃsariṣyatīti? evamātmano 'pi nāsti saṃsāraḥ, vandhyāsutasyeva avidyamānatvāt || 2 ||
T04canprasu:3993: bhavatu kāmamātmanaḥ saṃsāraḥ, yadi anupādānasya sato 'sya saṃsāro yuktaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:3994: kathaṃ punarasya anupādānatā prasajyata iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:3996: iha hi manuṣyopādānāddevopādānaṃ gacchan parityajya vā manuṣyopādānaṃ devopādānaṃ gacchedaparityajya vā? yadi tāvatparityajya gacchatītyucyate,
T04canprasu:3997: tadā pūrvopādānasya parityāgāduttarasya cānupādānāttadantarāle vibhavaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:4001: yaśca anupādāno nirañjano 'vyakto nirhetukaḥ, kaḥ saḥ? na kaścit saḥ |
T04canprasu:4003: tasmiṃścāsati tadabhāvādeva upādānamapi nirupādātṛkaṃ nāstīti kiṃ saṃsariṣyati? nāstyeva tat, yatsaṃsariṣyatītyarthaḥ |
T04canprasu:4010: pūrvasyāparityāgāduttarasya ca grahaṇād yasmādekasyātmano dvayātmakatā syāt |
T04canprasu:4013: atha pūrvottarayorbhavayormadhye āntarābhavikaskandhasaṃbhavāt, taiśca sopādānatvāt sopādānaṃ saṃsarato 'pi na vibhavatāprasaṅga iti |
T04canprasu:4017: kimekadeśena pūrvopādānaṃ tyajate ekadeśenāntarābhavopādānaṃ saṃcarati, atha sarvātmanā? tatra yadi avayaveneti parikalpyate, tadā dvayātmakatāprasaṅgādityuktadoṣaḥ |
T04canprasu:4019: sarvātmanā, evamapi sa eva vibhavatāprasaṅga āpadyate |
T04canprasu:4020: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ yadantarābhavasaṃcāre 'tisāmīpyāt sūkṣmaṃ kālamanupādānaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:4021: na ca sarvātmanā ekasya padārthasya abhinnapadārthasya viṣaye yugapat tyāgopādāne dṛṣṭe |
T04canprasu:4022: na hi ekasya devadattasya sarvātmanā gṛhādgṛhaṃ saṃcarataḥ ekadā tyāgopādānakriye dve saṃbhavataḥ
T04canprasu:4023: atha ekena pādena ekasya parityāgādaparasya copādānād yugapattyāgopādāne parikalpyete, nanu evaṃ sati pādadvayavad dvayātmakatā ātmanaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:4025: tasmād yaugapadyenāpi tyāgopādāne na saṃbhavataḥ ityaparihāra evāyam |
T04canprasu:4026: tasmādantarābhavopādāne 'pi sa eva doṣaprasaṅga iti sarvathā ātmano 'pi
T04canprasu:4028: yadā ca saṃskārāṇāmātmanaśca saṃsāro nāsti, tadā nāstyeva saṃsāra iti sthitam || 3 ||
T04canprasu:4030: iha yo nāsti, na tasya pratidvandvī vidyate, tadyathā vandhyāsūnoriti |
T04canprasu:4039: yadi nirvāṇaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt, tat parikalpyamānaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nityānāṃ vā parikalpyeta anityānāṃ vā? tatra nityānāmavikāriṇāṃ kiṃ nirvāṇaṃ
T04canprasu:4040: kuryāt? anityānāmapi asaṃvidyamānānāṃ kiṃ nirvāṇaṃ kuryāditi sarvaṃ
T04canprasu:4043: atha sattvasya nirvāṇaṃ parikalpyate, tadapi nityasya vā anityasya vā pūrvavannopapadyate
T04canprasu:4044: atha nityānityatvenāvācyasya parikalpyate, nanvevaṃ sati nirvāṇe
T04canprasu:4048: na ca nirvāṇe upādānamastīti kuto 'sya avācyatā?
T04canprasu:4049: bhavatu vā tattvānyatvāvācyatā ātmanaḥ, api tu kimasau nirvāṇe 'sti uta
T04canprasu:4050: nāsti? yadi asti, tadā mokṣe 'pi tasya sadbhāvānnityatā syāt |
T04canprasu:4053: tataśca tattvānyatvāvācyatāvannityānityatvenāpi ātmanaḥ avaktavyateti na syāt |
T04canprasu:4054: atha nirvāṇe 'pi ātmanaḥ astitvanāstitvenāvācyataiva iṣyate, evamapi kimasau vijñeyaḥ, atha
T04canprasu:4055: yadi vijñeyaḥ, na tarhi nirupādāno 'sāvātmā nirvāṇe vijñeyatvāt saṃsāra
T04canprasu:4057: atha na vijñāyate, tatrāsau avijñeyasvarūpatvāt khapuṣpavannāstyeveti kuto 'sya avācyatā? tadevaṃ nirvāṇamapi nāsti |
T04canprasu:4061: buddhadharmā āyuṣman subhūte māyopamāḥ svapnopamā ityādi |
T04canprasu:4062: saceta kulaputra nirvāṇādapyadhikataro 'nyo dharmo 'bhaviṣyat, tamapyahaṃ māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi ||
T04canprasu:4065: mana evamotarati yena vidu manasaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭhu ayam ||
T04canprasu:4067: nirodhasatyaṃ supinaṃ yathaiva svapnasvabhāvāmatha nirvṛtiṃ ca |
