T04canprasu:4068: yeneha vācottari bodhisattvo ayaṃ khu so vuccati vācasaṃvaraḥ ||
T04canprasu:4069: atrāha- yadyapi tvayā saṃsāranirvāṇe pratiṣiddhe, tathāpi bandhamokṣau vidyete |
T04canprasu:4071: tasmād bandhamokṣasadbhāvād vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti |
T04canprasu:4076: saṃskārāḥ pūrvavatsattvo badhyate na na mucyate || 5 ||
T04canprasu:4077: iha ya ime rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ baddhānāmasvatantrīkaraṇe bandhanamiti
T04canprasu:4078: vyapadiśyate, yaiśca baddhāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ traidhātukaṃ nātikramantīti vyavasthāpyate, tadetadrāgādikaṃ bandhanatvena parikalpyamānamudayavyayadharmiṇāṃ tāvat kṣaṇikānāṃ
T04canprasu:4082: yathā ca pūrvoktavidhinā saṃskārāṇāṃ bandhamokṣau na saṃbhavataḥ, evaṃ pūrvavadeva sattvo 'pi na badhyate nāpi
T04canprasu:4084: atrāha- yadyapi saṃskārāṇāṃ sattvasya vā bandho nāsti, tathāpi rāgādikamupādānākhyaṃ bandhanabhūtamasti, tatsadbhāvādbandho 'pi
T04canprasu:4089: yathā ca na badhnāti, tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:4092: tatra vidyamānopādānaḥ sopādānaḥ, sa tāvadbhāvo na badhyate |
T04canprasu:4093: yo hi sopādānaḥ, sa baddha eva |
T04canprasu:4095: yaścāpi anupādānaḥ bandhanarahitaḥ, asāvapi bandhanarahitatvāt tathāgatavanna badhyate
T04canprasu:4097: yaścaivaṃ nirūpyamāṇaḥ sopādāno nirupādāno vā na badhyate, sa idānīṃ kimavastho badhyatām? nāstyevāsau kācidaparā asyāvasthā, yasyāṃ badhyetetyabhiprāyaḥ |
T04canprasu:4098: yadā caivaṃ nirūpyamāṇaṃ bandhanaṃ na kaṃcidapi badhnāti, tadā kaṃcidapyabadhnata upādānasya rāgādeḥ kuto bandhanatvamiti |
T04canprasu:4102: na cāsti tat iha bandhyavyatirekeṇa bandhanaṃ nigaḍādikaṃ pūrvasiddhaṃ sat bandhyaṃ devadattaṃ badhnātīti dṛṣṭam |
T04canprasu:4103: evaṃ yadi bandhyebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ pudgalādvā bandhyātpūrvaṃ rāgādikaṃ bandhanaṃ siddhaṃ syāt, tena pūrvasiddhena bandhanaṃ syāt saṃskārāṇāṃ pudgalasya vā |
T04canprasu:4105: pūrvasiddhasya ca bandhanasya paścād bandhyena saha saṃbandhasya niṣprayojanatvāt |
T04canprasu:4106: bandhyasya ca bandhanātpṛthaksiddhasya pūvabandhanāpekṣāniṣprayojanatvācca nāsti bandhyādbandhanasya pūrvasiddhiḥ |
T04canprasu:4108: na ca kaṃcidapyabadhnato bandhanatvaṃ yuktamiti nāsti
T04canprasu:4114: baddho na badhyate tāvadabaddho naiva badhyate |
T04canprasu:4117: atrāha- yadyapi bhavatā bandhanaṃ pratiṣiddham, tathāpi saṃsāracārakāgārāvabaddhānāmatrāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahākāruṇikaistathāgataiḥ śīlasamādhiprajñātmakarakandhatrayopadeśo yadarthamuktaḥ, sa tāvanmokṣo 'sti |
T04canprasu:4122: ihāyaṃ mokṣaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ baddhasya vā parikalpyeta abaddhasya vā? kicātaḥ? ubhayathā ca na yujyata ityāha-
T04canprasu:4123: baddho na mucyate tāvadabaddho naiva mucyate |
T04canprasu:4125: tatra baddhasya mokṣo na saṃbhavati baddhatvāt |
T04canprasu:4126: atha baddhasya paścādupāyena mokṣa iti kṛtvā baddha eva mucyate iti syāt, na tarhi baddho
T04canprasu:4127: mucyata iti vaktavyam, kiṃ tarhi mokṣyata iti |
T04canprasu:4128: vartamānasāmīpyādeva mucyata iti cet, yadi kadācidapi mokṣaḥ saṃbhavet, tadā samīpe syāt yadā tu kasyāṃcidapyavasthāyāṃ mokṣe iṣyamāṇe baddhasya mokṣāsaṃbhavena mokṣābhāvaḥ pratipipādayiṣita tadā kuto vartamānasamīpatā? evaṃ tāvad baddho na mucyate iti sthitam ||
T04canprasu:4132: muktānāṃ cārhatāṃ punarapi mokṣāpekṣatvād baddhataiva syāt,
T04canprasu:4134: atha syāt- abaddhasya mokṣāsaṃbhavād baddha eva mucyate iti, evaṃ sati baddhe mucyamāne parikalpyamāne baddhatvānmucyamānatvācca yaugapadyena bandhamokṣaṇe syātām |
T04canprasu:4137: tasmānmokṣo 'pi nāsti, tadabhāvācca bandhanamapi nāstīti siddham ||
T04canprasu:4138: atrāha- yadi bhavataiva saṃsāranirvāṇe niṣiddhe, bandhamokṣau ca pratiṣiddhau, ya eṣa saṃsāravinirmumukṣūṇāmavidyāsāndrāndhakāravividhakudarśanakaṭhinātidīrghalatāsaṃchāditasatpathaṃ jātyādivividhā paryantavyasanāniṣṭataravipulavipākaphaladānuśayaviṣavṛkṣasaṃkulaṃ viṃśatiśikharasamunnatatarātipṛthusatkāyadṛṣṭimahāśailapariveṣṭitasarvadiṅmukhaṃ viṣayasukhāśātipicchilavipulamahātaṭavivaravāhitṛṣṇānadīmahāparikhaṃ saṃsāramahāṭavīkāntāraṃ nistitīrṣūṇāṃ paramāśvāsakaraḥ kuśalo mahādharmacchandaḥ, kadā nu khalvahamanupādāno nirvāsyāmi, kadā nu me
T04canprasu:4139: nirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, nanu sa vyarthaka eva saṃjāyate,
T04canprasu:4140: yaścāpyevamutpāditakuśalāmalavipuladharmacchandānāṃ kalyāṇamitrasaṃsevādānaśīlaśrutacintābhāvanādikramo nirvāṇaprāptaye, nanu tamyāpi vaiyarthyaṃ syāditi ucyate |
T04canprasu:4141: yo hyevaṃ niḥsvabhāveṣu sarvabhāveṣu pratibimbamarīcikājalālātacakrasvapnamāyendrajālasadṛśeṣu ātmātmīyasvabhāvarahiteṣu viparyāsamātrānugamāt tāmeva satkāyadṛṣṭim ahaṃ mametyahaṃkāramamakārasamudācāraparigraheṇotpādya manyate-
T04canprasu:4144: ahamanupādānaḥ sarvopādānarahito nirvāsyāmi, mama caivaṃ pratipannasya
T04canprasu:4145: nirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, evaṃ yeṣāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ grāho bhavati, nanu tadeva ahaṃkāramamakārākhyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭayupādānameṣāṃ mahāgraho bhavati, na caivaṃvidhamahāgrahābhiniviṣṭānāṃ śāntiḥ saṃbhāvyate niravaśeṣagrahaprahāṇenaiva mokṣāvāptaye yāvadahaṃmameti grāhābhiniveśaḥ,
T04canprasu:4146: yāvacca nirvāṇaṃ nāma astīti grāhābhiniveśaḥ, yāvacca
T04canprasu:4147: upādānatyāgābhiniveśaḥ, tāvanniyatameva anupāyena nirvāṇaṃ prārthayatāṃ sarva evārambhā vyarthā bhavanti |
T04canprasu:4153: bhagavantametadavocat- deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti
T04canprasu:4156: tat kasya hetoḥ? yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati, tasya karmābhisaṃskārā bhavanti |
T04canprasu:4157: bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ atyantāparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca upalabhate |
T04canprasu:4160: sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā |
T04canprasu:4161: saḥ asatsamāropeṇa vikalpayati- ahaṃ raktaḥ, ahaṃ dviṣṭaḥ,
T04canprasu:4163: tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ
T04canprasu:4168: sa vikalpayati- ime kuśalā dharmāḥ, ime 'kuśalā dharmāḥ, ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ, ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ, duḥkhaṃ parijñātavyam, samudayaḥ prahātavyaḥ, nirodhaḥ
T04canprasu:4171: sarvasaṃskārāḥ, ādīptāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ, yannvahaṃ sarvasaṃskārebhyaḥ palāyeyam |
T04canprasu:4172: tasya evamavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ |
T04canprasu:4176: sa ebhyo dharmebhya ārtīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate
T04canprasu:4185: sa eko rahogataḥ tān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate |
T04canprasu:4186: tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate
T04canprasu:4187: | tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ pratilīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate,
T04canprasu:4195: tasya kāṅkṣā ca vicikitsā ca bhavati buddhabodhau |
T04canprasu:4197: tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatiṃ cotpādayati ||
T04canprasu:4198: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- kathaṃ punarbhagavaṃścatvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni? bhagavānāha- yena mañjuśrīranutpannāḥ sarvasaṃskārā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena duḥkhaṃ parijñātam yena asamutthitāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tasya samudayaḥ prahīṇaḥ |
T04canprasu:4199: yena atyantaparinirvṛtāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ |
T04canprasu:4200: yena atyantaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena mārgo bhāvitaḥ |
T04canprasu:4201: yena mañjuśrīrevaṃ catvāri āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni, sa na kalpayati na vikalpayati- ime kuśalā dharmāḥ, ime 'kuśalā dharmāḥ |
T04canprasu:4202: ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ, ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ |
T04canprasu:4208: bālapṛthagjanāstu etān dharmān kalpayanto rajyanti ca dviṣanti ca muhyanti ca |
T04canprasu:4211: traidhātuke citta na sajjati, ajāta sarvatraidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati || iti vistaraḥ || 9 ||
T04canprasu:4214: yatra kastatra saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ kiṃ vikalpyate || 10 ||
T04canprasu:4215: yatra hi nāma paramārthasatye naivaṃ na nirvāṇasamāropaḥ na nirvāṇādhyāropaḥ saṃbhavati, anupalabhyamānatvāt, nāpi saṃsārāpakarṣaṇaṃ saṃsāraparikṣayo na saṃbhavati, kastatra saṃsāraḥ yo vikalpyate
T04canprasu:4216: kṣayārtham, kiṃ vā tatra nirvāṇaṃ yatprāpyarthaṃ vikalpyate? athavā |
T04canprasu:4217: yatra nirvāṇe kasyacit sattvasya saṃsārādapakarṣaṇamapanayanaṃ nirvāṇe ca samāropaṇaṃ prayatnavatāpi na śakyate kartuṃ
T04canprasu:4223: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samanvāhāraṃ samanvāharati sma, yanmāraḥ pāpīyānindrakīlabandhanabaddho dharaṇītalaprapatitaḥ utkrośati sma- gāḍhabandhanabaddho 'smi |
T04canprasu:4224: mañjuśrīrāha- asti pāpīyannetasmādbandhanādgāḍhataraṃ bandhanaṃ yena tvaṃ nityabaddho na punarbadhyase? tatpunaḥ katamat?
T04canprasu:4226: ato bandhanād gāḍhataraṃ bandhanaṃ na saṃvidyate |
T04canprasu:4232: atha khalu suyāmo devaputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- utsṛja mañjuśrīrmāraṃ pāpīyāṃsam
T04canprasu:4234: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto māraṃ pāpīyāṃsametadavocat- kenāsi pāpīyan baddho
T04canprasu:4235: yadātmānamutsṛjasi? āha- na jāne mañjuśrīḥ- kenāsmi baddhaḥ iti |
T04canprasu:4237: yathā tvaṃ pāpīyan abaddho baddhasaṃjñī, evameva sarvabālapṛthagjanā anitye nityasaṃjñinaḥ, duḥkhe 'duḥkha saṃjñinaḥ, aśubhe śubhasaṃjñinaḥ,
T04canprasu:4238: anātmani ātmasaṃjñinaḥ, arūpe rūpasaṃjñinaḥ, avedanāyāṃ vedanāsaṃjñinaḥ,
T04canprasu:4239: asaṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñinaḥ, asaṃskāre saṃskārasaṃjñinaḥ, avijñāne vijñānasaṃjñinaḥ |
T04canprasu:4240: api tu khalu punaḥ pāpīyan, yastvaṃ mokṣyase, kuto
T04canprasu:4243: mokṣyante, nate kutaścidvimokṣyante, anyatra yā asau asadbhūtasaṃjñā |
T04canprasu:4245: parijānanti, tāṃ parijñāya vimuktā ityucyante || iti ||
T04canprasu:4246: ata eva āgamād asadviparyāsakalpanāmātralatābandhanavicchedo vimokṣo nirvāṇamityucyate svapnopalabdhadahanajvālānirvāpaṇavat tadanilasalilairiti || 10 ||
T04canprasu:4247: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau bandhamokṣaparīkṣā nāma ṣoḍaśamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:4250: yadi iha saṃtānāvicchedakrameṇa janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā hetuphalabhāvapravṛttyā saṃskārāṇāmātmano vā saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt, syāttadānīṃ karmaphalasaṃbandhaḥ |
T04canprasu:4251: yathāvarṇite saṃsārābhāve tu utpattyanantaravināśitvāccittasya karmākṣepakāle ca vipākasyāsadbhāvāt karmaphalasaṃbandhābhāva eva syāt |
T04canprasu:4252: saṃsārasadbhāve tu sati iha kṛtasya karmaṇe janmāntare 'pi
T04canprasu:4253: vipākaphalasaṃbandhāt karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃbandho na virodhito bhavati |
T04canprasu:4255: kāni punastāni karmāṇi kiṃ vā tatphalamiti tatprabheda vivakṣayedamucyate-
T04canprasu:4257: maitraṃ sa dharmastadbījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca || 1 ||
T04canprasu:4260: cinoti upacinoti śubhamaśubhaṃ karma vipākadānasāmarthye niyamayatīti cetaḥ |
T04canprasu:4262: ātmānaṃ saṃyamayati viṣayeṣvasvatantrayati rāgādikleśavaśena pravṛttiṃ nivārayatītyātmasaṃyamakam
T04canprasu:4263: tadetadātmasaṃyamakaṃ kuśalaṃ cetaḥ prāṇātipātādiṣu pravṛttividhārakaṃ durgatigamanāddhārayatīti dharma ityucyate ||
T04canprasu:4266: tatra svalakṣaṇadhāraṇārthena sarve sāsravā anāsravāśca dharmā ityucyante |
T04canprasu:4268: dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete asmiṃlloke paratra ca ||
T04canprasu:4269: pāñcagatikasaṃsāragamanavidhāraṇārthena nirvāṇe dharma ityucyate, dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchatītyatra| iha tu kugatigamanavidhāraṇārthenaiva dharmaśabdo
T04canprasu:4271: kiṃ punarātmasaṃyamakamevaikaṃ cetaḥ dharma iti? netyāha |
T04canprasu:4272: kiṃ tarhi parānugrāhakaṃ ca maitraṃ ca yaccetaḥ, asāvapi dharmaḥ |
T04canprasu:4277: mitre bhavamaviruddhaṃ sattveṣu yaccetaḥ, tanmaitraṃ cetaḥ |
T04canprasu:4279: yaccaitat trividhaṃ ceto nirdiṣṭam, sa dharma ityucyate| viparyayādadharmo yojyaḥ ||
T04canprasu:4283: yattu sādhāraṇaṃ kṣityādi na tadbījaṃ kāraṇametat |
T04canprasu:4284: yathaitadevam, ihāpi iṣṭasya vipākasyābhinirvṛttau trividhaṃ ceto bhavati bījam |
T04canprasu:4286: kasmin punaḥ kāle bījasya phalaniṣpattirityāha- pretya ceha ca |
T04canprasu:4287: pretyeti adṛṣṭe janmani, iheti dṛṣṭe janmanītyarthaḥ |
T04canprasu:4289: evaṃ tāvat cittātmakamevaikaṃ dharmaṃ vyavasthāpya punarapi dvividhaṃ
T04canprasu:4293: paramaścāsau ṛṣiśceti paramarṣiḥ sarvākāratayā paramārthagamanāt śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhyo 'pi utkṛṣṭatvāt paramarṣiḥ saṃbuddho bhagavān |
T04canprasu:4294: tena paramarṣiṇā cetanā karma, cetayitvā ca karmetyuktaṃ sūtre ||
T04canprasu:4301: manodvāreṇaiva niṣṭhāgamanāt kāyavākpravṛttinirapekṣatvācca manovijñānasaṃprayuktaiva cetanā mānasaṃ karmetyucyate |
T04canprasu:4304: karmetyuktam, tatpunaḥ kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ ca veditavyam |
T04canprasu:4305: evaṃ ca evaṃ ca kāyavāgbhyāṃ pravartiṣye ityevaṃ cetasā saṃcintya yat kriyate,
T04canprasu:4311: etadapi trividhaṃ karma punarbhidyamānaṃ saptavidhaṃ saṃjāyate, ityevaṃ tasya karmaṇo bhagavatā bahuprakāro bhedo 'nuvarṇitaḥ |
T04canprasu:4316: cetanā ceti saptaite dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ smṛtāḥ || 5 ||
T04canprasu:4319: tatra kuśalākuśalā vā vāk sarvaiva viratyaviratilakṣaṇā vijñaptisamutthāpikā sāmānyena vāgiti gṛhyate |
T04canprasu:4320: evaṃ kuśalo 'kuśalo vā viratyaviratilakṣaṇo vijñaptisamutthāpako viṣpandaḥ sāmānyena gṛhyate || yathā caitadvijñapterdvidhā bhedaḥ, (Pp_134) evamavijñapterapi |
T04canprasu:4322: tatra aviratilakṣaṇā avijñaptayaḥ tadyathā adyaprabhṛti mayā prāṇinaṃ hatvā cauryaṃ kṛtvā jīvikā parikalpayitavyeti pāpakarmābhyupagamātprabhṛti tadakāriṇo 'pi
T04canprasu:4324: kaivartādīnāṃca jālādiparikarmakālātprabhṛti tadakāriṇāmapi yā avijñaptaya upajāyante, tā etā aviratilakṣaṇā avijñaptaya ityucyante |
T04canprasu:4325: yathā caitāstathā anyāḥ viratilakṣaṇāḥ kuśalasvabhāvā avijñaptayaḥ |
T04canprasu:4327: adyaprabhṛti prāṇātipātādibhyaḥ prativiramāmīti kāyavāgvijñaptiparisamāptikālakṣaṇātprabhṛti taduttarakālaṃ pramattādyavasthasyāpi yāḥ kuśalopacayasvabhāvā avijñaptaya upajāyante, tā etā viratilakṣaṇā avijñaptaya ityucyante |
T04canprasu:4328: etā rūpakriyāsvabhāvā api satyo vijñaptivat parānna vijñāpayantītyavijñaptayaḥ ||
T04canprasu:4337: yathā yathā hi tatkīrtau prāṇino hanyante, tathā tathā taddevakulādyupabhogāt tatkartṛṇāṃ saṃtāne paribhogānvayamapuṇyamapi jāyate, ityevamapuṇyaṃ ca tathāvidhaṃ bhavati ||
T04canprasu:4339: saṃkṣepeṇa etatsaptavidhaṃ karma bhavati- kuśalākuśalā vāk, kuśalākuśalo
T04canprasu:4342: ete ca sapta dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ karmatvenābhivyaktāḥ karmalakṣaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ || 5 ||
T04canprasu:4343: atraike paricodayanti- yadetat karma bahuvidhamuktam, tat kimā vipākakālādavatiṣṭhate, atha na tiṣṭhati utpattyanantaravināśitvāt? yadi
T04canprasu:4347: yadi utpannaṃ sat karma āvipākakālaṃ svarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhate iti parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:4348: tad iyantaṃ kālamasya nityatā āpadyate vināśarahitatvāt |
T04canprasu:4349: paścādvināśasadbhāvānna nityatvamiti cet, naitadevam, pūrvaṃ vināśarahitasya ākāśādivat paścādapi vināśena saṃbandhābhāvāt |
T04canprasu:4350: vināśarahitasya ca asaṃskṛtatvaprasaṅgāt, asaṃskṛtānāṃ ca vipākādarśanāt,
T04canprasu:4353: atha utpādānantaravināśitvameva karmaṇāmabhyupetam, nanu evaṃ sati-
T04canprasu:4354: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati |
T04canprasu:4355: abhāvībhūtaṃ sat karma avidyamānasvabhāvatvānnaiva phalaṃ janayiṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ || 6 ||
T04canprasu:4359: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati |
T04canprasu:4363: iha bījaṃ kṣaṇikamapi sat svajātīyabhāviphalaviśeṣaniṣpattisāmarthyaviśeṣayuktasyaiva saṃtānasya aṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrādyabhidhānasya hetubhāvamapyupagamya nirudhyate |
T04canprasu:4364: yaścāyamaṅkuraprabhṛtirbījātsaṃtānaḥ pravartate, tasmāt krameṇa sahakārikāraṇavaikalye sati svalpādapi hetorvipulaphalapracaya upajāyate |
T04canprasu:4365: ṛte bījāt vinā bījāt sa ca aṅkurādisaṃtānaḥ nābhipravartate |
T04canprasu:4366: tadevaṃ tadbhāve bhāvitvena tadabhāve ca abhāvitvena bījahetukatvamaṅkurādisaṃtānasya phalasyopadarśitaṃ bhavati || 7 ||
T04canprasu:4373: nirudhyeta, aṅkurādisaṃtānaśca pravarteta, tadā bījasyānirodhābhyupagamācchāśvatadarśanaṃ syāt, na caitadevam, ityato nāsti bījasya śāśvatocchedadarśanaprasaṅgaḥ || 8 ||
T04canprasu:4374: yathā ca bīje ayaṃ kramo 'nuvarṇitaḥ, evam-
T04canprasu:4377: tasmāt kuśalākuśalacetanāviśeṣasaṃprayuktāccittād yaḥ cittasaṃtānastaddhetukaḥ pravartate, tasmāt kuśalākuśalacetanāparibhāvitāccittasaṃtānāt sahakārikāraṇasaṃnidhānāvaikalye sati iṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ phalamupajāyate sugatidurgatiṣu |
T04canprasu:4378: ṛte tu taccitāt cittamantareṇa sa ca nābhipravartate ||
T04canprasu:4382: yadi arhaccaramacittamiva taddhetuphalapāraṃparyāvicchinnakramavartino bhāvinaścittasaṃtānasya hetubhāvamanupagamya kuśalaṃ cittaṃ nirudhyeta,
T04canprasu:4384: athāpi anāgatasaṃtānasya hetubhāvamupagamya svarūpādapracyutaṃ syāt, syāttadānīṃ karma śāśvatam
T04canprasu:4387: tadatra yathoditakarmaprabhedavyākhyāne daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā vyākhyātāḥ
T04canprasu:4390: phalaṃ kāmaguṇāḥ pañca dharmasya pretya ceha ca || 11 ||
T04canprasu:4391: ta ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmasya sādhanopāyā niṣpattihetubhūtā ityarthaḥ ||
T04canprasu:4392: kaḥ punarasau kuśalakarmapathavyatirikto dharmo nāma, yasyaite sādhanopāyatvena vyavasthāpyante? ucyate |
T04canprasu:4397: pariniṣṭhitarūpā ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmaśabdavācyā bhavanti, kriyamāṇarūpāstu kuśalakarmapathavācyā
T04canprasu:4398: | tadasya uktalakṣaṇasya ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā niṣpattau hetutvena vyavasthāpyante
T04canprasu:4399: kathaṃ punaratra prakrānte karmavibhāge daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā iti? ucyate-
T04canprasu:4401: ityādinā kāyikāsrayaḥ karmapathāḥ vācikāścatvāro vyākhyātāḥ| cetanā cetyanena abhidhyāvyāpādasamyagdṛṣṭayākhyāsrayo mānasā vyākhyātāḥ |
T04canprasu:4402: ityevaṃ daśāpi kuśalāḥ karmapathā atra vyākhyātāḥ |
T04canprasu:4403: te ca yathoditasya dharmasya niṣpattihetavo bhavanti |
T04canprasu:4404: asya ca dharmasya rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyalakṣaṇāḥ pañca kāmaguṇāḥ |
T04canprasu:4405: pretya ca adṛṣṭe paraloke ityarthaḥ, iha ceti ihaloke ityarthaḥ, phalamupabhujyate iti ||
T04canprasu:4406: evaṃ tāvadaikanikāyikairākṣepaparihāre varṇite sati, tān prati apare
T04canprasu:4410: yadi bījāṅkurasādharmyeṇa cittasaṃtāne śāśvatocchedadarśanadvayadoṣaprasaṅgaparihāraḥ syāt, tadā bahavaśca doṣāḥ
T04canprasu:4412: kathaṃ kṛtvā? yadi hi bījasaṃtānadṛṣṭāntena śālibījāt śālyaṅkurādisaṃtāna eva pravartate, na vijātīyaḥ, śālyaṅkurādisaṃtānācca śāliphalameva upajāyate, na bilvaphalam, bhinnajātīyatvāt, evamihāpi kuśalacittāt kuśalacittasaṃtāna eva syāt, samānajātīyatvāt, na
T04canprasu:4416: kāmarūpārūpyāvacarānāsravacittebhyaḥ sadṛśānāmeva cittānāṃ kāmarūpārūpyāvacarānāsravāṇāmutpādaḥ (Pp_137) syāt, na bhinnajātīyānām |
T04canprasu:4418: tataśca yo devaḥ sa deva eva syāt, yo manuṣyaḥ sa manuṣya eva syādityādi |
T04canprasu:4419: tataśca akuśalamapi kurvatāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ gatiyonivarṇabuddhīndriyabalarūpabhogādi vaicitryaṃ na syādapāyapatanaṃ ca |
T04canprasu:4421: evaṃ bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣā yasmādbījasaṃtānasādharmyakalpanāyāṃ prasajyante, tasmānnaiṣā kalpanā atropapadyate || 12 ||
T04canprasu:4422: imāṃ punaḥ pravakṣyāmi kalpanāṃ yātra yojyate |
T04canprasu:4427: iha kuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ sat utpādānantarameva nirudhyate, na ca tasminniruddhe phalābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ
T04canprasu:4429: tadā etasya karmaṇo 'vipraṇāśo nāma viprayukto dharmaḥ kartuḥ saṃtāne samupajāyate ṛṇapatrasthānīyaḥ
T04canprasu:4430: tadevaṃ patraṃ yathā avipraṇāśaḥ tathā veditavyaḥ |
T04canprasu:4431: yasya ca asau avipraṇāśākhyo dharma utpadyate, ṛṇamiva tatkarma veditavyam |
T04canprasu:4432: yathā ca ṛṇapatrāvasthānāt prayukte 'pi dhane dhanino na dhananāśo bhavati, saṃbadhyata eva sa kālāntareṇa pañcamena dhanaskandhena, tathā vinaṣṭe 'pi karmaṇi avipraṇāśākhyadharmāntarāvasthānāt tannimittakena phalena abhisaṃbadhyata eva kartā |
T04canprasu:4433: yathā ca ṛṇapatraṃ dāturdhanābhyāgamaṃ kṛtvā nirmuktaṃ sat punarapi vidyamānaṃ vā avidyamānaṃ vā na dhanābhyāgame samartham,
T04canprasu:4434: evamavipraṇāśo 'pi dattavipākaḥ san vidyamāno vā avidyamāno vā na śaknoti nirmuktapatravat kartuḥ punarapi vipākasaṃbandhaṃ kartum ||
T04canprasu:4438: yadi asau akuśalānāṃ karmaṇāmakuśalaḥ syāt, tadā kāmaṃ vītarāgāṇāṃ na syāt |
T04canprasu:4440: kuśalaḥ syāt, samucchinnakuśalamūlānāṃ sa na syāt |
T04canprasu:4443: prahāṇato na praheyo bhāvanāheya eva vā |
T04canprasu:4445: pārthagjanikāni karmāṇi darśanamārgeṇaiva prahīyante mā bhūdāryaḥ pṛthagjanakarmasamanvāgata iti |
T04canprasu:4446: avipraṇāśastu tatkarmaprahāṇe 'pi darśanamārgeṇa na prahīyate, kiṃ tu bhāvanāmārgeṇa vā tasyā prahāṇaṃ bhavati |
T04canprasu:4448: yataścaivamavipraṇāśaḥ karmavināśe 'pi na naśyati, karmaprahāṇe 'pi na
T04canprasu:4451: yadi punarapi asya avipraṇāśasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇena prahāṇātprahāṇataḥ prahāṇaṃ syāt karmaṇaśca saṃkrameṇa karmaṇo vināśena karmāntarasaṃmukhībhāvena vināśaḥ syāt, ko doṣaḥ syāditi? ucyate-
T04canprasu:4454: yadi darśanamārgeṇa pārthagjanikakarmavadavipraṇāśaḥ prahīyeta, tadā karmaṇo vināśa eva syāt
T04canprasu:4458: evaṃ karmavadhādayo doṣāḥ prasajyante prahāṇataḥ praheyatvābhyupagame sati avipraṇāśasya |
T04canprasu:4464: teṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva sabhāgānāṃ ca viṣabhāgānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ kāmarūpārūpyadhātupratisaṃdhiṣu sarvakarmāpamardanaḥ eka eva avipraṇāśa utpadyate |
T04canprasu:4465: sa cāpi sadhātūnāṃ samānadhātukānāmeva utpadyate na viṣabhāgadhātukānām || 17 ||
T04canprasu:4466: karmaṇaḥ karmaṇo dṛṣṭe dharma utpadyate tu saḥ |
T04canprasu:4468: sa cāyamavipraṇāśākhyo dharmaḥ sarvasyaiva karmaṇaḥ cetanācetayitvāsvabhāvasya sāsravānāsravabhedena vā dviprakārabhinnasya dṛṣṭe dharme ihaiva janmani karmaṇaḥ karmaṇaḥ ekaiko 'vipraṇāśa utpadyate
T04canprasu:4469: | sa cāyamavipraṇāśo vipakke 'pi vipāke nāvaśyaṃ nirudhyate,
T04canprasu:4470: nirbhuktapatravacca vidyamāno 'pi san na śaknoti punarapi vipaktum || 18
T04canprasu:4472: anāsravaṃ sāsravaṃ ca vibhāgaṃ tatra lakṣayet || 19 ||
T04canprasu:4479: sa cāyaṃ sāsravāṇāṃ sāsravaḥ, anāsravāṇāmanāsravaḥ ityevaṃ vibhāgaṃ
T04canprasu:4482: śūnyatā ca na cocchedaḥ saṃsāraśca na śāśvatam |
T04canprasu:4484: yasmāt karma kṛtaṃ sat nirudhyate, na svabhāvenāvatiṣṭhate, tasmāt karmaṇaḥ svabhāvenāvasthānāt śūnyatā copapadyate |
T04canprasu:4488: avipraṇāśadharmasadbhāvāt (Pp_139) bījasaṃtānasādharmyaparikalpanābhāvācca nānāgatijātiyonidhātubhedabhinnaśca pāñcagatikaḥ saṃsāro vicitraḥ siddho
T04canprasu:4493: evaṃ niravaśeṣāvidyānidrāpagamādvibuddhena bhagavatā yasmādayaṃ dharmo deśitaḥ, tasmād yatpūrvaṃmuktaṃ
T04canprasu:4495: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati || iti,
T04canprasu:4500: karmaṇyanupapadyamāne tatphalanimittaṃ vipravadadhvam? yadi hi karmaṇaḥ
T04canprasu:4503: yadā tu karma naivotpadyate svabhāvaśūnyatvāt, tadā tasya kuto 'vasthānaṃ vināśo vā, yata eṣā cintā syāt? atrāha-
T04canprasu:4507: yadi khalvevaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvātkarma notpadyate, tat kathamevamuktaṃ bhagavatā-
T04canprasu:4509: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām || iti?
T04canprasu:4517: akṛtaṃ ca bhavetkarma kriyate na hi śāśvatam || 22 ||
T04canprasu:4518: yadi hi karma svabhāvataḥ syāt, muktasaṃśayaṃ tacchāśvataṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:4524: kāraṇam? yasmāt kriyate na hi śāśvatam |
T04canprasu:4526: yacca vidyamānaṃ tasya karaṇānupapatteḥ tannaiva kāraṇamapekṣata iti || 22 ||
T04canprasu:4527: śubhāśubhe karmaṇi akṛta eva sakalasya lokasya vipāko yasmāt, tataśca-
T04canprasu:4530: yadi hi akṛtaṃ karma bhavet, tadā akṛtābhyāgamabhayaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:4531: yenāpi hi prāṇātipātādikaṃ na kṛtam, tasyāpi akṛtamapi sat tat karma astyeveti
T04canprasu:4534: kiṃ kāraṇam? pariśuddhabrahmacaryavāsānna kasyacinnirvāṇena bhavitavyaṃ syāt || 23 ||
T04canprasu:4536: vyavahārā virudhyante sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ |
T04canprasu:4538: ye hi ete kṛṣivāṇijyagorakṣādayaḥ kriyārambhāḥ phalārthamārabhyante, teṣāṃ sarveṣāmakṛtānāmeva vidyamānatvāt prārambhavaiyarthyaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:4540: paṭaṃ kuru, ityevamādayaśca sarva eva laukikavyavahārā virudhyante,
T04canprasu:4542: puṇyakṛdayam, pāpakṛdayam, iti ca pravibhāgo na prāpnoti, ubhayorapi puṇyapāpakṛtoḥ akṛtayorapi puṇyapāpayoḥ pratyekaṃ vidyamānatvāt || 24 ||
T04canprasu:4548: tadevaṃ yadi karma svābhāvikamiti manyase, yasmāt tatkarma vyavasthitamasti tasmānniḥsaṃśayaṃ yathopavarṇitā doṣāḥ prāpnuvanti sasvabhāvatve |
T04canprasu:4550: yataśca niḥsvabhāvaṃ karma, tasmācchāśvatocchedadarśanaprasaṅgo naivāsmākamevaṃ vyācakṣamāṇānāmāpadyate iti || 25 ||
T04canprasu:4551: atrāha- vidyata eva svabhāvataḥ karma, tatkāraṇasadbhāvāt |
T04canprasu:4561: karma kleśātmakaṃ cedaṃ te ca kleśā na tattvataḥ |
T04canprasu:4562: na cette tattvataḥ kleśāḥ karma syāttattvataḥ katham || 26 ||
T04canprasu:4567: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmātkleśā na tattvataḥ || iti |
T04canprasu:4568: tadevaṃ tāvat na tattvataḥ kleśāḥ, taddhetukaṃ karma tadānīṃ kutastattvato
T04canprasu:4570: atrāha- vidyanta eva kleśā karmāṇi ca, tatkāryasadbhāvāt |
T04canprasu:4575: syuḥ kleśāḥ karmāṇi ca, yadi tatkāryaṃ dehā vidyeran |
T04canprasu:4578: karma kleśāśca te śūnyā yadi deheṣu kā kathā || 27 ||
T04canprasu:4579: yathā karma kleśāśca śūnyāḥ, tathā pratipāditam |
T04canprasu:4580: tataśca karma kleśā yadā na santi, tadā tatkāryāṇāṃ dehānāmasattve kā kathā bhaviṣyati? nāstitvaṃ teṣāṃ pūrvameva siddhaṃ yasmāt, tasmānnānna kaścidvaktavyaviśeṣo 'stītyabhiprāyaḥ || 27 atrāha- vidyata eva svabhāvataḥ karma, tatphalabhoktṛsadbhāvāt |
T04canprasu:4585: sa bhoktā sa ca na karturanyo na ca sa eva saḥ || 28 ||
T04canprasu:4586: tatra avidyā ajñānaṃ tamaḥ saṃmoha iti paryāyāḥ |
T04canprasu:4594: atha ca punaridaṃ pāpaṃ karma svayameva
T04canprasu:4595: kṛtam, asya svayameva vipākaḥ pratyanubhavitavyaḥ iti vacanāt |
T04canprasu:4597: sa ca na karturanyaḥ, na ca sa eva saḥ |
T04canprasu:4600: atrocyate- syātkarmaṇaḥ kartā karmaphalasya copabhoktā yadi karmaiva syāt
T04canprasu:4605: karma cennāsti kartā ca kutaḥ syātkarmajaṃ phalam |
T04canprasu:4606: asatyatha phale bhoktā kuta eva bhaviṣyati || 30 ||
T04canprasu:4607: yadi karma nāma kiṃcitsyāt, tat pratyayasamutpannaṃ vā bhavet,
T04canprasu:4608: apratyayasamutpannaṃ vā? yadi tāvat pratyayasamutpannamiṣyate, tanna
T04canprasu:4611: tadapi- hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca ityādinā karmakārakaparīkṣāyāṃ vistareṇa pratipāditam
T04canprasu:4612: yataścaivaṃ pratyayasamutpannaṃ vā apratyayasamutpannaṃ vā karmedaṃ na saṃbhavati, tasmādasya karmaṇaḥ kartāpi na saṃbhavati |
T04canprasu:4613: yadā caivaṃ karma ca kartā ca nāsti, tadā nirhetukaṃ karmajaṃ phalaṃ kuto bhaviṣyatīti, asati ca phale kuta eva phalabhoktā bhaviṣyatīti, sarvametat svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānameveti
T04canprasu:4615: atrāha- yadi evaṃ naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ bhāvānāṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati, yattarhi etaduktaṃ bhagavatā- svayaṃ kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ svayameva vipākaḥ pratyanubhavitavyaḥ iti, tadetat sarvamamunā nyāyena apākṛtaṃ bhavati |
T04canprasu:4620: na ca karmakartṛphalādikaṃ nāstīti brūma, kiṃ tarhi niḥsvabhāvametaditi vyavasthāpayāmaḥ
T04canprasu:4621: atha manyase- niḥsvabhāvānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vyāpārakaraṇānupapatteḥ tadavastha eva doṣa iti, etadapi nāsti |
T04canprasu:4624: tathāhi niḥsvabhāvā eva santo ghaṭādayaḥ loke svakāryakṛt upalabhyante ||
T04canprasu:4628: nirmito nirmimītānyaṃ sa ca nirmitakaḥ punaḥ || 31 ||
T04canprasu:4629: tadyathā- ekaṃ nirmitakaṃ śāstā buddho bhagavān ṛddhisaṃpadā
T04canprasu:4630: ṛddhiprabhāveṇa nirmimīta, sa cāpi nirmitakaḥ punaḥ yo 'yaṃ buddhena bhagavatā nirmitaḥ, sa punarbhūyo 'nyamaparaṃ nirmitakaṃ nirmimīta |
T04canprasu:4631: tatra ya eṣa nirmitakaḥ aparasya nirmitakasya nirmātā, sa śūnyaḥ niḥsvabhāvaḥ,
T04canprasu:4634: yonirmitakena nirmitaḥ, asāvapi śūnyo nisvabhāvaḥ, tathāgatasvabhāvarahita ityarthaḥ |
T04canprasu:4636: tathā nirmitakākāraḥ kartā karma ca tatkṛtam |
T04canprasu:4638: yo hyatra karmaṇaḥ kartā sa nirmitakākāraḥ svabhāvaśūnyaḥ |
T04canprasu:4639: tena ca svabhāvaśūnyena svatantrakartrā yat kiṃcit karma kriyate, tadapi svabhāvaśūnyam |
T04canprasu:4640: tadyathā nirmitakena anyo nirmitako nirmitaḥ tathā veditavyam |
T04canprasu:4644: tasmādadvayavādināṃ mādhyamikānāṃ kuto mithyādarśanam? uktaṃ ca āryasamādhirāje-
T04canprasu:4645: yada sugatu kathāṃ katheti nātho vīthigatān manujān kṛpāyamānaḥ |
T04canprasu:4646: nirmita jinu tatra nirminitva vicarati teṣu praṇītabuddhadharmān ||
T04canprasu:4648: kada vaya labhi jñānamevarūpaṃ āśaya jñātva jino 'sya vyākaroti ||
T04canprasu:4649: raśmi śatasahasra aprameyān avasiri pādatalehi dharmarājā |
T04canprasu:4650: sarvi niraya śītalā bhavanti dukhamapanīya sukhaṃ ca vedayanti ||
T04canprasu:4651: dharma daśabalaprabhāṣite 'tra marumanujāna viśuddha bhoti cakṣuḥ |
T04canprasu:4653: keci spṛha janenti tatra kāle parama acintya tehi labdhalābhā |
T04canprasu:4654: yehi jinu nimantrito narendro na ca pariyanta teṣu dakṣiṇāyā ||
T04canprasu:4657: tannirmitabodhisattvena gandhasugandhāyāṃ lokadhātau samantabhadratathāgatopabhuktaśeṣaṃ bhojanamānītaṃ nānāvyañjanakhādyādisaṃprayuktaṃ pṛthakpṛthagvividharasamekabhojanena sarvaṃ tacchrāvakabodhisattvasaṃgharājarājāmātyapurohitāntaḥ puradauvārikasārthavāhādijanapadaṃ saṃtarpya prītyākāraṃ nāma mahāsamādhiṃ lambhayāmāsa iti ||
T04canprasu:4662: api ca amībhyo dṛṣṭāntebhyaḥ sphuṭaṃ naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ bhāvānāṃ pratīyatāmiti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:4663: kleśāḥ karmāṇi dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca |
T04canprasu:4665: tatra kleśā rāgādayaḥ, kliśnanti sattvacittasaṃtānānīti kṛtvā |
T04canprasu:4675: pañca ca bhikṣuśatāni dhyānalābhīni utthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni imāṃ gambhīrāṃ dharmadeśanāmanavabudhyamānāni anavataranti anavagāhamānāni anadhimucyamānāni |
T04canprasu:4676: bhagavānāha- tathā hyete kāśyapa bhikṣavaḥ ābhimānikāḥ imāmanāsravāṃ śīlaviśuddhiṃ nāvataranti nāvagāhante nādhimucyante uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsamāpadyante |
T04canprasu:4677: gambhīraḥ kāśyapa gāthābhinirhāro gambhīrā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ |
T04canprasu:4680: etāni kāśyapa pañca bhikṣuśatāni kāśyapasya tathāgatasya pravacane
T04canprasu:4682: taireva tasya kāśyapasya tathāgatasyāntikādupālambhābhiprāyaireṣā dharmadeśanā śrutā |
T04canprasu:4684: evaṃtairvāg bhāṣitā- āścaryaṃ yāvat madhurapriyamāṇī kāśyapastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti |
T04canprasu:4685: ta etenaikacittaprasādena pratilabdhena kālagatāḥ trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapannāḥ |
T04canprasu:4687: tenaiva ca hetunā iha mama śāsane pravrajitāḥ |
T04canprasu:4688: tānyetāni kāśyapa pañca bhikṣuśatāni dṛṣṭipraskandhāni imāṃ gambhīrāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ nāvataranti nāvagāhante nādhimucyante uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsamāpadyante kṛtaṃ punareṣāmanayā dharmadeśanayā parikarma |
T04canprasu:4691: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma- gaccha subhūte,
T04canprasu:4694: vilomayanti, kaḥ punarvādo mama? atha bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ yena mārgeṇaite bhikṣāvo gacchanti sma, tasmin mārge drau bhikṣū nirmimīte sma
T04canprasu:4695: | atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni yena mārgeṇa tau dvau bhikṣū nirmitakau tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma
T04canprasu:4696: upasaṃkramya etadavocan- kutra āyuṣmantau gamiṣyathaḥ? tāvavocatām- gamiṣyāva āvāmaraṇyāyataneṣu
T04canprasu:4697: tatra dhyānasukhasaṃsparśavihārairvihariṣyāvaḥ || ..... tānyapi pañca bhikṣuśatānyetadavocan- vayamapyāyuṣmantau bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ
T04canprasu:4698: nāvatarāmo nāvagāhāmahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāmaḥ saṃtrasyāmaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāmahe |
T04canprasu:4700: nirmitakāvavocatām- tena hi āyuṣmantaḥ saṃgāsyāmo na vivadiṣyāmaḥ |
T04canprasu:4702: yadidamāyuṣmanta ucyate parinirvāṇamiti, katamaḥ sa dharmo yaḥ
T04canprasu:4703: parinirvāsyati? kaścitpunaratra kāyaḥ ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā janturvā
T04canprasu:4704: poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo va, yaḥ parinirvāsyati?
T04canprasu:4705: kasya vā kṣayāt parinirvāṇam? te 'vocan rāgadveṣamohakṣayāt parinirvāṇam |
T04canprasu:4706: nirmitakāvavocatām- kiṃ punarāyuṣmatāṃ saṃvidyante rāgadveṣamohā yān kṣayiṣyatha? te 'vocan- na te adhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyante, nāpi te aparikalpitā utpadyante ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau karmaphalaparīkṣā nāma saptadaśamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:4708: atrāha- yadi kleśāḥ karmāṇi ca dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca sarvametanna
T04canprasu:4709: tattvam, kevalaṃtu gandharvanagarādivadattatvameva sat tattvākāreṇa pratibhāsate bālānām, kiṃ punaratra tattvam, kathaṃ vā tattvasyāvatāraḥ
T04canprasu:4711: ādhyātmikabāhyāśeṣavastvanupalambhena adhyātmaṃ bahiśca yaḥ sarvathā ahaṃkāramamakāraparikṣayaḥ, idamatra tattvam |
T04canprasu:4715: ātmānamasyā viṣayaṃ ca buddhā yogī karotyātmaniṣedhameva ||
T04canprasu:4717: kāyadṛṣṭimūlakameva saṃsāramanupaśyan ātmānupalambhācca satkāyadṛṣṭiprahāṇaṃ tatprahāṇācca sarvakleśavyāvṛttiṃ samanupaśyan prathamataramātmānamevopaparīkṣate, ko
T04canprasu:4719: sa cāyamahaṃkārasya viṣayaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ skandhasvabhāvo vā bhavetskandhavyatirikto vā?
T04canprasu:4720: ādhārādheyatadvatpakṣāṇāmapi ekatvānyatvapakṣe eva antarbhāvāt saṃkṣepeṇaiva ca vivakṣitatvādekatvānyatvapakṣadvayapratiṣedhenaiva ātmaniṣedhamārabdhukāma ācārya āha-
T04canprasu:4723: kimartha punaranyatra tathāgataparīkṣāyāmagnīndhanaparīkṣāyāṃ ca pañca pañca pakṣā upanyastāḥ, iha tu punaḥ pakṣadvayameveti? ucyate |
T04canprasu:4724: yenaiva tatra prakaraṇadvaye pañca pañca pakṣā nirdiṣṭāḥ, ata eva anyatra
T04canprasu:4727: tatra yadi skandhā ātmeti parikalpyate, tadā udayavyayabhāg utpādī ca vināśī ca ātmā prāpnoti, skandhānāmudayavyayabhāktvāt |
T04canprasu:4731: kṛtako vā bhavedātmā saṃbhūto vāpyahetukaḥ || iti |
T04canprasu:4736: skandhā ātmā cedatastadbahutvāt ātmānaḥ syuste 'pi bhūyāṃsa eva |
T04canprasu:4737: dravyaṃ cātmā prāpnuyāttādṛśaśca dravye vṛttau vaiparītye ca na syāt ||
T04canprasu:4738: ātmocchedo nirvṛtau syādavaśyaṃ nāśotpādau nirvṛteḥ prāk kṣaṇeṣu |
T04canprasu:4740: ityādinā madhyamakāvatāre vistareṇa vihitavicārādapi pakṣo boddhavya iti neha punarvistaraprapañca ārabhyate ||
T04canprasu:4741: evaṃ tāvat skandhā ātmā na bhavati |
T04canprasu:4743: yadi hi skandhebhyo 'nya ātmā bhavet, askandhalakṣaṇo bhavet |
T04canprasu:4744: yathā hi goranyo 'śvaḥ na golakṣaṇe bhavati, evamātmāpi skandhavyatiriktaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ askandhalakṣaṇo bhavet |
T04canprasu:4746: tatra askandhalakṣaṇa ātmā bhavan bhavanmatena utpādasthitibhaṅgalakṣaṇāyuktaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:4748: bhavati, saḥ avidyamānatvādasaṃskṛtatvādvā khapuṣpavannirvāṇabadvā naiva ātmavyapadeśaṃ pratilabhate, nāpyahaṃkāraviṣayatvena yujyate, iti skandhavyatirikto 'pyātmā na yujyate ||
T04canprasu:4750: ayamanyo 'rthaḥ- yadi ātmā skandhavyatiriktaḥ syāt, saḥ askandhalakṣaṇa syāt |
T04canprasu:4752: ātmā ca rūpādiva vijñānaṃ skandhebhyo vyatirikta iṣyamāṇaḥ pṛthaglakṣaṇasiddhaḥ syāt, pṛthaglakṣaṇasiddhaśca gṛhyeta rūpādiva cittam|
T04canprasu:4755: nanu ca tīrthikāḥ skandhebhyo vyatiriktamātmānaṃ pratipannā
T04canprasu:4757: yathā ca tīrthikā ātmano bhinnalakṣaṇamācakṣate tathoktaṃ madhyamakāvatāre-
T04canprasu:4758: ātmā tīrthyaiḥ kalpyate nityarūpo 'kartā bhoktā nirguṇo niṣkriyaśca |
T04canprasu:4759: kaṃcitkaṃcidvedamāśritya tasya bhedaṃ yātā prakriyā tīrthikānām ||
T04canprasu:4763: lakṣaṇam, na punaste svarūpata ātmānamupalabhya tasya lakṣaṇamācakṣate,
T04canprasu:4764: kiṃ tarhi yathāvadupādāyaprajñaptyanavagamena nāmamātrakamevātmānaṃ trāsādapratipadyamānāḥ saṃvṛtisatyādapi paribhraṣṭā mithyākalpanayaiva kevalamanumānābhāsamātravipralabdhāḥ santaḥ mohāt parikalpayanti ātmānam,
T04canprasu:4766: teṣāṃ ca karmakārakaparīkṣādiṣu ātmopādānayoḥ parasparāpekṣikīṃ siddhiṃ bruvatā saṃvṛtyāpi pratiṣedho vihita eva |
T04canprasu:4770: dṛśyate nāma taccaiva na kiṃcidapi tattvataḥ ||
T04canprasu:4779: yasyedaṃ skandhapañcakamupādānatvena pratibhāsate kimasau skandhalakṣaṇaḥ uta askandhalakṣaṇaḥ iti |
T04canprasu:4780: sarvathā ca vicārayanto mumukṣavo nainamupalabhante bhāvasvabhāvataḥ |
T04canprasu:4784: yathaiva hi dagdhe rathe tadaṅgānyapi dagdhatvānnopalabhyante, evaṃ yogino yadaiva ātmanairātmyaṃ
T04canprasu:4789: bījaṃ yasyānṛtaṃ tasya prarohaḥ satyataḥ kutaḥ ||
T04canprasu:4792: yathaiva hi grīṣme madhyāhnakālāvasānamāsāditasya vidhananabhomadhyadeśamācikraṃsorīṣatparibhramyamānapaṭutarahutabhugvitatasphuliṅgāniva virūkṣataramahīmaṇḍalottāpanaparān pradīptakiraṇasya kiraṇān pratītya virūkṣataramavanideśaṃ cāsādya viparītaṃ ca darśanamapekṣya salilākārā marīcaya upalabhyamānā vidūradeśāvasthitānāṃ janmavatāmatiprasannābhinīlajalākāraṃ pratyayamādadhati (Pp_148) na tu tatsamīpagatānām, evamihāpi yathāvasthitātmātmīyapadārthatattvadarśanavidūradeśāntarasthitānāṃ saṃsārādhvani vartamānānāmavidyāviparyāsānugamānmṛṣārtha eva
T04canprasu:4793: skandhasamāropaḥ satyataḥ pratibhāsamānaḥ padārthatattvadarśanasamīpasthānāṃ na pratibhāsate
T04canprasu:4796: marīciryadi vāri syādāsannaiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate ||
T04canprasu:4806: 'haṃkāraviṣayasya ātmanīnasya ca skandhādervastunaḥ mamakāraviṣayasya śamādanutpādādanupalambhānnirmamo nirahaṃkāraśca jāyate yogī || 2 ||
T04canprasu:4807: nanu ca yo 'sāvevaṃ nirmamo nirahaṃkāraśca yogī bhavati, sa tāvadasti |
T04canprasu:4808: sati ca tasmin siddha ātmā skandhāśceti naitadevam |
T04canprasu:4810: nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaśca so 'pi na vidyate |
T04canprasu:4811: nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ yaḥ paśyati na paśyati || 3 ||
T04canprasu:4812: ātmani skandheṣu ca sarvathānupalabhyamānasvarūpeṣu kutastadvayatirikto 'parapadārtho bhaviṣyati yo 'sau nirmamo nirahaṃkāraśceti |
T04canprasu:4813: yastu evamasaṃvidyamānasvarūpaṃ nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ ca paśyati, sa tattvaṃ na
T04canprasu:4817: na vidyate so 'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatām ||
T04canprasu:4819: yo 'pi ca cintayi śūnyaka dharmān so 'pi kumārgapapannaku bālaḥ |
T04canprasu:4820: akṣara kīrtita śūnyaka dharmāḥ te ca anakṣara akṣara uktāḥ ||
T04canprasu:4821: śānta paśānta ya cintayi dharmān so 'pi ca cittu na jātu na bhūtaḥ |
T04canprasu:4822: cittavitarkiṇa sarvi papañcāḥ tasya acintiya budhyatha dharmān || iti |
T04canprasu:4824: skandha sabhāvatu śūnya vivikta bodhi sabhāvatu śūnya vivikta |
T04canprasu:4825: yo 'pi caretsa pi śūnyasabhāvo jñānavato na tu bālajanasya ||
T04canprasu:4830: satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭisamudayāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāḥ sarvakleśāḥ sūtre uktāḥ |
T04canprasu:4834: yataśca ayaṃ janmanivṛttikramaḥ evaṃ vyavasthāpitaḥ, tasmāt-
T04canprasu:4836: upādāne hi kṣīṇe tatpratyayo bhavo na bhavati |
T04canprasu:4837: bhave niruddhe kuto jātijarāmaraṇādikasya saṃbhava iti |
T04canprasu:4839: karmakleśānāṃ tarhi kasya kṣayātparikṣaya iti vaktavyam || ucyate-
T04canprasu:4842: ayoniśo hi rūpādikaṃ vikalpayato bālapṛthagjanasya kleśa upajāyate rāgādikaḥ vakṣyati hi-
T04canprasu:4846: kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpātkila jāyase |
T04canprasu:4847: na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi || iti ||
T04canprasu:4850: sa cāyaṃ laukikaḥ prapañco niravaśeṣa śūnyatāyāṃ sarvasvabhāvaśūnyatādarśane sati nirudhyate
T04canprasu:4851: | kathaṃ kṛtvā? yasmātsati hi vastunaṃ upalambhe syād yathoditaprapañcajālam |
T04canprasu:4852: na hi anupalabhya vandhyāduhitaraṃ rūpalāvaṇyayauvanavatīṃ tadviṣayaṃ prapañcamavatārayanti rāgiṇaḥ |
T04canprasu:4853: na ca anavatārya prapañcaṃ tadviṣayamayoniśo vikalpamavatārayanti |
T04canprasu:4854: na ca anavatārya kalpanājālam ahaṃmametyabhiniveśāt satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakān kleśagaṇānutpādayanti
T04canprasu:4855: na ca anutpādya satkāyadṛṣṭayātmakān kleśagaṇān karmāṇi śubhāśubhāniñjyāni kurvanti |
T04canprasu:4858: evaṃ yogino 'pi śūnyatādarśanāvasthā niravaśeṣaskandhadhātvāyatanāni svarūpato nopalabhante
T04canprasu:4859: na ca anupalabhamānā vastusvarūpaṃ tadviṣayaṃ prapañcamavatārayanti |
T04canprasu:4860: na ca anavatārya tadviṣayaṃ prapañcaṃ vikalpamavatārayanti |
T04canprasu:4861: na ca anavatārya vikalpam ahaṃmametyabhiniveśāt satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakaṃ kleśagaṇamutpādayanti
T04canprasu:4862: na ca anutpādya satkāyadṛṣṭayādikaṃ kleśagaṇaṃ karmāṇi kurvanti |
T04canprasu:4864: tadevam aśeṣaprapañcopaśamaśivalakṣaṇāṃ śūnyatāmāgamya yasmādaśeṣakalpanājālaprapañcavigamo bhavati, prapañcavigamācca
T04canprasu:4866: karmakleśanivṛttyā ca janmanivṛttiḥ, tasmāt śūnyataiva sarvaprapañcanivṛttilakṣaṇatvānnirvāṇamityucyate yathoktaṃ śatake-
T04canprasu:4870: aparotpannapratikṣaṇavinaśvarasaṃskārakalāpamātramanātmānātmīyamavalokayataḥ āryaśrāvakasyāpi ātmātmīyavastvabhāvād dharmamātramidaṃ jāyate mriyate ceti darśanamutpadyate |
T04canprasu:4872: [tadabhāvāttasyāpyabhāvaḥ], tadabhāvādeva na kvacidādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā vastu astīti mamakārānutpatteḥ nirmamo nirahaṃkāro 'hamiti na
T04canprasu:4876: nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaśca so 'pi na vidyate || iti ||
T04canprasu:4877: tadayamācāryo yathaivaṃvidhe viṣaye nācāryapādamatānuvartī tathā pratipāditaṃ madhyamakāvatāre-
T04canprasu:4878: dūraṃgamāyāṃ tu dhiyādhikaḥ ityatreti na punastaddūṣaṇe yatna āsthīyate |
T04canprasu:4881: pratyeka bodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena subhūte asyāmeva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam |
T04canprasu:4882: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena asyāmeva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyamityādi ||
T04canprasu:4884: yo icchatī sugataśrāvaku haṃ bhaveyaṃ pratyekabuddhu bhavijā tatha dharmarājo |
T04canprasu:4885: imu kṣānti nāgatya na śakyati pāpuṇotuṃ yatha ārapāragamanīyaṃ atīradarśī
T04canprasu:4887: atrāha- yadyevamādhyātmikabāhyavastvanupalambhādadhyātmaṃ bahiśca ahaṃmametikalpanājālānāmanutpādastattvamiti vyavasthāpitam, yattarhi etaduktaṃ bhagavatā-
T04canprasu:4888: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet |
T04canprasu:4889: ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍitaḥ ||
T04canprasu:4890: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet |
T04canprasu:4891: ātmā hi ātmanaḥ sākṣī kṛtasyāpakṛtasya ca ||
T04canprasu:4893: kṛṣṇaśubhaṃ ca na naśyati karma ātmana kṛtva ca vedayitavyam |
T04canprasu:4894: no pi ca saṃkrama karmaphalasya no ca ahetuka pratyanubhoti ||
T04canprasu:4899: nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ |
T04canprasu:4901: tathā hi- rūpaṃ nātmā rūpavānnāpi cātmā rūpe nātmā nātmani rūpaṃ .... |
T04canprasu:4902: evaṃ yāvat vijñānaṃ nātmā, vijñānavānnātmā vijñāne nātmā nātmani vijñānam iti |
T04canprasu:4904: tatkathamidānīmanenāgamena pūrvakasyāgamasya virodho na syāt? tasmāddeśanābhiprāyo bhagavato
T04canprasu:4910: kudarśanadhanatimirapaṭalāvacchāditāśeṣabuddhinayanatayā laukikāvadātadarśanaviṣayānatikrāntamapi bhāvajātamapaśyanto vyavahārasatyāvasthitā eva santaḥ kṣitisalilajvalanapavanābhidhānatattvamātrānuvarṇanaparā mūlaudanodakakiṇvādidravyaviśeṣaparipākamātrapratyayotpannamadamurcchādisāmarthyaviśeṣānugatamadyapānopalambhavat kalalādimahābhūtaparipākamātrasaṃbhūtā eva buddhīranuvarṇayantaḥ pūrvāntāparāntāpavādapravṛttāḥ santaḥ paralokamātmānaṃ cāpavadante-
T04canprasu:4911: nāstyayaṃ lokaḥ, nāsti paralokaḥ, nāsti sukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ
T04canprasu:4914: teṣāṃ tadasadṛṣṭinivṛttyartha caturaśīticittacaritasahasrabhedabhinnasya sattvadhātoryathāśayānuvartakairaśeṣasattvadhātūttāraṇākṣiptapratijñāsaṃpādanatatparaiḥ prajñopāyamahākaruṇāsaṃbhārapuraḥ sarairnirupamairekajagadbandhubhirniravaśeṣakleśamahāvyādhicikitsakairmahāvaidyarājabhūtairhīnamadhyotkṛṣṭavineyajanānujidhṛkṣayā hīrnānāṃ vineyānāmakuśalakarmakāriṇāmakuśalādi nivartayituṃ
T04canprasu:4917: madhyamakāvatārācca vistareṇa veditavyeti tatpratiṣedhārtha neha punaryatna āsthīyate ||
T04canprasu:4918: ye tu sadbhūtātmadṛṣṭikaṭhinātidīrghaśithilamahāsūtrabaddhā vihaṃgamā iva sudūramapi gatāḥ kuśalakarmakāriṇo 'kuśalakarmapathavyāvṛttā api na śaknuvanti traidhātukabhavopapattimativāhya śivamajaramamaraṇaṃ
T04canprasu:4921: ye tu pūrvābhyāsaviśeṣānugatagambhīradharmādhimokṣalabdhabījaparipākāḥ pratyāsannavartini nirvāṇe teṣāmutkṛṣṭānāṃ vineyānāṃ vigatātmasnehānāṃ paramagambhīramaunīndrapravacanārthatattvāvagāhanasamarthānāmadhimuktiviśeṣamavadhārya-
T04canprasu:4923: yathaiva hi ātmadarśanamatattvam, evaṃ tatpratipakṣabhūtamapi anātmadarśanaṃ naiva tattvamiti
T04canprasu:4924: evaṃ nāstyātmā kaścit, na cāpyanātmā kaścidastīti deśitam |
T04canprasu:4930: | kāśyapa madhyamā pratipada dharmāṇāṃ bhūtapratyavekṣā iti ||
T04canprasu:4934: dṛṣṭaśrutādyaṃ muninā na satyaṃ na mṛṣoditam |
T04canprasu:4935: pakṣāddhi pratipakṣaḥ syādubhayaṃ tacca nārthataḥ || iti |
T04canprasu:4936: yataścaivaṃ hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭavineyajanāśayanānātvena ātmānātmatadubhayapratiṣedhena buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā pravṛttā,
T04canprasu:4940: sarvasya vāraṇaṃ paścādyo jānīte sa buddhimān || iti ||
T04canprasu:4950: anātmetyapi prajñapitaṃ lokāyatikaiḥ upapattyā ātmānaṃ saṃsartāramapaśyadbhiḥ-
T04canprasu:4957: atha khalu śāntamatirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat- upaśama upaśama iti bhagavannucyate, ka eṣa upaśamo nāma? kasya copaśamādupaśama ityucyate? bhagavānāha- upaśama iti kulaputra (Pp_154) ucyate,
T04canprasu:4966: ucchedaśāśvatadṛṣṭayupaśama iti satkāyadṛṣṭayupaśamasyaitadadhivacanam iti śāntamate ye kecidārambaṇahetudṛṣṭisaṃyuktāḥ saṃkleśāḥ pravartante, sarve te satkāyadṛṣṭerutpadyante, satkāyadṛṣṭayupaśamātsarvadṛṣṭayupaśama iti |
T04canprasu:4969: tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūle chinne sarvaśākhāpatraphalāni śuṣyanti, evameva śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭayupaśamātsarvakleśā upaśāmyante |
T04canprasu:4974: ātmāsamutthānaṃ śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā sattvāsamutthānaṃ jivāsamutthānaṃ pudgalāsamutthānaṃ dṛṣṭayasamutthānaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā na khalu punaḥ śāntamate sā dṛṣṭiradhyātmaṃ pratiṣṭhitā, na bahirdhā pratiṣṭhitā |
T04canprasu:4976: yattasyā apratiṣṭhitāyā dṛṣṭerapratiṣṭhiteti jñānam, iyaṃ śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā |
T04canprasu:4978: yacchūnyatānulomikyā kṣāntyā tāṃ dṛṣṭi nodgṛhṇāti, iyamapi śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā
T04canprasu:4981: satkāya iti śāntamate akāya eṣaḥ, na kasati na vikasati na cinoti nopacinoti, ādita eva tadabhūtaṃ parikalpitam |
T04canprasu:4982: yacca abhūtaṃ parikalpitam, tanna parikalpitaṃ na parikalpyate na vikalpyate, tanna kriyate na viṭhapyate, notthāpyate nādhyavasyate |
T04canprasu:4984: śāntamatirāha- upaśānta upaśānta iti bhagavannucyate, kasyopaśamādupaśānta ityucyate |
T04canprasu:4986: yanna bhūya ālambanīkaroti tanna jvalati, ajvalan upaśānta ityucyate |
T04canprasu:4987: tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate agnirupādānato jvalati, anupādānataḥ śāmyati, evameva ālambanataścittaṃ jvalati anālambanataḥ śāmyati |
T04canprasu:4988: tatra śāntamate upāyakuśalo 'yaṃ bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāpariśuddhaḥ ālambanasamatāṃ ca
T04canprasu:4991: atrāha- yadi buddhairbhagavadbhirnātmeti deśitam, nānātmeti, kiṃ tarhi deśitamiti? ucyate-
T04canprasu:4994: iha yadi kiṃcidabhidhātavyaṃ vastu syāt, taddeśyeta |
T04canprasu:4995: yadā tu abhidhātavyaṃ nivṛttam, vācāṃ viṣayo nāsti, tadā kiṃcidapi naiva deśyate buddhaiḥ
T04canprasu:5000: yadi cittasya kaścid gocaraḥ syāt, tatra kiṃcinnimittamadhyāropya syād vācāṃ pravṛttiḥ |
T04canprasu:5001: yadā tu cittasya viṣaya evānupapannaḥ, tadā kva nimittādhyāropaḥ, yena vācāṃ pravṛttiḥ syāt? kasmāt punaścittaviṣayo nāstīti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:5003: yasmādanutpannāniruddhā nirvāṇamiva dharmatā dharmasvabhāvaḥ dharmaprakṛtiḥ vyavasthāpitā, tasmānna tatra cittaṃ pravartate |
T04canprasu:5004: cittasyāpravṛttau ca kuto nimittādhyāropaḥ? tadabhāvāt kuto vācāṃ
T04canprasu:5005: pravṛttiḥ? ataśca na kiṃcid buddhairbhagavadbhirdeśitamiti sthitamavikalam |
T04canprasu:5011: ayamanyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ- yaduktaṃ prapañcaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ nirudhyate
T04canprasu:5012: iti, kathaṃ punaḥ prapañcasya śūnyatāyāṃ nirodha iti? ucyate |
T04canprasu:5014: athavā yadetaduktaṃ prāgādhyātmikabāhyavastvanupalambhena adhyātmaṃ bahiśca yaḥ sarvadā ahaṃkāramamakāraparikṣayaḥ, idamatra tattvamiti |
T04canprasu:5015: kīdṛśaṃ tat kiṃvat, vaktuṃ vā śakyate, tasmāt nivṛttamabhidhātavyaṃ nivṛtte cittagocare |
T04canprasu:5017: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra tattve nivṛttamabhidhātavyaṃ nivṛtte cittagocare ityāha-
T04canprasu:5019: iti pūrvakameva vyākhyānaṃ yojyam || ata evoktamāryatathāgataguhyasūtre-
T04canprasu:5020: yāṃ ca śāntamate rātriṃ tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
T04canprasu:5021: yāṃ ca rātrimanupādāya parinirvāsyati, asminnantare tathāgatena ekākṣaramapi nodāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhariṣyati |
T04canprasu:5022: kathaṃ tarhi bhagavatā sakalasurāsuranarakiṃnarasiddhavidyādharoragaprabhṛtivineyajanebhyo vividhaprakārebhyo dharmadeśanā deśitā? ekakṣaṇavāgudāhāreṇaiva tattajjanamanastamoharaṇī bahuvidhabuddhinalinīvanavibodhinī
T04canprasu:5026: na cātra vādakaḥ kaścinniścarantyatha ca svarāḥ ||
T04canprasu:5029: pratiśrutkādayaḥ śabdā nādhyātmaṃ na bahiḥ sthitāḥ |
T04canprasu:5030: vāgapyevaṃ narendrasya nādhyātmaṃ na bahiḥ sthitāḥ || iti |
T04canprasu:5032: devata codani dundubhi divya karmavipāka nivṛtta marūṇaṃ |
T04canprasu:5033: deva pamattavihāriṇa ñātvā dundubhighoṣa pamuñci nabhāto ||
T04canprasu:5034: sarva anitya aśāśvata kāmā itvara adhruva phenasabhāvāḥ |
T04canprasu:5036: dundubhi vādita śakramarudbhiḥ sārddhaya saṃkrami dharmasabhāyām |
T04canprasu:5037: dharmakathāṃ pakaroti marūṇāṃ yā katha śānta virāganukūlā ||
T04canprasu:5039: buddho yadā bheṣyati dharmarājaḥ sarvāṇa dharmāṇa pakāśako muniḥ |
T04canprasu:5040: tṛṇagulmavṛkṣauṣadhi śaila parvata abhāva dharmāṇa ravo bhaviṣyati ||
T04canprasu:5041: yāvanti śabdāstahi lokadhātau sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ |
T04canprasu:5042: tāvantu kho tasya tathāgatasya svaru niścarī lokavināyakasya ||
T04canprasu:5045: ekasvarā tu tava lokahito nānādhimukti svaru niścarati |
T04canprasu:5046: ekaikamanvimamabhāṣi jino brūhi smitaṃ prakṛtakasya kṛte || iti ||
T04canprasu:5047: atraike paricodayanti- nāstikāviśiṣṭā mādhyamikāḥ, yasmāt kuśalākuśalaṃ karma kartāraṃ ca phalaṃ ca sarvaṃ ca lokaṃ bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyamiti bruvate
T04canprasu:5051: kutaḥ? pratītyasamutpādavādino hi mādhyamikāḥ hetupratyayān prāpya pratītya samutpannatvāt sarvameva ihalokaparalokaṃ niḥsvabhāvaṃ varṇayanti |
T04canprasu:5052: yathāsvarūpavādino naiva nāstikāḥ pratītyasamutpannatvād bhāvasvabhāvaśunyatvena na paralokādyabhāvaṃ (Pp_157) pratipannāḥ |
T04canprasu:5053: kiṃ tarhi aihalaukikaṃ vastujātamupalabhya svabhāvataḥ tasya
T04canprasu:5055: tathāpi vastusvarūpeṇa avidyamānasyaiva te nāstitvaṃ pratipannāḥ ityamunā tāvaddarśanena sāmyamastīti cet, na hi |
T04canprasu:5059: yathā hi kṛtacaurya puruṣamekaḥ samyagaparijñāyaiva tadamitrapreritaḥ taṃ mithyā vyācaṣṭe cauryamanena kṛtamiti, aparastu sākṣād dṛṣṭvā dūṣayati, tatra yadyapi vastuto nāsti bhedaḥ, tathāpi parijñātṛbhedādekastatra mṛṣāvādītyucyate, aparastu satyavādīti, ekaśca ayaśasā ca apuṇyena ca samyak parīkṣyamāṇo yujyate nāparaḥ, evamihāpi yathāvadviditavastusvarūpāṇāṃ mādhyamikānāṃ bruvatāmavagacchatāṃ ca vastusvarūpābhede 'pi yathāvadaviditavastusvarūpairnāstikaiḥ saha jñānābhidhānayornāsti sāmyam |
T04canprasu:5061: apratisaṃkhyāya pratisaṃkhyāya upekṣakayoriva pṛthagjanārhatoḥ jātyandhacakṣuṣmatośca viṣamaprapātapradeśaviniścitasāmānye 'pi yathāsti mahān viśeṣaḥ, tathā nāstikānāṃ mādhyamikānāṃ ca viśeṣo bhaviṣyatīti
T04canprasu:5066: tasyāṃ ca nāsti vākcittayoḥ pravṛttiḥ, tathāpi naivāsau adeśyamānā śakyā janairvijñātumiti avaśyaṃ tasyāmavatāraṇārthaṃ vineyajanānāṃ saṃvṛtisatyāpekṣayā kadāciddeśanānupūrvyā bhavitavyam, ityataḥ sā kathyatāmiti |
T04canprasu:5068: iyamatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tattvāmṛtāvatāradeśanānupūrvī vijñeyā, yaduta-
T04canprasu:5069: sarvaṃ tathyaṃ na vā tathyaṃ tathyaṃ cātathyameva ca |
T04canprasu:5073: na hi pratihataḥ pātraṃ saddharmasya kathaṃcana || iti |
T04canprasu:5079: yalloke nāsti saṃmatam, mamāpi tannāsti saṃmatam |
T04canprasu:5081: nānyayā bhāṣayā mlecchaḥ śakyo grāhayituṃ yathā |
T04canprasu:5082: na laukikamṛte lokaḥ śakyo grāhayituṃ tathā ||
T04canprasu:5083: ityādita eva tāvadbhagavatā svaprasiddhapadārthamedasvarūpavibhāgaśravaṇasaṃjātābhilāṣasya vineyajanasya yadetat skandhadhātvāyatanādikamavidyātaimirikaiḥ satyataḥ parikalpitamupalabdham, tadeva tāvat satyamityupavarṇitaṃ bhagavatā
T04canprasu:5085: viditaniravaśeṣalokavṛttānto 'yaṃ bhagavān sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī, yaḥ evaṃ bhavāgraparyantasya vāyumaṇḍalāderākāśadhātuparyavasānasya bhājanalokasya
T04canprasu:5086: sattvalokasya ca aviparītaṃ sthityutpādapralayādikaṃ sātivicitraprabhedaṃ sahetukaṃ saphalaṃ sāsvādaṃ sādīnavaṃ copadiṣṭavāniti |
T04canprasu:5087: tadevaṃ bhagavati utpannasarvajñabuddhivineyajanasya uttarakālaṃ tadeva sarvaṃ na vā tathyamityupadeśitam
T04canprasu:5088: tatra tathyaṃ nāma yasya anyathātvaṃ nāsti |
T04canprasu:5093: keṣāṃcit sarvametat tathyaṃ ca atathyaṃ ceti deśitam |
T04canprasu:5097: keṣāṃcittu aticirābhyastatattvadarśanānāṃ kiṃcinmātrānutkhātāvaraṇatarūmūlānāṃ naivātathyaṃ naiva tathyaṃtaditi deśitam |
T04canprasu:5098: tasyāpi kiṃcinmātrasyāvaraṇasya prahāṇārthaṃ vandhyāsutasya avadātaśyāmatāpratiṣedhavadubhayametat pratiṣiddham ||
T04canprasu:5099: etacca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmanuśāsanam- unmārgādapanīya samyaṅmārgapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ śāsanam |
T04canprasu:5102: sarvāścaitā deśanā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākaruṇopāyajñānavatāṃ tattvāmṛtāvatāropāyatvena vyavasthitāḥ |
T04canprasu:5104: vyādhyanurūpabhaiṣajyopasaṃhāravat te vineyajanānujighṛkṣayā yathānurūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti
T04canprasu:5109: kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ punaḥ tat tattvaṃ yasyaitā deśanā avatārārthamupadiśante
T04canprasu:5113: yadā caitadevam, tadā kimaparaṃ pṛcchayate? yadyapyevam, tathāpi vyavahārasatyānurodhena laukikatathyādyabhyupagamavat tasyāpi samāropato lakṣaṇamucyatāmiti |
T04canprasu:5120: yathā hi taimirikā vitathaṃ keśamaśakamakṣikādirūpaṃ paśyanto vitimiropadeśenāpi na śaknuvanti keśānāṃ yathāvadavasthitaṃ svarūpamadarśananyāyena adhigantavyamataimirikā
T04canprasu:5123: yadā tu timiropaghātyaviparītaśūnyatādarśanāñjanāñjitabuddhinayanāḥ santaḥ samutpannatattvajñānā bhavanti, tadā tat tattvamanadhigamanayogena
T04canprasu:5125: evamaparapratyayaṃ bhāvānāṃ yat svarūpaṃ tat tattvam |
T04canprasu:5127: ata eva tat prapañcairaprapañcitam| prapañco hi vāk, prapañcayati arthāniti kṛtvā |
T04canprasu:5133: paramārthasatyaṃ katamat? yatra jñānasyāpyapracāraḥ, kaḥ punarvādo 'kṣarāṇāmiti |
T04canprasu:5135: nānārtho 'syeti nānārthaṃ bhinnārtham, na nānārthaḥ anānārtham,
T04canprasu:5138: devaputra āha- katamaḥ punarmañjuśrīḥ samyakprayogaḥ? mañjuśrīrāha-
T04canprasu:5140: tatsamāni paramārthataḥ pañcānantaryāṇi, yatsamāni pañcānantaryāṇi tatsamāni dṛṣṭikṛtāni, yatsamāni dṛṣṭikṛtāni tatsamāḥ pṛthagjanadharmāḥ,
T04canprasu:5141: yatsamāḥ pṛthagjanadharmāḥ tatsamāḥ śaikṣadharmāḥ, yatsamāḥ śaikṣadharmāḥ tatsamā aśaikṣadharmāḥ, yatsamā aśaikṣadharmāḥ tatsamāḥ
T04canprasu:5143: yatsamaṃ nirvāṇaṃ tatsamaḥ saṃsāraḥ, yatsamaḥ saṃsāraḥ tatsamaḥ
T04canprasu:5144: paramārthataḥ saṃkleśaḥ, yatsamaḥ paramārthataḥ saṃkleśaḥ tatsamaṃ paramārthato vyavadānam, yatsamaṃ paramārthato vyavadānaṃ tatsamāḥ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāḥ |
T04canprasu:5145: evaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmasamatāprayukto devaputra bhikṣuḥ samyakprayukta ityucyate ||
T04canprasu:5146: devaputra āha- katamayā punarmañjuśrīḥ samatayā yāvat paramārthato yatsamaṃ vyavadānaṃ tatsamāḥ sarvadharmāḥ paramārthata iti? mañjuśrīrāha-
T04canprasu:5147: paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpādasamatayā paramārthataḥ sarvadharmātyantājātisamatayā paramārthataḥ samāḥ sarvadharmāḥ |
T04canprasu:5149: kasmāddhetoḥ? paramārthato nirvāṇānānākaraṇā hi devaputra sarvadharmā atyantanirutpādatāmupādāya
T04canprasu:5165: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat |
T04canprasu:5167: yat kāraṇaṃ pratītya yat kāryamutpadyate, tadyathā śālibījaṃ pratītya
T04canprasu:5168: pṛthivyādisāmagrīṃ ca śālyaṅkura upajāyate, na hi tāvat tadeva taditi śakyate vaktum |
T04canprasu:5169: naiva yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ,
T04canprasu:5172: ananyatvācca aṅkurāvasthāyāmaṅkuravadbījagrahaṇamapi syāt, bījavacca aṅkurasyāpi grahaṇaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:5176: evaṃ tāvad yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ iti na yujyate |
T04canprasu:5183: yataścaivaṃ yat kāraṇaṃ pratītya yat kāryamutpadyate, naiva tat kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ bhavati, na ca tasmātkāraṇāttat
T04canprasu:5185: tasmānna kāraṇamucchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatamiti śakyate vyavasthāpayitum |
T04canprasu:5188: yasmānnivartate bhāvastena nityo na jāyate || iti |
T04canprasu:5190: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro |
T04canprasu:5191: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā ||
T04canprasu:5198: etaddharmatattvāmṛtapratipannānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ śrutacintābhāvanākramāt pravartamānānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñātmakaskandhatrayāmṛtarasasya upayogānniyatameva jarāmaraṇakṣayasvabhāvanirvāṇādhigamo bhavati |
T04canprasu:5199: athāpi kathaṃcidiha aparipakvakuśalamūlatayā śrutvāpyetat saddharmāmṛtam, dṛṣṭa eva dharme na mokṣamāsādayanti, tathāpi janmāntare 'pi avaśyameṣāṃ pūrvahetubalādeva niyatā siddhiḥ saṃpadyate yathoktaṃ śatake-
T04canprasu:5209: tasmādasaṃsargāddhetoḥ pratyekabuddhānāmasaṃbuddhake 'pi kāle yasmādbhavatyeva dharmatattvādhigamaḥ, tasmādabandhyā siddhirasya saṃbuddhamahāvaidyarājapraṇītasya saddharmatattvāmṛtabhaiṣajyasyeti vijñeyam |
T04canprasu:5210: yataśca etadevam, ato 'rhati prājñaḥ prāṇānapi parityajya
T04canprasu:5214: kathaṃ ca bhagavan sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā? evamukto bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ
T04canprasu:5215: sthavirametadavocat- sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena kāye 'narthikena jīvitanirapekṣeṇa lābhasatkāraślokeṣvaniśritena paryeṣamāṇena paryeṣitā |
T04canprasu:5216: tena prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena araṇyagatena antarīkṣānnirghoṣaḥ śruto
T04canprasu:5219: tathā ca gaccha yathā na kāyaklamathamanasikāramutpādayasi, na
T04canprasu:5220: styānamiddhamanasikāramutpādayasi, na bhojanamanasikāramutpādayasi, yāvat mā kvaciccittaṃ praṇidhā adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā |
T04canprasu:5221: mā ca kulaputra vāmenāvalokayan (Pp_162) gāḥ, mā dakṣiṇena, [mā pūrveṇa], mā paścimena, mā
T04canprasu:5222: uttareṇa, mā urdhvaṃ mā adhaḥ, mā ca anuvidiśamavalokayan gāḥ |
T04canprasu:5223: tathā ca kulaputra gaccha yathā [nātmato] na satkāyataścalasi na rūpato na vedanāto
T04canprasu:5224: na saṃjñāto na saṃskārebhyo na vijñānataścalasi |
T04canprasu:5227: yo buddhadharmebhyo vitiṣṭhate, sa saṃsāre carati |
T04canprasu:5228: yaḥ saṃsāre carati, sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na carati, na ca tāmanuprāpnotīti ||
T04canprasu:5229: yāvanmāreṇa pāpīyasā udake 'ntardhāpite athāsyaitadabhūt- yannvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhā ime pṛthivīpradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam |
T04canprasu:5230: tatkasya hetoḥ? ayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśa uddhatarajaskaḥ, mā rajodhāturito dharmodgatasya
T04canprasu:5232: kimahamātmabhāvena kariṣyāmi avaśyaṃ bhedanadharmiṇā? varaṃ khalu punarmama evaṃrūpayā kriyayā ātmabhāvasya vināśaḥ kṛto bhavet, na tvevaṃ niḥsāmarthyakriyayā |
T04canprasu:5233: bahūni ca mama ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bhinnāni punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ, na punarevaṃbhūteṣu sthāneṣu ..... |
T04canprasu:5234: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā samantādātmānaṃ viddhā samantatastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svakena rudhireṇāsiñcadityādi ||
T04canprasu:5235: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahadarśanādeva dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ pratyalabhata- tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpannasya
T04canprasu:5237: tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitādeśanā yaduta sarvadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamatā, sarvadharmaviviktatayā
T04canprasu:5247: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau ātmaparīkṣā nāma aṣṭādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:5249: atrāha- vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, kālatrayavijñaptihetutvāt |
T04canprasu:5252: | yasmādutpanno niruddho hi bhāvasvabhāvaḥ atīta iti vyapadiśyate, utpanno
T04canprasu:5265: iha tāvat yadi vartamānānāgatau syātām, tāvapekṣya atītaṃ kālaṃ bhavetām,
T04canprasu:5266: anapekṣya vā? tatra yadi atītamapekṣya sidhyete, tathā niyatamatīte kāle
T04canprasu:5268: yasmāt, yasya hi yatra asattvam, tat tena nāpekṣyate|
T04canprasu:5269: tadyathā vandhyā srī svatanayena, gaganamālatīlatā svakusumena, sikatā svatailena |
T04canprasu:5270: avidyamānamapyandhakāraṃ pradīpena, pradīpo 'pi andhakāreṇa pratidvandvitvena apekṣyate iti cet, naitadevam |
T04canprasu:5272: tadatra yadi atīte kāle vartamānānāgatau kālau iṣyete,
T04canprasu:5273: apekṣāsiddhayarthamevaṃ sati atīte kāle vidyamānatvāt atītakālātmavat tayorapyatītatvaṃ syāt
T04canprasu:5275: yasmāt vartamānāvasthātikrānto hi atītaḥ asaṃprāptaḥ anāgata iti syāt |
T04canprasu:5276: yadā tu vartamānānāgatayorasaṃbhava eva, tadā kutaḥ kasyacidatītatvaṃ syāt?
T04canprasu:5281: tatra atīte kāle yadi vartamānānāgatau kālau na staḥ iti parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:5283: athāpi syāt- kālavādināṃ vidyate eva kālaḥ, tatra kimapekṣayā prayojanamiti? ucyate |
T04canprasu:5288: yataścaivam pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca tasmātkālo na vidyate iti vijñeyam ||
T04canprasu:5289: yadā caivam atītamapekṣya vā anapekṣya vā pratyutpannānāgatayornāsti
T04canprasu:5290: siddhiḥ, evaṃ pratyutpannāpekṣayā vā anapekṣayā vā atītānāgatayoḥ
T04canprasu:5291: anāgatāpekṣayā vā anapekṣayā vā pratyutpannātītayoḥ asiddhau iṣyamāṇāyāṃ tenaiva pratyutpannāgatayoḥ atītāpekṣayā vā anapekṣayā asiddhikrameṇa
T04canprasu:5300: anapekṣya punaḥ siddhirna jātaṃ vidyate tayoḥ |
T04canprasu:5309: eṣa dvitīyaḥ kālaparivarta iti vyākhyānakārikā iti |
T04canprasu:5311: yataśca evaṃ vicāraṇe kālatrayaṃ nāsti, tasmāt kālo na vidyate,
T04canprasu:5313: yathā caitatkālatrayaṃ vicāritam, evam uttamādhamamadhyādīnekatvādīṃśca lakṣayet |
T04canprasu:5318: ekatvādīṃśca ityanena ādiśabdena dvitvabahutvayo grahaṇāt te eva uttamādayaḥ ekatvādayaśca kālatrayavyākhyānena vyākhyātā veditavyāḥ || 4 ||
T04canprasu:5320: iha yannāsti, na tasya parimāṇavattvaṃ vidyate tadyathā kharaviṣāṇasya |
T04canprasu:5329: nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate |
T04canprasu:5331: iha yadi kālo nāma kaścidavasthitaḥ kṣaṇādivyatiriktaḥ syāt, sa kṣaṇādibhiḥ parimāṇavattvād gṛhyeta |
T04canprasu:5332: na tu avasthitaḥ kūṭasthaḥ kaścit kālo nāma asti, yaḥ kṣaṇādibhirgṛhyeta |
T04canprasu:5335: athāpi syāt- nitya eva avasthitasvabhāvaḥ kālo nāma asti,
T04canprasu:5338: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ |
T04canprasu:5339: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ || iti |
T04canprasu:5342: evamapi sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate yaḥ kṣaṇādibhirabhivyajyamāno gṛhyeta |
T04canprasu:5343: kasmāt punaḥ sthitaḥ kālo nāstīti cet, kṣaṇādivyatirekeṇāgṛhyamāṇatvāt ||
T04canprasu:5345: ayaṃ kālaḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvaḥ san astīti, asaṃskṛtasvabhāvo vā?
T04canprasu:5350: tadevaṃ nāsti vyavasthitaḥ kālaḥ, yo gṛhyeta |
T04canprasu:5351: yaśca idānīṃ kālo na gṛhyate asthitatvādavidyamānasvarūpatvāt, so 'gṛhyamāṇaḥ san kathaṃ kṣaṇādibhiḥ prajñapayituṃ bhāvataḥ pāryata ityāha- agṛhītaśca kālaḥ prajñapyate kathamiti |
T04canprasu:5353: atrāha- satyaṃ nāsti nityaḥ kālo nāma kaścid rūpādivyatiriktaḥ
T04canprasu:5354: svabhāvasiddhaḥ, kiṃ tarhi rūpādīneva sa saṃskārānupādāya prajñaptaḥ kālaḥ kṣaṇādivācyo bhavati, tasmādadoṣa iti |
T04canprasu:5358: yadyevaṃ bhāvaṃ pratītya kālo bhavatīti bhavatā vyavasthāpyate, yadā khalu bhāvo nāsti, tadā niyataṃ taddhetuko 'pi kālo nāstīti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:5361: yadā caivaṃ na kaścidbhāvo 'sti bhāvataḥ, tadā-
T04canprasu:5363: kālābhāvācca na santi kṣaṇalavamuhūrtādayaḥ kālabhedāḥ tatpariṇāmabhūtāḥ,
T04canprasu:5364: ityataḥ kutaḥ pariṇāmavattvena kālasiddhirbhaviṣyati? tasmānnāstyeva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ iti || uktaṃ hi bhagavatā āryahastikakṣyasūtre-
T04canprasu:5365: yadi koci dharmāṇa bhavetsvabhāvaḥ tatraiva gaccheya jinaḥ saśrāvako |
T04canprasu:5366: kūṭasthadharmāṇa siyā na nirvṛtī na niṣprapañco bhavi jātu paṇḍitaḥ || iti
T04canprasu:5369: naiva ca dharma na cākṣara kṣīṇā nāsti samudbhavu tena akṣīṇā || iti |
T04canprasu:5371: utpādakāle hi tathāgatasya maitreyanāmā tviha yo bhaviṣyati |
T04canprasu:5372: bhaviṣyatīyaṃ kanakāvṛtā mahī tasyā idānīṃ kuta āgamo 'sau ||
T04canprasu:5373: ullāpanāḥ kāmaguṇā hi pañca vibhrāmaṇā mohana moṣadharmiṇaḥ |
T04canprasu:5374: madhyāhnakāle hi yathaiva grīṣme jalaṃ marīcyāṃ hi tathaiva kāmāḥ ||
T04canprasu:5375: ekena kalpena bhaveddhi loko ākāśabhūto gaganasvabhāvo |
T04canprasu:5376: dāhaṃ vināśaṃ ca payānti bhe[bhī?]ravaḥ kuta āgamaḥ kutra gatiśca teṣām ||
T04canprasu:5379: pañcemāni bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātraṃ pratijñāmātraṃ vyavahāramātraṃ saṃvṛtimātraṃ yaduta atīto 'dhvā anāgato 'dhvā ākāśaṃ nirvāṇaṃ pudgalaśceti ||
T04canprasu:5388: iha bījāvanisalilajvalanapavanagaganābhidhānahetupratyayasāmagrīṃ pratītya ayamaṅkura upajāyamānaḥ satyāmapi bījādipratyayasāmagryām,
T04canprasu:5393: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām || iti ||
T04canprasu:5394: yasmācca evamasti kālāpekṣā, tasmādastyasau kālo nāma, yaḥ aṅkurādipravṛttau sahakārikāraṇaṃ bhavatīti |
T04canprasu:5396: syāt sahakārikāraṇatā kālasya, yadi aṅkurādiphalasya pravṛttireva syāt |
T04canprasu:5399: parikalpyamāne vyavasthitasya vā phalasya sāmagryāṃ satyāṃtata utpādaḥ parikalpyeta avyavasthitasya vā? kiṃ cātaḥ? yadi tāvad vyavasthitasya
T04canprasu:5401: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi |
T04canprasu:5402: phalamasti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham || 1 ||
T04canprasu:5403: yadi hetupratyayasāmagryāṃ tvanmatena phalamasti, nanu evaṃ sati yasmāt
T04canprasu:5404: sāmagryāmasti, kathaṃ tayā tajjanyate? na hi kuṇḍe dadhi vidyamānaṃ kuṇḍena janyate |
T04canprasu:5407: abhivyaktiḥ sthaulyaṃ vā sūkṣmātmanā vidyamānasya kriyata iti cet, tasyāpi pakṣasya pūrvameva-
T04canprasu:5410: atha nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti parikalpyate, etadapi nopapadyate iti
T04canprasu:5412: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi |
T04canprasu:5413: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham || 2 ||
T04canprasu:5414: yadi hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti tatphalam, kathaṃ tarhi hetupratyayasāmagryā phalaṃ janyate? tatra avidyamānatvāt sikatābhiriva
T04canprasu:5417: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham |
T04canprasu:5421: gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāṃ sāmagryāṃ ca na gṛhyate || 3 ||
T04canprasu:5422: yad yatra asti, tat tatra gṛhyate, tadyathā kuṇḍe dadhi |
T04canprasu:5423: yacca yatra nāsti na tattatra gṛhyate tadyathā sikatāsu tailam, maṇḍūkajaṭāyāṃ śiromaṇiḥ ||
T04canprasu:5424: atha syāt- vidyamānā api padārthāḥ atisaukṣmyāt, atisaṃnikarṣāt,
T04canprasu:5426: mūrtyantardhānāt, manonavasthānāt, paramāṇuvat akṣasthāñjanaśalākāvat ādityagativat taimirikaikaikakeśavat
T04canprasu:5427: kuḍayādivyavahitaghaṭādivat siddhadevapiśācādiśarīravat viṣayāntaravyāpṛtasya viṣayāntaravanna gṛhyate iti cet, kiṃ khalu eṣāmagṛhyamāṇānāmastitve liṅgam, yena eṣāmastitve sati anupalabdhiriti
T04canprasu:5428: syāt? anumānopamānāgamairgrahaṇādeṣāmastitvamiti cet, na tarhi teṣāmanupalabdhiriti vaktavyam, anumānādibhirupalabhyamānatvāt |
T04canprasu:5429: yad rūpīndriyagrāhyaṃ tad ebhiḥ kāraṇairvidyamānamapi sanna gṛhyate, iti cet,
T04canprasu:5431: kimasmābhirevamuktam- rūpīndriyairvidyamānaṃ sad gṛhyeteti? kiṃ tarhi sāmānyenaiva yad brūmaḥ- gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāmiti ||
T04canprasu:5432: athāpi manyase- yad yatra nāsti, na tat tasmādutpadyate
T04canprasu:5434: utpadyate ca sāmagrītaḥ phalam, tasmādanumānataḥ sāmagryāṃ phalasyāstitvamiti |
T04canprasu:5436: yad yatra asti, na tat tasmādutpadyate, tadyathā kuṇḍād dadhi iti |
T04canprasu:5437: asmādapyanumānādastitvamasya ayuktamiti kṛtvā nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti kiṃ na gṛhyate?
T04canprasu:5438: athāpi syāt- ubhyorapi pakṣayoranumānavirodhād yathā astitvaṃ na yuktam,
T04canprasu:5441: na vayamasyāsattvaṃ pratipādayāmaḥ, kiṃ tarhi paraparikalpitaṃ sattvamasya nirākurmaḥ |
T04canprasu:5448: tadevaṃ na sāmagrītaḥ phalamutpadyate vidyamānasya grahaṇaprasaṅgāt, iti vyavasthitam || 3
T04canprasu:5449: atha manyase- nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti, evamapi-
T04canprasu:5450: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti cetphalam |
T04canprasu:5452: yathā hi jvālāṅgārādiṣu aṅkuro nāstīti kṛtvā tasya te hetupratyayā na
T04canprasu:5453: bhavanti, eva vivakṣitānāmapi bījādīnāṃ hetupratyayatā na syāt teṣu aṅkuro nāstīti kṛtvā
T04canprasu:5454: na ca ahetu pratyayebhyaḥ phalapravṛttiryukteti nāsti svabhāvataḥ phalapravṛttiḥ ||
T04canprasu:5455: atrāha- naiva hi sāmagryāḥ phalotpādanasāmarthyamasti yataḥ iyaṃ cintā
T04canprasu:5456: syāt- kiṃ sāmagryāṃ phalamasti utāho nāstīti |
T04canprasu:5459: sa hetuḥ phalasyotpattyarthaṃ hetuṃ datvā nirudhyate, tena ca hetunā anugṛhyamāṇaṃ phalamutpadyate iti |
T04canprasu:5462: na cāpyajātasya bandhyātanayasyeva kenacitkiṃcinmātraṃ kartuṃ śakyamityayuktaiṣā kalpanā || api ca-
T04canprasu:5465: yadi hetuḥ phalasyotpattyarthaṃ hetukaṃ kāraṇaṃ datvā nirudhyata iti parikalpyate, evaṃ sati yaddattaṃ yanniruddhaṃ ca tadātmabhāvadvayaṃ hetoḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:5466: na caitad yuktam, ardhaśāśvataprasaṅgāt nityānityayośca parasparaviruddhayorekatvābhāvāt atha hetorātmabhāvadvayaprasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ sarvātmanā nirodha iṣyate phalasyotpattyarthaṃ kiṃcidapyadatvā, evamapi-
T04canprasu:5469: yadi phalasya kiṃcidapyadatvā sarvātmanā heturnirudhyate, nanu tasmin hetau niruddhe yatphalamutpadyate tat āhetukaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:5472: atrāha- yadi evaṃ phalasya hetorutpattau doṣaḥ, evaṃ sati sahotpannaiva
T04canprasu:5473: sāmagrī phalasya janikā astu, tadyathā pradīpaprabhāyā iti |
T04canprasu:5479: atrāhureke- naiva hi abhūtvā bhāvānāmutpattiryuktā ākasmikatvaprasaṅgāt |
T04canprasu:5480: tasmād hetupratyayasāmagrītaḥ pūrvameva tat phalamanāgatāvasthāyāṃ vyavasthitamanāgatātmanā
T04canprasu:5486: yadi bhavatāmabhīpsitaṃ sāmagrītaḥ pūrvameva phalaṃ svarūpataḥ syāditi,
T04canprasu:5487: tad hetupratyayanirapekṣaṃ syāt, tataśca āhetukaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:5490: anye punarvarṇayanti- hetureva phalaṃ janayati na sāmagrī |
T04canprasu:5492: yasmāt na hi anyohetuḥ anyat phalam |
T04canprasu:5493: yataḥ, kiṃ hetuṃ datvā phalasya heturnirudhyate uta adatvaiveti vicāraḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:5494: api tu hetureva niruddhaḥ phalātmanā vyavasthitaḥ iti |
T04canprasu:5497: niruddhe cetphalaṃ hetau hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet |
T04canprasu:5499: yadi niruddhe hetau bhavanmatena phalamutpadyate, tacca phalaṃ hetvātmakameva bhavatīti parikalpyate, evaṃ sati hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet,
T04canprasu:5500: naṭasya veṣāntaraparityāgena veṣāntarasaṃcāravat hetoḥ saṃkramaṇa mātrameva syāt, na tu apūrvasya phalasyotpādaḥ |
T04canprasu:5507: etasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ pūrvajātasya ca hetoḥ punarjanma prāpnoti |
T04canprasu:5508: na ca jātasya punarapi [janma] yujyate niṣprayojanatvāt, anavasthāprasaṅgācca
T04canprasu:5509: atha manyase- yenātmanā vidyamāno na tenaivātmanā jāyate, yena cātmanā avidyamānaḥ tenaiva jāyata iti |
T04canprasu:5511: aparityaktahetusvabhāvasya hetusvarūpasya phalamiti saṃjñāmātrabhedādavasthābhedācca dravyābhedasya sādhayitumaśakyatvāt |
T04canprasu:5512: phalāvasthāyāṃ ca parityaktahetusvabhāvasya phalaśabdavācyatvād hetuḥ phalātmanā tiṣṭhatīti yatkiṃcidetat || 9 ||
T04canprasu:5513: kiṃ cānyat- yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, niruddho vā janayedaniruddho vā?
T04canprasu:5514: phalamapi utpannaṃ vā janayedanutpannaṃ vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate iti
T04canprasu:5518: [yadi tāvata niruddhaḥ astaṃgataḥ hetuḥ utpannaṃ sat vidyamānaṃ phalaṃ janayatīti parikalpyate, tannopapadyate |
T04canprasu:5519: kasmāditi cet, kathaṃ niruddhaḥ asaṃvidyamānaḥ hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet? yadi janayati, vandhyāputro
T04canprasu:5521: phalaṃ ca sad vidyamānamapi janmanirapekṣamapi kathaṃ heturjanayi ṣyati? atha manyase- śaktyabhāvānniruddho na janayati, kiṃ tu tiṣṭhanneva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti |
T04canprasu:5522: ucyate |] tiṣṭhannapi heturavikṛtarūpo vidyamānena phalena vṛtaḥ saṃbaddhaḥ kathaṃ janayet?
T04canprasu:5525: iti kāraṇābhāvaṃ pratipadyamānasya hetoravaśyaṃ vikāreṇa bhavitavyam |
T04canprasu:5526: yastu na vikriyate, sa hetulakṣaṇayukta eva na bhavatīti |
T04canprasu:5527: phalena ca saṃbaddhaḥ kathaṃ janayet? phalasya vidyamānatvāt || 10 ||
T04canprasu:5528: atha manyase- vidyamānasya phalasya punarjanayitumaśakyatvāt avṛta eva asaṃbaddha eva hetuḥ phalena phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti, etadapyayuktamityāha-
T04canprasu:5530: yadi hetuḥ phalena asaṃbaddha eveṣyate, tadā katamadidānīṃ phalaṃ janayet?
T04canprasu:5531: sarvameva vā phalaṃ janayedasaṃbaddhatvāt, na vā kiṃcijjanayedasaṃbaddhatvādevetyabhiprāyaḥ
T04canprasu:5533: yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, sa dṛṣṭvā phalaṃ janayedadṛṣṭvā
T04canprasu:5534: vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyate ityāha-
T04canprasu:5535: na hyadṛṣṭvā vā dṛṣṭvā vā heturjanayate phalam || 11 ||
T04canprasu:5536: tatra yadi heturdṛṣṭvā janayatīti parikalpyate, tanna yujyate |
T04canprasu:5539: evaṃ tāvad hetuḥ phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā na janayati,
T04canprasu:5540: adṛṣṭvāpi na janayati, sarvasya phalasya hetorjanakatvaprasaṅgāt ||
T04canprasu:5541: atha kimidaṃ darśanaṃ kiṃ vā adarśanamiti? ucyate |
T04canprasu:5544: nanu etad bījādiṣu nirindriyeṣu na saṃbhavati |
T04canprasu:5547: tatra yaḥ utpādavādī brūyāt- dṛṣṭvā janayatīti, sa vaktavyaḥ- na dṛṣṭametalloke yadbījādikaṃ paśyatīti |
T04canprasu:5550: evamapi yatkiṃcidadṛṣṭaṃ saṃbhavati tatsarvamutpādayet, na cotpādayati,
T04canprasu:5552: aniṣṭāpattyā hi vayaṃ parakalpanāṃ vicārayāmaḥ saṃsārāṭavīkāntāragiridarīprapātaduḥkhamālāsamākulāmā tāmīva |
T04canprasu:5553: buddhipūrvakartṛkaṃ ca puruṣādikāraṇino jagadabhyupagacchanto nirgranthāścaikendriyaṃ bījādikaṃ pratipannāḥ prasaṅgānna vyativartanta iti |
T04canprasu:5555: kiṃ cānyat- yadi yuṣmadabhimataṃ hetoḥ phalasya ca anyonyaḍhaukanalakṣaṇaṃ
T04canprasu:5557: yasmāt na hi parasparāsaṃgatayorālokāndhakārayoḥ saṃsāranirvāṇa yorjanyajanakabhāvo dṛṣṭa iti |
T04canprasu:5559: sā ca kālatraye 'pi vicāryamāṇā na saṃbhavati |
T04canprasu:5564: atītasya tāvat phalasya atītena hetunā saha jātu kadācidapi saṃgatirnāsti,
T04canprasu:5566: nāpi ajātena hetunā atītasya phalasya saṃgatirjātu vidyate, naṣṭājātatvena ubhayorapyavidyamānatvāt,
T04canprasu:5568: nāpi jātena vartamānena hetunā saha atītasya phalasya saṃgatiḥ saṃbhavati, bhinnakālatvāt, naṣṭasya ca phalasya
T04canprasu:5570: yathā ca atītasya phalasya atītena anāgatavartamānena hetunā saha na kadācit saṃgatirasti, evaṃ vartamānasyāpi phalasya traikālikena hetunā saha nāsti saṃgatiriti tat pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:5571: na jātasya hyajātena phalasya saha hetunā |
T04canprasu:5573: jātasya phalasya bhinnakālatvādajātena ca atītena ca hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti |
T04canprasu:5574: nāpi vartamānasya vartamānena hetunā saha saṃgatirasti,
T04canprasu:5576: kiṃ hi vidyamānayoḥ parasparanirapekṣayoḥ punaḥ saṃgatyā prayojanamiti nāsti saṃgatiḥ || 13
T04canprasu:5577: idānīmanāgatasyāpi phalasya yathā atītānāgatapratyutpannena hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti tathā
T04canprasu:5578: nājātasya hi jātena phalasya saha hetunā |
T04canprasu:5581: tasya bhinnakālena vartamānena atītena ca hetunā saha nāsti saṃgamanaṃ bhinnakālatvāt |
T04canprasu:5582: anāgatenāpi hetunā saha nāsti saṃgamanam, ubhayoravidyamānatvāt || 14 ||
T04canprasu:5583: yadā caivaṃ sarvathā hetuphalayoḥ saṃgatirnāsti, tadā-
T04canprasu:5584: asatyāṃ saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam |
T04canprasu:5585: naiva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayati saṃgateravidyamānatvāt vandhyāputramivetyabhiprāyaḥ ||
T04canprasu:5586: athāpi syāt- satyāmeva saṃgatau hetuḥ phalaṃ janayatīti, tadapi na yuktam,
T04canprasu:5590: satyāṃ vā saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam || 15 ||
T04canprasu:5591: saṃnihitasya phalasya punarjanmavaiyarthyāt, asaṃhitānāṃ ca saṃgaterayuktatvāt ityabhiprāyaḥ kiṃ cānyat-
T04canprasu:5594: yo 'yaṃ phalasya hetuḥ phalasya janaka iṣyate, sa tena śūnyo vā bhavan phalamutpādayet, aśūnyo vā? tatra hetuḥ śūnyaḥ phalena rahitaḥ phalaṃ na
T04canprasu:5597: janayati, vidyamānatvāt phalasya, vidyamānaputraṃ devadatta iva |
T04canprasu:5598: evaṃ tāvat phalaśūnyo vā phalāśūnyo vā hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati || 16 ||
T04canprasu:5599: yaccāpi phalamutpadyate, taccāpyaśūnyaṃ vā samutpadyate, śūnyaṃ vā? tatra
T04canprasu:5603: aśūnyaṃ hi phalamapratītyasamutpannaṃ svabhāvavyavasthitam, tadevaṃvidhaṃ phalaṃ naivotpatsyate svabhāvasyānapāyitvācca na nirotsyate |
T04canprasu:5605: na caitadiṣṭam, ityataḥ aśūnyaṃ tatphalaṃ na bhavati, utpādanirodhābhyupagamāt || 17 ||
T04canprasu:5606: idānīṃ śūnyamapi tatphalaṃ na saṃbhavati, anudayāvyayavattvaprasaṅgāt iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:5611: kathamutpatsyate, kathaṃ vā nirotsyate? na hi svabhāvena avidyamānasya ākāśādeḥ udayavyayau dṛṣṭau |
T04canprasu:5613: kiṃ cānyat- yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, sa phalādavyatirikto vā janayet,
T04canprasu:5614: vyatirikto vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha-
T04canprasu:5615: hetoḥ phalasya caikatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate |
T04canprasu:5616: hetoḥ phalasya cānyatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate || 19 ||
T04canprasu:5620: yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt, tadā janyajanakayorekatvamabhyupetaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:5623: evaṃ tāvad hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ nāsti ||
T04canprasu:5625: kiṃ kāraṇam? yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca bhavanmatenābhimatamanyatvaṃ syāt, tadā paratra nirapekṣatvād
T04canprasu:5632: kiṃ cānyat- yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, sa tatphalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ vā janayet, asadbhūtaṃ vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyate ityāha-
T04canprasu:5635: tatra yat phalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ svabhāvena vidyamānam, tanna punarjanyate vidyamānatvāt, vidyamānaghaṭavat |
T04canprasu:5636: yadapi svabhāvena asadbhūtaṃ phalam, tadapi heturna janayati, svabhāvena asadbhūtatvāt,
T04canprasu:5638: pratibimbenānaikāntikateti cet, bhavatu anaikāntikatā, naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ tu siddhaṃ bhāvānām
T04canprasu:5641: sasvabhāvaśca na kaścit padārtho nāma astīti pratidvandvayabhāvāt niḥsvabhāvo 'pi padārtho nāstīti kuto 'naikāntikatā?
T04canprasu:5642: na hi asmākaṃ pratibimbakaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ nāpi niḥsvabhāvam,
T04canprasu:5644: na hi āryāḥ pratibimbakaṃ nāma kiṃcit niḥsvabhāvaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ vā upalabhanta iti ||
T04canprasu:5645: tatra pūrvaṃ phalaṃ notpatsyate ityādinā ślokadvayena sākṣādutpattikriyākartṛtvaṃ phalasya niṣiddham |
T04canprasu:5648: atrāha- yadyapi hetoḥ phalotpattikriyāprayojakatvaṃ niṣiddham, tathāpi hetustāvat svabhāvato 'sti, na ca asati phale hetorhetutvaṃ sidhyati,
T04canprasu:5653: atha syāt- yadyapi evaṃ hetorhetutvaṃ nāsti, tathāpi phalaṃ tāvadasti |
T04canprasu:5654: na ca hetumantareṇa phalaṃ yuktamiti phalasadbhāvād heturapi bhaviṣyatīti |
T04canprasu:5660: atrāha- naiva hi kevalasya hetoḥ phalotpattikriyāyāḥ prayojakatvam, kiṃ tarhi hetupratyayasāmagryā phalaṃ janyate iti |
T04canprasu:5663: api ca, iyaṃ hetupratyayasāmagrī yadi phalasya janiketi kalpyate, kiṃ sāsvayameva tāvadātmānaṃ janayati, utāho na? yadi janayatīti kalpyate, tanna yujyate |
T04canprasu:5664: na hi alabdhātmabhāvasya prayojakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamityataḥ sāmagryā avaśyaṃ labdhātmabhāvayā bhavitavyam
T04canprasu:5665: na ca labdhātmabhāvāyāḥ punaḥ svātmotpāde prayojakatvaṃ yuktam, ityataḥ na sāmagrī svātmānamutpādayati
T04canprasu:5666: yā ca ātmānaṃ notpādayati, sā kathaṃ phalamutpādayituṃ śaknotīti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:5668: yā sāmagrī janayate sā kathaṃ janayetphalam |23 ||
T04canprasu:5669: pratyayānāṃ hetūnāṃ ca yeyaṃ sāmagrī sā tāvadātmanaiva ātmānaṃ notpādayati, svātmani vṛttivirodhāt, satyāḥ punarutpādavaiyarthyācca |
T04canprasu:5670: yā ca evamātmānameva tāvanna janayati, sā kathaṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati? na hi bandhyāduhitā ātmānaṃ janayitumaśaktā satī putraṃ janayiṣyatīti yujyate |
T04canprasu:5671: evaṃ sāmagryapi svātmājanikā phalaṃ janayatīti na yujyate || 23 ||
T04canprasu:5673: na sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ athāpi syāt- yadi sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na saṃbhavati, evaṃ tarhi asāmagrīkṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cet, ucyate-
T04canprasu:5675: yadā sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na saṃbhavati, tadā kathamatyantaviruddhamasāmagrīkṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati? asāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na
T04canprasu:5677: atha syāt- yadyapi nāsti phalaṃ svabhāvataḥ, tathāpi hetupratyayasāmagrī tāvadasti |
T04canprasu:5678: na ca phalamantareṇa hetupratyayasāmagrī saṃbhavatīti phalamapi saṃbhaviṣyatīti |
T04canprasu:5681: yadā tu yathoditena nyāyena phalameva nāsti, tadā-
T04canprasu:5682: asti pratyayasāmagrī kuta eva phalaṃ vinā || 24 ||
T04canprasu:5683: phalābhāve sati nirhetukā hetupratyayasāmagrī api nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ |
T04canprasu:5685: kaṇṭhoṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihvaparivarti ravanti akṣarāḥ |
T04canprasu:5686: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tāluke akṣaraikaikaśa nopalabhyate ||
T04canprasu:5687: sāmagri pratītyataśca sā vāca manabuddhivaśena niścarī |
T04canprasu:5690: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tadā dṛśī sarva vāca pratiśrutakopamā ||
T04canprasu:5692: iha śāsani sūramaṇīye pravrajathā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā |
T04canprasu:5693: phalavantu bhaviṣyatha śreṣṭhā eṣu nideśitu kāruṇikena |
T04canprasu:5694: pravrajitva gṛhiliṅga jahitvā sarvaphalasya bhaviṣyati prāptiḥ |
T04canprasu:5695: puna dharmasabhāva tulitvā sarvaphalāna phalāna ca prāptiḥ ||
T04canprasu:5696: alabhanta phalaṃ tatha prāptiṃ āścariyaṃ puna jāyati teṣām |
T04canprasu:5697: aho 'tikāruṇiko narasiṃho suṣṭupadeśita yukti jinena || iti |
T04canprasu:5699: tena hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhena na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthātavyam |
T04canprasu:5700: na srotaāpattiphale na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve na pratyekabuddhatve na samyaksaṃbuddhatve sthātavyam || iti ||
T04canprasu:5701: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau sāmagrīparīkṣā nāma viṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:5703: atrāha- vidyata eva svabhāvataḥ kālaḥ, saṃbhavavibhavanimittatvāt |
T04canprasu:5704: iha kaṃcit kālaviśeṣamapekṣya aṅkurotpattiḥ bhāvānāmutpādo bhavati,
