T04canprasu:5705: kaṃcitkālaviśeṣamapekṣya vibhavo vināśo bhavati, na sarvadā,
T04canprasu:5706: vidyamānāyāmapi hetupratyayasāmagryām- ityato vidyata eva kālaḥ,
T04canprasu:5709: syāt saṃbhavavibhavanimittatā kālasya yadi saṃbhavavibhavāveva syātām |
T04canprasu:5713: vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai |
T04canprasu:5714: vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai || 1 ||
T04canprasu:5715: iha yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām, tau anyonyaṃ sahabhāvena vā syātām,
T04canprasu:5719: tatra tāvad yathā vinā saṃbhavena utpādena vibhavo vināśo nāsti, tathā
T04canprasu:5721: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā |
T04canprasu:5722: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā || 2 ||
T04canprasu:5723: saṃbhavaṃ vinā kathaṃ nāma vibhavo vināśo bhaviṣyati? kathaṃ nāmetyanena prasiddhamatyantāsaṃbhavaṃ darśayati |
T04canprasu:5725: yadi punarvinaiva saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaḥ syāt, ko doṣaḥ syāt? ucyate |
T04canprasu:5726: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ syāt, ajātasya maraṇaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:5729: ādyenātra ślokasyārdhena pratijñā, madhyena pādena prasaṅgāpādanam, antyena nigamanamiti vijñeyam || 2 ||
T04canprasu:5730: evaṃ tāvadvinā saṃbhavena vibhavo na yuktaḥ iti pratipādya idānīṃ saha saṃbhavenāpi vibhavo na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:5732: na janmamaraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate || 3 ||
T04canprasu:5733: yadi hi saṃbhavena saha yugapat tulyakālaṃ vibhavaḥ syāt, evaṃ sati janmamaraṇe yugapat syātām |
T04canprasu:5734: na caivaṃ parasparaviruddhe ālokāndhakāravadekasmin kāle vidyete iti |
T04canprasu:5735: tasmāt sahāpi saṃbhavena vibhavasya nāsti siddhiriti sthitam || 3 ||
T04canprasu:5736: yadā caivaṃ saṃbhavena vinā vā saha vā vibhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ, evaṃ saṃbhavasyāpi vinā vā saha vā vibhavena nāsti siddhiriti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:5737: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācinna vidyate || naiva hi saṃbhavo vibhavena vinā yujyate |
T04canprasu:5738: yasmādanityatā hi bhāveṣu bhavanadharmakeṣu utpāda dharmakeṣu na kadācinna vidyate, kiṃ tarhi sarvadaiva vidyate |
T04canprasu:5741: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā || iti |
T04canprasu:5742: yadā caivaṃ nityamanityatānugatāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ, tadā kutaḥ sā kācidavasthā yā vināśarahitā syāditi? ato nāsti vibhavena vinā utpāda iti |
T04canprasu:5745: yastu sahetuko vināśaḥ, saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvāt, utpādavat, iti sādhanamutkṣipya antyacittacaittakṣaṇairanaikāntikatāmāha, sa na yuktamāha, tadvināśasyāpi jātipratyayatvena sahetukatvāt sādhyasamatvācca anaikāntikatābhāvāt yadapi nirdiṣṭam- bhāvātmabhāva eva abhūtvā
T04canprasu:5746: bhāvādutpāda ucyate, tasmād dravyasadutpādasiddhervyavahārato dṛṣṭāntabhāva iti, tadapi na yuktam, adravyasatāṃ pratibimbādīnāṃ sahetukatvābhyupagamāt |
T04canprasu:5748: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye |
T04canprasu:5749: kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ || iti |
T04canprasu:5750: asmādā[gamāt] kuto vyavahārato dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ? yadi ca bhāvāt, yat tattvānyatvena na śakyate vaktum, tat saṃvṛtyāpi nāstītyucyate |
T04canprasu:5756: kuto mādhyamikānāṃ svabhāvarūpaṃ siddhasattākaṃ yasya avasthāviśeṣa utpādaḥ syāt? ataḥ ayuktameva dṛṣṭāntāsiddhatodbhāvanam |
T04canprasu:5757: yaccoktam- na sahetuko vināśaḥ, avināśavattvāt, yathā asaṃskṛtamiti,
T04canprasu:5759: yathā hi ayaṃ heturvināśasya nirhetukatvaṃ sādhayati, evaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvābhāvamapi sādhayati |
T04canprasu:5762: na vijñānaṃ viṣayasvarūpacchedakam, avijñānavattvāt, asaṃskṛtavat, ityādinā sarvaniṣedhānmahatī aniṣṭāpattirupapadyate 'sya, iti nāstheyametat || 4 ||
T04canprasu:5763: idānīṃ vibhavena saha yathā saṃbhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ, tathā
T04canprasu:5766: na janmamaraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate || 5 ||
T04canprasu:5767: yadi hi saṃbhavo vibhavenaiva saha syāt, tadā janmamaraṇayostulyakālatā syāt |
T04canprasu:5770: atha syāt- yadyapi janmamaraṇayorekībhāvena vā nānābhāvena vā nāsti
T04canprasu:5771: siddhiḥ, tathāpi vidyete eva saṃbhavavibhavau, vācyatvāt, vijñānavat, iti
T04canprasu:5773: yadi vācyatvena anayoḥ siddhiriṣyate, vandhyāputrasyāpi iṣyatām ||
T04canprasu:5776: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate || 6 ||
T04canprasu:5777: sahabhāvāsahabhāvarahitaṃ nāsti pakṣāntaraṃ yataḥ saṃbhavavibhavayoḥ siddhiḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:5780: anirdhāryamāṇau svarūpatvāt bandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivanna staḥ eva saṃbhavavibhavāviti |
T04canprasu:5781: yadā caivaṃ saṃbhavavibhavau na staḥ, tadā taddheturapi kālo nāstīti siddham || 6 ||
T04canprasu:5782: kiṃ cānyat- ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpyamānau kṣayadharmiṇo vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātāmakṣayadharmiṇo vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate iti
T04canprasu:5785: kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca || 7 ||
T04canprasu:5786: tatra kṣayasya kṣayalakṣaṇasya bhāvasya virodhidharmasadbhāvāt saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ |
T04canprasu:5787: akṣayasyāpi bhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt kharaviṣāṇasyeva saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ |
T04canprasu:5789: kṣayadharmo hi avidyamānaḥ, tasya nirāśrayo vibhavo na yuktaḥ |
T04canprasu:5793: bhaviṣyati? yau ca saṃbhavavibhavau na kṣayadharmiṇo nākṣayadharmiṇo
T04canprasu:5796: atrāha- vidyete eva bhāvānāṃ saṃbhavavibhavau, tadāśrayidharmisadbhāvāt |
T04canprasu:5797: iha bhāvāśrayau saṃbhavavibhavau, sa ca tāvad bhāvo 'sti, tatsadbhāvāt tadāśritāvapi dharmau bhaviṣyataḥ iti |
T04canprasu:5799: syātāṃ bhāvāśritāvetau dharmau, yadi bhāvaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:5801: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate |
T04canprasu:5803: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate || 8 ||
T04canprasu:5804: bhāvasya hi lakṣaṇabhūtau saṃbhavavibhavau, tau ca svarūpato na staḥ iti
T04canprasu:5806: yadā ca tau bhāvataḥ pratiṣiddhau, tadā bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca vinā kuto bhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇo bhāvo bhaviṣyati?
T04canprasu:5807: bhāvaṃ ca vinā na staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau ||
T04canprasu:5808: apare tu pūrvārdhaṃ paścimaṃ kṛtvā vyācakṣate |
T04canprasu:5811: iha yannāsti, na tasyāsti bhāvadharmatvam, tadyathā maṇḍūkajaṭāśiromaṇeḥ |
T04canprasu:5812: bhāvadharmau ca saṃbhavavibhavau, (Pp_181) tasmāt staḥ eva tau iti |
T04canprasu:5813: yadi kasyacit paramārthataḥ saṃbhavavibhavau syātām, sa bhāva iti yuktaṃ syādabhidhātum |
T04canprasu:5814: tau ca na staḥ, iti saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate |
T04canprasu:5818: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate ||
T04canprasu:5820: kiṃ cānyat- ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpamānau śūnyasya vā bhāvasya
T04canprasu:5821: parikalpyeyātāmaśūnyasya vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate iti
T04canprasu:5828: kiṃ cānyat- iha yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām, tau ekatvena vā
T04canprasu:5829: syātāmanyatvena vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha-
T04canprasu:5834: na hi saṃbhavarahitasya vināśaḥ, na vibhavarahitasya saṃbhavo dṛṣṭa iti |
T04canprasu:5835: evamubhayoḥ parasparamavyabhicāritvāt saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva na nānetyupapadyate ||
T04canprasu:5836: atha syāt- kimanayā sūkṣmekṣikayā? āgopālāṅganādiko hi janaḥ yasmāt saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca paśyati, tasmāt staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau |
T04canprasu:5837: na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ śakyo draṣṭumiti |
T04canprasu:5842: na hi yad yad lokenopalabhyate tasya tasya astitvam |
T04canprasu:5843: tathā hi āgopālāṅganādiko jano gandharvanagaramāyāsvapnālātacakramarīcikāsalilādikamavidyamānamapi paśyati indriyopaghātāt, evamimāvapi saṃbhavavibhavau asantau mohādeva
T04canprasu:5846: atha kasmāt punaretadevaṃ niścīyate- avidyamānasvarūpāvimau saṃbhavavibhavau mohādeva vāralokena dṛśyete iti |
T04canprasu:5848: kā punaratra yuktiḥ? iha yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma bhavet,
T04canprasu:5850: tathā yadi abhāvo nāma kaścit, so
T04canprasu:5855: bhāvāt tāvat saṃbhavākhyād bhāvasya saṃbhavākhyasya utpādo na vidyate,
T04canprasu:5859: kiṃ kāraṇam? abhāvo hi nāma vibhavo vināśaḥ |
T04canprasu:5861: tasmādbhāvaviruddhāt kathaṃ bhāvaḥ syāt? yadi syāt, tadā vandhyāduhiturapi putraḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:5867: kāryakaraṇasāmarthyam? yadi syāt, nirvāṇasyāpi kāryakaraṇasāmarthyaṃ syāt
T04canprasu:5868: | yadi ca abhāvādabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā vandhyāduhiturapi putraḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:5876: yataścaivaṃ vicāryamāṇau saṃbhavavibhavau na staḥ, tasmānmohādeva lokena dṛśyete iti vijñeyam
T04canprasu:5878: ayamanyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ- iha hi yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām, tau bhāvāśrayau vā syātāmabhāvāśrayau vā |
T04canprasu:5879: tau ca bhāvābhāvau sarvathā vicāryamāṇau na saṃbhavataḥ |
T04canprasu:5884: yathā ca bhāvābhāvau na saṃbhavataḥ, tathā
T04canprasu:5890: yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma syāt, tasya udayavyayavattvāt saṃbhavavibhavau syātām |
T04canprasu:5895: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate |
T04canprasu:5896: na svataḥ parataścaiva jāyate, jāyate kutaḥ || 13 ||
T04canprasu:5897: etacca ādya eva prakaraṇe vyākhyātattvānna punarvyākhyāyate |
T04canprasu:5898: yaścaivaṃ yathoktaprakāreṇa jāyate sa idānīṃ kuto jāyate? naiva kutaścijjāyate ityabhiprāyaḥ
T04canprasu:5906: sa bhāvo hi nityo 'nityo 'tha vā bhavet || 14 ||
T04canprasu:5918: yo hi hetuphalayorudayavyayānuprabandhaḥ, sa hi asmākaṃ bhavaḥ saṃsāraḥ |
T04canprasu:5919: tatra yadi heturnirudhyeta, taddhetukaṃ phalaṃ notpadyeta, tadā syāducchedavādadoṣaḥ |
T04canprasu:5924: sa eva saṃsāraḥ yo 'yaṃ hetuphalāvicchinnakramavartī utpādavyayānuprabandhaḥ saṃskārāṇāmiti
T04canprasu:5930: yo hi hetukṣaṇaḥ phalasyotpattau hetubhāvamupetya nirudhyate, nanu tasya vyayavato hetukṣaṇasya punaranutpādāducchedadarśanamāpadyate |
T04canprasu:5931: tavāyaṃ kathaṃ na doṣa iti cet, bhāvamabhyupapannasya ayaṃ doṣaḥ |
T04canprasu:5932: na ca mayā bhāvo 'bhyupagataḥ, svabhāvānutpannatvāt sarvadharmāṇām |
T04canprasu:5934: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat |
T04canprasu:5936: ityuktam, tatrāpi amunā nyāyena naiḥsvābhāvyameva bhāvānāṃ pratipāditam |
T04canprasu:5937: anyathā hi sati bhāvasvarūpe bījāṅkurayoḥ kathamanyatvaṃ na syāt?
T04canprasu:5942: yadi hi hetoḥ sadbhāvaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt, tasya paścādasadbhāvo na syāt svabhāvasyā napāyitvāt
T04canprasu:5946: yadyapi hetuphalayorudayavyayasaṃtānapravṛttyā śāśvatocchedadarśanaprasaṅgaḥ parihriyate, tathāpi yatrāsya saṃtānasya
T04canprasu:5949: evaṃvidhamucchedadarśanaṃ na bhaviṣyatīti cet, anyadapi kimarthaṃ bhavatā
T04canprasu:5954: kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha hi caramo bhavo
T04canprasu:5958: anayośca bhavayoḥ saṃsāra iti saṃjñā kṛtā
T04canprasu:5959: atra ca idaṃ vicāryate- ya eṣa prathamo bhavaḥ phalarūpatvena vyavasthāpyate, sa kiṃ carame bhave niruddhe upajāyate, athāniruddhe, uta
T04canprasu:5960: nirudhyamāne, yato hetuphalānuprabandhāt saṃsāraḥ syāt? sarvathā ca vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavatīti
T04canprasu:5961: carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ |
T04canprasu:5962: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ || 18 ||
T04canprasu:5963: tatra yadi carame bhave niruddhe prathamo bhavo jāyate iti parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:5967: tasmāccarame niruddhe prathamo bhavo na yujyate ||
T04canprasu:5968: idānīmaniruddhe 'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo na yujyate |
T04canprasu:5970: nirhetukaḥ syāt, dvirūpatā ca ekasya sattvasya syāt,
T04canprasu:5971: apūrvasattvaprādurbhāvaśca, pūrvasya ca nityatā syāt, avinaṣṭe ca bīje
T04canprasu:5975: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ |
T04canprasu:5977: idānīṃ nirudhyamāne 'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo yathā nopapadyate
T04canprasu:5981: tatra nirudhyamāno vartamāno vartamānapratyayāntavācyatvāt, jāyate ityapi vartamāna evocyate vartamānaśabdavācyatvāt |
T04canprasu:5983: yaścāpi jāyate, asāvapi janikriyākārakaḥ, tau ca ekakālāviṣyamāṇau yaugapadyenaiva staḥ
T04canprasu:5985: syāt, jāyamānaścāpara iti yaugapadyenaiva dvau bhavau prāpnutaḥ |
T04canprasu:5986: na caikasya yugapad dvau bhavau saṃbhavataḥ ityuktametat || 19 ||
T04canprasu:5989: sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate || 20 ||
T04canprasu:5992: yadā evaṃ yathoditanyāyena niruddhe carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati, aniruddhe
T04canprasu:5993: 'pi carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati, sārdhaṃ caikasmiśca kāle caramena bhavena saha prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati, tat kimidānīṃ yeṣu eva skandheṣu mriyate teṣu eva jāyate iti syāt |
T04canprasu:5996: na hi mriyamāṇo jāyate iti dṛṣṭam || 20 ||
T04canprasu:5998: evaṃ triṣvapi kāleṣu na yuktā bhavadabhimatā bhavasaṃtatiḥ |
T04canprasu:5999: carame bhave niruddhe 'niruddhe nirudhyamāne yasmāt prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati, tasmāt triṣvapi kāleṣu bhavasaṃtirnāsti |
T04canprasu:6000: triṣu kāleṣu yā nāsti sā kathaṃ bhavasaṃtatiḥ || 21 ||
T04canprasu:6001: yā ca idānīṃ triṣu kāleṣu nāsti, kutaḥ sā anyenātmanā bhaviṣyatīti sarvathā nāsti bhavanmatā bhavasaṃtatiḥ |
T04canprasu:6005: tataśca bhāvābhyupagame sati sa eva śāśvatocchedavādaprasaṅgo durnivāro bhavatām, ityato nāstyeva
T04canprasu:6009: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro |
T04canprasu:6010: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā ||
T04canprasu:6012: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāra anucchedaśāśvatāḥ ||
T04canprasu:6016: jāyate cyavate cāpi na ca jātirna ca cyutiḥ |
T04canprasu:6017: yasya vijānata eṣa samādhirnāsya durlabhaḥ || iti|
T04canprasu:6019: sūsukhitā sada te nara loke yehi acintiya jñātibhi dharmāḥ |
T04canprasu:6020: na ca dharma adharma vikalpo cittapapañca vibhāvita sarvi ||
T04canprasu:6021: bhāva abhāva vibhāvayi jñānaṃ sarvamacintayi sarvamabhūtam |
T04canprasu:6022: ye puna cittavaśānuga bālāste dukhitā bhavakoṭiśateṣu ||
T04canprasu:6023: yo 'pi ca cintayi śūnyakadharmān so 'pi kumārgapapannaku bālaḥ |
T04canprasu:6024: akṣara kīrtita śūnyaka dharmāste ca anakṣara akṣara uktāḥ ||
T04canprasu:6025: śānta paśānta ya cintayi dharmān so 'pi ca cittu na jātu na bhūtaḥ |
T04canprasu:6026: cittavitarkaṇa sarvi papañcāḥ sūkṣma acintiya budhyatha dharmān ||
T04canprasu:6028: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃbhavavibhavaparīkṣā nāma ekaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:6031: iha hi bhagavatā mahākaruṇopāyaprajñādvayadhāriṇā sakalatraidhātukāśeṣasattvajātyādiduḥkhavyupaśamaikamanasā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ saptabhirvā nairantaryakrameṇodyacchatā taistairniratiśayairativicitraiḥ puṇyakriyāprārambhaiḥ sakalajagaddhitodayaikakriyālakṣaṇaiḥ priyaikaputrādapyadhikataraniravaśeṣajagadanugrahatatpareṇa mahākaruṇāparavaśena tatratatropapattyāyatane kṣitisalilajvalanapavanasādhāraṇabhaiṣajyamahāmahīruhavajjanānāṃ svecchāta upabhogyatāmātmānamupagamayatā mahākālena sārvajñaṃ sarvākāraparicchedi padamadhigatam sa evamadhigatasarvajñajñāno bhagavān yathā dharmāṇāṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tathaiva aśeṣato gatatvād buddhatvāt tathāgata ityucyate |
T04canprasu:6032: yadi bhavasaṃtatirna syāt, tadā tathāgato 'pi na syāt |
T04canprasu:6033: na hi ekena janmanā śakyaṃ tathāgatatvamanuprāptum |
T04canprasu:6036: bhavadīyameva hi idamatimahadajñānaṃ bhavasaṃtānasya avicchedavartitāṃ ca atidīrghakālaṃ ca
T04canprasu:6037: gamayati, yasya nāma bhavataḥ atimahadajñānadhanāndhakārameva vicitrairupapattiśaraccandrajñānālokairvidhvasyamānamapi aticiratarakālābhyāsavāsanāvistarābhivṛddhamadyāpi na vidhvasyate na nivartate |
T04canprasu:6038: yadi hi tathāgato nāma kaścit syāt svabhāvataḥ, tadā tasya mahatā kālenābhiniṣpatterbhavasaṃtatiḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:6039: na ca tathāgato nāma kaścid bhāvasvabhāvata upalabhyate |
T04canprasu:6040: kevalaṃ tu bhavānavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā dvicandrakeśamaśakādivanmithyā tathāgataṃ nāma svabhāvata upalabhate |
T04canprasu:6043: skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ |
T04canprasu:6045: yadi hi tathāgato nāma kaścit padārtho 'malo niṣprapañcaḥ syāt, sa skandhasvabhāvo vā bhavet,
T04canprasu:6049: pūrvakā eva pañca skandhāḥ sattvaprajñaptinimittatvādiha vicāre parigṛhyante nottare,
T04canprasu:6051: yadi vā pañcaskandhavyatirikto bhavet, tatra tathāgate vā skandhāḥ syuḥ,
T04canprasu:6052: skandheṣu vā sa bhavet, tathāgato vā skandhavān bhavet dhanavāniva devadattaḥ? sarvathā ca vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavati |
T04canprasu:6053: kathaṃ kṛtvā? tatra tāvat skandhā eva na tathāgataḥ |
T04canprasu:6064: evaṃ tāvat skandhā na tathāgataḥ || idānīṃ nānyaḥ skandhebhyastathāgata
T04canprasu:6078: anyatvābhāvācca skandhādīnāṃ tathāgatasya ca, tathāgate skandhā nopapadyante ||
T04canprasu:6081: skandheṣvātmā vidyate naiva cāmī santi skandhā ātmanītīha yasmāt |
T04canprasu:6082: satyanyatve syādiyaṃ kalpanā vai taccānyatvaṃ nāstyataḥ kalpanaiṣā ||
T04canprasu:6083: skandhavānapi tathāgato yathā na bhavati, tathā tatraivoktam-
T04canprasu:6084: iṣṭo nātmā rūpavānnāsti yasmādātmā vattvārthopayogo hi nātaḥ |
T04canprasu:6085: bhede gomān rūpavānaṣyabhede tattvānyatve 'rūpato nātmanaḥ staḥ ||
T04canprasu:6086: tattvānyatvapakṣe eva tu pañcāpi pakṣā antargatā vastutaḥ |
T04canprasu:6087: satkāyadṛṣṭipravṛttyapekṣayā tu pañca pakṣāḥ samupavarṇyante ācāryeṇeti vijñeyam |
T04canprasu:6088: yaścaivaṃ skandheṣu pañcadhā vicāryamāṇo nāsti tathāgataḥ, sa kenānyena ātmanā bhaviṣyatīti, sarvathā na saṃbhavatyeva tathāgata iti bhāvasvabhāvādapaśyanta ācāryapādāḥ prāhuḥ- katamo 'tra tathāgata iti |
T04canprasu:6091: atraike vadanti- naiva hi skandhāstathāgata iti brūmaḥ,
T04canprasu:6094: nāpi tathāgate anāsravān skandhān varṇayāmaḥ, himavati parvate iva tarukhaṇḍam |
T04canprasu:6099: kiṃ tarhi skandhānamalānupādāya tattvānyatvādyavācyaṃ tathāgataṃ vyavasthāpayāmaḥ |
T04canprasu:6103: svabhāvataśca yo nāsti kutaḥ sa parabhāvataḥ || 2 ||
T04canprasu:6104: yadi hi buddho bhagavānamalān skandhānupādāya tattvānyatvenāvaktavyaḥ
T04canprasu:6105: prajñapyate, na tarhi svabhāvataḥ so 'stīti vyaktamāpadyate,
T04canprasu:6107: yaśca idānīṃ svabhāvato nāsti ātmīyena svarūpeṇa, sa kathamavidyamānaḥ svabhāvataḥ skandhānupādāya parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti? na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ parabhāvamapekṣya bhavatīti yujyate atha syāt- yathaiva hi pratibimbakaṃ svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānamapi
T04canprasu:6108: parabhāvaṃ mukhādarśādikamapekṣya bhavati, evaṃ ca tathāgato 'pi
T04canprasu:6112: yaścānātmā sa ca kathaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ || 3 ||
T04canprasu:6113: yadi pratibimbavat parabhāvaṃ pratītya tathāgataḥ iṣyate, evaṃ sati pratibimbavadeva sa tathāgato 'nātmetyupapadyate |
T04canprasu:6117: pratibimbavadeva, sa kathaṃ tathāgataḥ svabhāvarūpato bhaviṣyati?
T04canprasu:6119: kiṃ cānyat- iha yadi tathāgatasya kaścit svabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā tatsvabhāvāpekṣayā skandhasvabhāvaḥ parabhāva iti syāt, taṃ ca parabhāvaṃ
T04canprasu:6121: yadā tu tathāgatasya svabhāva eva nāsti, tadā kutaḥ skandhānāṃ paratvaṃ syāditi pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:6122: yadi nāsti svabhāvaśca parabhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavet |
T04canprasu:6123: yadā caivaṃ svabhāvaparabhāvau na staḥ, tadā svabhāvaparabhāvābhyāmṛte kaḥ sa tathāgataḥ || padārtho hi bhavan svabhāvo bhavet, parabhāvo vā |
T04canprasu:6125: aparaḥ padārtho 'sti, yastathāgata iti vyavasthāpyate? tasmānnāsti svabhāvatastathāgata iti kiṃ cānyat-
T04canprasu:6128: yadi manyase- skandhebhyastattvānyatvena avaktavyastathāgataḥ skandhānupādāya prajñapyate iti, tat kadā yujyate? yadi skandhānanupādāya agṛhītvā pūrvaṃ kaścittathāgato nāma bhavet, sa skandhānupādadyāt |
T04canprasu:6129: vyatirikta eva hi pūrvasiddho dhanād devadatto dhanasyopādānaṃ kurute,
T04canprasu:6130: tadvadetān skandhānanupādāya yadi kaścit tathāgataḥ syāt, sa idānīṃ skandhānupādadyāt, tataśca tān skandhānupādāya tato bhavet || 5 ||
T04canprasu:6136: yadā caivaṃ na kiṃcidapyupādatte, tadā skandhānupādāya tathāgato nāma bhaviṣyatīti nopapadyate yadā caivaṃ tathāgataḥ upādānātpūrvamavidyamānatvāt na kiṃcidupādatte,
T04canprasu:6137: tadā tadupādānasyāpi kenacidapi anupādīyamānasya upādānatvaṃ na saṃbhavatyeveti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:6139: yadā caivamupādānaṃ kenacidapyanupādīyamānatvādupādānaṃ na bhavatīti, tadā upādānābhāvādupādātāpi kaścinnāstīti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:6145: yo hi tathāgato vicāryamāṇo mṛgyamāṇaḥ tattvenaskandhebhya ekatvena nāsti,
T04canprasu:6146: anyatvena skandhebhyaḥ pṛthaktvena ca yo nāsti, evaṃ tattvānyatvāsatvādādhārādheyatadvatpakṣapañcaprakārairmṛgyamāṇo
T04canprasu:6147: yo nāsti, sa kathamatyanto 'saṃvidyamānastathāgataḥ upādānena śakyaḥ prajñapayitum? ityato 'pi nāsti tathāgato nāma svabhāvataḥ || 8 ||
T04canprasu:6148: na kevalamanena vicāreṇa tathāgata eva nāsti,
T04canprasu:6151: tadapi svabhāvena na vidyate, pratītyasamutpannatvāt, skandhaparīkṣāyāṃ ca vistareṇa pratiṣiddhatvāt
T04canprasu:6152: athāpi syāt- yadyapi svabhāvataḥ upādānaṃ nāsti, tathāpi hetupratyayātmakāt parabhāvā dbhaviṣyatīti, tadāpi nopapadyate iti
T04canprasu:6155: na hi bandhyāsūnuḥ svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānaḥ śakyaḥ parabhāvena prajñapayitumiti |
T04canprasu:6160: atha yadyapi upādātṛnirapekṣamupādānaṃ svabhāvasiddhaṃ na saṃbhavati, evaṃ tadupādātrapekṣameva bhavatviti |
T04canprasu:6164: svabhāvato yadupādānaṃ na siddham, tadavidyamānasvabhāvaṃ kathamupādātuḥ parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti
T04canprasu:6168: sarveṇa prakāreṇa vicāryamāṇaṃ śūnyamupādānaṃ niḥsvabhāvam, upādātā ca śūnyaḥ svabhāvarahitaḥ
T04canprasu:6171: naiva tatsaṃbhavati yadavidyamānena avidyamānasya tathāgatasya prajñaptiḥ syāditi |
T04canprasu:6172: tasmāt skandhānupādāya tathāgataḥ prajñapyate iti nopapadyate ||
T04canprasu:6173: atrāhuḥ- aho vata hatā pratyāśā asmākam, ye hi nāma vayaṃ svavikalpavikalpitātikaṭhinakudarśanamālutālatājālāvabaddheṣu nirvāṇapuragāmyaviparītamārgagamanaparibhraṣṭeṣu anatikrāntasaṃsārāṭavīkāntāradurgeṣu kaṇabhakṣākṣapādadigambarajaimininaiyāyikaprabhṛtiṣu tīrthakareṣu aviparītasvargāpavargamārgopadeśābhimāniṣu spṛhāṃ parityajya
T04canprasu:6178: ityādinā svabhāvato 'sattvaṃ vruvatā bhavatā hatā asmākaṃ mokṣapratyāśā anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhyāgamābhilāṣaḥ iti |
T04canprasu:6181: asmākameva hatā pratyāśā bhavadvidheṣvabudhajaneṣu ye hi nāma bhavantaḥ mokṣakāmatayā anyatīrthyamatāni parityajya bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamapi aviparītaṃ paramaśāstāraṃ pratipadya paramagambhīramanuttaraṃ
T04canprasu:6182: sarvatīrthyavādāsādhāraṇaṃ nairātmyasiṃhanādamasahamānāḥ kuraṅgamā iva svādhimuktidaridratayā vividhakudṛṣṭivyālamālākulaṃ viparyastajanānuyātaṃ tameva mahāghorasaṃsārāṭavīkāntāracārakānugamārgamavagāhante na hi tathāgatāḥ kadācidapyātmanaḥ skandhānāṃ vā astitvaṃ prajñapayanti |
T04canprasu:6185: buddhadharmā apyāyuṣman subhūte māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ || iti ||
T04canprasu:6187: dharma svabhāvatu śūnya vivikto bodhi svabhāvatu śūnya viviktā |
T04canprasu:6188: yo hi caretsa pi śūnyasvabhāvo jñānavato na tu bālajanasya || iti |
T04canprasu:6189: na ca vayaṃ sarvathaiva niṣprapañcānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nāstitvaṃ brūmaḥ,
T04canprasu:6192: niḥsvabhāvaṃ hi tathāgataṃ vyācakṣāṇena aviparītārthābhidhitsunā yogināṃ satā sarvathā-
T04canprasu:6195: kiṃ tu anukte yathāvadavasthitaṃ svabhāvaṃ pratipattā pratipattuṃ na samartha ityato vayamapi āropato vyavahārasatye eva sthitvā vyavahārārthaṃ vineyajanānurodhena (Pp_193)
T04canprasu:6196: śūnyamityapi brūmaḥ, aśūnyamityapi, śūnyāśūnyamityapi, naiva śūnyaṃ nāśūnyamityapi brūmaḥ
T04canprasu:6212: evaṃ yāvat atītaṃ cedbhikṣavo vijñānaṃ nābhaviṣyat-
T04canprasu:6218: na śūnyaṃ nāpi cāśūnyaṃ tasmātsarvaṃ vidhīyate |
T04canprasu:6220: yena tvabhiprāyeṇa śūnyatvādikamupadiśyate, sa ātmaparīkṣāto boddhavyaḥ |
T04canprasu:6223: nātmā na sattva na ca jīvagatī dharmā marīcidakacandrasamāḥ ||
T04canprasu:6228: rathacakravad bhramati sarvajagat tiryakṣu pretanirayeṣu gatāḥ |
T04canprasu:6229: mūḍhā adeśika anāthagatāḥ teṣāṃ pradarśayasi mārgavaram || iti |
T04canprasu:6230: sarvāstvetāḥ kalpanā niṣprapañce tathāgate na saṃbhavanti || 11 ||
T04canprasu:6231: na ca kevalaṃ śūnyatvādikameva catuṣṭayaṃ tathāgate na saṃbhavati, api ca-
T04canprasu:6236: lokaḥ, aśāśvato lokaḥ, śāśvataśca aśāśvataśca lokaḥ, naiva śāśvato nāśāśvataśca lokaḥ, iti catuṣṭayam |
T04canprasu:6238: antavāṃśca anantavāṃśca lokaḥ, naiva antavān na anantavāṃśca lokaḥ, iti dvitīyam |
T04canprasu:6239: bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ
T04canprasu:6240: maraṇāt, bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, naiva bhavati na na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, iti tṛtīyam |
T04canprasu:6244: tatra yathopavarṇitena nyāyena yathā śūnyatvādikaṃ catuṣṭayaṃ prakṛtyā śānte niḥsvabhāve tathāgate na saṃbhavati, evaṃ śāśvatāśāśvatādikamapi catuṣṭayamatra na saṃbhavati |
T04canprasu:6245: asaṃbhavādeva ca catuṣṭayaṃ vandhyāputrasya śyāmagauratvādivat na vyākṛtaṃ bhagavatā lokasya
T04canprasu:6246: yathā ca etaccatuṣṭayaṃ tathāgate na saṃbhavati, evamantānantādikamapi śānte tathāgate na saṃbhavati || 12 ||
T04canprasu:6247: idānīṃ bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt ityādikasyāpi kalpanācatuṣṭayasya pravṛttyasaṃbhava
T04canprasu:6250: yena hi ghanataro mahatābhiniveśena asti tathāgataḥ iti grāho gṛhītaḥ,
T04canprasu:6251: parikalpa utpāditaḥ, saḥ niyataṃ parinirvṛte tathāgate, na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, maraṇāduttarakālaṃ na bhavati,
T04canprasu:6254: yasya tu na kasyāṃcidapyavasthāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatvāt tathāgatasya
T04canprasu:6257: paraṃ nirodhādbhavati buddho na bhavatīti vā || 14 ||
T04canprasu:6259: tadevaṃ prakṛtiśānte niḥsvabhāve tathāgate sarvaprapañcātīte mandabuddhitayā śāśvatāśāśvatādikayā nityānityāstināstiśūnyāśūnyasarvajñāsarvajñādikayā kalpanayā-
T04canprasu:6261: te prapañcahatāḥ sarve na paśyanti tathāgatam || 15 ||
T04canprasu:6262: vastunibandhanā hi prapañcāḥ syuḥ, avastukaśca tathāgataḥ |
T04canprasu:6263: kutaḥ prapañcānāṃ pravṛttisaṃbhava iti? ataḥ prapañcātītastathāgataḥ |
T04canprasu:6265: tamitthaṃvidhaṃ tathāgataṃ svotprekṣitamithyāparikalpamalamalinamānasatayā vividhairabhūtaiḥ parikalpaviśeṣaiḥ ye buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ prapañcayanti,
T04canprasu:6267: tataśca śavabhūtāḥ etasmin pravacane na paśyanti tathāgataṃ jātyandhā ivādityam |
T04canprasu:6269: ye māṃ rūpeṇa adrākṣurye māṃ ghoṣeṇa anvayuḥ |
T04canprasu:6270: mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtā na māṃ drakṣyanti te janāḥ ||
T04canprasu:6271: dharmato buddhā draṣṭavyā dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ |
T04canprasu:6272: dharmatā cāpyavijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum ||
T04canprasu:6274: tadatra tathāgataparīkṣāyāṃ sattvalokaḥ sakalaḥ sasurāsuranarādiḥ parīkṣitaḥ |
T04canprasu:6275: yathā cāyaṃ sattvaloko niḥsvabhāvaḥ, tathā bhājanalokasyāpi vāyumaṇḍalāderakaniṣṭhavitānabhavanaparyantasya
T04canprasu:6283: yathā ca jagato naiḥsvābhāvyam, tathā pratyayaparīkṣādibhiḥ pratipāditam |
T04canprasu:6285: anupādadharmaḥ satataṃ tathāgataḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ sugatena sādṛśāḥ |
T04canprasu:6286: nimittagrāheṇa tu bālabuddhayaḥ asatsu dharmeṣu caranti loke ||
T04canprasu:6287: tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya |
T04canprasu:6288: naivātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarva loke || iti
T04canprasu:6290: atha khalu te devaputrāḥ āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocan- kiṃ punarāryasubhūte māyopamāste sattvāḥ, na te māyā? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat- māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ,
T04canprasu:6292: iti hi māyā ca sattvāśca advayameta dadvaidhīkāram |
T04canprasu:6293: iti hi svapnaśca sattvāśca advayametadadvaidhīkāram |sarvadharmā api devaputrā māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ |
T04canprasu:6305: atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan- samyaksaṃbuddho 'pi
T04canprasu:6306: māyopamaḥ svapnopama iti, samyaksaṃbuddhatvamapi māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti
T04canprasu:6307: āryasubhūte vadasi? subhūtirāha- nirvāṇamapi devaputrā māyopamaṃ
T04canprasu:6308: svapnopamamiti vadāmi, kiṃ punaranyaṃ dharmam? devaputrā āhuḥ-
T04canprasu:6310: yadyapi devaputrā nirvāṇādapyanyaḥ kaściddharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:6312: iti hi māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramiti ||
T04canprasu:6313: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau tathāgataparīkṣā nāma dvāviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:6322: tasmāt kāryabhūtāpi janmamaraṇaparaṃparā avicchedaprabandhena bhavasaṃtatirapi bhaviṣyatīti
T04canprasu:6324: syād bhavasaṃtatiḥ, yadi taddhetubhūtāḥ kleśāḥ syuḥ |
T04canprasu:6331: kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpātkila jāyase |
T04canprasu:6332: na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi ||
T04canprasu:6333: iti gāthābhidhānāt saṃkalpaprabhavo rāgo dveṣo mohaśca kathyate |
T04canprasu:6337: tatra hi śubhamākāraṃ pratītya rāga utpadyate, aśubhaṃ pratītya dveṣaḥ,
T04canprasu:6345: āvilo mohajo manaskāro bhikṣavo 'vidyāyā hetuḥ || ityataḥ avidyā saṃkalpaprabhavā bhavati tataśca-
T04canprasu:6347: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmāt kleśā na tattvataḥ || 2 ||
T04canprasu:6349: yadi rāgādayaḥ svabhāvasiddhāḥ syuḥ, naiva te śubhāśubhaviparyāsān
T04canprasu:6351: bhavanti ca śubhāśubhaviparyāsān pratītya, tasmānniḥsvabhāvā eva te |
T04canprasu:6352: tattvato na vidyante, paramārthataḥ svabhāvato na vidyante ityarthaḥ || 2
T04canprasu:6356: ātmano yathā astitvanāstitve na staḥ, tathā uktaṃ vistareṇa |
T04canprasu:6359: atha syāt- yadi astitvanāstitve ātmano na staḥ, tadā kimatra kleśānāmāyātam, yatasteṣāmapi astitvanāstitve na staḥ iti? ucyate-
T04canprasu:6360: kasyaciddhi bhavantīme kleśāḥ sa ca na sidhyati |
T04canprasu:6361: kaścidāho vinā kaṃcitsanti kleśā na kasyacit || 4 ||
T04canprasu:6362: iha amī rāgādayaḥ kuḍayaṃ citravat phalaṃ pakvatādivacca utpattau āśrayamapekṣante |
T04canprasu:6363: tataśca kasyacidete bhavanti, na vinā kaṃcidāśrayam |
T04canprasu:6364: sa ca āśrayaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ ātmā vā cittaṃ vā bhavet |
T04canprasu:6366: taṃ ca kaṃcidāśrayaṃ vinā kasya kleśā
T04canprasu:6367: bhavantu? naiva kasyacidbhavanti, tasyāvidyamānatvāt, āho vinā kaṃcit
T04canprasu:6369: atrāha- naiva hi kleśānāṃ kaścidāśrayaḥ pūrvaṃ siddho 'bhyupagamyate |
T04canprasu:6370: na ca ātmā nāma kaścidasti, yaḥ āśrayatvena vyavasthāpyeta, nirhetukatvād vyomacūtataruvat
T04canprasu:6371: kiṃ tarhi kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ pratītya kleśā upajāyante,
T04canprasu:6374: svakāyadṛṣṭivat kleśāḥ kliṣṭe santi na pañcadhā |
T04canprasu:6378: yatheyaṃ pañcadhā vicāryamāṇā svakāye na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:6379: skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ |
T04canprasu:6382: evaṃ kliṣṭe 'pi kleśā vicāryamāṇāḥ pañcadhā na saṃbhavanti |
T04canprasu:6383: tatra kliśyantīti kleśā kliśyate iti kliṣṭam |
T04canprasu:6384: tatra yadeva kliṣṭaṃ tadeva kleśā iti na yujyate dagdhṛdāhyayorapyekatvaprasaṅgāt |
T04canprasu:6388: ata eva ca ekatvānyatvābhāvādādhārādheyatadvatpakṣāṇāṃ ca abhāvānna kleśeṣu kliṣṭam, na kliṣṭe kleśāḥ, nāpi kleśavat kliṣṭam |
T04canprasu:6389: ityevaṃ kliṣṭe pañcadhā vicāryamāṇāḥ kleśā na saṃbhavanti |
T04canprasu:6390: yathā ca kliṣṭahetukāḥ kleśā na saṃbhavanti, evaṃ kleśahetukamapi kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣu vicāryamāṇaṃ pañcadhā na saṃbhavati |
T04canprasu:6393: nirapekṣatvaprasaṅgāt, na ca kliṣṭe kleśāḥ na ca kleśeṣu kliṣṭam, na kliṣṭavantaḥ (Pp_199) kleśāḥ |
T04canprasu:6394: ityevaṃ svakāyadṛṣṭivadeva kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣvapi pañcadhā nāsti |
T04canprasu:6396: atrāha- yadyapi tvayā kleśāḥ pratiṣiddhāḥ, tathāpi kleśahetavaḥ śubhāśubhaviparyāsāstāvat santi, tatsadbhāvācca kleśāḥ santīti |
T04canprasu:6398: syuḥ kleśāḥ, yadi śubhāśubhaviparyāsā eva syuḥ, yāvatā ete 'pi pratītya sasutpannatvādvakṣyamāṇapratiṣedhācca
T04canprasu:6399: yadā ca te na santi svabhāvataḥ,
T04canprasu:6403: yadā ca te na santi svabhāvataḥ, tadā-
T04canprasu:6407: iha hi yannāsti, na tasyālambana masti, tadyathā vandhyāsūnoḥ |
T04canprasu:6414: vastu rāgasya dveṣasya mohasya ca vikalpyate || 7 ||
T04canprasu:6415: tatra vastu ālambanam, vasatīti vā asmin rāgādikam, tadutpatteḥ iti kṛtvā
T04canprasu:6416: | tacca tadālambanaṃ ṣoḍhā bhavati, indriyāṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ paricchedakarāṇāmanyonyabhedāt |
T04canprasu:6417: rūpaṃ śabdā gandhā rasāḥ spraṣṭavyāni dharmāśceti |
T04canprasu:6419: tena śabdena śabdyante prakāśyante padārthā iti śabdaḥ |
T04canprasu:6420: gandhyante hiṃsyante yatra prāptāḥ tato 'nyatrāgamanād gandhāḥ |
T04canprasu:6428: dūṣaṇaṃ doṣaḥ, āghātaḥ sattvaviṣayo 'sattvaviṣayo vā dūṣyate vā anena citamiti doṣaḥ |
T04canprasu:6431: tadeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ rūpādikaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ vastu ālambanaṃ bhavati |
T04canprasu:6432: tatra śubhākārādhyāropeṇa yathā rūpādibhyo rāga upajāyate, aśubhākārādhyāropeṇa dveṣaḥ, nityātmādyadhyāropeṇa mohaḥ saṃbhavatīti || 7 ||
T04canprasu:6434: kiṃ tu avidyamānasvabhāvasattākametad rāgādīnāmālambanatvena parikalpyate bhavatā taimirikairiva asatkeśamaśakamakṣikādvicandrādikamiti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:6441: yathā gandharvanagarādiprakhyā ete kevalaṃ viparyāsādupalabhyante, tadā-
T04canprasu:6442: aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāpi kutasteṣu bhaviṣyati |
T04canprasu:6447: bījaṃ yasyānṛtaṃ tasya prarohaḥ satyataḥ kutaḥ ||
T04canprasu:6451: na ca kevalamāśrayamithyātve śubhāśubhayornimittayormithyātvam, api ca anayāpyupapattyā anayormithyātvamiti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:6454: iha yadi śubhaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt, niyataṃ tadaśubhamapekṣya bhavet,
T04canprasu:6458: yadaśubhaṃ pratītya yadaśubhamapekṣya śubhaṃ prajñapayemahi vyavasthāpayemahi |
T04canprasu:6461: yataśca evaṃ śubhasya prajñaptau saṃbandhyantaramapekṣaṇīyamaśubhākhyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ nāsti, tasmācchubhaṃ naivopapadyate hrasvāsaṃbhavādiva
T04canprasu:6463: idānīmaśubhamapi yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:6466: yadi hi aśubhaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt, niyatameva tacchubhamapekṣya bhavet,
T04canprasu:6468: taccāpyapekṣaṇīyaṃ śubhamaśubhena vinā nāsti, anapekṣyāśubhaṃ nāsti śubham |
T04canprasu:6475: yataścaivamaśubhasya prajñaptau saṃbandhyantaramapekṣaṇīyaṃ śubhākhyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ nāsti, tasmādaśubhaṃ naiva vidyate || 11 ||
T04canprasu:6477: avidyamāne ca śubhe kuto rāgo bhaviṣyati |
T04canprasu:6479: śubhāśubhanimittakayo rāgadveṣayoḥ śubhāśubhanimittābhāve sati nirhetukatvānnāsti saṃbhava ityabhiprāyaḥ || 12 ||
T04canprasu:6480: tadevaṃ śubhāśubhanimittābhāvena rāgadveṣayorabhāvamupapādya viparyāsasvabhāvābhāvapratipādanena mohasyāpyadhunā svabhāvābhāvaṃ
T04canprasu:6483: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ || 13 ||
T04canprasu:6485: tadyathā- anitye pratikṣaṇavināśini skandhapañcake yo nityamiti grāhaḥ, sa viparyāsaḥ |
T04canprasu:6487: anityasya dhruvā pīḍā pīḍā yasya na tatsukham |
T04canprasu:6489: ityamunā nyāyena yadanityaṃ tadduḥkham, sarvasaṃskārāśca anityāḥ,
T04canprasu:6490: tasmādduḥkhātmake skandhapañcake yaḥ sukhamiti viparīto grāhaḥ, so 'paro
T04canprasu:6496: yaḥ śayīta sa nārīṇāṃ śayīta jaghanodare || ityādi |
T04canprasu:6498: tatra yo mohācchucitvena grāho 'bhiniveśaḥ, sa viparyāsaḥ |
T04canprasu:6499: tathā pañcaskandhakamātmalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇamasthiratvādudayavyayadharmitvācca nirātmakamātmasvabhāvaśūnyam, tasmin ya ātmagrāho 'bhiniveśaḥ anātmani
T04canprasu:6502: atredānīṃ vicāryate- yadi nityatvaṃ nityadarśanaṃ svabhāvaśūnyeṣu nityagrāho viparyāsa ityevaṃ vyavasthāpyate, nanu ca svabhāvaśūnyeṣu
T04canprasu:6503: skandheṣu anityatvamapi nāsti, iti nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ |
T04canprasu:6504: anityatvaṃ hi viparītamapekṣya nityatvaṃ viparyāsa iti vyavasthāpyate |
T04canprasu:6506: yadā anityatvasyābhāvaḥ, tadā kutastadvirodhi nityatvaṃ nityadarśanaviparyāso bhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ |
T04canprasu:6508: yathā ca anityatvaṃ śūnye na saṃbhavati bhāvasvabhāvarahite sasvabhāvena anutpanne, evaṃ duḥkhatvamapi
T04canprasu:6511: yadā ca svabhāvaśūnyatvādduḥkhatvādikaṃ nāsti, tadā kutastadvipakṣabhūtā nityasukhaśucyātmaviparyāsā bhaviṣyanti? tasmāt santi viparyāsāḥ
T04canprasu:6516: avidyayā naiva kadāci vidyate avidyata pratyayasaṃbhavaśca |
T04canprasu:6517: avidyamāneyamavidya loke tasmānmayā ukta avidya eṣā ||
T04canprasu:6519: kathaṃ bhagavan moho dhāraṇīpadam? bhagavānāha- atyantamukto hi mañjuśrīḥ
T04canprasu:6522: nanu evaṃ sati svabhāvena avidyamāne padārthe anityamityapi grāho na saṃbhavati iti asāvapi kasmānna viparyāsa iti vyavasthāpyate iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:6524: anityamityapi grāhaḥ śūnye kiṃ na viparyayaḥ || 14 ||
T04canprasu:6525: yadā ca ubhayasyāpi vaiparītyaṃ nityasya anityasya ca, tadā tadvayatiriktaṃ tṛtīyamaparaṃ nāsti yanna viparyayaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:6526: yadā ca aviparyāso nāsti, tadā kimapekṣo viparyāsaḥ syāditi |
T04canprasu:6529: yathā ca anitye nityamityevaṃ grāho viparyāso na saṃbhavati, evaṃ śeṣaviparyāsāsaṃbhave 'pi yojyam |
T04canprasu:6532: bhagavānāha- kimetat kulaputra tasya bhavati yo mārgeṇa niḥsaraṇaṃ
T04canprasu:6533: paryeṣate? na kulaputra tathāgatena rañjanīyān dharmān parivarjya
T04canprasu:6534: rāgaprahāṇaṃ prajñaptam, evaṃ na doṣaṇīyān mohanīyāna dharmān parivarjya
T04canprasu:6536: tat kasmāddhetoḥ? na kulaputra tathāgatāḥ kasyaciddharmasya utsargāya vā pratilambhāya vā dharmaṃ deśayanti na parijñāyai na prahāṇāya na sākṣātkriyāyai nābhisamayāya na saṃsāracaraṇatāyai na nirvāṇagamanatāyai notkṣepāya na prabhedāya |
T04canprasu:6538: tatra ye dvaye caranti, na te samyakprayuktāḥ |
T04canprasu:6540: katamacca kulaputra dvayam? ahaṃ rāgaṃ prahāsyāmīti dvayametat |
T04canprasu:6545: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣo māyākāranāṭake pratyupasthite māyākāranirmitāṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāgacittamutpādayet |
T04canprasu:6547: so 'pakramya tāmeva striyamaśubhato manasi kuryādanityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmato manasi kuryāt |
T04canprasu:6549: draṣṭavyāḥ, ye 'nutpannān dharmānajātānaśubhato manasi kurvanti, anityato duḥkhato 'nātmato manasi kurvanti |
T04canprasu:6552: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare svagṛhe rājabhāryāṃ paśyet
T04canprasu:6556: sa bhītasrastaḥ palāyet, mā māṃ rājā vidhyet,
T04canprasu:6558: tat kiṃ manyase kulaputra api nu sa puruṣo bhītasrastaḥ palāyamānastato rājabhāryānidānabhayātparimucyeta?
T04canprasu:6560: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavaṃstena puruṣeṇa astriyāṃ strīsaṃjñā utpāditā, abhūtaṃ ca parikalpitam
T04canprasu:6562: evameva kulaputra ihaike bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā draṣṭavyāḥ, ye arāge rāgasaṃjñāmutpādya rāgabhayabhītā rāganiḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante |
T04canprasu:6567: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sa puruṣaḥ abhaye bhayasaṃjñāmutpādayedasatsamāropeṇa |
T04canprasu:6568: evameva kulaputra sarvabālapṛthagjanā rāgakoṭiṃ virāgakoṭimaprajānanto rāgakoṭibhayabhītā virāgakoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante |
T04canprasu:6570: mohakoṭiṃ śūnyatākoṭimaprajānanto mohakoṭibhayabhītāḥ śūnyatākoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante |
T04canprasu:6571: nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kulaputra mohapuruṣāṇāṃ mārgabhāvanāṃ vadāmi |
T04canprasu:6573: atrāha- yadyapi anitye nityamityevaṃ grāho viparyayo na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:6576: tasya ca avaśyaṃ sādhanena karaṇena bhavitavyaṃ sādhakatamena nityatvādinā |
T04canprasu:6577: kartrā ca bhavitavyaṃ svatantreṇa nityātmanā cittena vā |
T04canprasu:6579: satyāṃ ca bhāvakaraṇakartṛkarmaṇāṃ siddhau sarvasiddheriṣṭasiddhiḥ syādasmākamiti |
T04canprasu:6583: yena gṛhṇāti yogrāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate |
T04canprasu:6585: iha hi kaścid grahītā yena viśeṣeṇa nityatvādinā karaṇabhūtena kiṃcit karmabhūtaṃ rūpaśabdādikaṃ vastu gṛhṇāti, tadyathā na saṃbhavati tathā pūrvaṃ pratipāditam |
T04canprasu:6588: ityādinā yathā nityatvādikaṃ karaṇaṃ na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipāditam |
T04canprasu:6591: ityanena pratipāditam| yacca gṛhyate tadapi nāsti tathā-
T04canprasu:6594: yadā caivaṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmāṇi na siddhāni, tadā kuto nirhetuko grāho bhaviṣyati? tataśca-
T04canprasu:6595: yena gṛhṇāti yo grāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate |
T04canprasu:6600: pratyayaparīkṣādibhiḥ prakaraṇairyasmāt sarveṣāmeva karaṇakartṛkarmaṇāṃ sarvathānutpādaḥ pratipāditaḥ, tasmāt sarvāṇyetāni bhāvasvarūpavirahādupaśāntāni |
T04canprasu:6603: iha hi viparyāsānugato devadatto nāma vidyate |
T04canprasu:6604: na ca vinā viparyāsaiḥ sa viparyāsānugataḥ saṃbhavati |
T04canprasu:6607: iha asmābhiḥ karaṇakartṛkarmaṇāmabhāvāt sarvathā grāha eva nāstīti pratipāditam |
T04canprasu:6609: avidyamāne grāhe ca mithyā vā samyageva vā |
T04canprasu:6611: samyagvā mithyā vā kasyacit kiṃcidapyagṛhṇataḥ kuto viparītatvamaviparītatvaṃ veti |
T04canprasu:6615: aviparītasya vā, viparyasyamānasya vā? sarvathā ca nopapadyante iti
T04canprasu:6622: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt, yo hi viparīta, sa viparīta eva |
T04canprasu:6626: vibuddhabuddhinayanānāmapi ajñānanidrātimiropaśamād buddhānāṃ viparyayaprasaṅgāt || (Pp_205) tathā viparyasyamānasyāpi na santi
T04canprasu:6629: padārthaḥ, yo viparītāviparītavinirmukto viparyasyamāno nāma bhaviṣyati?
T04canprasu:6630: ardhaviparīto viparyasyamāna iti cet, ardhaviparīto hi nāma yasya kiṃcidviparītaṃ kiṃcidaviparītam
T04canprasu:6631: tatra yadasya kiṃcidviparītaṃ tadviparyāso na viparyāsayati, viparyastatvāt |
T04canprasu:6635: yadā caivaṃ viparītāviparītaviparyasyamānā na saṃbhavanti, bhavānidānīṃ vimṛśatu svayaṃ prajñayā madhyasthaḥ san kasya saṃbhavanti viparyāsā iti |
T04canprasu:6640: tatra na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate |
T04canprasu:6643: tataśca yaduktam- santi viparyayāḥ viparyayagatasadbhāvāditi, tanna yuktam || 19-20 ||
T04canprasu:6646: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃna sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate |
T04canprasu:6647: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca na viparyayaḥ || 21 ||
T04canprasu:6648: yadi etāni ātmaśucinityasukhāni viparyāsā iti vyavasthāpyante, kimetāni
T04canprasu:6649: santi, atha na santi? yadi vidyante, na tarhi viparyāsāḥ,
T04canprasu:6651: atha na vidyante, tadā eṣāmavidyamānatvānna kevalaṃ nāsti viparyāsatvam,
T04canprasu:6652: viparyāsapratibandhyabhāvādanātmādīnāmapi aviparyāsādīnāṃ nāsti sadbhāva iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:6653: nātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate |
T04canprasu:6654: anātmāśucyanityaṃ ca naiva duḥkhaṃ ca vidyate || 22 ||
T04canprasu:6655: yadi ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca na vidyate iti manyase, viparyāsāsaṃbhavāt,
T04canprasu:6656: evaṃ sati ātmādīnāmapyabhāvād yadi etadanātmādikamaviparyāsatvena gṛhītam,
T04canprasu:6658: yadā caivamanātmādikaṃ na saṃbhavati, tadā tadapi svarūpato 'vidyamānatvāt
T04canprasu:6659: ātmādivat kathaṃ na viparyāsaḥ syāt? tasmāt jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāracārakāgārabandhanānmumukṣubhiraṣṭāvapyete viparyāsāstyājyāḥ || 22 ||
T04canprasu:6660: asya ca yathopavarṇitaviparyāsavicārasya avidyādiprahāṇahetutvena mahārthatāṃ pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:6663: yadā ayaṃ yogī yathoditena nyāyena viparyāsān nopalabhate, tadā evaṃ viparyāsānupalambhanena taddhetukā avidyā nirudhyate |
T04canprasu:6665: avidyā hi sakalasyaiva saṃkleśagaṇasya jātyādiduḥkhasya ca hetubhūtā |
T04canprasu:6666: yathā hi kāyendriyahetukāni sarvāṇi rūpīndriyāṇi kāyendriye nirudhyamāne
T04canprasu:6667: nirudhyante, evamavidyāhetukāni saṃskārādīni bhavāṅgāni pravartamānāni niyatamavidyāyāṃ niruddhāyāṃ nirudhyante iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:6669: atrāha- yadi viparyāsanirodhādavidyā nirudhyate, asti tarhi avidyā yasyā evaṃ viparyāsanirodhānnirodho bhavati |
T04canprasu:6676: atra hi nāma atimahadanarthapāṇḍityaṃ parasya, yo hi nāma sarvātmanā atyantaduḥkhāyāsakleśāsamañjase
T04canprasu:6677: nirantaraphullaphalapradasaṃkleśaviṣavṛkṣe parārthodayasaṃbaddhakakṣaiḥ sādhubhiḥ prajñopāyamahānilabalairniḥśeṣaṃ tadunmūlyamānairna kevalaṃ na sāhāyyenāvatiṣṭhante, api khalu tadunmūlakānāmatimahānilabalānāmiva
T04canprasu:6678: bhāvasadbhāvavādamahāśailāyamāna ivātivirodhitayā avasthito bhavān āhopuruṣikayā tasyaiva kleśaviṣavṛkṣasya jātijarāmaraṇaśokāyāsavisaraduḥkhaikaphalasya sutarāṃ bhāvābhiniveśatoyāsravairāropaṇamādriyate api ca |
T04canprasu:6679: yadi avidyādīnāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃbhavet, syāt tatprahāṇopāyānveṣaṇam |
T04canprasu:6681: yadi syāt, tadā tattvarūpato vidyamānānāṃ vā syāt, avidyamānānāṃ vā? kiṃ cātaḥ? tatra yadi svarūpataḥ sadbhatānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇamiṣyate, tannopapadyate| kiṃ
T04canprasu:6683: yadi bhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit |
T04canprasu:6684: kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyati || 24 ||
T04canprasu:6685: svabhāvato vidyamānānāṃ bhāvānāṃ na śakyaḥ svabhāvo vinivartayitum |
T04canprasu:6687: evaṃ yadi ime kleśāḥ svabhāvataḥ sadbhūtāḥ syuḥ |
T04canprasu:6690: kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran? naiva te kasyacit kathaṃcinnāma prahīyeran |
T04canprasu:6691: kasmātpunaḥ na te prahīyante ityāha- kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyatīti |
T04canprasu:6694: atha svabhāvena asadbhūtā iti vikalpyate, evamapi prahāṇāsaṃbhava evetyāha-
T04canprasu:6697: abhūtā api kleśāḥ svabhāvena avidyamānāḥ aśakyā eva prahātum |
T04canprasu:6700: kasyacit svabhāvato na vidyante, kastān prahāsyati? naiva kaścit prahāsyati |
T04canprasu:6704: yaduktam- vidyanta eva avidyādayaḥ kleśāḥ, tatprahāṇopāyānveṣaṇāditi,
T04canprasu:6707: yo rajyeta, yatra vā rajyeta, yena vā rajyeta |
T04canprasu:6708: yo duṣyeta, yatra vā duṣyeta, yena vā duṣyeta |
T04canprasu:6709: yo muhyeta yatra vā muhyeta, yena vā muhyeta |
T04canprasu:6710: sa taṃ dharma na samanupaśyati, taṃ dharmaṃ nopalabhate |
T04canprasu:6717: ādarśapṛṣṭhe tatha tailapātre nirīkṣate nārimukhaṃ svalaṃkṛtam |
T04canprasu:6718: so tatra rāgaṃ janayitva bālo pradhāvito kāmi gaveṣamāṇo ||
T04canprasu:6719: mukhasya saṃkrānti yadā na vidyate bimbe mukhaṃ naiva kadāci labhyate |
T04canprasu:6720: mūḍho yathā so janayeta rāgaṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān || ityādi |
T04canprasu:6722: rūpeṇa darśitā bodhī bodhaye rūpa darśitam |
T04canprasu:6724: śabdena uttaraṃ rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ ca svabhāvataḥ |
T04canprasu:6725: samaṃ rūpaṃ ca bodhiśca nānātvaṃ na sa labhyate ||
T04canprasu:6727: labhyate na ca nirvāṇaṃ sa ca śabdo na labhyate |
T04canprasu:6728: śabdaścāpi nirvāṇaṃ ca ubhayaṃ tanna labhyate |
T04canprasu:6730: nirvāṇaṃ nivṛttireva nirvāṇaṃ ca na labhyate |
T04canprasu:6735: jñānena jānāmyahu skandhaśūnyatāṃ jñātvā ca kleśehi na saṃvasāmi |
T04canprasu:6736: vyāhāramātreṇa hi vyāharāmi parinirvṛto lokamimaṃ carāmi ||
T04canprasu:6738: parinirvṛta loki te śūrā yehi svabhāvata jñātibhi dharmāḥ |
T04canprasu:6739: kāmaguṇairhi caranti asaṅgāḥ saṅgu vivarjiya sattva vinenti ||
T04canprasu:6741: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau viparyāsaparīkṣā nāma trayoviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:6744: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ |
T04canprasu:6746: yadi yuktyā nopapadyate iti kṛtvā sarvamidaṃ bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ bhāvajātaṃ śūnyamiti pratipāditam, nanu ca evaṃ sati bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣā bhavata āpadyante |
T04canprasu:6747: kathaṃ kṛtvā? yadi sarvamidaṃ śūnyaṃ syāt, tadā yacchūnyaṃ tannāsti, yacca nāsti, tadavidyamānatvād vandhyāputravannaivotpadyate na cāpi nirudhyate, iti na kasyacitpadārthasya udayo vyayaśca tadabhāvācca caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaḥ te śūnyavādinaḥ prasajyate |
T04canprasu:6748: kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha hi pūrvahetujanitāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ duḥkhaduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā ca pratikūlavartitvācca pīḍātmakatvena duḥkhamityucyate etacca duḥkhamāryā eva viparyāsaprahāṇe sati duḥkhamiti saṃjānate, na anāryāḥ,
T04canprasu:6750: yathā hi viparyastendriyāṇāṃ madhurasvabhāvamapi guḍaśarkarādikaṃ tiktatayā upalabhamānānāṃ jvarādirogāturāṇāṃ tiktataiva satyaṃ tajjñānāpekṣayā,
T04canprasu:6751: mādhuryam, tenātmanā tasya vastuno 'nupalabhyamānatvāt, evamihāpi yadyapi pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhasvabhāvā bhavanti, tathāpi ye etān duḥkhātmakān
T04canprasu:6752: paśyanti, teṣāmeva duḥkhaṃ vyavasthāpyate, na viparyāsānugamādanyathopalabhamānānāmiti |
T04canprasu:6753: ataḥ āryāṇāmeva duḥkhātmatā satyamiti kṛtvā duḥkhamāryasatyamityucyate |
T04canprasu:6754: nanu ca anāryairduḥkhā vedanā duḥkhamiti paricchidyate iti, evaṃ tatkathaṃ duḥkhamāryāṇāmeva
T04canprasu:6756: na hi duḥkhaiva vedanā kevalaṃ duḥkhasatyam, kiṃ tarhi pañcāpyupādānaskandhāḥ, ityataḥ āryāṇāmeva tat satyamiti kṛtvā āryasatyamiti vyavasthāpyate |
T04canprasu:6758: ūrṇāpakṣma yathaiva hi karatalasaṃsthaṃ na vi(ve?)dyate puṃbhiḥ |
T04canprasu:6759: akṣigataṃ tu tadeva hi janayatyaratiṃ ca pīḍāṃ ca ||
T04canprasu:6763: kadā ca tadduḥkhamāryasatyaṃ yujyate? yadā saṃskārāṇāmudayavyayau saṃbhavataḥ |
T04canprasu:6764: yadā tu śūnyatvānna kiṃcidutpadyate nāpi kiṃcinnirudhyate,
T04canprasu:6766: asati ca duḥkhe kutaḥ samudayasatyam? yato hi hetorduḥkham, samudeti samutpadyate sa hetuḥ tṛṣṇākarmakleśalakṣaṇaḥ samudaya ityucyate |
T04canprasu:6767: yadā tu phalabhūtaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ nāsti, tadā phalarahitasya hetukatvānupapatteḥ
T04canprasu:6769: duḥkhasya ca vigamaḥ apunarutpādaḥ nirodha ityucyate |
T04canprasu:6771: nāsti, tadā kasya nirodhaḥ syāditi? ato duḥkhanirodho 'pi na saṃbhavati |
T04canprasu:6773: asati ca duḥkhanirodhe kuto duḥkhanirodhagāminī āryāṣṭāṅgamārgānugā pratipad bhaviṣyatīti mārgasatyamapi nāstīti |
T04canprasu:6774: tadevaṃ śūnyatvaṃ bhāvānāṃ bruvataḥ caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaḥ prasajyate || 1 ||
T04canprasu:6776: parijñā ca prahāṇaṃ ca bhāvanā sākṣikarma ca |
T04canprasu:6778: caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaprasaṅge sati yadetadanityādibhirākārairduḥkhasatyaparijñānaṃ duḥkhasamudayasya ca prahāṇaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminyāśca pratipado bhāvanā duḥkhanirodhasya ca sākṣikarma sākṣātkaraṇam, tannopapadyate || 2 ||
T04canprasu:6779: yadi duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāmabhāve sati parijñānādikaṃ nāsti, tadā ko doṣa
T04canprasu:6782: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ || 3 ||
T04canprasu:6783: saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ |
T04canprasu:6785: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati |
T04canprasu:6786: yadā caivaṃ duḥkhaparijñānādikaṃ nāsti, tadā, asminnasati srotaāpattisakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhatphalākhyaṃ phalacatuṣṭayaṃ nopapadyate |
T04canprasu:6787: kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha kleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃpiṇḍitaṃ phalākhyaṃ pratilabhate |
T04canprasu:6788: tadyathā- saṃyojanatrayaprahāṇe sati ṣoḍaśe mārge anvayajñānakṣaṇe yat
T04canprasu:6790: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāmadhimātramadhyamṛdūnāṃ prakārāṇāṃ punaradhimātramadhyamṛduprakārabhedena pratyekaṃ bhidyamānānāṃ nava prakārā bhavanti |
T04canprasu:6791: tatra kāmāvacaraṣaṣṭhakleśaprakāraparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat prahāṇaṃ tat sakṛdāgāmiphalam
T04canprasu:6792: teṣāmeva kāmāvacarāṇāṃ navamaprakārakleśaparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat kleśaprahāṇaṃ tadanāgāmiphalam
T04canprasu:6793: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau navaprakārabhedabhinnānāṃ yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanabhūmikanavamakleśaprakāraparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat prahāṇaṃ tadarhatphalam |
T04canprasu:6795: tānyetāni kathaṃ yujyante? yadi duḥkhasya parijñānaṃ saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:6796: samudayasya prahāṇam, nirodhasya sākṣātkaraṇam, āryamārgasya ca bhāvanā
T04canprasu:6798: yadā tu duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāmabhāve sati duḥkhaparijñānādikaṃ nāsti, tadā na santi tāni catvāri phalāni |
T04canprasu:6799: caturṇā ca phalānāmabhāve sati ye teṣu vyavasthitāḥ phalasthāścatvāra āryapudgalāḥ, te na santi |
T04canprasu:6800: ata eva ca pratipannakā api catvāra āryapudgalā na saṃvidyante ||
T04canprasu:6801: iha hi ṣoḍaśāt mārge 'nvayajñānakṣaṇāt pūrve ye pañcadaśa
T04canprasu:6803: tatra katame traidhātukaduḥkhābhisamaye catvāraḥ kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ? tadyathā-
T04canprasu:6804: kāmāvacaraduḥkhadarśanaprahātavyasatkāyāntagrāhamithyādṛṣṭidṛṣṭiparāmarśaśīlavrataparāmarśavicikitsārāgapratighamānāvidyākhyadaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ anityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkhasatyālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ |
T04canprasu:6805: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ |
T04canprasu:6806: evaṃ rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitānantaroktāṣṭādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ duḥkhādyākārotpannaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe anvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ |
T04canprasu:6809: kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāścatvāraḥ, evaṃ kāmāvacarasamudayadarśanaprahātavyamithyādṛṣṭidṛṣṭiparāmarśavicikitsārāgapratighamānāvidyākhyasaptānuśayapratipakṣaḥ hetusamudayaprabhavapratyayākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacarasamudayasatyālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ |
T04canprasu:6810: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye dharmajñānakṣayo dvitīyaḥ |
T04canprasu:6811: evaṃ rūpārūpyāvacarasamudayasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitānantaroktadvādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ samudayasatyākārotpannaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣaṇaścaturthaḥ |
T04canprasu:6813: yathā caite catvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ traidhātukaduḥkhasamudayasatyābhisamaye, evaṃ kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodhadarśanaprahātavyasamudayoktasaptānuśayapratipakṣaḥ nirodhaśāntapraṇītaniḥsaraṇākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkha nirodhasatyālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe
T04canprasu:6815: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ |
T04canprasu:6816: etaireva ākāraiḥ rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhanirodhasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitadvādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ |
T04canprasu:6817: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvayajñānakṣaṇaścaturthaḥ |
T04canprasu:6819: evaṃ kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodhagāmimārgadarśanaprahātavyanirodhoktānuśayeṣu śīlavrataparāmarśamaṣṭamaṃ prakṣipya aṣṭānuśayapratipakṣaḥ mārganyāyapratiopannairyāṇikākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodhagāmimārgālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ mārge dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ |
T04canprasu:6820: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ mārge dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ |
T04canprasu:6824: evaṃ vyavasthitaḥ āryaḥ srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ ityucyate |
T04canprasu:6825: ṣoḍaśe tu mārge 'nvayajñānasthitaḥ sa srotaāpanna ityucyate ||
T04canprasu:6826: ta ete aṣṭāśītiranuśayāḥ satyānāṃ darśanamātreṇa bhāvanāmanapekṣyaiva prahīyante iti kṛtvā darśanaprahātavyā ityucyante |
T04canprasu:6827: yathādṛṣṭasatyākārabhāvanayā tu ye paścātprahīyante te bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ
T04canprasu:6831: ārūpyāvacarāśca trayaḥ ete eveti daśa bhavanti |
T04canprasu:6832: ete ca yathoktena nyāyena bhūmau bhūmau navadhā bhidyante,
T04canprasu:6834: ekaikasya ca kleśaprakārasya prahāṇārthamānantaryavimuktimārgabhedena dvau dvau jñānakṣaṇau vyavasthāpyete kleśakṣaṇaviparyayeṇa |
T04canprasu:6837: sthūlaṃ hi malamalpaprayatnasādhyam, sūkṣmaṃ tu mahāyatnasādhyaṃ
T04canprasu:6839: tatra darśanamārgādūrdhvaṃ kāmāvacarabhāvanāprahātavyaṣaṣṭhakleśaprakārapratipakṣavimuktimārgākhyajñānakṣaṇādarvāg jñānakṣaṇāvasthitaḥ āryaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate |
T04canprasu:6843: ṣaṣṭhāt kṣaṇādūrdhva navamakleśaprakāraprahāṇavimuktimārgakṣaṇādarvāgjñānakṣaṇeṣu vartamānaḥ āryaḥ anāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate |
T04canprasu:6851: ta ete catvāraḥ pratipannakāḥ pudgalāḥ, catvāraśca phalasthāḥ ityete aṣṭau mahāpuruṣapudgalā bhavanti |
T04canprasu:6858: sukṣetraṃ te pravakṣyāmi yatra dattaṃ mahatphalam ||
T04canprasu:6861: yadi catvāri āryasatyāni na santi teṣāṃ ca parijñānāni, tadā satyadarśanabhāvanālabhyānāṃ
T04canprasu:6865: (Pp_213) adhigamadharmeṇa pratyakṣadharmatayā sarvamārairapi buddhe bhagavati abhedyatvādavetya prasādalābhena saṃghaḥ, sa na syāt |
T04canprasu:6867: āryasatyānāṃ ca abhāvāt saddharmo 'pi na saṃbhavati |
T04canprasu:6869: tatra nirodhasatyaṃ phaladharmaḥ, mārgasatyaṃ tu phalāvatāradharmaḥ |
T04canprasu:6874: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddhao bhaviṣyati ||
T04canprasu:6875: yadi hi yathokto dharmaḥ syāt, tadā taddharmapratipattyā sarvākārasarvadharmābhisaṃbodhād buddho bhavatīti yuktaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:6876: yadi ca saṃghaḥ syāt, tadā tadupadeśairupacīyamānajñānasaṃbhāraḥ taddānamānaśaraṇagamanādibhiśca upacīyamānapuṇyasaṃbhāraḥ kramād buddho bhavet ||
T04canprasu:6880: avaśyaṃ hi pūrvaṃ bhagavatā kasmiṃścit phale vyavasthātavyam |
T04canprasu:6881: tatra ca phale vyavasthitaḥ saṃghāntaḥpātyeva bhagavān bhavati |
T04canprasu:6882: saṃghe cāsati niyataṃ nāsti bhagavān buddhaḥ |
T04canprasu:6884: tathā ca buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ ityabhidhānāt saṃghāntargata eva bhagavān iti kecidvarṇayanti
T04canprasu:6886: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati |iti |
T04canprasu:6887: madhyoddeśikāśca mahāvastūpadiṣṭabhūmivyavasthayā prathamabhūmisthitaṃ bodhisattvamutpannadarśanamārgaṃ vyācakṣāṇāḥ saṃghāntaḥpātinaṃ vyācakṣate
T04canprasu:6888: | tadā saṃghe cāsati bodhisattvo 'pi nāstīti kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyatīti spaṣṭamevaitat |
T04canprasu:6891: śūnyatāmityevaṃ vadan buddhadharmasaṃghākhyāni trīṇyapi durlabhatvāt kadācideva utpattitaḥ alpapuṇyānāṃ ca tadaprāpteḥ mahārghamūlyatvād ratnāni pratibādhase || 5 ||
T04canprasu:6896: yadi sarvamidaṃ śūnyam, yadā sarvameva nāsti, tadā sarvāntaḥ pātitvāt dharmādharmau saha taddhetukena
T04canprasu:6898: sarva eva cāmī laukikā vyavahārāḥ- kuru,
T04canprasu:6899: paca, khāda, tiṣṭha, gaccha, āgaccha ityevamādayo 'pi sarvāntargatatvāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ ca śūnyatvānnaiva yujyante iti |
T04canprasu:6901: atra brūmaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ na tvaṃ vetsi prayojanam |
T04canprasu:6902: śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ ca tata evaṃ vihanyase || 7 ||
T04canprasu:6903: sa bhavān svavikalpanayaiva nāstitvaṃ śūnyatārtha ityevaṃ viparītamadhyāropya "yadi sarvamidaṃ śūnyamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ"
T04canprasu:6904: ityādinopālambhaṃ bruvāṇo 'smāsu mahāntaṃ khedamāpanno 'tīva vihanyate vividhairbhūtaiḥ parikalpairhanyate ityarthaḥ |
T04canprasu:6905: na tvayamasmābhiratra śāstre śūnyatārthaṃ upavarṇito yastvayā parigṛhītaḥ, śūnyatārthaṃ cājānānaḥ śūnyatāmapi na jānāsi |
T04canprasu:6908: atha kiṃ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ prayojanam? uktameva tadātmaparīkṣāyām-
T04canprasu:6913: bhavāṃstu nāstitvaṃ śūnyatārthaṃ parikalpayan prapañcajālameva saṃvardhayamāno na śūnyatāyāṃ prayojanaṃ vetti ||
T04canprasu:6914: atha kā punaḥ śūnyatā? sāpi tatraivoktā |
T04canprasu:6917: ataḥ prapañcanivṛttisvabhāvāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ kuto nāstitvamiti śūnyatāmapina jānāti bhavān |
T04canprasu:6922: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti |
T04canprasu:6923: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnyu ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ ||
T04canprasu:6925: evaṃ pratītyasamutpādaśabdasya yo 'rthaḥ, sa eva śūnyatāśabdasyārthaḥ, na punarabhāvaśabdasya yo 'rthaḥ sa śūnyatāśabdasyārthaḥ |
T04canprasu:6929: kaścāsmākaṃ yathoktamupālambhaṃ karoti? yo bhagavatpravacanopadiṣṭāviparītasatyadvayavibhāgaṃ na jānāti, kevalaṃ granthamātrādhyayanapara eveti |
T04canprasu:6933: iha hi bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ satyadvayamāśritya dharmadeśanā pravartate |
T04canprasu:6935: tatra skandhātmā loka ākhyātastatra loko hi niśritaḥ |
T04canprasu:6936: iti vacanātpañca skandhānupādāya prajñapyamānaḥ pudgalo loka ityucyate |
T04canprasu:6943: kiṃ punaralokasaṃvṛtirapyasti yata evaṃ viśiṣyate lokasaṃvṛtiriti?
T04canprasu:6951: na hi paramārthata ete vyavahārāḥ saṃbhavanti |
T04canprasu:6955: iti kṛtvā kutastatra paramārthe vācāṃ pravṛttiḥ kuto vā jñānasya? sa hi paramārtho 'parapratyayaḥ śāntaḥ pratyātmavedya āryāṇāṃ sarvaprapañcātītaḥ
T04canprasu:6966: te tattvaṃ na vijānanti gambhīraṃ buddhaśāsane || 9 ||
T04canprasu:6967: atrāha- yadi tarhi paramārtho niṣprapañcasvabhāvaḥ sa evāstu, tatkimanayā aparayā skandhadhātvāyatanāryasatyapratītyasamutpādādideśanayā
T04canprasu:6972: kiṃ tu laukikaṃ vyavahāramanabhyupagamya abhidhānābhidheyajñānajñeyādilakṣaṇam, aśakya eva paramārtho deśayitum, adeśitaśca na śakyo 'dhigantum, anadhigamya ca paramārthaṃ na śakyaṃ nirvāṇamadhigantumiti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:6975: tasmānnirvāṇādhigamopāyatvādavaśyameva yathāvasthitā saṃvṛtirādāvevābhyupeyā bhājanamiva salilārthineti tadevaṃ yaḥ saṃvṛtiparamārthalakṣaṇasatyadvayasya vyavasthāmapākṛtya śūnyatāṃ varṇayati, taṃ tathāvidhaṃ pudgalam-
T04canprasu:6977: sarpo yathā durgṛhīto vidyā vā duṣprasādhitā || 19 ||
T04canprasu:6978: saṃvṛtisatyaṃ hi ajñānamātrasamutthāpitaṃ niḥsvabhāvaṃ buddhā tasya paramārthalakṣaṇāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratipadyamāno yogī nāntadvaye patati |
T04canprasu:6979: kiṃ tadāsīdyadidānīṃ nāstītyevaṃ pūrvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvānupalambhāt paścādapi nāstitāṃ na pratipadyate
T04canprasu:6983: yastu evaṃ satyadvayavibhāgamapaśyan śūnyatāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ paśyati, sa śūnyatāṃ paśyan mumukṣurnāstitāṃ vā saṃskārāṇāṃ parikalpayed, yadi vā śūnyatāṃ kāṃcidbhāvataḥ satīm, tasyāścāśrayārthaṃ bhāvasvabhāvamapi parikalpayet |
T04canprasu:6984: ubhayathā cāsya durdṛṣṭā śūnyatā niyataṃ vināśayet |
T04canprasu:6986: kṛtvā? yadi tāvatsarvamidaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvaṃ nāstīti parikalpayet, tadāsya mithyādṛṣṭirāpadyate
T04canprasu:6990: atha sarvāpavādaṃ kartuṃ necchati, tadā niyatamasya śūnyatāyāḥ pratikṣepa
T04canprasu:6991: āpadyate- kathaṃ hi nāma amī bhāvāḥ sakalasurāsuranaralokairupalabhyamānā
T04canprasu:6992: api śūnyā bhaviṣyanti? tasmānna niḥsvabhāvārthaḥ śūnyatārthaḥ, ityevaṃ pratikṣipya saddharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena pāpakena karmaṇā niyatamapāyānvayāt |
T04canprasu:6996: evaṃ tāvadabhāvena gṛhyamāṇā śūnyatā grahītāraṃ vināśayati |
T04canprasu:6997: athāyaṃ bhāvena śūnyatāṃ parikalpayet, tadāśrayāṇāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāmastitvam,
T04canprasu:6999: tadevaṃ bhāvarūpeṇāpi śūnyatā gṛhyamāṇā grahītāraṃ vināśayati ||
T04canprasu:7000: nanu ca yadupakārakaṃ tadanyathā [kriyamāṇamakāloptamiva bījaṃ na phalāya
T04canprasu:7001: kalpate, kāloptaṃ ca mahate phalalābhāya jāyate, evameva
T04canprasu:7002: maṇimantrauṣadhādibhi] rgṛhyamāṇaḥ [sarpaḥ] mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhamāvahati śiromaṇigrahaṇāt, tena ca vyālagrāhakāṇāṃ jīvikākalpanāt |
T04canprasu:7004: yathā ca yathopadeśaṃ prasādhitā vidyā sādhakamanugṛhṇāti,
T04canprasu:7005: upadeśaparibhraṣṭā tu sādhyamānā sādhakameva vināśayati, evamihāpi yathopadeśaṃ śūnyatā mahatī vidyā sādhyamānā gṛhyamāṇā bhāvābhāvādigrāhatiraskāreṇa madhyamayā pratipadā grahītāraṃ parameṇa
T04canprasu:7007: yathopadeśaviśeṣavigamena tu gṛhyamāṇā niyataṃ yathoditena nyāyena grahītārameva vināśayati
T04canprasu:7008: yataścaivaṃ śūnyatā durgṛhītā grahītāraṃ vināśayati, mandaprajñaiśca aśakyā samyaggrahītum-
T04canprasu:7011: yasmādayaṃ śūnyatālakṣaṇo dharmo mandamedhasamalpaprajñaṃ sattvaṃ viparyāsagrahaṇādvināśayati, ata eva asya dharmasya mandairduravagāhatāṃ matvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvadhātuṃ cāvalokya dharmasya cātigāmbhīryam, saddharmaṃ deśayituṃ cittaṃ pratinivṛttaṃ munerbuddhasya bhagavato mahopāyajñānaviśeṣaśālinaḥ |
T04canprasu:7015: sacettamahaṃ pareṣāmārocayeyam, pare ca me na
T04canprasu:7016: vibhāvayeyuḥ, sa mama vighātaḥ syāt, klamathaḥ syāt, cetaso 'nudayaḥ syāt
T04canprasu:7024: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ |
T04canprasu:7025: ityādinā, sa yasmāt satyadvayavyavasthānabhijñena satā śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ śūnyatāprayojanaṃ ca yathāvadabuddhā upakṣiptaḥ, so 'smākaṃ
T04canprasu:7028: doṣaprasaṅgaṃ śūnyatāyāmudbhāvayan śūnyatāyāmadhilayamadhikṣepaṃ nirākaraṇaṃ pratikṣepaṃ karoti, so 'dhilayo 'smākaṃ nopapadyate |
T04canprasu:7029: abhāvārthaṃ hi śūnyatārthamadhyāropya prasaṅga udbhāvito bhavatā |
T04canprasu:7030: na ca vayamabhāvārthaṃ śūnyatārthaṃ vyācakṣmahe, kiṃ tarhi pratītyasamutpādārtham |
T04canprasu:7032: na ca kevalaṃ yathoktadoṣaprasaṅgo 'smatpakṣe nāvatarati, api khalu sarvameva satyādi vyavasthānaṃ sutarāmupapadyate iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:7033: sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate |
T04canprasu:7034: sarvaṃna yujyate tasya śūnyaṃ yasya na yujyate || 14 ||
T04canprasu:7035: yasya hi sarvabhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateyaṃ yujyate, tasya sarvametad yathopavarṇitaṃ yujyate
T04canprasu:7036: kathaṃ kṛtvā? yasmāt pratītyasamutpādaṃ hi vayaṃ śūnyateti vyācakṣmahe-
T04canprasu:7037: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti |
T04canprasu:7038: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ ||
T04canprasu:7041: tasmādyasyeyaṃ śūnyatā yujyate rocate kṣamate, tasya pratītyasamutpādo yujyate |
T04canprasu:7042: yasya pratītyasamutpādo yujyate, tasya catvāryāryasatyāni yujyante |
T04canprasu:7043: kathaṃ kṛtvā? yasmāt pratītyasamutpannaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ bhavati nāpratītyasamutpannam |
T04canprasu:7045: sati ca duḥkhe duḥkha samudayo duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī ca pratipad yujyate |
T04canprasu:7046: tataśca duḥkhaparijñānaṃ samudayaprahāṇaṃ nirodhasākṣātkaraṇaṃ mārgabhāvanā ca yujyate |
T04canprasu:7051: āryasatyānāṃ ca sadbhāve sati saddharmo 'pi yujyate |
T04canprasu:7052: sati ca saddharme saṃghe ca buddho 'pi yujyate |
T04canprasu:7055: dharmādharmaṃ tatphalaṃ sugatidurgatiḥ laukikāśca sarvasaṃvyavahārā yujyante |
T04canprasu:7057: sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate |
T04canprasu:7058: yasya sarvabhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā yujyate, tasya sarvametad yathoditaṃ
T04canprasu:7060: yasya tu śūnyatā yathoditā na yujyate,
T04canprasu:7065: atisthūle atyāsanne tadviruddhe ca svakīye pakṣe doṣavati atimogho yathāvadavasthitau guṇadoṣāvapaśyan-
T04canprasu:7068: yathā hi kaścid yamevāśvamārūḍhaḥ, tameva vismṛtaḥ san, tadapahāradoṣeṇa
T04canprasu:7069: parānupālabhate, evameva bhavān pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇaśūnyatādarśanāśvamārūḍha eva atyantavikṣepāttamanupalambhamāno 'smān parivadati || 15 ||
T04canprasu:7070: ke punaste parasya doṣāḥ, yānanupalabhamānaḥ śūnyatāvādinameva upālabhate
T04canprasu:7074: yadi tvaṃ svabhāvena vidyamānān bhāvān paśyasi, tadā svabhāvasya hetupratyayanirapekṣatvāt ahetupratyayān avidyamānahetupratyayān padārthān bāhyādhyātmikabhedabhinnān nirhetukān tvamevaṃ sati paśyasi || 16 ||
T04canprasu:7076: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kartāraṃ karaṇaṃ kriyām |
T04canprasu:7077: utpādaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca phalaṃ ca pratibādhase || 17 ||
T04canprasu:7078: kathaṃ kṛtvā? yadīha ghaṭaḥ svabhāvato 'stīti parikalpayasi, tadā asya svabhāvato vidyamānasya kiṃ mṛdādibhirhetupratyayaiḥ prayojanamiti teṣāmabhāvaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:7080: asati cāsmiṃścakrādikasya karaṇasya, kartuḥ kumbhakārasya ghaṭakaraṇakriyāyāścābhāvā dutpādanirodhayorabhāvaḥ
T04canprasu:7081: asatoścotpādanirodhayoḥ kutaḥ phalam? iti sasvabhāvābhyupagame sati
T04canprasu:7083: tadevaṃ bhavataḥ sasvabhāvābhyupagame sati sarvameva na yujyate || 17 ||
T04canprasu:7093: yaḥ pratyatyairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti |
T04canprasu:7094: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ || iti |
T04canprasu:7096: śūnyā iti mayā deśitāḥ" || iti vistareṇoktam ||
T04canprasu:7098: yā ceyaṃ svabhāvaśūnyatā sā prajñaptirupādāya, saiva śūnyatā upādāya
T04canprasu:7102: svabhāvenānutpattiḥ, yā ca svabhāvenānutpattiḥ, sā śūnyatā |
T04canprasu:7103: saiva svabhāvānutpattilakṣaṇā śūnyatā madhyamā pratipaditi vyavasthāpyate |
T04canprasu:7104: yasya hi svabhāvenānutpattiḥ, tasya astitvābhāvaḥ, svabhāvena cānutpannasya vigamābhāvānnāstitvābhāva iti |
T04canprasu:7105: ato bhāvābhāvāntadvayarahitatvāt sarvasvabhāvānutpattilakṣaṇā śūnyatā madhyamā pratipat, madhyamo mārga ityucyate |
T04canprasu:7106: tadevaṃ pratītyasamutpādasyaivaitā viśeṣa saṃjñāḥ- śūnyatā, upādāya prajñaptiḥ, madhyamā pratipad iti || 18
T04canprasu:7110: yo hi apratītyasamutpanno dharmaḥ, sa na saṃvidyate |
T04canprasu:7117: pratītya dharmānadhigacchate vidū na cāntadṛṣṭīya karoti niśrayam |
T04canprasu:7118: sahetu sapratyaya dharma jānati ahetu apratyaya nāsti dharmatā ||
T04canprasu:7131: anityamuktaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi tatsvābhāvye na vidyate || 21 ||
T04canprasu:7136: anityaṃ ca duḥkhamuktaṃ bhavagatā- yadanityaṃ tadduḥkhamiti |
T04canprasu:7138: anityasya dhruvā pīḍā pīḍā yasya na tatsukham |
T04canprasu:7139: tasmādanityaṃ yatsarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ taditi jāyate || iti |
T04canprasu:7140: yacca anityaṃ svābhāvye sasvabhāvatve 'bhyupagamyamāne bhāvānām, tanna vidyata iti || 21 ||
T04canprasu:7141: evaṃ tāvat sasvabhāvatve sati bhāvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ na yujyate |
T04canprasu:7142: na ca kevalaṃ duḥkhameva na yujyate, sati sasvabhāvābhyupagame samudayo 'pi na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:7145: iha samudetyasmādduḥkhamiti duḥkhasya hetu [taḥ] samudaya ityucyate |
T04canprasu:7146: tadasya duḥkhasya śūnyatāṃ pratibādhamānasya sasvabhāvaṃ duḥkhamabhyupagacchataḥ tasya punarutpādavaiyarthyāt
T04canprasu:7149: svābhāvikameva duḥkhamabhyupagacchato duḥkhanirodho 'pi na yujyate iti
T04canprasu:7151: na nirodhaḥ svabhāvena sato duḥkhasya vidyate |
T04canprasu:7153: yadi hi svabhāvato duḥkhaṃ syāt, tadā svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt kuto 'sya
T04canprasu:7154: nirodhatvamiti? evaṃ svabhāvaparyavasthānāt svabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā pratyavatiṣṭhamāno duḥkhanirodhamapi pratibādhase || 23 ||
T04canprasu:7158: athāsau bhāvyate mārgaḥ svābhāvyaṃ te na vidyate || 24 ||
T04canprasu:7159: yadi hi sasvabhāvā bhāvā bhaveyuḥ, tadā mārgo 'pi sasvabhāva eveti kṛtvā
T04canprasu:7163: atha asya mārgasya bhāvanā abhyupagamyate bhavatā, evaṃ tarhi svabhāvatā
T04canprasu:7165: api ca- duḥkhasya nirodhaprāptyarthaṃ samudayasya ca prahāṇārthaṃ bhāvanā
T04canprasu:7168: yadā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodhaśca na vidyate |
T04canprasu:7170: nāstyeva asau duḥkhanirodhaḥ, yannirodhānmārgo bhāvitaḥ san prāpayiṣyati |
T04canprasu:7173: idānīṃ duḥkhādiparijñānādikamapi yathā parasya na saṃbhavati, tathā
T04canprasu:7177: yadi pūrvaṃ duḥkhamaparijñātasvabhāvaṃ tat paścāt parijñāyata iti
T04canprasu:7181: yo hi svabhāvaḥ, sa kila loke samavasthitaḥ,
T04canprasu:7184: nāsti, tadā pūrvamaparijñātasvabhāvasya duḥkhasya paścādapi parijñānaṃ nopapadyata iti
T04canprasu:7189: yadetat samudayasya prahāṇaṃ nirodhasya ca sākṣātkaraṇam, te ete dve
T04canprasu:7190: prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇe yā ca mārgasya bhāvanā, eṣāpi |
T04canprasu:7192: samudayasya svabhāvenāprahīṇasya svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt paścādapi prahāṇaṃ nopapadyate |
T04canprasu:7194: na ca kevalaṃ parijñānādikameva na saṃbhavati sasvabhāvavāde, api ca-
T04canprasu:7196: yathā svabhāvenāparijñātasya duḥkhasya parijñānaṃ na yuktam, evaṃ svabhāvenāvidyamānasya pūrvaṃ srotaāpattiphalasya paścādastitvaṃ na
T04canprasu:7199: na ca kevalametāni phalāni parijñāvanna yujyante, kiṃ tarhi adhigamo
T04canprasu:7205: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ |
T04canprasu:7206: saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ || 29 ||
T04canprasu:7208: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati || 30 ||
T04canprasu:7211: apratītyāpi bodhiṃ ca tava buddhaḥ prasajyate |
T04canprasu:7212: apratītyāpi buddhaṃ ca tava bodhiḥ prasajyate || 31 ||
T04canprasu:7213: yadi hi svabhāvato buddho nāma kaścid bhāvaḥ syāt, sa bodhiṃ sarvajñajñānamapratītyāpi anapekṣyāpi syāt |
T04canprasu:7214: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca |
T04canprasu:7216: tathā vināpi buddhena bodhiḥ syāt, anapekṣyāpi buddhaṃ nirāśrayā bodhiḥ syāt || 31 ||
T04canprasu:7220: iha hi buddhatvātpūrvamabuddhasvabhāvasya sataḥ pudgalasya satyāmapi bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ bodhyarthaṃ ghaṭamānasyāpi naiva bodhiḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:7223: na ca dharmamadharmaṃ vā kaścijjātu kariṣyati |
T04canprasu:7224: kimaśūnyasya kartavyaṃ svabhāvaḥ kriyate na hi || 33 ||
T04canprasu:7225: sati hi svabhāvavādābhyupagame dharmādharmayoḥ karaṇaṃ nopapadyate |
T04canprasu:7226: kiṃ hi aśūnyasya kartavyam? na hi svabhāvasyāśūnyasya kāraṇamupapadyate vidyamānatvāt || 33
T04canprasu:7228: vinā dharmamadharmaṃ ca phalaṃ hi tava vidyate |
T04canprasu:7229: dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate || 34 ||
T04canprasu:7232: yadā ca vinā dharmādharmaṃ phalaṃ tavāsti, tadā dharmādharmajaṃ phalaṃ tava na saṃbhavati
T04canprasu:7234: dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate |
T04canprasu:7236: atha dharmādharmanimittakaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti parikalpyate, na tarhi tatphalamaśūnyamiti
T04canprasu:7237: dharmādharmanimittaṃ vā yadi te vidyate phalam |
T04canprasu:7241: sarva eva hyete 'gaccha, kuru, paca, paṭha, tiṣṭha'; ityevamādayo laukikā vyavahārāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ
T04canprasu:7243: bhavān, tadā bhavatā pratītyasamutpādo bādhito bhavati |tadbādhanācca
T04canprasu:7244: sarva eva laukikā vyavahārā bādhitā bhavantīti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:7252: yadi hi svarūpaśūnyāḥ padārthā na bhaveyuḥ, sasvabhāvā eva bhaveyuḥ, tadā svabhāvasya vidyamānatvānna kenacit kasyacit kiṃcit kartavyaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:7261: [vicitrābhiravasthāmiḥ svabhāvaracitaṃ svabhāvenaiva racitamapratītyasamutpannaṃ jagat svabhāvaśūnyavādinām |] svabhāvenaiva yadi bhāvāḥ [sasvabhāvāḥ] syuḥ, tadā svabhāvasyākṛtrimatvādavyāvartanatvācca sarvamidaṃ jagadajātamaniruddhaṃ ca syāt |
T04canprasu:7265: syādyadi kiṃcidaśūnyaṃ na vadejjinu tasya vyākaraṇam |
T04canprasu:7266: tathāhi sthitaṃ tat svake svake bhāve |
T04canprasu:7267: kūṭasthamavikāraṃ na tasya vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ || iti ||
T04canprasu:7269: yadi koci dharmāṇa bhavetsvabhāvaḥ tatraiva gaccheya jinaḥ saśrāvakaḥ |
T04canprasu:7270: kūṭasthadharmāṇa siyā na nirvṛtī na niṣprapañco bhavi jātu paṇḍitaḥ || iti
T04canprasu:7271: na ca kevalaṃ sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame laukikā eva vyavahārā nopapadyante,
T04canprasu:7272: api ca lokottarā eva [api?] nopapadyante iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:7275: yadi hi aśūnyaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ sarvametat syāt, tadā yadasaṃprāptaṃ tadasaṃprāptameva, iti asaṃprāptasya ca phalasya prāptirna syāt |
T04canprasu:7276: tadā duḥkhaparyantakāraṇaṃ ca pūrvaṃ nābhūditi sāṃpratamapi na syāt |
T04canprasu:7277: sarveṣāṃ ca kleśānāṃ pūrvaṃ prahāṇaṃ nābhūditi paścādapi prahāṇaṃ na syāt || 39 ||
T04canprasu:7278: tadevaṃ yasmāt sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame sati sarvametanna yujyate, ataḥ-
T04canprasu:7280: duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca || 40 ||
T04canprasu:7281: yo hi sarvadharmapratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samyak paśyati, sa catvāri āryasatyāni paśyati yathābhūtāni tattvataḥ |
T04canprasu:7283: yena mañjuśrīranutpādaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ, tena duḥkhaṃ parijñātam |
T04canprasu:7284: yena nāstitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭā, tasya samudayaḥ prahīṇaḥ |
T04canprasu:7285: yena atyantaparinirvṛtāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ |
T04canprasu:7286: yena mañjuśrīrabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ, tena mārgo bhāvitaḥ || iti vistaraḥ ||
T04canprasu:7288: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- caturṇā mañjuśrīrāryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtādarśanāccaturbhirviparyāsairviparyastacittāḥ sattvā evabhimamabhūtaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti |
T04canprasu:7290: bhagavantametadavocat- deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti? bhagavānāha- ātmātmīyopalambhato mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti |
T04canprasu:7291: tat kasya hetoḥ? yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati, tasya karmābhisaṃskārā bhavanti |
T04canprasu:7292: bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjano 'tyantaparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ
T04canprasu:7293: upalabhate, upalabhya abhiniviśate, abhiniviṣṭaḥ san rajyate duṣyate muhyate |
T04canprasu:7294: sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā |
T04canprasu:7295: saḥ asatsamāropeṇa vikalpayati- ahaṃ raktaḥ, ahaṃ duṣṭaḥ,
T04canprasu:7297: tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ
T04canprasu:7298: śīlavān, ahaṃ brahmacārī, saṃsāraṃ samatikrāmiṣyāmi, ahaṃ
T04canprasu:7300: sa kalpayati- ime dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ, ime dharmā akuśalā iti, ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ, ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ, duḥkhaṃ parijñātavyam, samudayaḥ prahātavyaḥ, nirodhaḥ
T04canprasu:7305: tasyaiva mavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ |
T04canprasu:7306: tasyaivaṃ bhavati- eṣā sā duḥkhaparijñā, yeyameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parijñā |
T04canprasu:7308: sa sarvadharmebhya artīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate
T04canprasu:7309: tasyaivaṃ bhavati- iyameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sākṣātkriyā, idaṃ samudayaprahāṇam, yadidamebhyo dharmebhyo 'rtīyanā |
T04canprasu:7314: sa eko rahogatastān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate |
T04canprasu:7315: tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate |
T04canprasu:7316: tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ na pralīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate |
T04canprasu:7320: sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ, na mama bhūyaḥ uttariṃ kiṃcitkaraṇīyam,
T04canprasu:7323: tasya kāṅkṣā vicikitsā ca bhavati buddhabodhau |
T04canprasu:7326: yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatimutpādayati ||
T04canprasu:7327: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- kathaṃ punarbhagavan catvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni? bhagavānāha- yena mañjuśrīranutpannāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena duḥkhaṃ parijñātam yena asamutthitāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tasya samudayaḥ prahīṇaḥ |
T04canprasu:7328: yena atyantaparinirvṛtāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ |
T04canprasu:7329: yena atyantaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena mārgo bhāvitaḥ |
T04canprasu:7330: yena mañjuśrīrevaṃ catvāri āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni, sa na kalpayati- ime dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ, ime dharmā akuśalāḥ, ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ, ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ,
T04canprasu:7331: duḥkhaṃ parijñātavyam, samudayaḥ prahātavyaḥ, nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ,
T04canprasu:7333: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathāhi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate yaṃ parikalpayet |
T04canprasu:7334: bālapṛthagjanāstvetān dharmān kalpayanto rajyanti ca dviṣyanti ca muhyanti ca |
T04canprasu:7338: ajātaṃ sarvatraidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati māyopamaṃ svapnopamaṃ pratiśrutkopamam || evaṃsvabhāvān sarvadharmān paśyan anunayapratidhāpagato bhavati sarvasattveṣu |
T04canprasu:7339: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathāhi sa tān dharmān nopalabhate yatrānunīyeta vā pratihanyeta vā |
T04canprasu:7340: sa ākāśasamena cittena buddhamapi na samanupaśyati,
T04canprasu:7341: dharmamapi na samanupaśyati, saṃdhamapi na samanupaśyati |
T04canprasu:7342: sarvadharmān śūnyāniti samanupaśyan na kvaciddharme vicikitsāmutpādayati |
T04canprasu:7345: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau āryasatyaparīkṣā nāma caturviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:7348: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ |
T04canprasu:7350: iha hi bhagavatā uṣitabrahmacaryāṇāṃ tathāgataśāsanapratipannānnāṃ dharmānudharmapratipattiyuktānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dvividhaṃ nirvāṇamupavarṇitaṃ sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ ca |
T04canprasu:7351: tatra niravaśeṣasya avidyārāgādikasya kleśagaṇasya prahāṇāt sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇamiṣyate |
T04canprasu:7354: śiṣyata iti śeṣaḥ, upadhireva śeṣaḥ upadhiśeṣaḥ, saha upadhiśeṣeṇa vartate iti sopadhiśeṣam
T04canprasu:7359: yatra tu nirvāṇe skandhapañcakamapi nāsti, tannirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇam |
T04canprasu:7363: abhedi kāyo nirodhi saññā vedanā pi ti dahaṃsu sabbā |
T04canprasu:7369: etacca dvividhaṃ nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃ yujyate yadi kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca nirodho
T04canprasu:7370: bhavati? yadā tu sarvamidaṃ śūnyam, naiva kiṃcidutpadyate nāpi
T04canprasu:7371: kiṃcinnirudhyate, tadā kutaḥ kleśāḥ, kuto vā skandhāḥ, yeṣāṃ nirodhe nirvāṇaṃ syāditi? tasmādvidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti || 1 ||
T04canprasu:7376: svabhāvena hi vyavasthitānāṃ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt kuto nivṛttiḥ, yatastannivṛttyā nirvāṇaṃ syāditi? tasmāt svabhāvavādināṃ naiva nirvāṇamupapadyate |
T04canprasu:7377: na ca śūnyatāvādinaḥ skandhanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ kleśanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ vā nirvāṇamicchanti yatasteṣāmayaṃ doṣaḥ syāditi |
T04canprasu:7379: yadi khalu śūnyatāvādinaḥ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ vā nivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ necchanti, kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ tarhi icchanti? ucyate-
T04canprasu:7382: yaddhi naiva prahīyate rāgādivat, nāpi prāpyate śrāmaṇyaphalavat,
T04canprasu:7383: nāpyucchidyate skandhādivat, yaccāpi na nityamaśūnyavat, tat svabhāvato 'niruddhamanutpannaṃ ca sarvaprapañcopaśamalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇamuktam |
T04canprasu:7384: tat kutastasminnitthaṃvidhe niṣprapañce kleśakalpanā yeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇānnirvāṇaṃ bhavet? kuto vā skandhakalpanā tatra, yeṣāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhāt tadbhavet? yāvaddhi etāḥ kalpanāḥ pravartante, tāvannāsti
T04canprasu:7386: atha syāt- yadyapi nirvāṇe na santi kleśāḥ, na cāpi skandhāḥ, tathāpi nirvāṇādarvāgvidyante
T04canprasu:7393: nivāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca |
T04canprasu:7395: tadevaṃ nirvāṇe na kasyacit prahāṇaṃ nāpi kasyacinnirodha iti vijñeyam |
T04canprasu:7398: nirvṛtti dharmāṇa ca asti dharmā ye neha astī na te jātu asti |
T04canprasu:7399: astīti nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāmevaṃ carantāna na duḥkha śāmyati || iti |
T04canprasu:7400: asyā gāthāyā ayamarthaḥ- nivṛtau nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau dharmāṇāṃ kleśakarmajanmalakṣaṇānāṃ skandhānāṃ vā sarvathā astaṃgamādastitvaṃ nāsti,
T04canprasu:7402: ye tarhi dharmā iha nirvṛtau na santi,
T04canprasu:7403: pradīpodayādandhakāropalabdharajjusarpabhayādivat, na te jātu asti, na te dharmāḥ kleśakarmajanmādilakṣaṇāḥ kasmiṃścit kāle saṃsārāvasthāyāmapi tattvato (Pp_229) vidyante |
T04canprasu:7404: na hi rajjuḥ andhakārāvasthāyāṃ svarūpataḥ sarpo 'sti, sadbhūtasarpavat andhakāre 'pi āloke
T04canprasu:7406: kathaṃ tarhi saṃsāraḥ iti cet, ucyate |
T04canprasu:7407: ātmātmīyāsadgrahagrastānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāmasatsvarūpā api bhāvāḥ satyataḥ pratibhāsante taimirikāṇāmiva asatkeśamaśakādaya iveti |
T04canprasu:7409: astīti nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāmevaṃ carantāna na duḥkha śāmyati |
T04canprasu:7414: tadanyeṣāṃ ca atītānāgatasaṃsthānāṃ vijñaptiviprayuktasaṃskārāṇāṃ nāstivādināṃ tadanyadastivādinām,
T04canprasu:7416: paratantrapariniṣpannasvabhāvayorastivādinām, evamastināstivādināmevaṃ caratāṃ na duḥkhaṃ saṃsāraḥ śāmyatīti |
T04canprasu:7418: yatha śaṅkitena viṣasaṃjña abhyupeti no cāpi koṣṭha gantu āviṣṭa papadyate
T04canprasu:7419: evameva bālu 'pagato ..... jāyi mriyate sadā abhūto || iti |
T04canprasu:7420: tadevaṃ na kasyacinnirvāṇe prahāṇaṃ nāpi kasyacinnirodha iti vijñeyam |
T04canprasu:7423: na cābhāvo 'pi nirvāṇaṃ kuta evāsya bhāvanā |
T04canprasu:7426: ye tu sarvakalpanopaśamarūpaṃ nirvāṇamapratipadyamānāḥ bhāvābhāvatadubhayānubhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ parikalpayanti, tān prati ucyate-
T04canprasu:7428: prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā || 4 ||
T04canprasu:7429: tatraike bhāvato nirvāṇamabhiniviṣṭā evamācakṣate- iha kleśakarmajanmasaṃtānapravṛttiniyatarodhabhūto jalapravāharodhabhūtasetusthānīyo nirodhātmakaḥ padārthaḥ, tannirvāṇam |
T04canprasu:7430: na ca avidyamānasvabhāvo dharmaḥ evaṃ kāryakārī dṛśyate |
