T04canprasu:7432: nandīrāgasahagatāyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇamityuktam, na ca kṣayamātraṃ bhāvo bhavitumarhati |
T04canprasu:7438: naitadevaṃ vijñeyaṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayaḥ tṛṣṇākṣayaḥ iti |
T04canprasu:7439: kiṃ tarhi tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayo 'sminniti nirvāṇākhye dharme sati bhavati, sa tṛṣṇākṣaya iti
T04canprasu:7442: tatrāpi yasmin sati cetaso vimokṣo bhavatīti veditavyamiti ||
T04canprasu:7443: evaṃ bhāve nirvāṇa vyavasthāpite ācāryo nirūpayati- bhāvastāvanna nirvāṇam |
T04canprasu:7444: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmājjarāmaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ prasajyeta, bhāvasya jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇāvyabhicāritvāt
T04canprasu:7447: tāmeva ca jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇavyabhicāritāṃ spaṣṭayannāha- asti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vineti
T04canprasu:7448: yo hi jarāmaraṇarahitaḥ, sa bhāva eva na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:7451: bhāvaśca yadi nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet |
T04canprasu:7452: nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana || 5 ||
T04canprasu:7453: yadi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvaḥ syāt, tadā tannirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet, vijñānādivat bhāvatvāt |
T04canprasu:7454: yastu asaṃskṛtaḥ, nāsau bhāvaḥ, tadyathā kharaviṣāṇavaditi vyatirekamupadarśayannāha-
T04canprasu:7455: nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana |
T04canprasu:7461: nirvāṇaṃ nānupādāya kaścid bhāvo hi vidyate || 6 ||
T04canprasu:7462: yadi bhavanmatena nirvāṇaṃ bhāvaḥ syāt, tadupādāya bhavet,
T04canprasu:7464: na caivamupādāya nirvāṇamiṣyate, kiṃ tarhi anupādāya |
T04canprasu:7465: tadyadi bhāvo nirvāṇamanupādāya, tat kathaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt? naiva anupādāya syāt, bhāvatvāt, vijñānādivat |
T04canprasu:7466: vyatirekakāraṇamāha- nānupādāya kaścidbhāvo hi vidyate iti || 6 ||
T04canprasu:7467: atrāha- yadi bhāvo hi na nirvāṇam, yathoditadoṣaprasaṅgāt, kiṃ tarhi abhāva eva nirvāṇam, kleśajanmanivṛttimātratvāditi? ucyate |
T04canprasu:7469: yadi bhāvo na nirvāṇamabhāvaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati |
T04canprasu:7470: nirvāṇaṃ yatra bhāvo na nābhāvastatra vidyate || 7 ||
T04canprasu:7471: yadi bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ neṣyate, yadi nirvāṇaṃ bhāva iti neṣyate, tadā kimabhāvo bhaviṣyati nirvāṇam? abhāvo 'pi na bhaviṣyatītyarthaḥ |
T04canprasu:7474: anityataiva hi kleśajanmanorabhāvo nānyat, ityataḥ anityataiva nirvāṇaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:7480: tatra abhāvaḥ anityatā vā bhāvamupādāya prajñapyate,
T04canprasu:7484: ataḥ parasparāpekṣikyāṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇapravṛttau kuto lakṣyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya anityatā bhaviṣyati?
T04canprasu:7486: tato yadi abhāvaśca nirvāṇam, tat kathamanupādāya nirvāṇaṃ bhavet? upādāyaiva tadbhavet, abhāvatvādvināśavat
T04canprasu:7487: | etadeva spaṣṭayannāha- na hyabhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate iti ||
T04canprasu:7488: yadi tarhi abhāvaḥ anupādāya nāsti, kimidānīmupādāya bandhyāputrādayo 'bhāvā bhaviṣyanti? kenaitaduktaṃ vandhyāputrādayo 'bhāvā iti? uktaṃ hi pūrvam-
T04canprasu:7493: ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca |
T04canprasu:7497: vandhyāputra iti śabdamātramevaitat, na asya arthaḥ upalabhyate, yasyārthasya bhāvatvamabhāvatvaṃ vā syāditi |
T04canprasu:7498: kutaḥ anupalabhyamānasvabhāvasya bhāvābhāvakalpanā yokṣyate? tasmāt na bandhyāputro 'bhāva iti vijñeyam |
T04canprasu:7501: atrāha- yadi bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ na bhavati, abhāvo 'pi, kiṃ tarhi nirvāṇamiti?
T04canprasu:7507: sa cāyamājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ kadāciddhetupratyayasāmagrīmāśritya astīti prajñapyate dīrghahrasvavat
T04canprasu:7509: sarvathā yadyayamupādāya prajñapyate, yadi vā pratītya jāyata iti vyavasthāpyate, sarvathāsya janmamaraṇaparaṃparāprabandhasya apratītya vā anupādāya vā
T04canprasu:7511: na ca apravṛttimātraṃ bhāvo 'bhāvo veti parikalpitu pāryata iti |
T04canprasu:7514: yeṣāṃ saṃskārāḥ saṃsarantīti pakṣaḥ, teṣāṃ pratītya pratītya ya utpādaśca vināśaśca, so 'pratītyāpravartamāno nirvāṇamiti kathyate |
T04canprasu:7515: yeṣāṃ tu pudgalaḥ saṃsarati, teṣāṃ tasya nityānityatvenāvācyasya
T04canprasu:7516: tattadupādānamāśritya ya ājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ sa upādāya pravartate, sa evopādāyopādāya pravartayamānaḥ sannidānīmanupādāyāpravartayamāno nirvāṇamiti vyapadiśyate |
T04canprasu:7517: na ca saṃskārāṇāṃ pudgalasya vā apravṛttimātrakaṃ bhāvo 'bhāvo veti śakyaṃ parikalpayitum
T04canprasu:7518: ityato 'pi na bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yujyate || 9 ||
T04canprasu:7522: tatra sūtra uktam- ye kecidbhikṣavo bhavena bhavasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante
T04canprasu:7524: ubhayaṃ hyetat parityājyaṃ bhave tṛṣṇā vibhave tṛṣṇā ca |
T04canprasu:7527: tadyadi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvarūpaṃ syādabhāvarūpaṃ vā, tadapi prahātavyaṃ bhavet |
T04canprasu:7530: yeṣāmapi kleśajanmanostatrābhāvādabhāvarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ svayaṃ ca bhāvarūpatvādbhāvarūpamityubhayarūpam, teṣāmubhayarūpamiti nirvāṇaṃ nopapadyate, iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:7533: yadi bhāvābhāvobhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt, tadā bhāvaśca abhāvaśca mokṣa iti syāt |
T04canprasu:7534: tataśca yaḥ saṃskārāṇāmātmalābhaḥ tasya ca vigamaḥ, sa eva mokṣaḥ
T04canprasu:7536: na ca saṃskārā eva mokṣa iti yujyate |
T04canprasu:7542: yadi bhāvābhāvarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt, tadā hetupratyayasāmagrīmupādāya āśritya bhavet, na anupādāya |
T04canprasu:7544: bhāvamupādāya abhāvaḥ, abhāvaṃ copādāya bhāvaḥ, iti kṛtvā ubhayametad
T04canprasu:7545: bhāvaṃ ca abhāvaṃ ca upādāyaiva bhavati, na anupādāya |
T04canprasu:7550: asaṃskṛtaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau || 13 ||
T04canprasu:7554: tadyadi bhāvābhāvasvabhāvaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt, tadā na asaṃskṛtam, [kiṃ tu]
T04canprasu:7556: yasmānna ca saṃskṛtamiṣyate, tasmānna bhāvābhāvasvarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ yujyate || 13 ||
T04canprasu:7557: athāpi syāt- naiva hi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvasvarūpam, kiṃ tarhi nirvāṇe
T04canprasu:7563: bhāvābhāvayorapi parasparaviruddhayorekatra nirvāṇe nāsti saṃbhava iti,
T04canprasu:7567: idānīṃ yathā naiva bhāvo naivābhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yujyate, tathā
T04canprasu:7570: abhāve caiva bhāve ca sā siddhe sati sidhyati || 15 ||
T04canprasu:7571: yadi hi bhāvo nāma kaścit syāt, tadā tatpratiṣedhena naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamityeṣā kalpanā, yadi kaścidabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā tatpratiṣedhena naivābhāvo nirvāṇaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:7572: yadā ca bhāvābhāvāveva na staḥ, tadā tatpratiṣedho 'pi nāstīti |
T04canprasu:7573: tasmānnaiva bhāvo naivābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yā kalpanā, sāpi nopapadyata eva |
T04canprasu:7576: naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yadi vidyate |
T04canprasu:7577: naivābhāvo naiva bhāva iti kena tadajyate || 16 ||
T04canprasu:7578: yadi etannirvāṇaṃ naivābhāvarūpaṃ naiva bhāvarūpamastīti kalpyate, kena tadānīṃ taditthaṃvidhaṃ nobhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇamastīti ajyate gṛhyate prakāśate vā? kiṃ tatra nirvāṇe kaścidevaṃvidhaḥ pratipattāsti, atha
T04canprasu:7579: nāsti? yadi asti, evaṃ sati nirvāṇe 'pi tavātmā syāt |
T04canprasu:7582: atha nāsti, kenaitaditthaṃvidhaṃ nirvāṇamastīti paricchidyate? saṃsārāvasthitaḥ paricchinattīti cet, yadi saṃsārāvasthitaḥ paricchinatti, sa kiṃ vijñānena paricchinatti, utta
T04canprasu:7583: jñānena? yadi vijñāneneti parikalpyate, tanna yujyate |
T04canprasu:7585: (Pp_234) yasmānnimittālambanaṃ vijñānam, na ca nirvāṇe kiṃcinnimittamasti,
T04canprasu:7589: yasmād jñānena hi śūnyatālambanena bhavitavyam, tacca anutpādarūpameveti,
T04canprasu:7590: kathaṃ tenāvidyamānasvarūpeṇa naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamiti gṛhyate,
T04canprasu:7592: tasmānna kenacinnirvāṇaṃ naivābhāvo naiva bhāva ityajyate |
T04canprasu:7594: sarvathā yathā ca nirvāṇe etāścatasraḥ kalpanā na saṃbhavanti, evaṃ nirvāṇādhigantaryapi tathāgate etāḥ kalpanā naiva saṃbhavantīti
T04canprasu:7597: na bhavatyubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nohyate || 17 ||
T04canprasu:7600: nāstīti vā kalpayan sa nirvṛtasya vikalpayet |
T04canprasu:7601: evaṃ tāvat paraṃ nirodhādbhavati tathāgato na bhavati ceti nohyate |
T04canprasu:7604: na ca kevalaṃ paraṃ nirodhāccaturbhiḥ prakārairbhagavānnohyate, api ca-
T04canprasu:7607: yathā nājyaṃ na cohyaṃ tathā tathāgataparīkṣāyāṃ pratipāditam || 18 ||
T04canprasu:7612: nohyate bhavatītyevamādinā, ata eva saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ parasparato nāsti kaścidviśeṣaḥ, vicāryamāṇayostulyarūpatvāt |
T04canprasu:7614: anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāra iti, tadapi ata evopapannam,
T04canprasu:7617: nirvāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca |
T04canprasu:7619: na ca kevalaṃ saṃsārasya nirvāṇenāviśiṣṭatvāt pūrvāparakoṭikalpanā na
T04canprasu:7623: tā api ata eva nopapadyante, saṃsāranirvāṇayorubhayorapi prakṛtiśāntatvenaikarasatvāt ||
T04canprasu:7624: tatra paraṃ nirodhādityanenopalakṣaṇena catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ parigṛhyante |
T04canprasu:7625: tadyathā- bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ
T04canprasu:7626: maraṇāta, bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, naiva bhavati na na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi |
T04canprasu:7632: tatra ātmano lokasya vā anāgatamutpādamapaśyan antavān loka ityevaṃ kalpayan aparāntamālambya
T04canprasu:7633: pravartate| evamanāgatamutpādaṃ paśyan anantavān loka ioti pravartate|
T04canprasu:7634: paśyaṃśca apaśyaṃśca ubhayathā prātipadyate| dvayapratiṣedhena naivāntavān nānantavāniti pratipadyate |
T04canprasu:7636: śāśvataścāśāśvataśca, naivaśāśvato naivāśāśvāto lokaḥ, ityetāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritya pravartante| tatra ātmano lokasya vā atītamutpādaṃ paśyan śāśvato loka iti pratipadyate, apaśyannaśāśvata iti pratipadyate, paśyaṃśca apaśyaṃśca śāśvataścāśāśvataśceti pratipadyate,
T04canprasu:7637: naiva paśyannaivāpaśyan naivaśāśvato nāśāśvataśceti pratipadyate pūrvāntamāaśritya |
T04canprasu:7638: tāścaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ kathaṃ yujyante? yadi kasyacitpadārthasya kaścit svabhāvo bhavet, tasya bhāvābhāvakalpanāt syuretā dṛṣṭayaḥ |
T04canprasu:7643: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca kiṃ vā nobhayamapyataḥ || 23 ||
T04canprasu:7644: caturdaśāpyetāni avyākṛtavastūni asati bhāvasvarūpe naiva yujyante| yastu bhāvasvarūpamadhyāropya tadvigamāvigamataḥ etā dṛṣṭīrutpādya abhiniviśate,
T04canprasu:7645: tasyāyamabhiniveśo nirvāṇapuragāminaṃ panthānaṃ niruṇaddhi, sāṃsārikeṣu ca duḥkheṣu niyojayatīti vijñeyam || 23 ||
T04canprasu:7646: atrāha- yadi evaṃ bhavatā nirvāṇamapi pratiṣiddham, nanu ca ya eṣa bhavagatā anantacaritasattvarāśyanuvartakena
T04canprasu:7647: viditāviparītasakalajagadāśayasvabhāvena mahākarūṇāparatantreṇa priyaikaputra kapremānugatāśeṣatribhuvanajanena caritapratipakṣānurūpo dharmo deśito lokasya nirvāṇādhigamārtham, (Pp_236) sa evaṃ sati vyartha eva jāyate| ucyate- yadi kaściddharmo nāma svabhāvarūpataḥ syāt, kecicca sattvāstasya dharmasya śrotāraḥ syuḥ, kaścidvā deśitā buddho bhagavānnāma bhāvasvabhāvaḥ syāt, syādetadevam |
T04canprasu:7651: tadā kuto 'smākaṃ yathoktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ? iha hi sarveṣāṃ prapañcānāṃ nimittānāṃ ya upaśamo 'pravṛttistannirvāṇam |
T04canprasu:7658: yadā caivaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvaprapañcopaśāntarūpe nirvāṇe śive 'sthānayogena nabhasīva haṃsarājāḥ sthitāḥ svapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārapakṣapātavāte vātagagane vā
T04canprasu:7659: gaganasyākiṃcanatvāt, tadā sarvanimittānupalambhānna kvaciddeveṣu vā manuṣyeṣu vā na kasyaciddevasya vā manuṣyasya vā na kaściddharmaḥ sāṃkleśiko vā vaiyavadāniko vā deśita iti vijñeyam |
T04canprasu:7662: parinirvāsyati, atrāntare tathāgatenaikamapyakṣaraṃ nodāhṛtaṃ na vyāhṛtaṃ nāpi pravyāharati nāpi pravyāhariṣyati |
T04canprasu:7663: atha ca yathādhimuktāḥ sarvasattvā nānādhātvāśayāstāṃ tāṃ vividhāṃ tathāgatavācaṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānanti |
T04canprasu:7664: teṣāmevaṃ pṛthak pṛthagbhavati- ayaṃ bhagavānasmabhyamimaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, vayaṃ ca tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇumaḥ |
T04canprasu:7665: tatra tathāgato na kalpayati na vikalpayati |
T04canprasu:7670: ya evaṃ jānati dharmān kumāro buddha socyate ||
T04canprasu:7671: yadi tarhyevaṃ na kvacitkasyacitkaściddharmo buddhena deśitaḥ,
T04canprasu:7672: tatkathamime ete vicitrāḥ pravacanavyavahārāḥ prajñāyante? ucyate |
T04canprasu:7674: ayaṃ bhagavān sakalatribhuvanasurāsuranaranāthaḥ imaṃ dharmamasmabhyaṃ deśayatīti |
T04canprasu:7676: tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya |
T04canprasu:7677: naivātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarvaloke || iti |
T04canprasu:7679: tataśca nirvāṇārthaṃ dharmadeśanāyā abhāvāt kuto dharmadeśanāyāḥ sadbhāvena nirvāṇasyāstitvaṃ bhaviṣyati? tasmānnirvāṇamapi nāstīti siddham |
T04canprasu:7683: tathā- na teṣāṃ bhagavan saṃsārasamatikramo ye nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante |
T04canprasu:7684: tatkasya hetoḥ? nirvāṇamiti bhagavan yaḥ praśamaḥ sarvanimittānāmuparatiḥ sarveñjitasamiñjitānām
T04canprasu:7685: tadime bhagavan mohapuruṣā ye svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya tīrthikadṛṣṭau nipatitā nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante tadyathā tilebhyastailaṃ kṣīrātsarpiḥ |
T04canprasu:7686: atyantaparinirvṛteṣu bhagavan sarvadharmeṣu ye nirvāṇaṃ mārganti tānahamābhimānikān tīrthikāniti vadāmi |
T04canprasu:7687: na bhagavan yogācāraḥ samyak pratipannaḥ kasyaciddharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā karoti, nāpi kasyaciddharmasya prāptimicchati nābhisamayamiti vistaraḥ ||
T04canprasu:7688: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau nirvāṇaparīkṣā nāma pañcaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:7697: duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca || iti,
T04canprasu:7702: tatra avidyā ajñānaṃ tamo yathābhūtārthapracchādakaṃ stimitatā |
T04canprasu:7703: avidyayā nivṛtaḥ chāditaḥ pudgalaḥ punarbhavāya punarbhavārthaṃ punarbhavotpattyarthamabhisaṃskaroti utpādayati yān kuśalādicetanāviśeṣāṃste punarbhavābhisaṃskārāt saṃskārāḥ |
T04canprasu:7704: te ca trividhāḥ- kuśalā akuśalā ānejyāśca, yadi vā- kāyikā vācikā mānasāśceti |
T04canprasu:7706: taiśca saṃskārairabhisaṃskṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ karmasaṃjñitaiḥ taddhetukāṃ gatiṃ gacchati || 1
T04canprasu:7709: kṛtopacitasaṃskārasyāsya pudgalasya saṃskārānurūpāyāṃ gatau devādikāyāṃ saṃskārahetukaṃ vijñānaṃ saṃniviśate praviśati upapadyate saṃsārānarthabījabhūtam |
T04canprasu:7717: idaṃ ca rūpaṃ pūrvakaṃ ca nāma,
T04canprasu:7719: tatra bimbapratibimbanyāyena svādhyāyadīpamudrāpratimudrādinyāyena vā māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu nirudhyamāneṣu ekasminneva kṣaṇe tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmanyāyenaiva aupapattyāṃśikāḥ (Pp_239) skandhā yathākarmākṣepata upajāyante |
T04canprasu:7721: tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmanyāyena tu yadvijñānaṃ saṃniviśate ityuktam, tad
T04canprasu:7723: tathā samānena samānakālaṃ lokasya duḥkhaṃ ca sukhodayaṃ ca |
T04canprasu:7724: hartuṃ ca kartuṃ ca sadāstu śaktistamaḥ prakāśaṃ ca yathaiva bhānoḥ || iti
T04canprasu:7725: na tu punaḥ pratītyasamutpādasvarūpavicakṣaṇānāmevaṃ vaktuṃ yujyate sāhacaryāditvamekakṣaṇe tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmadṛṣṭānteneti |
T04canprasu:7726: janmonmukhaṃ na sadidaṃ yadi jāyamānaṃnāśonmukhaṃ sadapi nāma nirudhyamānam |
T04canprasu:7727: iṣṭaṃ tadā kathamidaṃ tulayā samānaṃ kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā ||
T04canprasu:7729: yathā bimbapratibimbamudrāpratimudrādinyāyena kṣaṇikatvaṃ neṣyate bhavadbhiḥ, tathā anyasyāpi bhāvasya utpādasamanantaradhvaṃsinaḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ na yuktam |
T04canprasu:7730: yataḥ jātijarāsthityanityatākhyāni catvāri saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni utpadyamānasya bhāvasya bāhyasya ādhyātmikasya vā ekasminneva kṣaṇe bhavantītyabhidharmapāṭhaḥ |
T04canprasu:7731: tatra jātijarayoḥ parasparavirodhāt sthityanityatayośca ekasminneva bhāve na yugapatsaṃbhava iṣyate sadbhiḥ |
T04canprasu:7739: na ca jātimaraṇayoḥ parasparabhinnalakṣaṇayoḥ ekasmin kṣaṇe saṃbhavo bhavet,
T04canprasu:7748: naikatve sahabhāvo 'sti na tenaiva hi tatsaha |
T04canprasu:7750: evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha |
T04canprasu:7752: iti pratiṣedhāt kutaḥ samānakālatā bhāvānāṃ maraṇabhavopapattibhavayoriti?
T04canprasu:7754: tena naikasminneva kṣaṇe nāmonnāmau tulāyāḥ saṃbhavataḥ nāmonnāmayoḥ kālabhedāt |
T04canprasu:7757: tathāpi atra utpalapatraśatasahasravedhaḥ sūcyagreṇa kramaśo vedho 'vaseyaḥ
T04canprasu:7764: iti pāṭhādutpādanirodhayorasaṃbhava eva pratipāditaḥ śāstre madhyamake |
T04canprasu:7769: sattvadhātuṃ ca deśeti eṣā lokānuvartanā || ityādi |
T04canprasu:7775: divā vā yadi vā rātrau saṃprajānan pratismṛtaḥ |
T04canprasu:7778: ataḥ phenapiṇḍādīnāṃ hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ prāpya pratītya samutpannānāṃ sāravastuvigatānāṃ kutaḥ kṣaṇikākṣaṇikacinteti? mahāyānasūtreṣu ca-
T04canprasu:7779: supinopamā bhavagatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate |
T04canprasu:7780: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇaśubha saṃsarato ||
T04canprasu:7781: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ |
T04canprasu:7782: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśatī na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate ||
T04canprasu:7783: yathā kumārī supināntarasmiṃ svaputra jātaṃ ca mṛtaṃca paśyati |
T04canprasu:7784: jāte 'tituṣṭā mṛti daurmanasyitā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān ||
T04canprasu:7785: yathaiva grāmāntari lekhadarśanāt kriyāḥ pravartanti pṛthak śubhāśubhāḥ |
T04canprasu:7786: na lekhasaṃkrānti girāya vidyate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān ||
T04canprasu:7788: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāra 'nucchedaśāśvatāḥ ||
T04canprasu:7789: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro |
T04canprasu:7790: na ca anyu tato na caiva tat evamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā ||
T04canprasu:7791: yatha muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā |
T04canprasu:7792: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣu ekaikasu nāsti vartanā ||
T04canprasu:7801: tadevaṃ bimbapratibimbādinyāyena mātuḥ kukṣau vijñāne saṃmūrcchite vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ niṣicyate, kṣarati prādurbhavatītyarthaḥ |
T04canprasu:7802: yadi iha gatau vijñānaṃ na saṃmūrchitaṃ syāt, tadā nāmarūpaprādurbhāvo na syāt
T04canprasu:7803: sacedānanda vijñānaṃ mātuḥ kukṣiṃ nāvakrāmeta, na tat kalalaṃ kalalatvāya saṃvarteta |
T04canprasu:7809: saumanasyasthānīyānyabhiniviśate, abhiniviṣṭaḥ san rāgajaṃ dvevajaṃ mohajaṃ karma karotītyādinā duḥkhotpattāvāyadvāratvaṃ ṣaṇṇāmāyatanānām |
T04canprasu:7812: kaḥ punarayaṃ saṃsparśaḥ, kathaṃ vā saṃpravartate iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:7813: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca samanvāhārameva ca |
T04canprasu:7816: sparśaḥ saḥ cakṣurindriyaṃ pratītya rūpāṇi ca samanvāhāraṃ ca pratītya manaskāraṃ viṣayādivilakṣaṇaṃ samanantarapratyayaṃ vijñānabījabhūtaṃ
T04canprasu:7821: tadevameṣāmindriyaviṣayavijñānānāṃ trayāṇāṃ yaḥ saṃnipātaḥ sahotpādaḥ anyonyopakāreṇa tulyaṃ yā pravṛttiḥ, sa spṛṣṭilakṣaṇaḥ sparśaḥ |
T04canprasu:7827: yathā caiṣāṃ rūpavijñānacakṣuṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātalakṣaṇaṃ sparśamāgamya
T04canprasu:7836: kathaṃ kṛtvā? yadi tāvat sukhā vedanā asyopajāyate, sa tasyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃyogārthaṃ
T04canprasu:7837: | atha duḥkhā, tadā tasyā visaṃyogārthaṃ paritṛṣyate |
T04canprasu:7842: sa evaṃ vedanāsvabhiniviṣṭaḥ saktaḥ tṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ kāmadṛṣṭiśīlavratātmavādopādānākhyaṃ caturvidhaṃ karmākṣepakāraṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti |
T04canprasu:7847: pañca skandhāḥ sa ca bhavaḥ caturvidhasya yathoktasya upādānasya upādātā grahītā utpādayitā
T04canprasu:7849: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt, yo hi anutpāditavedanātṛṣṇaḥ pratisaṃkhyānabalena tṛṣṇāmasvīkurvan,
T04canprasu:7850: caturvidhamupādānaṃ pravihāya upādātā amalādvayajñānasaṃmukhībhāvāt syāddhi yadyanupādāno mucyeta saḥ |
T04canprasu:7852: kaḥ punarayaṃ bhavaḥ? pañca skandhāḥ sa ca bhavaḥ |
T04canprasu:7853: yaḥ upādānāt pravartate, sa pañcaskandha svabhāvo veditavyaḥ |
T04canprasu:7854: trividhamapi kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasikaṃ ca karma bhavatyasmādanāgataṃ skandha pañcakaṃ bhavaḥ iti vyapadiśyate |
T04canprasu:7855: tatra kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma rūpaskandhasvabhāvaṃ karmavijñaptitvāt |
T04canprasu:7857: evaṃ sa bhavaḥ pañca skandhā iti vijñeyam |
T04canprasu:7869: mriyamāṇasya vigacchataḥ saṃmūḍhasya sāmiṣaṅgo hṛdayasaṃtāpaḥ śokaḥ |
T04canprasu:7876: tadevaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena kevalasyaivametasya duḥkhaskandhasya saṃbhavaḥ || 9 ||
T04canprasu:7884: tatra saṃsārasya vijñānādipravṛttilakṣaṇasya mūlaṃ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃskārāḥ |
T04canprasu:7886: avidyānugato yaḥ pudgalo bhikṣavaḥ puṇyānapi saṃskārānabhisaṃskaroti,
T04canprasu:7889: yataścaivamavidvān kārakaḥ, tasmādavidvāneva pudgalaḥ kārako bhavati saṃskārāṇām, na vidvāṃstattvadarśī prahīṇāvidyaḥ |
T04canprasu:7891: sarvapadārthanāmevānupalambhāt nāsti kiṃcid yadālambya karma kuryāditi ||
T04canprasu:7892: yataścaivamavidyāyāmeva satyāṃ saṃskārāḥ pravartante, asatyāṃ na pravartante, ataḥ-
T04canprasu:7898: yo hi pratītyasamutpādaṃ samyak paśyati, sa sūkṣmasyāpi bhāvasya na svarūpamupalabhate |
T04canprasu:7900: sa eva svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāmavatīrṇo na kiṃcidvastu upalabhate bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ vā |
T04canprasu:7901: so 'nupalabhamāno na kvaciddharme muhyati, amūḍhaśca karma na karotīti |
T04canprasu:7908: pūrvasya pūrvasya aṅgasya nirodhena utarasyottarasya aṅgasya nirodho bhavatīti vijñeyam |
T04canprasu:7909: anayā cānupūrvyā ayaṃ yogī ātmātmīyādyadarśanāyāsanirastaḥ kārakavedakavirahitaṃ bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyaṃ duḥkharāśiṃ punaranutpattyā samyaṅnirodhayati |
T04canprasu:7916: ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ, sparśapratyayā vedanā, vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā,
T04canprasu:7919: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati |
T04canprasu:7927: evaṃ yāvajjāterapi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ jarāmaraṇamabhinirvartayāmīti |
T04canprasu:7929: atha ca satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇābhinirvṛtti rbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ |
T04canprasu:7934: katameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt? yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya
T04canprasu:7936: tatrādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaḥ? yaḥ kāyasya saṃśleṣātkaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayati, ayamucyate pṛthivīdhātuḥ |
T04canprasu:7939: yaḥ kāyasya āśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karoti, ayamucyate vāyudhātuḥ |
T04canprasu:7941: yo nāmarūpamabhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena pañcavijñānakāyasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānam, ayamucyate bhikṣavo vijñānadhātuḥ |
T04canprasu:7945: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ kāyasya kaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayāmīti
T04canprasu:7951: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahamemiḥ pratyayairjanita iti |
T04canprasu:7952: atha ca punaḥ satāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyātkāyasyotpatti rbhavati |
T04canprasu:7953: tatra pṛthivīdhāturnātmā na sattvo na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit |
T04canprasu:7954: evamabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturākāśadhāturvijñānadhāturnātmā (Pp_246) na sattvo na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ
T04canprasu:7955: na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit ||
T04canprasu:7956: tatra avidyā katamā? yā eṣāmevaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāyamaiksaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā sattvasaṃjñā
T04canprasu:7960: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣu, amī saṃskārā ityucyante |
T04canprasu:7962: vijñānasahabhuvaścatvāraḥ skandhā arūpiṇaḥ upādānākhyāḥ, tannāmarūpaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni, tāni copādāya rūpam |
T04canprasu:7978: ye cāpyanye evamādaya upakleśāste upāyāsā iti ||
T04canprasu:7997: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āneñjyopagāḥ
T04canprasu:7998: tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati |
T04canprasu:8004: saharūpaskandhena ca nāma rūpaṃ ceti nāmarūpamucyate |
T04canprasu:8005: nāmarūpavivṛddhayā ṣaḍbhirāyatanadvāraiḥ kṛtyakriyāḥ pravartante prajñāyante, tannāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate |
T04canprasu:8008: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate |
T04canprasu:8010: | yastāṃ vedanāṃ viśeṣeṇāsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya
T04canprasu:8012: āsvādanābhinandanādhyavasānasthānādātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhūnnityamaparityāgo bhavediti yaivaṃ prārthanā idamucyate bhikṣavastṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam |
T04canprasu:8014: 'rjanāya viṭhapanāyopādānamupādatte, tatra tatra prārthayate, evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca, sa upādānapratyayo bhava ityucyate |
T04canprasu:8019: naivānityo naiva nityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā nāvedayitā na pratītyasamutpanno nāpratītyasamutpanno na kṣayadharmo nākṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo nāvināśadharmo na nirodhadharmo nānirodhadharmo 'nādikālapravṛtto 'nucchinno 'nupravartate nadīsrotavat ||
T04canprasu:8021: nadīsrotavat, atha cemānyasya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāryaṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante |
T04canprasu:8023: yaduta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca |
T04canprasu:8032: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti |
T04canprasu:8033: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānasya snehakāryaṃ karomiti |
T04canprasu:8034: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti |
T04canprasu:8036: atha ca vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyanditamavidyayā svavakīrṇaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ virohati |
T04canprasu:8038: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃ kṛtoa na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ |
T04canprasu:8040: ṛtusamavāyād, anyeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādānuviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣvaparigraheṣvamameṣvākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu
T04canprasu:8044: yaduta cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ cālokaṃ cākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītyotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam
T04canprasu:8052: yadā tu cakṣurādhyātmikamāyatanamavikalaṃ bhavati, evaṃ rūpālokākāśatajjamanasikārāścāvikalā bhavanti, tataḥ sarveṣāṃ samavāyāccakṣurvijñānamutpadyate |
T04canprasu:8053: tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
T04canprasu:8054: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
T04canprasu:8055: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomiti |
T04canprasu:8056: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti
T04canprasu:8062: tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ supariśuddhe ādarśamaṇḍale mukhapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate, na ca tatrādarśamaṇḍale mukhaṃ saṃkrāmati, asti ca mukhaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt, evamasmāllokānna kaściccyuto nāpyanyatropapannaḥ, asti ca karmaphalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt tadyathā bhikṣavaścandramaṇḍalaṃ catvāriṃśadyojanaśatamūrdhvaṃ vrajati, atha ca punaḥ parītte 'pyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate, na ca tasmātsthānādūrdhvaṃ nabhasaścyutaṃ parītte udakasya bhājane saṃkrāntaṃ
T04canprasu:8065: tadyathā- agnirupādānapratyaye sati jvalati, upādānavaikalyānna jvalati,
T04canprasu:8066: evameva bhikṣavaḥ karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyāyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣvaparigraheṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu amameṣu kṛtrimeṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt ||
T04canprasu:8069: pañcabhiḥ? na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuvipulaphalābhinirvṛttitastatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti
T04canprasu:8070: kathaṃ na śāśvatataḥ? yasmādanye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, anye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ
T04canprasu:8071: na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāsta evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ |
T04canprasu:8072: api tu māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante, tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti
T04canprasu:8074: kathaṃ nocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nāpyaniruddheṣu |
T04canprasu:8076: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tulādaṇḍonnābhāvanāmavat candrabimbapratibimbavat
T04canprasu:8078: kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśāḥ sattvanikāyāḥ sabhāgāyāṃ jātyāṃ jātimabhinirvartayanti |
T04canprasu:8084: tatsadṛśānuprabandhataḥ? yathāvedanīyaṃ karma kriyate, tathāvedanīyo vipāko 'nubhūyate |
T04canprasu:8087: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dvādaśāṅgaparīkṣā nāma ṣaḍviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
T04canprasu:8089: yaścaivaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak paśyati, sa na pūrvāntaṃ
T04canprasu:8090: pratisarati, nāparāntaṃ pratisarati,- ityādi sūtre paṭhayate, tatra katamaḥ pūrvāntaḥ, katamo 'parāntaḥ, kathaṃ na pratisaratīti?
T04canprasu:8092: tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya atītā ātmabhāvāḥ pūrvānta ityucyate |
T04canprasu:8095: pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvadavasthitatattvadarśanāt nānyathāvasthitaṃ vastu anyathā abhiniviśate
T04canprasu:8096: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ |
T04canprasu:8104: nābhūvamatītamadhvānam, abhūvaṃ ca nābhūvaṃ ca, naivābhūvaṃ na nābhūvam,
T04canprasu:8109: yāstāḥ śāśvatalokādyāḥ pūrvaṃ prasaṅgena upavarṇitāḥ, tā api
T04canprasu:8111: tatra yadyapi pūrvāntād dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayāduttaraṃ dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ nātibhidyate, tathāpi tāvanmātraviśeṣamāśritya pṛthagupādīyate |
T04canprasu:8116: yacchāśvato lokaḥ ityeṣāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sāmānyena pūrvāntamāśritā |
T04canprasu:8117: abhūvamatītamadhvānam, ityeṣā tu ātmana eva pūrvāntaparāmarśena pravṛttā,
T04canprasu:8120: ityevaṃ tāvat aṣṭāvetā dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntaṃ samupāśritāḥ || 1 ||
T04canprasu:8123: tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya bhāvinaḥ ātmabhāvāḥ aparānta ityucyate |
T04canprasu:8124: aparo hi janmaparaṃparāṃśo 'parāntaḥ, taṃ na pratisarati,
T04canprasu:8128: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ |
T04canprasu:8134: tadyathā- kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānam, na bhaviṣyāmi, bhaviṣyāmi ca na bhaviṣyāmi ca, naiva (Pp_250) bhaviṣyāmi na ca na
T04canprasu:8136: kimetā eva catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ? netyāha |
T04canprasu:8137: kiṃ tarhi aparā api catasro vidyante antādyā aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ |
T04canprasu:8138: tatra antādyāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ sāmānyena aparāntamāaśritya pravṛttāḥ, kiṃ tu bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānamityetāstu ātmana evāparāntamāśritya pravṛttāḥ,
T04canprasu:8140: tatra ādyasya tāvat pūrvāntālambikasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya yathā na
T04canprasu:8143: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu sa eva na bhavatyayam || 3 ||
T04canprasu:8144: tatra ya eva atīteṣu janmasu babhūva, yadi sa evāyamadhunā syāt, tadā yuktamasya grahītum- abhūvamahamatītamadhvānamiti |
T04canprasu:8145: na caitadevaṃ saṃbhavati nityatvaprasaṅgāt, nityasya ca saṃsaraṇānupapatteḥ,
T04canprasu:8147: iha hi pūrvaṃ yadi narakādigatiko bhūtvā idānīṃ karmavaicitryāt manuṣyeṣu upapannaḥ
T04canprasu:8148: evaṃkalpayet- ahamevāsau nāraka āsam iti, tadasya na yuktam |
T04canprasu:8149: kathaṃ hi nāma manuṣyaḥ san nārakādikaḥ syāt?
T04canprasu:8150: yattarhi idaṃ paṭhayate sūtre- ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena
T04canprasu:8151: māndhātā nāma rājā cakravartī abhūvam iti, tat kathaṃ veditavyamiti?
T04canprasu:8153: ata eva hi nānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayeneti paṭhayate |
T04canprasu:8154: yadi punaḥ sa evāyamiti pūrvakasya cādhunātanasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt, ko doṣaḥ syāt?
T04canprasu:8158: yadi sa eva pūrvaka ātmāyamidānīṃ syāt, tadā upādānasya pañcaskandhalakṣaṇasya viśeṣo na syāt upādāturaviśeṣātpūrvāvasthāyāmiva |
T04canprasu:8159: na caivamupādānāviśeṣo 'syātmanaḥ, kiṃ tarhi viśiṣyata eva upādānamupādātuḥ karmabhedāt kārakabhedācca
T04canprasu:8160: tataśca upādānaviśeṣāt sa evāyamātmeti na yujyate ||
T04canprasu:8161: atha manyase- viśiṣyatāmupādānam, ātmā tu eka eveti |
T04canprasu:8165: yadi hi anyadupādānam, anyaścātmā syāt, tadā upādānaviśeṣe 'pi ātmano
T04canprasu:8167: na caitad bhedena darśayituṃ śakyam- ayamasāvātmā,
T04canprasu:8170: yadā caivamupādānavinirmukta ātmā darśayituṃ na śakyate, tadā upādānaviśeṣe 'pi
T04canprasu:8172: athāpi kaścit parikalpayet- satyam, upādānavinirmukta iti evaṃ na
T04canprasu:8173: saṃbhavati, kimupādānameva ātmatvena parikalpyate iti? etadapi na yuktamiti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8176: yathā tāvadupādānamevātmā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8179: tatra yadetat pañcopādānaskandhākhyamupādānam, tat pratikṣaṇamutpadyate ca
T04canprasu:8181: na caivamātmā pratikṣaṇamutpadyate ca vinaśyati ca |
T04canprasu:8182: ātmā skandhebhyastattvānyatvādinā ca nityānityatvenāpyaśakya eva vaktum,
T04canprasu:8184: nityatve hi ātmanaḥ śāśvatavādaḥ syāt, anityatve ca ucchedavādaprasaṅgaḥ |
T04canprasu:8191: tasya copādānasya yadi ātmatvamiṣyate, tatra upādānameva upādātā ityapi vidyate |
T04canprasu:8193: na caitad dṛṣṭaṃ yuktaṃ vā iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8197: atrāha- satyamupādānamātramātmā na yujyate, kiṃ tarhi upādānavyatirikta
T04canprasu:8202: gṛhyate hyanupādāno yadyanyo na ca gṛhyate || 7 ||
T04canprasu:8203: yadi upādānādātmā vyatiriktaḥ syāt, gṛhyeta sa upādānavyatiriktaḥ,
T04canprasu:8210: ātmā nāstyanupādānaḥ atha syāt- yadi ātmā upādānasvarūpo na bhavati,
T04canprasu:8213: sa hi anyo 'pi na bhavati upādānamanapekṣya bhedena grahaṇaprasaṅgāt |
T04canprasu:8219: yo hi nāma skandhānupādāya prajñapyate, sa kathaṃ nāstīti syāt? na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ skandhānupādāya prajñapyate |
T04canprasu:8220: kathaṃ sati upādāne upādātā nāstīti yujyate |
T04canprasu:8224: ihāpi ca pūrvameva sthānasthāneṣu kṛtā vyavastheti na punariha tadvayavasthāne yatna āsthīyate evaṃ tāvadabhūvamatītamadhvānamityeṣā kalpanā nopapadyate |
T04canprasu:8225: idānīṃ nābhūvamatītamadhvānamityedapi yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8227: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam || 9 ||
T04canprasu:8228: yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya adhunātanasya ātmano 'nyatvaṃ syāt, tadānīṃ nābhūmatītamadhvānamiti syāt |
T04canprasu:8231: yadi punaḥ pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt, ko doṣa iti? ucyate-
T04canprasu:8232: yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet |
T04canprasu:8233: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra jāyeta vāmṛtaḥ || 10 ||
T04canprasu:8234: yadi hi ayamadhunātana ātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anyaḥ syāt, tadā taṃ pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya parityajya tannirapekṣaḥ ataddhetuka eva syāt
T04canprasu:8236: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt, tadā anyatvād ghaṭotpāde paṭāvināśavat pūrvasyātmanā uttarasminnapi ātmani samutpadyamāne 'pi anirodhaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:8237: aniruddhatvācca yatra pūrvaṃ devamanuṣyādijanmasu upapannaḥ, yena varṇasaṃsthānādinā pūrvamupalabhyamānaḥ, tenaiva prakāreṇa tathaiva sa tatrāvatiṣṭheta tathaivāvatiṣṭheteti |
T04canprasu:8240: yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet |
T04canprasu:8242: yadi puna pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya [ayamiha bhavet, ko doṣaḥ syāt?
T04canprasu:8247: yadi pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya ayamātmā bhavet, tadā] pūrvakasya ātmanaḥ tatra naṣṭatvād, iha ca anyasyaiva cotpādanātpūrvakasyātmana ucchedaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:8248: tasmiṃśca ātmani ucchinne karmaṇāmadattaphalānāmevāśrayavicchedena vicchedāt, bhoktaścābhāvānnāśa eva syāt |
T04canprasu:8249: atha pūrvakenātmanā kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ uttareṇātmanā phalaparibhogaḥ parikalpyate, tathāpi anyena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalasya anyenopabhogaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:8254: yadi ayamātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anya eva atropapannaḥ syāt, tadā pūrvamabhūtvā paścādutpanna iti syāt |
T04canprasu:8259: yadi hi ātmā pūrvamabhūtvā paścādutpannaḥ syāt, tadā kṛtaka eva ātmā syāt |
T04canprasu:8261: vyatiriktasya ca tanniṣpādakasya karturabhāvāt kutaḥ kṛtakatvamātmano yojyeta? kṛtake cātmani parikalpyamāne ādimān saṃsāraḥ syādeva, apūrvasattvasya prādurbhāvaśca |
T04canprasu:8267: pūrvaṃ hi ātmā nāstīti akṛtako nirhetukaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:8269: kṛtako vā bhavedātmā yadi vā nābhūvamatītamadhvānamityetannābhyupeyam |
T04canprasu:8277: evaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena abhūmatītamadhvānamiti yā dṛṣṭiḥ, eṣāpi naivopapadyate |
T04canprasu:8281: ekaikasya ca pṛthakpṛthagabhāvāt kutastatsamāhāra iti ubhayamapi na saṃbhavati |
T04canprasu:8284: tadevaṃ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya asaṃbhavamudbhāvya idānīmaparāntasamāśritasya
T04canprasu:8287: yathaiva hi atīte 'dhvani dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ niṣiddham, evamanāgate
T04canprasu:8291: aiṣyajanmani yo bhāvo sa eva na bhavatyayam ||
T04canprasu:8295: na syāmanāgate kāle ityetannopapadyate aiṣya janmani yo bhāvo tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam ||
T04canprasu:8299: sa devaḥ sa manuṣyaścedevaṃ bhavati śāśvatam |
T04canprasu:8300: anutpannaśca devaḥ syājjāyate na hi śāśvatam || 15 ||
T04canprasu:8301: iha hi kaścinmanuṣyagatisthaḥ kuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā devagatiṃ gacchati |
T04canprasu:8302: tatra yadi sa eva devaḥ sa eva manuṣya iti evamubhayoraikyaṃ syāt, tadā śāśvataṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:8303: na caitadevaṃ yadeva eva manuṣyo bhavediti |
T04canprasu:8307: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmājjāyate na hi śāśvatam |
T04canprasu:8310: tataśca anutpanno devaḥ syāt, anutpanno devo na yujyate iti || evaṃ tāvacchāśvataṃ na yujyate idānīmaśāśvatamapi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8313: yadi hi anyo devo 'nyaśca manuṣyaḥ syāt, tadā pūrvakasya manuṣyātmanastatra naṣṭatvādiha ca anyasyaivotpādāt sa pūrvako manuṣyātmā tatra vinaṣṭa ityaśāśvataṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:8317: yadi devādanyo manuṣyo bhavet, tadā yathā nimbasya na āmratarusaṃtāno bhavati, evaṃ manuṣyasya devaḥ ekasaṃtānapatito na syāt |
T04canprasu:8320: (Pp_255) yadi devādanyo manuṣyo bhavet, tadā saṃtānānuvṛttirna syāt |
T04canprasu:8321: asti ceyaṃ saṃtānānuvṛttiḥ devasya manuṣyaḥ ekasaṃtānapatita iti |
T04canprasu:8322: tasmāt saṃtānābhāvaprasaṅgāt devādanyo manuṣyo na bhavati |
T04canprasu:8325: divyo yadyekadeśaḥ syādekadeśaśca mānuṣaḥ aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca bhavettacca na yujyate || yadi ayaṃ manuṣyaḥ aṃśena manuṣyatāṃ vijahyāt, aṃśena vihāya manuṣyatāṃ
T04canprasu:8326: devātmabhāvamupādadyāt, tadā ekadeśasya nāśādaśāśvataṃ syāt, ekadeśasya ca avasthānācchāśvataṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:8327: etacca ayuktaṃ yadekasya divyagatisaṃgṛhītaḥ ekadeśaḥ syāt, ekadeśaśca manuṣyaḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:8328: tasmācchāśvataṃ ca aśāśvataṃ ca etadubhayaṃ nopapadyate || 17 ||
T04canprasu:8332: yadi śāśvataṃ kiṃcidvastu syāt, tadā paścādaśāśvatadarśanānnaiva śāśvatamiti syāt |
T04canprasu:8333: evaṃ yadi kiṃcidaśāśvataṃ syāt, tadā tasya paścācchāśvatopapattito nāśāśvatamiti syāt |
T04canprasu:8334: yadā tu śāśvatāśāśvatamevāprasiddham, tadā kutastatpratiṣedhena naivaśāśvataṃ
T04canprasu:8336: atha syāt- anādijanmamaraṇaparaṃparāpravṛttamavicchinnakamaṃ saṃsāraprabandhamupalabhya śāśvata mātmānaṃ parikalpayāmaḥ |
T04canprasu:8337: astyasau śāśvataḥ kaścit padārthaḥ, yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti |
T04canprasu:8343: yadi tasmādanādistu saṃsāraḥ syānna cāsti saḥ || 19 ||
T04canprasu:8344: yadi hi saṃskārāṇāmātmano va kutaścidgatyantarād gamanaṃ gatyantaramāgamanaṃ syāt, tataśca gantyantarāt punaḥ kvacid gamanaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:8348: na cāpi itaḥ punaḥ kasyacit kvacid gamanaṃ saṃbhavati, nityasya vā anityasya gamanānupapatteḥ
T04canprasu:8349: yadā caivaṃ na saṃbhavati, tadā kuto janmamaraṇaparaṃparāyā atidīrghatvena ādyanupalambhādanādimān saṃsāraḥ syāt? saṃsarturabhāvāt kutaḥ anādimattvamādimatvaṃ vā saṃsārasya saṃbhavet? yadā ca na saṃbhavati, tadā
T04canprasu:8350: yaduktam- astyasau śāśvataḥ kaścitpadārthaḥ, yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti, tanna yuktam ||
T04canprasu:8354: yadā caivaṃ śāśvata eva padārtho na saṃbhavati, tadā kasya vigamanādaśāśvataḥ syāt |
T04canprasu:8356: nobhayamiti? tasmādevaṃ śāśvatādidṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ pūrvānte saṃsārasya na saṃbhavati || 20
T04canprasu:8359: antavān yadi lokaḥ syātparalokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet |
T04canprasu:8361: yadi hi antavān, vināśādūrdhvaṃ pūrvaloko na syāt, tadā paraloko na syāt asti ca paraloka iti antavāṃlloka iti nopapadyate |
T04canprasu:8362: athāpi anantavāṃllokaḥ syāt, tadānīmapi paralokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet? naiva paralokaḥ syādityabhiprāyaḥ
T04canprasu:8365: idānīmantavattvamanantavatvaṃ ca ubhayametallokasya yathā na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:8374: yadi pūrve manuṣyaskandhā naśyeyuḥ, tāṃśca pratītya uttare
T04canprasu:8375: devagatyupapattisaṃgṛhītā nopapadyeran, tadā antavān loko bhavet tailavartikṣayaniruddhapradīpavat
T04canprasu:8379: atha yadi pūrvakāḥ skandhā na naśyeṣuḥ, tān pratītya uttare phalabhūtāḥ skandhā notpadyeran tadā ananto 'vināśī lokaḥ syāt svarūpādapracyutatvāt |
T04canprasu:8380: yadā tu pūrvakāḥ skandhā nirudhyante taddhetukāścāpare skandhā uttarakālaṃ jāyante, tadā pūrvakānāmanavasthānāt kuto 'nantavattvaṃ saṃsārasya syāt?
T04canprasu:8384: yadi hi kasyacidekadeśasya vināśaḥ syāt, ekadeśasya ca gatyantaragamanaṃ
T04canprasu:8386: na caitadevaṃ saṃbhavati yadekadeśo naśyati, ekadeśo na naśyatīti |
T04canprasu:8387: ataḥ antavāṃśca anantavāṃśca loka iti na yujyate || 25 ||
T04canprasu:8388: kasmāt punarekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8390: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśa evaṃ caitanna yujyate || 26 ||
T04canprasu:8391: iha ekadeśasya vināśe ekadeśasya cāvasthāne parikalpyamāne yadi vā upādāturekadeśasya vināśaḥ avasthānaṃ vā parikalpyeta, yadi vā upādānasya?
T04canprasu:8392: tatra yadi tāvadupādāturekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ
T04canprasu:8396: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśaḥ naiva hi atra kācidupapattirasti yayā ekadeśasya vināśamekadeśasya cāvināśaṃ parikalpayiṣyāmaḥ |
T04canprasu:8401: sa ca skandheṣu pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇo na saṃbhavati |
T04canprasu:8402: yaśca na saṃbhavati, tasya kathamekadeśo vinaṅkṣyate,
T04canprasu:8403: ekadeśaśca na naṅkṣyate? ata evāha- evaṃ caitanna yujyate iti |
T04canprasu:8404: athavā yadi upādāturekadeśo naśyedekadeśaśca na naśyet, tadā ekasyaiva upādāturdevatvamaṃśenānyena manuṣyatvaṃ syāt |
T04canprasu:8408: idānīmupādānasyāpi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8412: tadevamubhayadarśanāsaṃbhavaṃ pratipādya idānīṃ yathā nobhayamapi na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8416: ataḥ antavattve ca anantavattve ca ubhayasminnapratīte kasya pratiṣedhena naivāntavān nānantavān lokaḥ iti dṛṣṭisaṃbhavaḥ syāditi || 28 ||
T04canprasu:8417: evaṃ tāvat sāṃvṛtaṃ pratibimbākāramupādātāramupādānaṃ cābhyupetyāpi śāśvatādidṛṣṭayasaṃbhavaṃ pratipādya idānīṃ sarvathā bhāvasvabhāvānupalambhena bandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivat śāśvatādidṛṣṭīnāmasaṃbhavaṃ pratipipādayiṣurāha-
T04canprasu:8420: iha sarvabhāvānāṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt śūnyatvaṃ sakalena śāstreṇa pratipāditam |
T04canprasu:8421: tataśca sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt katamāstāḥ sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ śāśvatādyā dṛṣṭayo bhaviṣyanti, yāḥ kaścid grahīṣyati
T04canprasu:8422: yatastannirākaraṇamārapsyāmahe? tathā kiṃ vā ālambanaṃ yat sarvabhāvānantargataṃ yatraitā dṛṣṭaya utpatsyante yatraitā dṛṣṭīrnivārayiṣyāmaḥ? katamaścāsau bhāvaḥ pudgalo vā sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ yasyaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ utpatsyante yaṃ dṛṣṭibhyo nivārayiṣyāmaḥ? kiṃ vā dṛṣṭīnāmutpattikāraṇamālambananimittaṃ sarvabhāvabāhyaṃ yasmānnimittādutpadyamānāḥ śāśvatādikāḥ dṛṣṭīḥ vārayiṣyāmaḥ? sarveṣāmeva hi padārthānāṃ sarvabhāvāntargatatvāt śūnyatvam, śūnyatvācca sarve eva hi te padārthā nopalabhyanta iti,
T04canprasu:8424: naiva kāścit, naiva kvacit, naiva kasyacit, nāpi kenacidākāreṇa saṃbhaviṣyantītyabhiprāyaḥ
T04canprasu:8425: asaṃbhave ca sati āsāṃ parikalpanaiva notpadyate ityayuktā evaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ || 29 ||
T04canprasu:8436: prapañcopaśamaṃ śivaṃ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñayā hi deśitavān sarvadṛṣṭiprahāṇārthaṃ jagatāmanukampāmupādāya mahākaruṇāmevāśritya priyaikaputrādhikatarapremapātrasakalatribhuvanajanaḥ na lābhasatkārapratyupakārādilipsayā, taṃ namasyāmi niruttaramadvitīyaṃ
T04canprasu:8441: ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitamajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanāvaraṇaṃ śivamabhayamanāhāryamavyayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati asatastucchataḥ riktato 'sārato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghato 'nityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ, na sa pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati |
T04canprasu:8444: aparāntaṃ vā punarna pratisarati kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani, (Pp_259) āhosvinna bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani,
T04canprasu:8445: ko nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani, kathaṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani |
T04canprasu:8446: pratyutpannaṃ vā punarna pratisarati kiṃ nvidaṃ kathaṃ nvidaṃ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ ayaṃ sattvaḥ kutaṃ āgataḥ, sa itaścyutaḥ kutra gamiṣyatīti yānyekeṣāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ pṛthagloke dṛṣṭigatāni bhaviṣyanti tadyathā-
T04canprasu:8447: ātmavādapratisaṃyuktāni jīvavādapratisaṃyuktāni kautukamaṅgalapratisaṃyuktāni, tānyasya tasmin samaye prahīṇāni bhavanti parijñātāni samucchinnamūlāni tālamastakavadanābhāsagatāni
T04canprasu:8449: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāṣitamabhinandya anupramodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ, prakrāntāste ca bhikṣava iti ||
T04canprasu:8450: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dṛṣṭiparīkṣā nāma saptaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam ||
